mthu stobs bsam mi khyab// de phyir chos skyong chen po'o// 'jigs pa'i tshul ston gshin rje'o// gnag pa'i cha lugs bdud kyi gtso// 'phengs par skong nor lha'o// dngos grub khol du phyung
ba'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// 'dod khams dbang byed gnod sbyin
'di// shin tu gdug cing mi bsrun na// 'di yi gnyen po gang la bgyi// gnyen po'i sgrub pa gang la bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// gnod sbyin bsgrub pa'i

rnal 'byor pas// phyag na rdo rje grub par bya// dang po dben pa'i gnas dag tu// stegs bu shin tu mdzes pa la// tsan dan bsregs pa'i dud pa dang// ma ki rtsi dang bcas pa'o// bdud rtsi rnam lngas byugs nas

su// me tog nag po dgram par bya// dam tshig skyed la ye shes bsam// spyan drangs phyi nang gsang bas mchod// sum 'bum dag tu sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ gtor ma sha lnga bdud rtsi
lnga// 'bru gsum 'od kyi byin gyis brlabs// mchod cing gtor mas mnyes par bya// me tog nag po dus gsum mchod// sku gsung thugs kyi rtags byung nas// de nas gnod sbyin bsgrub pa bya// dngos grub
khol du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ gnyen po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos// 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di dang 'thun pa'i gnas gang lags/
gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// byang du kha ltas gser gyi mdog/ gnya' shing 'dzin gyi ri 'dra ba// chu gling me tog gling yang zer// rgya mtsho che 'am dur khrod
du// gdeng dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sgrub na dngos grub thob 'gyur ro// dngos grub khol du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ gnas btsal ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga'
bos// gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje la// 'di skad ces ni tshig gsol to// bsod nams 'dod pa gang dag gis// des ni ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi// sngags kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa

kun dga' bo// gnas ni yid 'ong dben pa ru// pad+ma 'dab brgyad gong sar la// rin chen sna lnga dag gis ni// mtha' ma 'ja' tshon rnam lngas bskor// khyams dang rta babs sgo brgyan rin chen 'bar// mdzes

pa'i 'phan 'phran brgyad ldan bri// pad+ma phyogs kyi 'dab ma la// sman lnga 'bru lnga snying po lngas gang ba'i// bum pa lnga dag bdud rtsi gang ba'i snod// 'bras bu chags pa'i kha brgyan byas// mgul chings dag gis
bcing bar bya// de stengs dpon g.yog tshang bar dgram// mdun du nor gyi sid+d+hi stsol cig pa'i// byang bu re re bris la gzhag/ mtshams bzhir gtor snod gzhag par bya// me tog 'phreng dang mar
me dang// sna tshogs dar gyi rgyal mtshan bla re dgram par bya// 'jig rten zas kyi bye brag ni// ma lus 'tshogs par bsags par bya// nyin dang mtshan mo dus drug tu// tshogs dang gtor ma rgyun mi
gcad// ser sna med pa'i sems kyis mchod// rang nyid gsang bdag nga rgyal gyis// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas su// dpon g.yog rnams ni dgug par bya// sngags kyi rnam pa 'di dag yin// gzugs

pa'i dngos grub 'di rnams yod// thams cad sgrub phyir bshad par bya// oM radan tsit+ta ra ga ru ge rad na tsit+ta hUM/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ar+ya dzaM b+ha ri hri ta hUM/ oM ma hA ka la ha na ha na badzra na swA hA/ oM yak+Sha de ba pany+tsa rA

dza dza dza/ a ma hA rA dza bai shra ma Na ye swA hA/ glo dang sbrid pa dbyal gyis bar mi gcad// chod na sngags kyi yan lag nyams// bul na nor zhing yal bar 'gyur// dgon pa nas ni 'ben gang nas// phar ni 'gro

bar mi rung ngo// bar chad sngags pa rang la yong// bar du rol mo'i sgra sgrags shing// gus pa'i tshul gyis mchod bstod bya// ma gus pa la byin mi brlob// des na gus pas mnyes par bya// gtso bo 'bum la

'khor la khri// bsgrub pa'i sngags dang las rnams rdzogs// mtshan ma byung bar ma gyur na// bar chad mtshan ma yin srid pas// 'jigs shing phya sangs khyer ba dang// yo byad 'phang sems byed pa dang// khro dang

'gro snying 'dod pa dang// bying zhing yid la mi dran dang// rmi lam gzhan gyis nor khyer na// bar chad bzlog pa'i cho ga bya// 'bru dang me tog char 'babs dang// rin po che ni mang rnyed dang// 'phral gyi bza'

ba tha ma yin// gal te de ltar ma byung na// 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin mdun du ni// zhag gsum smyung bar gnas byas la// khrus byas gos dkar gon nas su// lus la dri zhim spos kyis byug/ zla ba yar ngo'i tshes

brgyad la// lci ba'i dal gyi dbus su ni// dkar gsum mngar gsum sbyar ba'i chu// khyor ba stong dang rtsa brgyad du// mchod dam kun tu rgyu'i spos kyis bdug/ de yi mtshan mo rmi lam du// gter ni brgya stong ston

par 'gyur// tsan dan dag gi shing dag dang// rgyas ba yi ni shing rnams sam// ka ra bI ra'i shing rnams la// rin chen sna tshogs 'bru sna dang// de sogs rgyas pa'i rdzas rnams la// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg brgya
phul na// rgyal srid sa yang thob par 'gyur// longs spyod phran tshegs smos ci dgos// dngos grub khol du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ nor sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po

yis// sngags kyi sham bu 'di gsungs so// sa mA ya sarba sid+d+hi dza dza/[ (]radan [)]sid+d+hi d+harma sid+d+hi/ pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye/ sa b+ho sid+d+hi hUM/ d+ha naM me de hi/ na ma kha de sid+d+hi dza hUM a/ rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba
dang// sngags la sham bu btags la bzlas// bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje bsgom// thugs kha'i hUM las 'od 'phros bas// gnod sbyin rnams kyi thugs rgyud bskul// 'od zer de rnams tshur 'dus pas// rang khyim
nor gyis gang bar bsam// dngos grub khol du phyung ba'i rgyud las// sngags dang ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// rtags kyi rim pa 'di gsungs

so// lha rtags bstan pa 'di lta ste// slob dpon nor rdzas ster byung ba// zhang dbon yab yum grub pa yin// 'od dkar me tog dkar po ni// dzam+b+ha la ni grub pa yin// ban nag 'od nag bya nag ni// mgon po

yab yum grub pa yin// mi ni mang po phyag 'tshal na// 'brog gnas mched lnga grub pa yin// rta pa mang po rmi ba ni// rnam thos sras ni grub pa yin// de rnams thams cad rmi 'gyur na// dpon g.yog thams cad

grub pa yin// sna la rtags ni gang byung ba// de dang las 'phro yod pa yin// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rtags rnams ni// 'bru yis bang mdzod gang ba dang// rin po che yi char 'bab dang// zas nor ster dang

gter rnyed pa// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rtags yin no// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// dngos grub bskul ba'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// snyan pa'i sgra sgrags 'di skad bskul// hUM/ ri rab lhun po'i tshur rol
na// gnya' shing 'dzin gyi pha rol nas// rin chen mdzes pa'i gzhal yas nas// ye shes brjid ldan 'od 'bar sku// mdzes pa'i rin chen praug zhu gsol// bdud rtsi bum pa rin chen 'dzin// bsgrub pa po la

dngos grub ster// ming ni rdo rje bdud 'dul te// dam tshig dbang gis 'dir gshegs la// rnal 'byor bdag la dngos grub stsol// shar gyi phyogs nas byung ba ni// dzam+b+ha la ni nor gyi lha// rin chen 'bar ba'i
sgrom bu 'dzin// 'dzum bag dkar po nor gyi bdag/ 'dir gshegs mchod 'bul dngos grub stsol// lho phyogs dur khrod zhing skyong tshogs la dbang sgyur ba// tsan dan be con lcags phor 'dzin// mdog gnag
dpal ldan mgon po che// 'dir spyon mchod bzhes dngos grub gsol// nub phyogs bzhugs pa nor gyi bdag/ dbu drug phyag drug sku mdog dmar// sku mched lngar ni yang dag gsal// 'dir bzhugs gnas
la nges med kyang// rnal 'byor dad pas spyan 'dren na// gnas 'dir bdag la dngos grub stsol// byang phyogs lus ngan sku mdog ljang// gser kyi spa lcag dngul gzhong 'dzin// gye ling gser 'dra chibs su
chibs// 'dir gshegs mchod 'bul dngos grub stsol// hUM/ mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje dam tshig gis// sngon gyi thugs dam dgongs pa'i dpon

g.yog rnams// 'dir gshegs bdag la 'dus 'dir stsol// oM ma hA yak+Sha [(]radan [)]tsit+ta gu Na hri da hUM/ oM badzra [(]radan [)]ra ga ra ti sid+d+hi sa ma yA/ ka yA bA ga tsit+ta maM ga la ga ta phA la sid+d+hi hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes

bskul lo// 'di grub pa yi yon tan ni// 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang sgyur zhing// tshe 'dir bde skyid phun sum tshogs// phyi ma ngan song dag las thar// ci bsam thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dngos grub khol

du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ grub rtags dang cho ga'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// zhang dpon dpon g.yog lnga pa la// bla rdo rnam pa lnga gsungs so// dang po zhang dbon nyid la

ni// seng ldeng seng ge mtshon gang la// zhang dpon nyid du bskyed byas la// mthing gi shog bu gru bzhi la// srog sngags gser gyis rab bris la// ser ldeng seng ge gtum par bya// 'bru sna lnga dang rin chen

lnga// dar sna lnga yis gril byas la// yon tan nyi ma dang mnyam phyir// za 'og nyi ris khug mar gzhug/ zhang dbon nyid kyi bla rdo 'o// shar phyogs nor lha'i bla rdo ni// chu shes dkar po tshon gang la// shar phyogs

nor lha nyid du bsgom// srog snying gser gyis bris la dril// dar dkar khug mar gzhug par bya// lho phyogs mgon po'i bla rdo ni// zhang nye dkar po mtshon gang la// lho phyogs mgon por bskyed par bya// srog

snying mthing gis bris byas la// le brgan sngon po'i khur mar gzhug/ lho phyogs mgon po'i bla rdo'o// nub phyogs 'brog gnas bla rdo ni// me rdo smug po tshon gang la// srog snying mtshal gyis bris byas la// de yi

bla rdor bcang bar bya// 'brog gnas mched lngar bskyed par bya// le brgan dmar ser khug mar gzhug/ 'brog gnas mched lnga'i bla rdo 'o// rnam thos sras kyi bla rdo ni// rdo ni pha wang long bu la// rnam thos sras

su bskyed par bya// srog sngags ri bong khrag gis bri// le brgan dmar po'i khug mar gzhug/ rnam thos sras kyi bla rdo 'o// 'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga// nor sgrub dus su blug par bya// de rnams mchan khung
g.yon du bcang// mi yis mthong na dam tshig nyams// gsang la spyad pa rab tu gces// rang la 'khu ldog byed gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin par gsal ba yis// rkang pa g.yon pa'i 'og tu gnan// gal te bsgrubs

pas ma grub na// bla rdo ri gsum rtse bskyal gnan// des ni ci bsam 'grub par byed// gal te srog sgrub byed gyur na// bla rdo bya lugs mthun pa la// gzas pa'i ling ga bris byas la// dpon g.yog bla rdo'i zla
la gzhug/ gzas pa'i phyogs su bla rdo brdab// dpon g.yog lnga po khros gyur te// gzas pa brlag par the tshom med// bla rdo'i gdams pa 'di med na// khyi rgod phugs su bcug pa 'dra// bla rdo'i
gdams pa 'di shes na// bu gcig pa la ma byams ltar// bdag la brtse gdung che bar 'gyur// rgyal pos 'bangs la bka' bsgo ltar// rnal 'byor bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur// khyi la nar mar zan byin
bzhin// bdag la rtag tu chags par 'gyur// de phyir 'di la nan ta bskyed// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// a ka ru ni nag po la// gnod sbyin ci 'dra'i
gzugs bris la// bai DUr+Ya yi mdog bsgyur la// rin chen gser gyis snying po bri// sku bskyed rab gnas byin gyis brlab// gtsug gam mgul du gdags par bya// bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// lus

dang grib ma bzhin du 'ong// dngos grub khol du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ bla rdo gzung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// oM ma hA yak+Sha rat+na tsit+ta

hUM/ gu Na hri da hUM 'di yi yon tan bsam mi khyab// rgyal po g.yul du zhugs pa'i tshe// spyi bor snying po 'di bcings nas// bstod dang gsang sngags 'di brjod na// dgra rnams rab tu 'pham par 'gyur// zhi

rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// las rnams de ni ci dga' byed// 'di ni legs par bsgrubs gyur na// ji ltar 'dod pa grub par 'gyur// dngos grub khol du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ 'khrug pa rgyal ba dang yon
tan rgyas pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos gsol pa// gang zag snod kyi rim pa ni// rgyud 'di gang la bstan pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig

'phags pa kun dga' bo// mi bstan pa yi rim pa la// kha sbub can dang zhabs su rdol// dri ma can dang som nyi can// log chos can dang g.yeng ba can// dka' thub can dang rtog pa che// mi sgrub spel dang bla
ma spong// dam med dmyal ba'i rgyu can la// rna bar yang ni mi bsgrag go/ rin po che yi gang zag la// shin tu gdams te sbyin par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// 'phags pa kun
dga' bo la sogs pa 'dus 'khor de dag gis/ lha'i me tog gtor nas bstod pa/ zhi ba'i las mdzad byang chub sems dpa'i tshul// rgyas pa'i las mdzad dga' ldan lha yi tshul// dbang gi las mdzad gtum
po 'jigs pa'i tshul// drag po'i las mdzad sku la brjod du med// rgyal ba sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbul 'phongs bsal phyir zhal nas bdud rtsi shar// longs spyod spel phyir zhal nas rgyud
gsungs pa// bdud rtsi gsang rgyud de la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// gsang sngags grong khyer spyod pa'i tshe// rgyud
'di dkon pas/ gser zas kyang dkon par 'gyur ro// ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur// zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te// shin tu dkon par 'gyur
ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nas dus nam zhig na rgyud 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og

tu// lo ni brgya dang drug cu na// lho phyogs be ta la'i yul du ni// dge slong klu grub ces bya 'byung// rgyud 'di de yis 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas lo ni grangs med nas// chu bo lo hi ta yi 'gram// has po ri zhes

bya ba'i rtsar// many+dzu shri'i sprul pa ni// sman pa'i rgyal por grags pa des// de yis rgyud 'di 'dzin par 'gyur// skal bar ldan pas 'dzin par 'gyur// skal med rnams la ming mi grag/ 'di la mi mos smod byed

pa// de ni rig pa 'dzin ma yin// gang zhig 'di la mi mos pa// gzhan dag phub ma bdungs dang 'dra// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ kun dga' bo dga' zhing yi rang nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po la gsol pa/
bdag gis spobs par gyur nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs so// zhes lha'i me tog gtor nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rin po che
nor gyi dngos grub chen po khol du phyung ba'i rgyud las le'u ste bcu pa'o//// dngos grub chen po khol du phyung ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgyud 'di la dngos grub kyi bka' ma chad par byung ba
yin pas/ bka' dam par bgyi'o//// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha sid+d+hi b+hir ya ti tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin chen po yid bzhin gter gyi rgyud ces bya ba/
gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na/ wA ra Na si

nas lho phyogs kyi mtshams su gshegs pa las/ de'i tshe de'i dus na grong khyer chen po dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba dang/ yab gnod sbyin mig po che dang// yum klu mo mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba gnyis bshos pa'i

sras gnod sbyin chen po mthu rtsal dang ldan pa zhig 'dug na/ yum kun la gdug byed ma zhes bya ba dang/ 'khor gnod sbyin stong sde dang bcas/ skye 'gro'i sha khrag la longs spyod cing sems can rnams la rnam
par 'tshe ba cig 'dug ste/ de 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po mthu stobs dang ldan pa lag na rdo rje la byin gyis brlabs nas 'dul bar bskos so// de

nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes sku 'jigs pa'i cha lugs bstan/ rngam pa'i nga ro dang ldan pas/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+ta na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra dun b+h+yo yak+Sha tig Na sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes nga

ro 'brug stong dus gcig tu bzlas pas/ gnod sbyin chen po 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu skrag pa dang ldan pas bka' nyan cing 'dud par gyur to// oM badzra [(]radan [)]tsit+ta ra ga ru ge yak+Sha tsit+ta sarba ru pa hUM phaT/

ces srog gi snying po mgrin gcig tu phul lo// de nas spyi bor rdo rje rtse lnga pa gzhag ste/ shAkya'i bstan pa bsrung zhing sems can gyi dbul ba sel bar dbang bskur ro// rtsa rgyud yid bzhin gter gyi rgyud las/

gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'khor gyi nang nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po yak+Sha ku be ra zhes bya ba bstan las langs te/ lag na rdo rje la gsol ba/ e ma rdo rje 'dzin pa che// 'gro ba'i don la
brtson mdzad pa// phyi rabs gang zag rnam bzhi yis// gdug pa'i gnod sbyin ji ltar bsgrub// gnas dang dus dang rdzas dang sngags// las kyi rnam grangs gang yin pa// bye brag rgyas par bstan du
gsol// zhes zhus so// yid bzhin gter gyi rgyud las/ zhus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
rnams// phyi rabs don du bshad kyis nyon// brtson ldan gnod sbyin sgrub 'dod na// theg chen rigs ldan sems ldan pas// lo zla gza' skar shis pa la// dga' ba'i tshal lam kun dga' rar// yang na bkra
shis dben gnas su// bsod nams ldan pa'i rgyal po 'am// khyim bdag bram ze phun tshogs pa'i// khang khyim sa blang stegs bu brtsigs// sku gzugs dar phan rgyan dang bcas// phyi yi rten du gzugs par

bya// seng ldeng seng ge dngul sgrom dang// ga'u zangs seng gser rta'i gzugs// sngags dang gzugs bcas nang gi rten// seng ldeng seng ge lto sbyar nas// 'khor lo rin chen gsang ba'i rten// lug nag khyi dang

shel rdo nag/ rin chen lnga dang ne le'i snying// mi ldog bla rdo dal 'og bca'// dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi bsgo bzhir ldan// mdzes pa'i tshon gyis kha dog dbye// bum pa dngos grub rdzas dang ldan// dbus su nor

gyi rten du bca'// phyogs bzhir mchod pa'i 'bru gtor bca'// de nas ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// sgrub pa po yis gsang bdag bskyed// mdun du b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang// rin chen rgyan dang ldan pa'i nang//
sa bon yig 'bru lnga po las// dkyil 'khor dbus dang phyogs bzhi por// dbus su gnod sbyin chen po bskyed// shar du nor lha lhor mgon po// nub tu 'brog gnas byang phyogs su// rnam thos bu

pho bskyed par bya// spyan drangs bzhugs gsol phyag rgya bya// mchod cing bstod de sngags kyang bzlas// gnas nas bskul zhing 'phrin las bcol// ting 'dzin 'phro 'dur rab ldan pas// smra ba spangs nas zla
gcig tu// dril dang gtor ba'i sngags kyis bsnyen// grub na dngos grub rtags rnams dang// ma grub bar chad mtshan ma rtags// grub rtags dpon g.yog lnga yi rtags// gang grub dngos grub blang byas
te// mtshan ldan thod pa 'khor lo dang// spyan gzigs dngos grub rten bkram la// sngags tshig ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// zhag bdun bar du dngos grub blang// bum pa'i rdzas bca' rten du bca'// rgyun du
mchod bstod gsol ba gdab// mnga' gsol rtag tu gsol kha 'bad// de lta bu yi rim pa yis// gang bsgrub 'khor lo sgyur ba 'dra// ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa 'grub// ces gsungs so// gnod sbyin sgrub
pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gdug byed drag po'i gnod sbyin 'di// nor sgrub rten gyi 'khor lo 'di// rtsibs bzhi mu khyud gsum ldan pa'i// dbus su gnod sbyin rtsibs

la 'khor// dpon g.yog lnga yi srog sngags bri// mu khyud rin chen char la 'bebs// gser dngul gyis bris lus la bcang// lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs// bla rdo 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// mu khyud lnga

ldan rtsibs bzhi sngags// mu khyud nang la dbang sdud sngags// rtsibs mchan bla tshe 'gugs pa'i sngags// rdo rje 'phreng ba me ris bskor// dar dmar la bri bla rdo gril// 'khu zhing las la mi 'gro na// bcun
sngags drag pos de la gzir// dngos grub bsdu ba'i 'khor lo ni// mu khyud bzhi dang ldan pa la// dbus su dngos grub rtsol yang bri// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad ldan la// phyogs bzhi dbus dang rnam lngar
sngags// mtshams bzhir nor bu rin chen dang// bdud rtsi bum pa dpag bsam shing// 'dod 'jo ba dang bcas pa bri// mu khyud dngos grub blang ba'i sngags// thod pa mtshan ldan dum gcig pa// shong bu bzhi
dang ldan pa bri// 'dod dgu 'byung ba'i gter du gsungs// 'khor lo'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gnod sbyin gtso 'khor bcas pa yi// sngags kyi rim pa

bstan pa ni// oM badzra ratsit+ta ra ga ru ge hUM phaT swA hA/ bcu bzhi gnod sbyin bsnyen pa'i sngags// oM badzra tsit+ta ban d+ha bdud ma ting skyol ting ting dza dza/ bcu drug bdud mo yum gyi sngags// oM badzra

ma hA kro d+ha Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la hr-i da hUM/ bcu bzhi gnod sbyin nor lha'i sngags// oM ma hA ka la ha na ha na badzre ni swA hA/ bcu gsum mgon po nag po'i sngags// oM badzra yak+Sha de ba pany+tsa rA dza dza dza/ bcu

gnyis 'brog gnas mched lnga'i sngags// oM badzra ma hA rA dza bai shra ma Na ye hUM phaT/ bco lnga rnam thos bu yi sngags// oM badzra ma hA yak+Sha ya a ka tri skyol dza dzA/ bcu gsum gnod sbyin rnon pa'i sngags// oM badzra ma

hA dz+nyA na/ nA ga rA dza/ ha ha rbad rbad sa ma ya dza dzA/ bcu dgu nyi ma 'bum gyi sngags// oM badzra yak+Sha tsakra dun dan dza dzA/ bcu pa kun gyi 'jigs byed sngags// na na kha te sid+hi/ rat+na sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi pha la/ d+ha nam me de

hi hUM/ sarba sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM hUM/ A yur sid+d+hi/ sa ma ya bsdus bsdus/ so drug dngos grub sdud pa'i sngags// oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ru ge yak+Sha trig nan/ rbad nan k+Sha hur thums dza/ ma rA ya rbad/ rtsa gsum gzir dang

bcun pa'i sngags// oM tsi ti tsi ti/ bi li bi li/ glo li a mu kaM/ sad+ha naM/ ba ri ba raM me ba na swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru le ba shaM ku ru hUM/ so bdun gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi// gang dmigs dbang du sdud pa'i

sngags// A yur dz+nyA na min 'du// a pa ri mi ta tshe b+h+ru?M/ bco lnga rgyas pa tshe sngags so// oM badzra tsit+ta ra ga ru ge hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+ha Ar+ya dzaM hri/ ma hA kA la yak+Sha/ de ba pany+tsa/ bai shra ma Na ye sa ma ya dza dza/ zhes pa
ni gsang ba'i sngags// bzlas thabs las kyi rim pa sngags// mkhas pas dmigs dang sbyar la bzlas// gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// gsang sngags kyi rim pa ste le'u lnga

pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// tshe dbang rgyas pa'i las byed na// rin chen bum par tshe rdzas stsal// gnod sbyin mchod rdzas rgya cher bsham// ting 'dzin ldan pas gnod sbyin gyi// sngags la tshe yi
sngags btags te// tshe srog dgug bstim bsgrub pa brtsam// grub nas tshe sba rdzas rnams bza'// tshe lo stong du gnas par 'gyur// rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya
ba// 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mo rnams kyis// dbang du bsdu ba'i las byed na// ras sam gro ga dar dmar la// bcu drug rtsibs mtshan 'khor lo bri// dmigs pa'i gzugs kyi snying khar gzhug/ ting 'dzin dbang

dang rab ldan pas// gnod sbyin pho mo'i gsang sngags spel// zhag bdun bar du bsgrub pa brtsam// rgyal po'i khyim dang grong khyer sogs// bdag gi bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur// dbang gi las kyi le'u ste bdun
pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gnod sbyin drag po'i mthu rtsal gyis// bar chad gdug pa bsgral ba'i thabs// gtor ma spyan gzigs rgya cher bsham// gnod sbyin 'khor bcas gsol cig

mchod// bar chad sel ba'i 'phrin las bcol// drag sngags 'di yis 'byung po 'dul// oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti yak+Sha sarba/ e ki la ya mA ra rbad/ gardza gardza haM shaM tri mA rA ya phaT// pa tsa pa tsa

haM shaM tri mA ra ya phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha haM shaM traM mA ra ya phaT/ hu lu hu lu dam sri mA ra ya phaT/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha rA dza mA ra ya hUM phaT/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha dan tri tri'u mA ra ya hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta 'byung po u tsa ta mA ra ya phaT
phaT/ ces bzlas gnod sbyin 'khor bcas kyis// 'byung po gdul du brlag par sgom// gnod byed skad ngan tser tser 'ong// ji ltar bu yi 'dre gdon che ba yang// drag sngags 'di yis nyams te 'gro// 'byung
po 'dul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sri'u bsrung ba'i las byed na// gnod sbyin grub par gyur nas ni// gang bsrung gnas su rten yang bca'// g.yag rog lug nag rten
du gzugs// sos nas gtang rag btang zhes brjod// gsol mchod gtor mas mnyes byas te// lo gcig bar du srung bar bcol// tshe yi sgrub pas bar chad bsal// gnod sbyin sngags dang srungs shig

spel// zhag bdun sgrubs te gnyer gtad bya// chung sri drag po'i sngags kyis gdul// sos nam gtang rag rgya cher bya// ji lta bu yang 'tsho bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dmangs po sri'u gso ba'i le'u ste dgu
pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gnod sbyin chen po sgrub 'dod na// rje ltar bsten la bsnyen par bkur// grogs ltar bsten la dam tshig bsre// bran ltar bsten la las la bkol// phyi ltar
gsol kas dus su mchod// nang ltar bskang ba bsgrub pa'i grogs// gsang ba ltar mchod mi 'bral grogs// phyi rten g.yag rog lug nag bcang// nang rten ras ris dkyil 'khor bri// gsang rten seng ge
lus la bcang// phyi ltar spyi yi dam tshig bsrung// nang ltar gnod sbyin nyid dang bstun// gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang thub cing// brtson 'grus drag po'i sems kyis sgrub// bla rdo bca' zhing gdung ba
bskyed// 'phrin las gang byed dmigs kyis bcol// dgos 'dod phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// spyir gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya
ba// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs dang bcas pa// dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung ba yi// yid bzhin gter gyi rgyud 'di ni// 'gro ba'i don du bsgrub pa dang// bstan pa gnyan po bsrung bar gyis// zhes bshad
do// rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas gnod sbyin chen po ku be ra dang// gnod sbyin chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad rjes su yi rangs te/ dam la gnas shing 'khor
rnams dang bcas pa longs spyod spel zhing bstan pa srung ba'i las byed do// gnod sbyin chen po yid bzhin gter gyi rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o//// gnod sbyin chen po gter gyi rgyud rdzogs so//// rtsa rgyud yin/ o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bdag bai ro tsa nas bsgyur te rin chen gter du sbas pa'o// sa
ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ a+thi+-i//// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha rA dza tsit+ta badzra ra ga ra ti ma hA gu h+ya tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/

gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rin chen sbyin rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi gsang ba'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom

ldan 'das shAkya thub pa lha'i yul lcang lo can gyi gnas phyag na rdo rje'i pho brang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe b+ha ga wan dang 'khor thams cad gdan 'dzom nas// lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis yongs su// bskor te phyag

'tshal nas// rang rang gi srog gi snying po phul nas rgyud mang po bshad pa'i tshe/ 'khor de'i nang nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs la bdud dang gshin rje'i cha byad can shin tu gdug pa'i tshogs rnams// gnod sbyin

stong phrag lnga brgya dang bcas pa thams cad kyang lag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha thogs pa srog gcod pa la dga' ba zhig gis// rang rtags srog gi snying po mdongs gsol du phul nas/ shin tu dal chags shing

brdal ba'i skad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kha nas gsod pa'i sngags zlos shing// e ma ho/ gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la sogs// nga yi 'khor du gtogs pa yi// gnod sbyin chen po ha ra stong phrag lnga brgya

rnams// b+ha ga wan gyi bka' nyan te// lha rnams dar ni za ba rnams// b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsol mdzod// b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gdug pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs// las ngan byed na dmyal

bar skye// dam tshig nyams na dmyal bar skye// bde gshegs gzhung bzhin bsgrub pa la// srung ba'i las rnams grub par gyis// dkon mchog smod pa'i rgyal po dang// dam sri byed pa'i ban d+he dang// sku la bsdo
ba'i skye bo dang// mtshams med dug can bud med dang// gnod sbyin khyod kyis za bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// gnod sbyin gyis gsol ba/ chos byed thams cad bsrung ba dang// bla ma mgon rnams bsrung ba

dang// bud+d+ha bstan pa gnyan po la// gnod byed thams cad bzlog par gyi// b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyi de ltar byas gyur nas// bud+d+ha sarba mnyes par byed// nga yi thugs kyang mnyes par byed// de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga yis bstan pa'i chos 'di dag/ bud+d+ha sarba'i yum mo// de'i phyir bstan pa bsrung ba ni// bud+d+ha sarba'i thugs bsrung ba yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'phags pa kun dga'

bos 'di skad ces gsol to// b+ha ga wan/ shin tu gdug pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs// skye ba sngon rol gang du blangs// las su bya ba gang la spyod// b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsol cig/ b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsal
pa// rdo rje bdud 'dul gsang rgyud 'di// sngags kyi bdag po de la dris// de yis khyod la legs par 'chad// ces gsungs pa dang/ kun dga' bos dri bar sems pa dang/ phyag na rdo rjes kun dga' bo'i
sems kyis rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ kun dga' bo la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bo// shin tu gdug pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs// sngon chad lha yul

nang na 'dug/ las su lha yi longs spyod spyod// ming ni rdo rje nor bu'o// zhes gsungs so// kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje nor bu lha yi sku// gnod sbyin dag tu skyes pa yi// las kyi rnam
smin ci las byung// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bo// yongs 'du sa brdol ljon shing la// lha dang lha min rtsod pa la// lha rnams 'pham

par gyur ba las// rdo rje nor bu lha yi bu// mar me mdzad ni bud+d+ha la// man d+ha ra ba me tog mngon gtor nas// spyan sngar smon lam 'di btab bo// bcom ldan bdud dang bdud rigs kyi// lha dang lha min

gnyen por shog/ mar me mdzad ni bud+d+ha yis// mgo la phyag ni reg mdzad de// 'dod pa'i khams la dbang byed pas// rdo rje bdud 'dul zhes bya ba'i// gnod sbyin dag tu skye ba ni// der khyod skye bar the tshom

med// badzra pA Nis byin gyis rlob// chos dang mthun par bstan bsrung ngo// zhes mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan no// shin tu gdug pa'i las byed spyod// lag na rdo rje'i bu ru skye// lha yi dug lnga'i shugs las

byung// mar me mdzad kyi spyan snga ru// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa dang// smon lam dag par btab pa'i mthus// da lta shAkya thub pa yi// bstan pa bsrung ba brtson par byed// ces gsungs so// b+ha ga wan gyis legs
so zhes pa gnang ste/ legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje de bzhin te// ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin no// de nas Ar+ya kun dga' bos gsol pa// shin tu gdug pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs// 'dul ba'i
gnyen por bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bos// shin tu gdug pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs// gnya' shing 'dzin la gnas bcas nas// steng 'og kun tu rgyug byed cing// sems can kun gyi srog kyang
gcod// dbugs ni rngub pa tsam gyis kyang// sems can mang po kha ru za// 'dod khams 'di dag phung bar byed// de tshe nga ni gtum por sprul// de dag 'dul bar byas pa la// gnod sbyin rnams

ni 'di lta ste// skra ni gyen song lce yang dril// mig rtsa rig rig rkan sgra brdeb// khyod nyid za bar bya'o zhes// de la ngas ni 'di skad brjod// nyon cig gdug pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs// du: kha ma hA bzod par

gyis// nga yi sku la me 'bar te// dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'bar// ri dang khyim yang 'bar bar byas// gnod sbyin rnams ni rab tu tshig/ gdung ba'i skad kyis 'di skad zer// e ma thugs rje chen po ma lags
sam// bde bar gshegs pas skyab tu gsol// kyi hud bdag cag rnams 'tshig cing brlag/ e ma thugs rje can chen te// zhi yang sems can 'dul don du/ dri ma med pas khro bor sprul// gdug pa 'dul
phyir khro bo'i skul// ston mdzad rdo rje 'chang la skyabs su mchi// bde gshegs ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bdag cag bgyid par 'tshal// 'dod khams 'di na gang 'khod pa// nga yi dbang du mi 'dus

med// bdag gi rig pa 'bul lags na// thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol// oM ma hA yak+Sha badzra tsit+ta ra ga ra ti// gsang sngags bka' rnams bskyang ba dang// bud+d+ha'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang// chos
byed thams cad bsrung ngo zhes// yi dam chen po der bcas so// dbang bskur ming btags dam tshig shes pa byin// rdo rje 'jigs byed bdud dpung 'joms// chos kyi bsrung ma chen por bskos// chos dang
mthun par bstan pa bsrungs// zhes gsungs so// rin chen sbyin gyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas Ar+ya kun dga' bos// b+ha ga wan la 'di skad gsol to// 'dod khams

dbang byed gnod sbyin ni// shin tu gdug cing mi bsrun na// de yi gnyen po gang la bgyi// gnyen po bsgrub pa bka' stsol cig/ b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bo// gnod sbyin sgrub

pa'i rnal 'byor pas// phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par bya// dang po dben pa'i gnas dag tu// stegs bu shin tu mdzes pa la// tsan dan bsregs pa'i dud pa dang// ma ki tsi dang bcas pa'o// bdud rtsi dang ni gtor

ma dang// byugs nas me tog nag po dgram// dam tshig bskyed la ye shes gzhug/ phyi nang gsang gsum dag gis mchod// kA ya bAk+ka tsit+ta'i rtags byung nas// de nas bsgrub la 'jug par bya// nor bu rin chen
sbyin gyi rgyud las/ gnyen po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas Ar+ya kun dga' bos// gsang bdag de la 'di skad do// gnod sbyin gyi ni ngo bo gang nges pa'i tshig ni gang la bgyi// man tra'i
bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bo// 'dod pa ster bas gnod sbyin no// las rnams byed pas dam can no// sems can skyob phyir mgon po'o// bstan la dga' bas mthu

stobs can// de phyir chos skyong chen po'o// 'jigs tshul ston pas gshin rje 'o// gnas pa'i cha lugs bdud kyi gtso// 'phongs pa'i re skong nor lha'o// nor bu rin chen sbyin rgyud las/ gnod sbyin gyi mtshan
nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas Ar+ya kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// de yi mthun pa'i gnas gang lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos

bka' stsal pa// nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bo// byang du kha bltas gser gyi mdog/ gnya' shing 'dzin 'dra'i ri yang rung// ri nag rtse mo gnam du song// gnam sgo bskor 'dra ri zlum mam// chu gling me tog gling

yang rung// rgya mtsho che 'am dur khrod do// gdeng dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sgrub na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen sbyin rgyud las/ gnas btsal ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas Ar+ya
kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// b+ha ga wan shin tu gsang ba'i gnod sbyin ni// dang po bsgrub na ji ltar sgrub// man tra'i bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bo// 'di la don ni

rnam gsum ste// bsnyen bsgrub las la sbyar ba yi// bsnyen pa la na gtor ma dang// phyi mtshams bsrung zhing nang mtshams gcad// ngang la bri zhing rgyan rnams dgram// dam rdzas bsag cing phyi mchod bya// thugs

kyi snying po 'di bzlas bya// oM ma hA yak+Sha badzra rat+na tsit+ta hUM ra ga ra ti/ oM ma hA yak+Sha rat+na tsit+ta gu Na hri da hUM/ yon tan gyi snying po'o// ma hA yak+Sha hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// spyan drang ba'i sngags la/ e h+ye hi ma hA yak+Sha

badzra rat+na tsit+ta/ dza hUM baM ho/ rin chen sbyin gyi rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang phyi sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// kun dga' bo yis yang gsol pa// sgrub pa'i thabs ni yang gsungs shig/ bsnyen pa'i rdzas dang
mchod pa'i rdzas// gsad pa'i rdzas dang sngags rnams ni// sngags kyi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ b+ha ga wan gyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bo// gdug pa'i sa la maN+Dal brtsig/ mthing nag
gru gsum brtsegs ma la// zla gam smug nag gsum gyis bskor// phyi rim tsakra rtsibs drug ldan// gru bzhi la ni sgo bzhi pa// thams cad dug khrag ro sol byug/ dbus su gsang ba'i bdag po ni// gnyen po'i
tshul du bsgom par bya// bdud kyi ber nag sku la gsol// sbrul dang dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// mgo yi 'phreng ba'i do shal bya// kha nas khrag 'dzag 'jigs par byed// kha T+wAM g.yas la ban d+ha
g.yon// zhabs kyis srin po gnon par mdzad// de yi g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// rnon po'i dang ni nyi ma mig/ grogs po'i tshul du dgod par bya// 'jigs byed dang ni gzi ldan ma// rnon po

nag po 'di rnams ni// de dag sku mdog nag po ste/ zla gam dag la pho nya'i tshul// de dag 'di las bskyed pa'o// hi ri raM raM ma/ k+Sha las bskyed pa'i gnod sbyin brgyad// tsakra brgyad la dgod par bya// khrag

las bskyed pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs// lcags kyi bya khrag brgya stong sprul// rdo rje rin chen sbyin rgyud las// dkyil 'khor skyed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas Ar+ya kun dga' bos// gsang ba'i bdag

po gnod sbyin 'di// ji ltar sku 'di bsnyen par bya// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig Ar+ya kun dga' bo// a ka ru ni nag po la// gnod sbyin ci 'dra'i sku bris la// bai DUr+Ya yis mdog bsgyur

la// rin chen gser gyi snying po bri// sku bskyed rab gnas byin brlabs la// gtsug gam mgul du gdags par bya// bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// lus dang dri ma bzhin du 'o// rin chen sbyin gyi rgyud
las/ bla rdo bzung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// nyon cig ar+ya kun dga' bo// 'di la mthun pa'i dam rdzas ni// bdud khug nag po sbyi dkar dang// mda' mo bya rgod mthing nag dang// 'phags mchog

dam pa bla med pa// ba dan dmar ser mang po bsham// ba dan nag po bod pa'i rdzas// 'di ni nang gi rten rdzas so// gri rgod snying dang wa yi snying// khra yi tsit+ta la sogs pa// sman dang spos dang snying pos

brgyan// gsang ba yi ni rten rdzas so// rtag tu rten pa'i mchod rdzas ni// rin po che ni 'bar ba dang// gsang ba lnga dang sha lnga dang// mtshan ldan snod du 'bru bcud do// nang nub mchod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// sha

chen smug po gcal du bkram// bdud rtsi lnga yi gtor ma dang// rak+ta dmar gyi ar+g+ha dang// rgya phor rin chen gser skyems so// nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa la// drag shul g.yul ngor bsad pa'i ro// steng du sdig pa'i
g.yang gzhi dgab// 'og tu dar gyi sa gzhi gding// gzungs thag phyogs bzhir gdags par bya// de la gnod sbyin dpon g.yog bsdu// rtsang mdung dam po 'dom gang la// mi lpags rgyal mtshan gdags par
bya// de yi sha khrag mchod rdzas so// rdo rje rin chen sbyin gyi rgyud las// rdzas bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// yang ni kun dga' bos gsol pa// 'khor lo'i rgyud dang bri ba'i thabs// de yi
sngags dang dbye ba rnams// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ sngags kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// legs par nyon cig kun dga' bo// gsad pa srog gi 'khor lo ni// dur khrod dag
gi ras la ni// gru gsum bsnol mar yang dag ldan// de dbus e dbyibs bri bar bya// dbus su gzugs bris mthar sngags bskor// oM tsaN+Da ma ha ro Sha Na yak+Sha rat+na tsit+ta a mu kaM/ khA hi khA hi ma

ra ma ra/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ kha thun tri dza mA ra ya phaT/ dbus su badzra snying mgo chod// 'khor lo rtsibs drug dag la ni// dang po la ni dgod par

bya// kha la mu long tri dgra la rbad// gnyis pa la ni dgod pa ni// sud na pra sh+ti rbad/ gsum pa la ni rmugs rbad do// bzhi pa ma la shri tri la rbad/ rtsa khri khra ri yab rbad lnga'o// drug pa/ mi dzi dzi de la rbad/ a mu kaM

i ni/ sngags 'di ni/ dgra bo 'khor lo'i logs la dgod// dgra bo'i 'khor lo'i tha ma ral gris bskor// dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang/ shangs tshe dag gi khu bas ni// khra yi sgro rtsas bri bar bya// dur khrod

sol bas tshub ma dang// bdud rtsi dri chu rkang rjes dang// gzugs byas snying khar 'khor lo gzhug/ sna lnga 'am ni zhing rgyud bcings// badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma hA yak+Sha a mu kaM/ kha tas ma badzra a mo ha ya/ shri hri

a na ya hUM phaT/ dug gi chu yi byug nas su// rang byung drag po'i snod nang du// ga mi ta yi srad bus bcings// de nas gru gsum thur du bsgyur// dang po dgug pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM b+ha ta pa tra hUM/ na maHtra

yad hi ka nan/ sarba ta tha ga ta yA/ sarba pra ma ya/ pa tra ti ha/ ta rba sa ni/ d+ha ma tsa la ni swA hA/ oM a sa man to ta/ a nan pa ta/ b+ha ni to sha sa ni ha ra ha sma ra/ b+hi ni ga ta ra/ ga pud ta d+ha me te/ sa ra sa ra/

mas ma ma pa la/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya ya ga b+ha ni b+ha ra/ ma hA g+ha re dz+wa la ni sa ga re ma hA yak+Sha ni ku ni khu nri shog dza hUM baM ho/ zhes pa ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// gdug pa can der 'dus nas// gsang sngags
ldan pa'i dur khrod kyi// rdo leb dag gis dong kha gcad// rdo rje rin chen gyi rgyud las// 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos// gsad pa'i sngags rdzas gang la
bgyi// de nas ngan sngags gang gis brdeg/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// bzlas pa tshad du phyin pa dang// zhag ni sum cu rtsa lnga'i bar// rbad pa'i las la gtad

par bya// gnod sbyin drag sngags bdun pa 'di// gang la btab kyang mi 'chor te// rdo rje'i brag kyang 'gems par byed// badzra snying mgo chod// kha la mu le tri dgra la rbad// pud na pra ti rbad/ mugs rbad/ ma ga

la shi tri rbad/ ba ri khra ri yi rbad/ ma dzi dzi de la rbad/ ma hA yak+Sha ra tsit+ta rbad/ yak+Sha snying khrag rtsa srog breng breng/ dza la dza hUM phaT/ yak+Sha srog la tug tug/ khrag blangs snying la thun/ ma hA ya k+Sha srog thuM/ tsit+ta la ma

ra nri rbad/ mA ra ya rbad/ khra thun nri dza/ ra ga ra ti snying sha ku ru ru thuM rbad/ ra dza rA' dza snying la thun rtsan kha la rtsangs sa ma ya rbad/ spyan drangs bye ba drug 'bum yod// sku gsung thugs la grangs med

do// rbad pa rgyal po drug 'bum mo// ban d+he 'bum la skye bo khri// bud med la ni stong stong ngo// khugs pa'i mtshan ma byung nas ni// gsad pa'i las ni brtsam par bya// gzas pa po la ming mi bza'// lcags phye

rdo phye dug phye dang// yungs kar yungs nag thal chen dang// khrag sna dag ni sna tshogs kyis// gsad pa'i rgyal po bya ba ste// ban d+he bdun 'bum skye bo 'bum// bud med khri yis 'grub par 'gyur// gsod na lho

nub kha bltas te// gos sngon gyon nas rgyan chas brgyan// rdo rje kha T+wAM lag na thogs// gdug pa khros pa'i sems kyis su// drag sngags 'di yis brdeg par bya// ma hA yak+Sha badzra rat+na tsit+ta a mu ka sha truM tsit+ta la ma

ra ya nri dza/ tsi taM shag thum ril li li rbad dza dza/ su na dza la rbad/ ma hA yak+Sha badzra rat+na tsit+ta sarba yak+Sha shag tshe le tshal pa sha chod/ srog rbud yak+Sha hUM/ srog la tshal bu rtsa khrom// tsugs khrom/ snying rbud sa snying la ya/

snying snying par chug/ srog spar du sdud// yag ti sh+tig sna/ tsit+ta rol sha tri dza/ snying la shad shad mA ra ya rbad dza/ yag sha ro ga ra te/ tsit+ta 'du sha sod/ snying la shud shud mA ra ya rbad dza/ rgyal po la ra dza gul thul

lo// ban de la yak+Sha de ya ni ban d+he'i srog rtsa la rbad/ skye bo la ni kha la yak+Sha mA ra ya rbad/ bud med la ni long pa tsa long pa tsa/ 'byung po la ni phre da big+h+nan dri dri mA ra ya phaT/ rin chen sbyin gyi rgyud las/ sngags
dang thun gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje 'dzin// gnod sbyin dbang du ma 'dus na// dbang du bsdu ba'i skal
ba'i thabs// sngags kyi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// ma bcos gcig tu gsal bar brtag/ lta bas dbang du bsdu ba'o// phyag na rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// dpa' bos

seng ge bzhin du spyod// mi gtsang ngo tsha rnam par spang// lus la bdud rtsi rnam lnga byug/ de bzhin zas su bza' bar bya// An d+ha mu Sha kha sbyar du// rgyal po nor dang bcas pa gzhug/ srid pa'i lho nas bzlog par

bya// rang srog rang la bstan par bya// gnod sbyin thams cad dkrug pa dang// he ru ka yi ting 'dzin gyis// bod sngags zlos shing rbad sngags dkrug/ gsang sngags de bzhin nyid du ste// thod pa nag po'i nag

dag hu// thun dang dug gi gtor ma sbyin// rak+ta ta sbreng zhing sngags 'di bzlas// oM ha yak+Sha rat+na tsit+ta kar ma rtsi kra re ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha snying shi tsit+ta kha raM kha hi rtsa bdun rtsa \u0f84ga sha kha hi/ phu ya rag sha

kha hi yag sha naM ha ra ha ra he/ ma hA yak+Sha rat+na tsit+ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ srog srog sgol sgol rin chen hang hang/ a mu kaM khrag tu skyugs// gtor ma chen po 'dir khug sod zhal dbye'o// nor bu rin
chen sbyin rgyud las/ dbang du bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos// gsol pa rtags dang mtshan ma stsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig
'phags pa kun dga' bo// nyams dang rmi lam dag tu ni// slob dpon dang ni a tsa ra// 'od dang sgra dang grib ma dang// mi nag khyi nag bya nag dang// mun nag sros sam tshub nag 'brub// dmag dang
dar thogs rkyal pa thogs// zhags thogs mang po sems can 'dzin// shing gcod lings 'debs sems can gsod// gri thogs shan pa'i las byed mi// tsit+ta rlon pa za ba dang// ban d+ha khrag can 'thung ba
dang// de ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// rdo rje rin chen sbyin rgyud las/ rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos// gsang bdag de la 'di skad
gsol// bstan pa gshig pa'i dgra bo la// ngan thabs bya na gang gis bya// rdzas su btsal na gang dang gang// de la ngan thabs gang gis brdeg/ sngags kyi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ gsang ba'i bdag pos
bka' stsol pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// drag shul g.yul ngor bsad pa yi// thod pa nag po'i nang dag tu// tsha ba gsum dang yungs kar yungs nag dang// dug dang rims khrag ske tshe

dang// lcags phye rdo phye dug phye dang// dngul phye btsan dug 'di rnams la// lnga 'bum dag tu sngags 'di bsgrub// badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sarba yak+Sha snying kha la rak+Sha rbad/ tubs tsit+ta baM ga la 'ubs/ myos snying khrag

pra ha ru ru thums yak+Sha he thuM/ yak+Sha mo b+h+yo thums/ du thum pra ma thum// shi ni thum/ nri du thuM/ i u a sa ma ya thibs ling shar/ yang sod/ mA ra ya sod/ skabs su drag po'i pho nya gtong// gang la dmigs pa smod
par bya// 'ben gang tsam nas 'phangs la gtang// gnas pa dag tu ma phog na// zhag gsum bskyar la thugs dam bskang// mnan pa las kyi rim pa bya// rdo rje rin chen sbyin rgyud las// zor 'phangs pa'i
le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos gsungs pa/ sgrub pa'i rtags ni rdzogs pa dang// las gzhug gcod pa bka' stsol cig/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon
cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// bzlas pa las kyi gzhug gcad ni// 'phrin las yang snying 'bum bzlas bya// dmod do las kyi gzhug gcad ni// gnod sbyin kun gyi dmod mo bzlas// mnan pa las kyi

gzhug gcad ni// sgrub pa'i thod pa dur khrod khyer// rang nyid gsang bdag nga rgyal gyis// dur khrod ras sam gro ga la// badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma hA yak+Sha khA hi khA hi// ma ra ma ra/ gr-i h+na gr-i h+na ban

d+ha ban d+ha/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ ming dang yi ge mtshams bzhir bri// dug dang ske tshes bri bar bya// gzugs brnyan sor ni bcu drug pa'i// snying khar bcug la thod par ni// bcug nas skud pas rgya gram bri// gru

gsum dur khrod sol bas byug/ phur bu btsugs la thod par gzhag/ rigs ngan khyim nas me blangs la// tsher ma can rnams ro ma la// blangs phyin lan gsum bsros nas ni// de nyid sbas na tshangs pa yi// tshe
ldan pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur// gzhan la yang ni smos ci dgos// klu yod sa ru sbas pa na// mdze nad kyis ni zin par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i sar sbas na// rims kyis kyang ni 'chi bar 'gyur// sbyin
sreg las kyi mjug gcod ni// las dang rjes mthun 'brub khung du// de dang mthun pa'i me lha bsam// de ltar gnod sbyin bsam par bya// mchod rdzas de bzhin dbul bar bya// rab tu tsha ba'i me dag

dang// tsher ma can gyi shing dag dang// til dang dug chus byugs la dbul// bar du ming bcug sgrub bya yis// drag shul shi ba'i ro bzung la// de'i sha gtubs byin rlabs ming yig las// khro bo 'dra ba de la

babs// lcags kyus snying drangs rlung gis brdeg/ rnam shes bstim la phur pas brdeg/ bsad nas me la sbyin sreg bya// ma lha mo smos brgya rtsa brgyad// lha la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dbul// 'bum pa brgyad kyis

brtags pa la// 'bul te bar du ming rus gzhug/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma hA yak+Sha tsit+ta dz+wa la ma na la ha na ha na sarba rmi ru yo ta ya trag haM sha thun mA ra ya phaT// de tshe dur khrod snod rnams kun// de ru 'du

zhing za bar bsam// bsod nams can la bcu gnyis 'ong// 'bring dang tha ma phyed kyi phyed// sreg na 'chi bar gdon mi za// rdo rje rin chen sbyin rgyud las/ las kyi gzhug gcod sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'u ste
bcu bzhi pa'o//// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba// 'di ni bsam pa tsam gyis kyang// lha chen nyid kyang nges par 'jig/ phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// gdug pa

khros pa bsam pa yis// ming gi yi ge dang po las/ gsad bya mdun du bsam par bya// rnam par shes pa de la bstim// de yi lte ba'i rtsa kha la// rnal 'byor can gyis lag pa gcad// de ma thag tu spyi gtsug

bsam// khrag skyug 'dar zhing 'ong skyes kyang// kha ni thur du sbub par bsam// so rtsi ma yi gzugs can ni// snang mdzad lam zhugs snying khar ni// kha sbyar nang gi gnas mthong nas// de phung sog 'bral mthong
nas ni// ro ni dum bu stong du gtub// bza' yam yang na gtor bar bya// rdo rje rin chen sbyin rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyis gsad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// gnod sbyin chen po'i

gtor ma'i nang// dur khrod ras la de ming bris// ming smos brgya rtsa brgyad btab na// bsam pa gang yang de yis 'grub// mig rna sna yi dri ma dang// rang gi shu ra ma rnams la// ru lu byas nas gtor mar
ni// bcug nas byin pa dbang du byed// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya na// thod pa ma chag ma gas par// gnod sbyin kun gyi snying po bri// bzlas nas yungs kar de ru
blug/ dgra ba'i sgo gong sbas pa na// nor dang bcas pa zla drug gis// brlag par 'gyur bar the tshom med// rdo rje rin chen sbyin rgyud las// thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun
dga' bos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dam sri mkhan po de// dam can byad du bcug pa la// rig sngags bzlog na ji ltar bzlog/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsol
cig/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// gzhan gyi rig sngags bzlog pa ni// bla ma la ni bsrung mi dgos// chang bu nyid la gzugs byas te// gro ga shog bu gzugs

la gdags// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa gcig la// nang du yi ge dgod par bya// ma hA yak+Sha hUM/ mtshams bzhi dag tu bsgrub bya yi// dbye ba sngags dang bcas pa bri// bi tang pa ya bi

tang pa ya/ phrangs ma phrol shig mA ra ya phye// nang gi re'u mig dgu rdzogs nas// phyi rol yi ge bcu gnyis la// oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti hUM/ sum 'bum grangs ni tsha ba dang// rta dang ma he'i lto bar

gzhug/ rab tu rnga mo'i lus la gzhug/ bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro yis skyon// khyi dang bya yi ske la gdags// me dang chu yi 'khor lor gzhug/ tha ma brgyab gcod ri la mnan// shri shi phur pa sor gsum gdab// rig

sngags bcad pa'i las dag ni// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba// dur khrod ras sam gro ga la// lha sbyin gzugs ni bri byas la// rtsibs la sngags 'di dgod byas la// oM ta badzra pa ri ri phaT/ ma hA sa nga g+ha na

hUM/ sa shing zla shing sa da hUM/ lo shing kha la ra sha rbad/ hUM du na rbad/ thib nan bzlas nas lce la gdab// ngag dang byad thim nyams pa ya nan n+na n+na/ seng ldeng phur pa sor bzhi la// sngags 'di brgya dang rtsa brgyad

du// bzlas nas lce la gdab par bya// oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma yak+Sha kI li kI la ya bAg tsit+ta a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ tsha tsha nag po'i nang bcug nas// rnal 'byor mal 'og gru gsum gzhug/ steng 'og rgya
gram ri rab mnan// de la sogs pa gzhan du yang// brgya 'am stong ngam khri ru// des ni dbang phyug chen po yang// 'chi 'gyur 'di la gdon mi za// rdo rje rin chen sbyin rgyud las/ rig sngags
gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bsod nams 'dod pa gang dag gis// de ni ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi// sngags kyi bdag pos

bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// sgrub pa'i gnas ni dben pa ru// pad+ma 'dab brgyad ge sar la// rin chen rnam lnga dag gis ni// tha ma 'ja' tshon sna lngas bskor// khyams dang rta babs sgo

brgyan ldan// rin chen mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan bri// pad+ma phyogs kyi 'dab ma la// sman lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga// rin chen dri yi bcud kyis bkang ba yi// bum pa lnga dang bdud rtsis bkang ba'i snod// 'bras bur

bcas pas kha rgyan bya// mgul pa gtsang ma'i gos kyis bcings// de steng dpon g.yog mtshan ma dgram// mdun du nor gyi dngos grub stsol cig pa// byang bu re re bris la gzhag/ mtshams bzhi ru ni spos snod

gzhag/ me tog 'phreng dang mar me dang// sna tshogs dar gyi rgyal mtshan dgram// gdugs kyi bla res brgyan par bya// 'jig rten zas kyi bye brag ni// ma lus 'tshogs par bsogs byas la// nyin dang mtshan mo
dus drug tu// tshogs dang gtor ma rgyun mi gcad// ser sna med pa'i sems kyis mchod// rang nyid gsang bdag nga rgyal gyis// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas kyang// gnod sbyin dpon g.yog dgug par

bya// sngags kyi bdag po 'di dag yin// gzung ba dngos grub 'di la yod// thams cad grub phyir gsad par bya'o// oMr ga ru ge tsit+ta hUM/ oM ma hA kro d+ha dzam+b+ha ri hri da hUM// oM ma hA kA la ha na ha badzra na

swA hA/ oM yak+Sha de ba pany+tsa ra dza dza dza/ oM ma hA ra dza be/ glo dang sbrid pa g.yal la sogs// sngags kyi bar chad mi bya'o// skyen na sngags kyi nus pa nyams// bul na bzlas pa grangs med 'gyur// mgon po'i
gnas nas dben rung ni// 'das nas 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'das na bar chad rang la 'ong// bar du rol mo'i sgra bsgrag cing// gus pa'i sems gyis mchod bstod bya// ma grub pa la byin mi rlob// de bas
gus pas mnyes par bya// gtso bo dag la 'bum bzlas shing// 'khor la khri khri bzlas par bya// sgrub pa'i sngags dang las rnams rdzogs// mtshan ma byung bar ma gyur na// bar chod mtshan ma yin srid

pas// 'jigs shing phya sangs khyer ba dang// yo byad phangs sems byed pa dang// khro dang 'gro ni 'dod pa dang// bying zhing yid la mi dran dang// rmi lam gzhan gyis nor khyer na// bar chad bzlog pa'i cho ga
bya// 'bru dang me tog char 'bab dang// rin po che ni rnyed pa na// 'phral gyi bza' ba tha ma yin// gal te de ltar ma byung na// 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin mdun du ni// zhag gcig smyung par gnas

byas la// khrus byas gos dkar gyon nas su// lus la dri zhim spos kyis byug par bya// zla ba yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la// lci ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dkar gsum mngar gsum sbyar ba'i chus// khyor ba

stong dang rtsa brgyad du// mchod nas kun tu du ru'i spos kyis bdug/ de yi mtshan mo rmi lam du// gter ni brgya stong ston par 'gyur// der ni tsan dan dag gam ni// rgyas pa yin ni shing rnams sam// ka ra bI

ri'i shing rnams la// rin chen sna tshogs 'bru sna tshogs// de la sogs pa rgyas pa'i rdzas rnams la// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg brgya phul nas// rgyal srid nges par thob par 'gyur// longs spyod phran tshegs smos ci

dgos// nor bu rin chen sbyin rgyud las/ nor sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// oM ma hA yak+Sha rat+na tsit+ta hUM/ gu Na hri da hUM/ 'di yi yon tan bsam mi khyab// rgyal po g.yul du 'jug pa'i tshe// spyi bor
snying po 'di bcings nas// bstod dang gsang sngags 'di brjod na// dgra bo 'dod pa bzhin du dbang du byed// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod dang// dgug dang bkar dang rengs dang bskrad pa
dang// dgug dang tshig 'phrog gzugs bsgyur bsrung la sogs// las de rnams ci dga' byed// 'di ni legs par 'grub 'gyur na// ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur// yul du 'jug pa'i tshe 'dis bzlog
pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan gang zag snod kyi rim pa ni// rgyud
'di gang la bstan par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'phags pa kun dga' bo// mi snang pa yi rim pa la// kha bub dang ni zhabs rdol dang// dri ma can dang som nyi za// log chos can

dang g.yeng ba can// dka' thub can dang rtog pa che// mi 'grub g.yeng bas gzhan don byed// dam med dmyal ba'i rgyud can la// rna bar yang ni mi sgrog go/ tsan dan lta bu'i gang zag la// dam sri byed pa'i gang

zag la// rna ba yang ni mi sgrog go/ rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la// shin tu gdam te sbyin par bya'o// rin chen sbyin gyi rgyud las/ gang zag gi snod bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das

kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dus pa'i 'khor dag gis lha'i me tog gtor nas/ zhi ba'i las mdzad bo d+hi sa twa'i tshul// rgyas pa'i las mdzad dga' ldan lha
yi tshul// dbang gi las mdzad gtum po 'jigs pa'i tshul// drag pa'i las mdzad kun la brjod du med// rgyal ba sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa 'dul phyir zhal nas bdud rtsi

shar// bstan pa bsrung phyir zhal nas rgyud gsungs pa// bdud rtsi gsang rgyud de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod do// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgu nas yi
rangs te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// bdag gis spobs par gyur ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zhes gsungs pa dang/ lha'i me tog gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rin po che byin gyi rgyud gsang ba'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// rin po che sbyin gyi rgyud dgos 'dod 'byung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs
so//// rgya gar skad du/ bi ha ra du ma he tan tra bod skad du/ gnod sbyin zha 'on bdud 'dul gyi rgyud/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
na// ri rab lhun po'i byang phyogs na// gnya' shing 'dzin gyi tshur 'gram na// rin chen dbyibs legs gzhal yas khang// mdzes pa'i lan phran brgyan pa na// zhar bon chen po sku mdog gnag/ dar nag ber
chen dbu skra mdzes// spyan dmar zhabs bgrad kha T+waM g.yas// thod pa rim khrag bkang pa g.yon// rin chen sna bdun rgyan dang ldan// gnod sbyin dug mo yum nye mdun// sku mdog yab 'dra dug rkyal
g.yas// dgos sbyin nor bu rin chen g.yon// g.yas su gnod sbyin rnon po gnag/ g.yas gnyis dgra sta ral gri g.yas// g.yon gnyis khrag rkyal bcu zhags g.yon// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid
g.yon// g.yas gnyis gri gug zhags pa thogs// g.yon gnyis khrag gi char pa 'bebs// rgyab tu kun gyi 'jigs byed ni// dmar ser dar nag dgra sta g.yas// g.yon gnyis zhags pa khrag nad

'bebs// rin chen kun brgyan nor gyi lha// drag shul che zhing mi bsrun pa// sngon gyi gnod sbyin gtsug phud lnga// de tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// phyag rgya rtse sprad thugs khar gdams// dam shing lha nag

phur pa byas// dam rdo pha wang long bu bzung// dam chu bdud rtsi skyems phud gsal// sa bcu'i byang sems mnga' yang gsol// oM pad+ma ta ri hUM/ hUM rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti hUM phaT/ dam tshig 'khul

pas sa ma non// da yang 'jig rten spyo rlab byed// de tshe de yi dus na yang// mthu stobs bdag po phyag rdor gyis// gong gi dam rtsal lha ngos bstan// drag po mngon du byon nas ni// kye ma mthu stobs bdag po
bka' cig stsol// 'jig rten khams na bde rgyas na// rin chen nor la mnga' yang gsol// dkon mchog gsum gyis bstan bsrung na// dbang bskur gsang mtshan ngas btags la// bstan bsrung rje bor
mnga' gsol gyis// rang rgyud thul la rang rgyud shog/ kye/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdzogs pa'i sku// bdag dang yul 'khor srog snying 'bul// bdag ni 'jig rten srid gsum lags// dbang bskur chos skyong

dbang zhig stsol// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// dbang bskur lag tu rdo rje gtad// zha 'on rdo rje drag por btags// de nas rdo rje drag po yis// gus par btud nas rang rgyud bshad// gleng bzhi'i le'u

ste dang pa'o//// kye ma gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// rang sems srog snying dbang du 'dzugs// pa ra d+hi ts+ya na ra kan/ rgya rgya rgya/ oM rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra b+ha na d+ha bdud ma ting skyol ting

tir dza dzA/ oM badzra ma la yak+Sha a ka ti skyol dza dzA/ oM badzra ma hA dz+nyA na ga ra tsa ha ha rbad sa ma ya dza dzA/ oM badzra snying chod badzra yak+Sha tsakra dun dun dza dzA/ dga' ba'i mdangs phyung srog snying phul// srog snying gi le'u ste
gnyis pa'o//// kye ma gsang ba'i bdag po lags// pha cho ma 'brang mang brjod de// rang rgyud mu tra gong du bshad// rang sod nyams len ma yin pa// dam tshig nyams su gang len la// dkor 'phel
bstan pa bsrung bar bya// las rnams sde dpon spyan sngar 'chad// bsnyen bsgrub gsad pa rnam gsum las// bsnyen pa'i rdzas dang dkyil 'khor bstan// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi'i dbus// zlum po

sor bzhi mtho bar btod// sgom bzhi mu khyud ldan par bri// grwa bzhir ba dan sgo bzhir 'phan// gsang phyir zhun mar byug pa lnga// rta gtor chang phud lnga lngas bskon// zhal rnams bris te bkod par bya// srog
snying dril te zhag bdun bzlas// mon nag chos ston 'khor bzang ston// bsnyen pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// kye ma gsang ba'i bdag po lags// bsgrub pa'i rdzas dang maN+Dal 'bul// gru gsum zla
kham mu khyud ldan// phyag mtshan ma nor 'dod par bri// ba dan 'phan dang sku gzugs dgram// mchog phur lnga la cod pan gdags// mnga' gsol rang rang gnas su gzugs// thun rdzas rnam gsum rim pas

bdun// rtag gtor gdams la bsgrub sngags bzlas// oM ni sha rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti// ma ting skyol yak+Sha ka ti pa dra ma hA sa ma ya ha ha// rak+Sha che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ so dgu sgrub sngags zhag
bdun bzlas// rang gi chos skyong dmag dpon 'gyed// 'phan 'phyar zangs dung 'bud pa ston/ bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// kye/ gsang ba'i bdag po las 'di 'bul// maN+Dal drag po e zur
bzhi// mu khyud sgo rnams rab tu ldan// i bzhi drag po ling ga bzhi// mchog phur gzhi ni rang gi g.yon// thun rdzas gsum ni rang gi g.yas// sku gzugs 'phan ni bsdom pa gdab// gsang sngags zhag bdun

phur thun gdab// oM ni sha rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra tsit+ta ra ga ra ti tsakra rbad/ yak+Sha ka tri bi sha tsa thun rbad/ badzra ma hA sa ma ya ha ha sraM sraM tsakra thun rbad/ rak+Sha tsakra rak+ta tsakra thun rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya tsakra thun rbad/ oM

rat+na tsit+ta che ge mo badzra snying mgo chod// kha la mu long chod/ kraM gyi trang la rbad/ pu na pu ti rbad/ mugs rbad/ ma la kha shi tse la rbad/ ba ra khra ri yab rbad/ drug cu rtsa bzhi thun brabs bas// ri dwags bsad dang sha
khal bkal// ri mtho khar 'dzegs tho les 'debs// thams cad mes tshig thal bar bun// thun dbab phur gdab ril gyi dril/ bsad pa'i las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// e ma zhag gcig sbyin sreg

las// dbus su gdug shing hoM btsugs la// btab pa'i tho ras sbyin sreg bya// bdag gi 'khor rnams me lhar bsams// srog snying dag dang sgrags te dbul// ag ne raM raM dz+wa la dz+wa la raM raM swA hA/ bzhi bcu
don ldan bsreg sngags 'di// 'jig rten kun tshig na ra skan/ sbyin sreg le'u ste drug pa'o//// kye ma gsang ba'i bdag po gson// ma nyes dkon mchog dgra dar na// bdun gyis gsad pa'i las sngags
'di// bcu gnyis bzlas pas mngon du 'byung// drug cu rtsa gnyis gsad pa ste// gsang bar 'os pa'i man ngag 'di// rin chen rgyas btab gter du sbas/ gab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// kye ma rdo rje sde

dpon 'chang// ha hi las kyi kha tshar 'bul// stor rlag cho 'phrul btang 'dod na// zhag bdun sgrub pa gzhung srangs la// maN+Dal 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// mon pa spra spre stag seng dom// sha sna spu sna bag phye

gzugs// ga 'ur bkod pa 'phan gdugs gdab// zhag bdun 'di bzlas mngon du ston// oM rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti dza dzA/ trag rak+Sha snying kha rag dza dun/ snying kha rag ma ma badzra dun dun/ drik+Sha hi ma ma b+h+yo hring sa

ti/ snying kha rag tsa dun sha pa mi hri sha shul l+yeM// stod tshig la ni gtor chung gtad// zhi bdun rtsa sngags khri bzlas nas// 'gul dag 'phrig dang dngos su 'byung// hUM rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti/ shuSh+ta Sh+ta l+yal+yeM sa tri g+ha yo

mu tri da b+haM ya pa ti pa b+ha ha h+ti/ dza hi du tra pra sha du lu ma g+ha ti dza ho trig sha ma ya ga ti l+yiM// zhi drug zhi bzlas dngos su 'byung// zha 'on rdo rje drag po rtsal// pa ra pi ra mon du spyos// yum chen gnod

sbyin dug mo ni// spra yis spre khur cho 'phrul ston// gnod sbyin rnon po stag la rngoms// nyi ma gzi brjid seng ltar mchongs// kun gyi 'jigs byed dom ltar rngam// dam nyams dgra la cho 'phrul thong// Sha ha sma sh+ya

h+yi ni ra ya g+ha g+ha pra sha l+ye ma pa du se sha ha pra ti/ cho 'phrul gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// kye ma gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// ma rdugs thogs med rdo rje'i sku// thugs rjes kun khyab nyi ma'i zhal// yon
tan kun 'byung rin chen gsung// mthu stobs thogs med drag po'i thugs// nyon mongs kun skyob nam mkha'i ngogs// thugs rje'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba'i bdag po las kha tshar bdun po
yang// 'theb lis rgyas btab klong du sbas// gsang rgyud le'u ste brgyad phyag tu phul// slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// rnam par snang mdzad dbu la bltam// smon lam btab nas gter du sbas// las
'phro ldan pas mngon shes shar// stag gi lo la gter nas phyung// gsang rgyud le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so//// gsang ba'i kha tshar bdun po yang// 'theb li rgyas btab klong sbas pa// dang la gnyen po

stobs kyi le// dra la dri phyi ma lags pa// gsang bdag sku ru rab bsgom la// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rab gsal bas// de bzhin kun tu snang gyur badzra hUM// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'gying bag mthing// rdo rje

sdigs mdzub spyan bzlog gtsigs// sprul chen rigs lngas brgyan par bsgom// dam tshig sngags ni khri yis gzir// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ ni sha rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti ma ting yak+Sha hri ma ra hri// khri bzlas
gsang sngags bdag por 'gyur// mchod pa rnam lnga dus dus dbul// rtsa dgugs bsnyen pa 'dzud pa ste// gnod sbyin bran du bkol ba'o// gsang ba'i bdag por bdag bsgom pas// shi sa bdud rtsi dam chu

blud// oM bag sh+na ni ho ya bag sha tsit+ta rat+na ra ga ra ti e ma ti yak+Sha pa ra du du ra ma ra/ rtsa dgus dam gsal las la 'dzud// bdag la bdag mchod gtor ma dbul// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na puSh+pe ni nu mi ti i

dam du bar ba laM kha kha khA hi/ rtsa drug gtor dbul che ba bskyed// gnyen po stobs kyi lha 'di rab bsgrubs na// sha khyi bdag pos sbod pa 'dra/ gnyen po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// kye ma gsang ba'i bdag po
ngas// rang rgyud dbang 'di nges par bshad/ rat+na 'phreng ba cod pan dar// tshe gzungs dbang rtags rdzas bshams la// bsnyen pa'i bsgrub pa zhag gsum bya// dam 'jug sgo dbye kun mthun pas// bdag la

bdag gis dbang bskur phyir// rang gi dam tshig sngags stong bzlas// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na/ ya ba ba ga ro haM pi rat+na tsit+ta ho/ a mr-i te hri bag+sha a/ rtsa bdun stong bzlas rang dbang bskur// dbang
sngags rtsa bdun khri bzlas na// dpa' bo grub zhib bcas pa 'dra/ dbang gi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de phyir gsang ba'i bdag po la// bdag dang gzhan gyi tshe sgrub bstan// de la lha srin sde brgyad

mchod// 'bru sna bcu gcig bre gang nas// mthing nag dar gyi nang du gtums// tshe rten rat+na rnam lnga ni// srad bu gsum bsgril dag la brgyus// sna cig dar phud nang du gzhug/ sna cig bdag gam phur pa

la// mchod pa dbul zhing tshe sngags bzlas// oM ma hA ra ha ra te bruM bruM rat+na tsit+ta bruM ne mu ne me do// yak+Sha A yu a a/ rtsa lnga 'chi med tshe sngags 'di// khri bzlas shi med rtog bral 'dra// sras dbu gsum la tshe nas

bstim// dam tshig ma nyams tshe sgrub mchog/ tshe'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// da ni gsang ba'i bdag po ngas// chung ngu gso ba'i rim pa bstan// ma la khrus dang gtsang sbra bya// smyug ma gsang ma tshigs

lnga la// dar sna lnga dang rin chen gdags// dkar gsum mngar gsum zhal nas mchod// lhag ma ma dang bu la sbyin// oM rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti ma ting skyol// yak+Sha ka ti bi bi ha hUM si d+ha ha hUM si ha ti/ dus su
mchod cing gnyer gtad na// yid bzhin nor bu rnyed pa 'dra// 'gab 'phel le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag po rin chen gter// dbul 'phongs bsal phyir nor sgrub bstan// bsgrub

pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhung bsangs la// ljon dmar glang gi khog stong du// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma btsal// rin chen 'bru sna dkar dngar sman// bsgrubs la ra ba'i dkyil du sba// hUM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti ma

ting yak+Sha rat+na bruM ni na bruM rat+na bruM hriM hUM hUM/ rtsa drug nor sgrub rin chen gter// 'bum bzlas nor bu rin chen gter// 'dod dgu yid bzhin 'grub par byed/ nor sgrub le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// gsang
ba'i rgyas btab gter du sbas// gsang ba'i bdag po de ni ngas// de ltar rdzogs nas snying nad bstan// bsnyen sgrub rnam gsum rdzogs byas la// bse phor dug sna bcu gsum dang// med du mi rung lang tang

rtse// khyi phag snying dang rab chad rus// nyungs kar khrag bsres thun du brab// 'jag ma'i ling ga sor bzhi la// ming byang blangs la thod par gsal// rgya khraM lha khang them 'og gsal// oM rat+na tsit+ta kha ra b+he ba sha

du staM mu sha ra ya/ ga ra na ha ra ha ra/ ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha/ thu pa thu pa phaT swA hA// so lnga gnam khyer smyo 'bog sngags// 'bum bzlas sho mangs rlung khyer 'dra/ smyo 'bog gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// gsang
ba'i bdag po da ni ngas// da ni drag sngags chu 'khyags dbab// bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// g.yas gnyis lcags kyu dug gi kha// g.yon gnyis zhags pa ber kha bsnams// bdag

bsgom gang rung lha 'dre gzir// zhabs ma rgya tshil khyi ra khrag/ sngo sna skya rings thabs sprad la// yul lha'i ming yang gam du gzhug/ rdo rje bdud 'dul gzir sngags bzlas// oM rat+na tsit+ta zhu lnga th+ya pa zla tshang

tshang thang a pra ha pra hUM zengs/ oM hUM ba se ru she kan le mi lu tshe/ na she na le mi lu tse/ nya nan te gzir/ kha ma nya le nya ma kha nan gzir/ ba sha ke nan/ dza ha mu nan gzir/ dgra yul yin mi nyal kha na du gzir/
ku ma ra hi nan te gzir/ don gcig gnod sbyin gzir sngags 'di// gang yang rung ba'i lha 'dre gzir// rgya tshil ma thab sprad de thog ser de nyid du phab/ thog ser le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// gsang ba'i
rgyas btab gter du sbas// las 'phro can dang 'phrad par shog/ rdo rje bdud 'dul bco lnga las/ gsang ba'i kha tshar bdun po rtse mo mi 'gyur ba'i rgyal mtshan rdzogs so///// so////

rgya gar skad du/ nA tha badzra i b+hi da ra tan tra na ma/ bod skad du/ mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ kha che'i skad du/ gnod sbyin rdo rje bdud 'dul// o rgyan skad du/ yak+Sha/ bal po'i
skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi drag sngags bdun pa/ bram ze'i skad du/ khams gsum srog 'phrog/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'chang chen po des srod la bdud gtul/ tho rangs rdo rje gdan gyi spo la rdo rin po che 'bar ba'i gnas/ mtshon cha sna tshogs bu yug 'tshub pa'i yul/ shin tu rngub pa'i ljongs/ gnod sbyin 'bar ba'i
grong khyer/ ma mo'i tshogs 'dus pa'i grong rdal/ rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang na bzhugs te/ der 'dus pa'i 'khor ni/ nag po bdud 'dul chen po dang/ gnod sbyin mo kun dug ma dang/ de'i 'khor

gnod sbyin rnon po dang/ nyi ma'i mig nang gi'o// phyi'i blon po kun gyi 'jigs byed do// gzhan yang 'dus pa'i tshogs mkha' 'gro ma dang/ ma mo'i tshogs dang/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang/ bdud kyi tshogs
dang/ nag po'i tshogs thams cad 'dus te/ de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod pa dang/ me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor zhing phyag 'tshal zhing kun tu bskor ro// mgon po rdo rje
bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang de'i tshe de dag gi nang nas// ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyis// rdo rje 'chang la

'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye/ rdo rje 'chang chen bka' stsal 'tshal// bdag cag 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams ni// 'tshal skal yang ni gang la bgyi// las su ci bgyi bka' stsol cig/ rdo rje 'chang la bdag nyan
'tshal// de skad ces zhus pa dang/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig mgon po 'khor dang bcas// khyod kyi las dang zas dag ni// bstan pa 'byung dang dus dang// gnas dang bsnyen pa bsgrub pa
dang// gsad pa ma grub spogs chog dang// sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin dang// phyag rgya dang ni bskul ba dang// thun dang zor dang bsreg dang mnan// dus min 'chi ba bzlog pa dang// nad zhi dpal
bskyed rigs brgyud spel// dgug dang zhi ba dbang du bya// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan gyis 'khor tshogs nyon// rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ zhus pa dang gleng bslangs pa'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// rdo rje 'chang chen gyis khyod la bstan pa gnyer du gtad// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnas pa yi// rnam bzhi 'khor rnams bsrung ba dang// dkar po'i phyogs kyi 'khor rnams la// bsrung ba skyab
pa khyod kyis gyis// gnod gdug rnam gnyis bsgral bar gyis// rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ lung bstan pa dang gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// rdo rje 'chang chen bcom ldan
'das// bdag gi zas skal gang la bgyi// zhus pa las/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyi zas kyi skal ba ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa la gnod dang// nag pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa rnams// mi sha mi
khrag tshil bur bcas// rjen pa btsos pa sna tshogs rnams// khrag sna tshogs pa'i thun rdzas rnams// rab tu mang ba bsog par bya// rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ zas skal bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi
pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bstan pa 'byung ba'i rim pa ni// gos ngan re ba gon pa'i dus// de'i tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// zas ngan lci ba za ba'i dus// de tshe nga yi bstan pa

'byung// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ bstan pa 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// dus ni nyi zla shis pa

la'o// bsnyen bsgrub las la sbyar ba'o// ma grub spogs pa'i cho ga dang// bsreg dang mnan pa'i cho ga 'o// dus ni ra ba bzhi'i dpyid zla ra ba'o// gnas na lha khang ngam dbu rtse'i bar khang ngam/ brag dmar nag
chos zangs lta bu 'am/ ri gsum 'dus pa'i rtse 'am/ yid du 'ong ba'i gnas sam/ bsnyen pa'i dus ni yar ngo'i tshes gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ brgyad kyi bar du'o// bsgrub pa'i dus ni tshes bcu

bdun nas/ bco lnga'i bar du'o// las sbyor gyi dus ni bcu drug nas/ nyi shu gnyis kyi bar ro// ma grub na spogs pa ni nyi shu gsum nas/ dgu'i bar du'o// sbyin sreg dang mnan pa ni/ nyi shu dgu'i gnam stong

la shis so// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor ma grub spogs cho ga mnan bsreg gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rten gyis gang zag mtshan nyid

bstan// zhe sdang che la sgom sran che// blo brtan skyo ngal med pa dang// sems la brnab cing las sbyor mkhas// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i rten gyi gang zag mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u

ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// sngags kyi dbye ba bshad kyis nyon// oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ru ge hUM phaT/ oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti bdud t-ing skyol skyol ting ting dza dza/ oM badzra

rat+na ban d+ha bdud ma ting skyol ting dza dza/ badzra ma la yak+Sha ma ka tri skyol dza dza/ badzra dz+nyA na nA ga rA dza ha ha rbad/ sa ma ya dza dza ya kra tsa kra dun dun dza dza/ oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti swA hA/ oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ru

ge hUM/ oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti che ge mo tsit+ta shaM long/ snying la b+h+yo/ oM rat+na tsit+ta che ge'i badzra snying mgo chod/ kha la mu lo ta khri dgra la rbad/ spu na pra ti rbad/ mugs rbad/ ma la ga shi lce la rbad/ ba ri kha ri ya

rbad/ oM rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti che ge mo dza dza/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// khyod kyi sku'i rten

dang dam rdzas bstan// rgya chen sa yi dkyil 'khor ni// rgya dang khyon du mda' gru bzhi// dbus su e dbyibs gru gsum pa// zla gam thod 'phreng me ri dang// gru chad lha rnams bcas pa'o// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i

gzhal yas khang// bla re gdugs dang ba dan dang// 'phan dang seng ldeng seng ger bcas// dpa' bo grir shi'i ro ras la// rin chen sna lngas bris pa'i sku// khyi nag snying gi thugs dam bskangs// skyes pa grir

shi'i sha khrag dang// g.yag la sogs pa'i sha khrag la// gtor ma'i rgyu ni bya bar shis// khyad par bdud rtsi rnam lngas mchod// phyi yi mchod pa 'di lta ste// gsang phyi rin chen 'bar ba la// zhun mar bu ram

bsres pas byug/ zhun mar phrom dang zho 'o ma// thud dang 'khur ba sna tshogs dang// sha sna rnam pa sna tshogs dang// bu raM ka ra sbrang rtsi dang// zhal zas sna tshogs pa yis mchod// gser g.yu zangs lcags la
sogs pa// sna tshogs pa yi rdzas kyis mchod// rta dang glang po la sogs pa// sna tshogs pa yi mchod pa bya// dar dang za 'og la sogs pa// bar snang khebs pa'i dar gyis mchod// rdza rnga gling bu pi
wang dang// dung la sogs pa sgra yis mchod// sna tshogs spyan gzigs rta gtor rgyun gtor dang// dus kyi mchod pa mi gcad dbul// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ mchod pa'i le'u ste dgu

pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor dus gsum du// ling ga dang ni 'khor lo bstan// spra tshil ling ga sor bzhi'i tshad// de yi snying khar bsgrub bya'i gzugs// rtsang ris

bcas te bri bar bya// dri ma med dar le brgan la// tsakra rtsibs drug mu khyud bcas// dbus su dgra yi ming rus bris// de yi phyi rim mu khyud la// gnyen po lha yi sngags kyang bri// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs drug

la// mgon po'i srog sngags bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ming rus bris// de yi phyi rim mu khyud la// rdo rje ra ba me ris bskor// dri ma ma song dar nang gril// tshon sna lnga yis bcings bsdams la// mchu

gsum snying 'phrig med pa'i thod nang du// rang 'og e dbyibs gru gsum nang du bcug/ de rjes pang la gnas par bya// de nas pad+ma'i mchan khung gdags// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bka' nyan gsung
stod byed pa dang// dam la mi 'gal ci bgyi nyan// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ log gnon rten gyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gnyen po gong du
bsgom par bya'o// las mkhan rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// ral pa kham nag gyen du khyil// sma ra ser po gyen du 'greng// ag tshom nag po thur la 'phyang// spyan gsum dmar

ba/ smin ma glog ltar 'khyug pa// mtha' ber nag po sku la gsol/ thod skam lngas dbu brgyan pa/ thod rlon lnga bcus do shal byas pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang rna rgyan byas pa/ ska rags su bcings pa/ phyag
g.yas na kha T+wAM kha gsum la dpal dar nag po 'phyar thabs su bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi dung dmar nang na dam nyams bsgral ba'i snying khrag gis bkang nas gsol ba/ de'i yum gnod sbyin dug mo ni sku mdog

mthing nag la/ phyag g.yas dug gi rkyal pa kha phye nas dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgra rdul du rlog pa/ g.yon na zhal zas kyi bye brag sna tshogs pa dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsnams nas bsgrub pa po la
dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du skong ba'o// g.yas su gnod sbyin rnon po sku mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi/ phyag g.yas dgra sta/ de 'og ral gri/ g.yon dang po nad rkyal/ de 'og rdo rje bcu zhags/
g.yon phyogs na gnod sbyin nyi ma mig dmar ser zhal gcig phyag bzhi/ g.yas dang po dar nag g.yob pa/ de 'og khrag rkyal lo// g.yon dang po rdo rje zhags pa/ de 'og mdung dmar bsnams pa/
de'i rgyab na gnod sbyin kun gyi 'jigs byed sku mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas gri gug/ g.yon ba dan nag po 'phyar ba'o// thams cad la thod pa skam pos brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs
kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i 'khor ni gnod sbyin stong sdes bskor ba'o// de rnams ni shin tu 'jigs shing bzhin mi sdug pa// kha dog phyag mtshan 'di 'dra ma nges te sna tshogs su snang ba'o// de'i yang
sprul gsum sprul sna tshogs pas dkon mchog gi 'khor rnam bzhi la gnod pa'i bstan pa bshig pa de la gsod pa dang/ 'ching ba dang/ brdeg pa dang/ 'ded pa dang/ mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis gsod cing

brdeg pa dang/ bsreg cing 'tshod ba dang/ sha za ba dang/ khrag 'thung ba dang/ sha za zhing snying bton nas bsgrub pa po la ster ba dang/ de dag 'dra ba'i bran dang/ g.yog dang/ yang g.yog dang/ yang bran la sogs bsam gyi
mi khyab pas bka' nyan cing/ gsung bstod pa gsal bar bsgom/ mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ pad+ma

dbang gi phyag rgya yis/ mgon po dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni/ lcags kyus dgug cing zil gyis mnan pa'i phyag rgya pad+ma dbang gi man ngag mthe bong gnyis gzhibs/ sor mo phral la brkyang/ byin brlabs dbang

bskur 'brel ba'i phyag rgya yin/ lag g.yon rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa la/ mtheb mdzub bzhi po lcags sgrog lta bur sbrel/ gtor ma byin la dbang du 'dus par byas la/ gnyis su med par lta ba'o// mgon po
rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ rtags dang mtshan ma dngos nyams rmi lam gsum du ldan pa ni/ rtags su
'od dmar nag gam/ dar 'phyar ba 'am/ rang gi slob dpon du 'ong na/ mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul lo// bud med khrag rkyal thogs pa ni/ yum kun dug ma'o// a tsa rA ni/ rnon po'o// seng ge brtsad po blon

po nyi ma mig/ mi reng dang ban bon du 'ong ba de/ kun gyi 'jigs byed do// dmag mang po dang/ lung ba dar gyis khengs pa dang/ me chen po 'bar ba rmi ba ni/ dpon g.yog yo grub pa'i rtags so// sprang po

mdze po chu dang ni// rta dang bong bu khyi dang ni// nag mo'i lus la chags spyod pa// me dang btsun pa snying mi dga'// ngan pa'i rtags rnams yin par gsungs// btsas ma brnga dang rmos byed pa// sha khyim 'ded dang
sha za ba// srog gcod snying za khrag 'thung dang// gzhan gyis bsad pa rmi ba dus thebs so// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ rtags dang mtshan ma'i le'u ste bcu gsum
pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ gnod sbyin gyis rgyud drag sngags bdun pa bstan pa ni/ gong 'dras ma thub las 'gyangs nas// ma grub spogs chog bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra

ba las// gru gsum sum brtsegs khrag gis byug/ zla gam gsum la ba dan 'phyar// gur dbub pa ni dkyil 'khor ro// ling ga bca' ba'i rgyu ni/ chu pha ga tshu ga'i sa dang/ dri chen dri chu gos dum dang/ srub
ma'i lo ma dang/ gangs kyi dum bu dang/ grog mkhar gyi sa dang/ bdun brtsegs la/ bag phye la gzugs bya'o// gro ga 'am shing shun la gzugs bya'o// de yang rid cing skem par bri/ gsad pa'i thun rdzas

ni// a bi sha la sogs pa'i dug sna tshogs dang/ gser gyi rtun bu dang/ lcags kyi rtun bu dang/ ske tshe shang tshe dang/ rims kyi khrag dang/ re'u nag po'i khrag dang/ gri khrag dang/ khyi dang phag pa'i khrag dang/

tsaN+Da li mi'i mi khrag dang/ de rnams bsres la drag sngags bdun pa'i sngags bgrang zhing sngags bzlas pa ni/ badzra khrag thur thur thuM khri shag thuM rbad/ pra ma tsit+ta shag thuM rbad/ dum pa ri ma thuM rbad/ tsan ti tsan ti me

sa ri rbad/ pra ma dur ma sa dur rbad/ ma hA thuM ril tsit+ta shag rbad/ tsit+ta ma dur ha la ha du sa ri b+h+yo b+h+yo rbad/ gsang ba thun nag drag sngags las sbyor ro// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ drag sngags
bdun pa ma grub spogs chog bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// las 'jug sbyin sreg rim pa bstan// gong gi e dbyibs nang du ni// gtum pa'i ro bsregs mgal

dum dang// me reg ma la me blangs te// zhing gi pags pas rlung yab bya// shin tu drag par me spar la// der ni sbyin sreg rim bzhin sbyar// mA ra ya yi ling ga dang/ khyi nag snying dang sha dang khrag/ bya rog snying

dang sha khrag bcas// lug nag snying dang sha dang khrag/ gzhan yang sha chen sha sna tshogs// khrag sna rnam pa sna tshogs dang// phye ma gsum dang yungs dkar yungs nag mu zi dang// lcags phye ske tshe shangs tshe

dang// de rnams thun du brab pa'i sbyin sreg bya// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ las 'jug sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mnan pa'i rim pa bstan pa
