ni// gos dum gcin rtug rkang rjes dang// bdun brtsegs dang bag phye dang// mA ra ya yi ling ka bya// snying khar ming rus gzhug byas la// sbyin sreg rim bzhin sbyar ba yi// khyu ba nag po'i thod par
gzhug/ thod pa thag pa nag pos bsdam// dur khrod gnas sam yi dgas thams cad du// yang na ro khung rnying pa 'am// lha khang rnying pa'i them 'og mnan// sa klu gnas pa'i sa ru mnan// mgon
po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ las gzhug mnan pas bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ ma hA kA la badzra la bstod pa ni// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul

gyi/ thugs rje thabs kyis bdud btul ba// gzhon nu dpa' bo khros pa'i sku// khro bo'i rgyal po khyod la bstod// mgon po g.yul las rnam rgyal te// phyag na kha T+wAM thod khrag bsnams// mgon po rdo rje 'jigs

byed khyod la bstod// mgon po rgyal po khyod ni pha rol 'dul la mkhas// spyan dmar gsum bgrad mche ba gtsigs// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa// ma rungs 'joms byed khyod la bstod// phyag na mtshon cha sna
tshogs bsnams// sbrul dang thod pa'i 'breng bas brgyan// sku la tha ber nag po gsol// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mgon po khyod ni 'khor yang gnod sbyin stong sdes
bskor// sku mdog nag po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rngam pa'i stobs kyis bgegs rnams 'dul mdzad pa// mgon po bgegs 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bgegs dang log 'dren 'dul mdzad

pa// phyi rol bdud chen 'dul ba'i sku// nang gi dgongs pa 'jam la zhi// zhi khro khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis khro chen khyod 'phags pas// mthu rtsal mi nyams mnga' bas na// srid
pa gsum po mthar phyin pas// bdud 'dul 'jigs byed khyod la bstod// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud btul ba'i dus der bstod pa'o// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste
bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'chang chen gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye/ nga yi 'khor du gtogs pa yi// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul dang// gnod sbyin pho yi tshogs rnams
dang// gnod sbyin mo yi tshogs rnams dang// de dag la sogs 'khor rnams la// drag sngags bdun pa'i rgyud bshad zin gyis// khyod la gtad do zung zhig/ rgyud 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/
'di lta bu'i rgyud 'di shin tu yang rnyed par dka' 'o zhes bka' stsal to// rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi 'khor gnod sbyin pho dang// gnod sbyin mo dang/ gnod sbyin mang po la sogs pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das la
mngon par dga' 'o// de nas de dag thams cad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs pas/ gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang gyis mchod de/ 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das la rjes
su yi rang nas mi snang bar gyur to// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// mgon po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rgyud drag sngags bdun
pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rdo rje gdan gyi mchod rten nag po'i bsrungs mar bskos pa'o// DA ki ma rnams la phyag na rdo rjes bka' bsgo gnyer gtad nas phyag rgyas btab nas gtad de/ phyi

rabs las 'phro can dang phrad par shog/ ces smon lam btab bo// slob dpon pad+mas rdo rje gdan gyi mchod rten gyi nang nas phyung nas phyi rabs kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i don du bsam yas dbu rtse'i kwa khol du

sbas pa/ bsam yas rgya gar gling chung nas grwa pa bdag gi gter gyi kha byang rnyed/ dbu rtse bar khang ka khol nas rgyud dang sgrub thabs bcas pa rnyed/ phyi rabs kun la phan phyir spel ba yin// nga rang gis nyams
su long ba'i chos so// kun la med pa'i khyad chos a+thi+-i/ sa ma yA////

rgya gar skad du/ yak+Sha lo ka sarba pa shaM rat+na sid+d+hi tan tra/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du sdud pa rin po che dngos grub kyi rgyud/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal

lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ byang phyogs lcang lo can gyi byang shar gyi mtshams na/ gnod sbyin gyi gter mdzod chen po brgya rtsa brgyad yod pa la/ gnod sbyin gyi mes po kun na tan tri ka

dang/ gnod sbyin gyi mes mo kha d+har pa ta ha dang/ bu dang tsha bo 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa grangs med pas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la bskor nas bzhugs so// de'i dus su gter mdzod rnams la

gnod sbyin rnams 'khrugs te rtsod pa gyur to// dus der gnod sbyin gyi mes po kur na tan tri kas/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi pho nya a pa ra tsit+ta zhes bya ba la/ gter mdzod kyi lde mig rnams gtad pas/ a pa
ra de gter mdzod kyi gseb na nor gyis non nas rdul tsi ri ri yod pa la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis bka' bgros te// a pa ra la dmag drangs pas/ a pa ra yid 'khrugs par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la 'di
skad ces gsol te gter mdzod rnams phul lo// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa lags// lcang lo can gyi byang shar na// gter mdzod brgya dang rtsa brgyad gda'// 'od mdzod gzi brjid dpal 'byung dang// dkar 'joms
dung dang dung chen dang// rab tu tshal dang/ dpal sbyin dang/ rin chen 'dus/ yid bzhin grub dang/ mgon mdzes pa dar 'dus/ se na tri dang d+ha ra paM/ ku ha dri pu/ ta ri pa/ rad na sid+d+hi/ ka ra

ha ti na ra wa/ mdzod chen nyi shu dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung ba 'di/ dpa' bo yab la bdag 'bul lo// dra ba can dang mdzes pa'i tshal// dga' ba'i tshal dang mdzes pa'i tshal// bdud rtsi pho brang rin chen
tshal// dpal gyi tshal dang 'od mdzes tshal// yid bzhin nor bu'i mdzod chen de brgyad kyang// dpa' bo yab la bdag 'bul lo// gser khang bcu dang dung khang bcu// g.yu khang bcu dang dngul khang
bcu// mdzod phran brgyad cu tham pa yang// dpa' bo yab la bdag 'bul lo// gnod sbyin dmag tshogs zhi bar mdzod// ces gsol te// lde mig rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa la phul// dus der rdo rje 'dzin pas

gnod sbyin rnams dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin dmag tshogs nga la nyon// gnod sbyin nang nas stobs che zhing// 'jig rten dbang sdud nus pa yi// zha

'on rdo rje rdzu 'phrul khyod// gter mdzod brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyi// mnga' bdag chen po khyod ky-is la// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bsdus// zhes gsungs nas// zha 'on la spyan gdongs tshugs su bltas te/ gter mdzod kyi lde
mig rnams gtad do// dus der rdo rje bdud 'dul gyis thal mo sbyar te/ e ma ho/ 'jig rten dbang du sdud pa dang/ gter mdzod bdag po bdag gis bgyi// gnod sbyin kun gyis bdag gi bran gyis

shig/ ces smras pa dang/ gnod sbyin lo ka skyong ba thal mo sbyar te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa lags// pha dang ma phyi tha mi dad/ stobs dang nus pa lhag par mnyam/
gter dang mdzod 'di thun mong mnyam/ dpa' bo'i 'khor ni kun kyang yin// lhag par gter mdzod gtod pa gang// zhes mdun du 'dug ste/ mgrin gcig tu smras pas/ rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad gsungs

so// kha ro ya mi gnod sbyin rnams nyon cig/ rdo rje bdud 'dul 'di ni sngon ri rab kyi khong seng na yar la dpag bsam gyi shing bya ba cig skyes te/ rtse mo lha'i yul na yod// 'bras bu ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa

cig la lha rnams longs spyod pas/ dus cig tsam na 'bras bu cig ri rab kyi khong seng na mar lhung bas// lha ma yin cig gis snyed de zos pas ro bro ste/ lha ma yin rnams gros byas te lha rnams la smras pa/ shing

'di'i sked pa nged la yod pas 'bras bu yang nged la blang/ mi ster na shing rked par gcod byas pas/ lha rnams na re nged rang gis gsod nams las grub pas khyod la mi ster/ shing gcod na chod byas/ lha ma
yin rnams kyis shing bcad pas ma chod do// dus der 'khrug pa byas pas lha rnams pham ste sdug bsngal chen pa kyi hud ces zer ba'i dus su/ lha'i bu nor bu bya ba cig gis/ sangs rgyas mar me

mdzad la me tog man da ra ba phul nas/ bdag lha min 'dul ba'i gnyen por dbang bskur du gsol// ces zhus pas/ khyod 'di nas tshe 'phos te shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la rdo rje bdud 'dul bya bar skyes nas/

lha ma yin dang bdud thams cad 'dul zhing/ 'jig rten thams cad dbang du sdud par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la ri rab kyi byang shar dung chen gyi tshal bya ba ru/ gnod sbyin

dzam+b+ha la dang/ yum rgya mtsho gling gi dbang mo che 'tshogs pa las bu gnyis byung ste/ pho bo gnod sbyin mig po che dang/ nu bo rnam thos sras gnyis skyes so// dus der gnod sbyin mig po che dang/ mtsho sman rgyal mo

gnyis 'tshogs pa las/ bu zha 'on rdo rje bdud 'dul byung ste/ sngon yang lha ma yin dang bdud thams cad btul lo// da yang bdud dang lha ma yin 'dul zhing 'jig rten dbang du sdud nus pas/ de'i phyir na

gter mdzod kyi bdag por bskos pa yin pas/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis rdo rje bdud 'dul kyi 'khor dang bran gyis shig ces rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pas/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams kyi nang nas khu bo rnam thos sras dang/

'brog gnas mched lnga dang/ a pa ra tsit+ta dang/ gnod sbyin lag na be con dang/ nor lha dkar po rnams kyis/ dus der ngo so la bstod de bran bya bar khas blangs so// gnod sbyin dmag tshogs bye ba dung phyur

gyis kyang 'khor dang bran g.yog bya bar khas blangs so// dus der zha 'on gyi mdun du gnod sbyin kun gyis thal mo sbyar te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad smras so// kye ma rdo rje bdud 'dul khyod// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
dbang bskur sras// mdzod bdag chen po khyod bgyis pas// bdag cag rnams kyis bran bgyis te// 'jig rten thams cad dbang bsdus la// zas nor longs spyod khyod la dbul// ces 'khor bya bar dam

bcas// dus der 'khor de'i nang nas gnod sbyin 'jig rten skyong zhes sku bsgrungs pa/ stobs che la nga ro drag pa/ phyag g.yas na gza' bdud ra hu la bsnams/ g.yon na rgyal po rnam thos sras bsnams pa cig

yod pa de/ 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces zhus so// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ zha 'on rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi// 'jig rten dbang du sdud pa la/ rten dang dam

rdzas ci dang gang/ bod pa'i srog snying gang dang gang// bsod nams longs spyod ji ltar bsgrub// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig lo ka skyong ba khyod// zha 'on bsgrub thabs ngas
bshad do// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten dbang sdus kyi rgyud las/ skye rgyud dang gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten dbang du sdud pa la/ thog mar
yid mthun gnas nyid du// dpa' stobs ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'di zhus bla ma dung dung dran// chos skyong 'di la mos pa yi// rnal 'byor dam tshig gtsang ba yis// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi

bya// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gong ras mdzes la gru chad ljang// sgo dang rtsig pa spyi dang mthun// dkyil 'khor de yi steng nyid du// 'o ma can gyi shing dag la// rten gyi pho brang bca' ba ni// rkang dang

ru ni gzhu gang la// logs bzhi khru re 'grig par sbyar// byang phyogs shin tu bsgrig bya ste// de la sgo ni dbye gcod bya// sgo yi phyi ru rnam thos kyi sku yang bri// nub tu 'brog gnas lho ru lag na be con bri// shar du

nor lha dkar po bri// kun kyang logs kyi phyi ru bri// nang du zha 'on nyid kyi sku// stag pa dag la bskos la gzhag/ pho brang de yi nang du yang// gnod sbyin 'khor bcas dpon g.yog gi/ rten rnams ma lus tshang

bar byas// rang rang phyogs phyogs dag du gzhag/ gtor ma pho brang steng du gzhag/ mdun du pU tsa rnam lnga bsham// phyi rten mda' mo bya rgod lnga// 'phan dang stag ras gzig ras dang// rin chen btags la

phyogs bzhir gzugs// cig ni pho brang rtse ru gzug/ 'phan la dpon g.yog sku 'bag bri// nang rten seng ldeng seng ge dang// rin chen dngul gyi sgrom bu dang// lcags kyi ga 'u zangs kyi seng ge dang// gser

gyi rta gzugs nang du ni// lnga ka'i sku 'bag sngags dang bcas pa bri// sman dang dri bzangs byug par bya// dpon g.yog lnga ru mnga' gsol la// pho brang nang du rang phyogs gzhag/ gsang rten seng ldeng seng ge

ni// lto ba sbyar ba'i nang dag tu// rten gyi 'khor lo gser gyi bris pa dang// rin chen sna tshogs blugs bya ste// dar dang za 'og dag gis gril// phying khung dag tu bcug bya ste// rang gi mchan khung g.yon du

bcang// bla rdo bca' ba 'di lta ste// zha 'on bla rdo lug nag snying// nor lha shel la mgon po rta nag snying// rin chen sna lnga 'brog gnas la// rnam thos sras la ne le'i snying// de rnams sngags dang bcas pa

yang// ne le'i blud pur gzhug par bya// de ni pho brang zhabs la gdags// nor dang longs spyod spel ba yang// phyug po bdun gyi mdzod nang gis// 'phan po bdun gyi mal sa g.yos sa dang// kha drag bdun gyi

gong rtsa g.yas kyi gos dum dang// ri rtse mthon po bdun gyi me tog dang// lung chen bdun gyi chu sna dang// rgyal khams kun kyi 'bru sna dang// rin chen sna tshogs dar zab sman sna tshogs// rta phyugs sna tshogs spu
sna tshogs// sha mar rtsi bcud la sogs zas sna tshogs// de rnams zangs kyi bum par blug/ bum pa dag la sngags lnga bri// nor dang longs spyod spel cig bri// de ni pho brang 'og gi yang// dkyil
'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhug/ 'jig rten dbang sdud las/ rten bca' ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rang nyid gtum po'i ting 'dzin ldan// pho brang dbus su yi ge

k+Sha// mthing nag de las zha 'on bsam// dza:hUM baM hos/ byang shar gter mdzod dag nas spyan drangs de la bstim/ hUM/ ri rgyal lhun po'i pha rol nas// gnya' shing 'dzin gyi tshu rol nas// rgya mtsho chen po'i pha

rol nas// lcags ri nag po'i tshu rol nas// dur khrod chen po'i pha rol nas// me tog gling gi tshu rol nas// rin chen gling gi khang bzangs nas// bai DUr sngon po'i khri stengs na// dge bsnyen chen po bzhugs
pa ni// mtshan ni rdo rje bdud 'dul lo// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa la// dbu la rin chen prog zhu gsol// phyag na nor bu rin chen 'dzin// g.yon na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// 'dzam gling chos kyi

'jig rten nas// nor dang zas kyi mnga' thang sgyur// zhun mar mngar dang sbyar ba yi// zhal zas pU tsa 'di bzhes la// bsgrub pa po la sid+d+hi stsol// dngos grub chu ba'i char chen phob// ces bstod la/ oM badzra

rat+na tsit+ta li ka sarba ra ga ru ge hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes ni zhag ni bdun du drang/ a tsa ra dang slob dpon dar 'phyar 'byung// rang la gzhan gyis nor ster 'byung// mi yi ded dpon byed pa rmi// zha 'on dngos su 'ong
bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang sdud las/ gtso bo sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// dzam dkar shar gyi rten la bsam// de la nor lha dkar po bskyed// dza:hUM baM
hos spyan drangs bstims// hUM/ shar phyogs lha chen nor lha ni// sum cu rtsa gsum lha yul nas// sku mdog dkar po 'dzum pa la// phyag g.yas rin chen 'bar ba thogs// g.yon na rin chen sgrom bu

bsnams// bsod nams can gyi mi rnams la// zas dang nor gyi char pa 'bebs// ka ra mtshal dang sbyar ba yi// zhal zas pU tsa 'di bzhes la// bsgrub pa po la sid+d+hi stsol// ces bstod la/ oM ma hA kro d+ha Ar+ya

dzam+b+ha la hri da hUM/ zhes pa zhag lnga drang bas ni// me tog dkar dang 'od dkar dang// mi dkar rta dkar bzang po 'ong// nor lha dngos su zhal mthong nges// 'jig rten dbang sdud las/ nor lha sgrub pa'i le'u ste
bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang ni bshad par bya// lho ru rten las hUM mthing nag/ sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa la// g.yas na tsan dan beng chen bsnams// nor bu rin chen phye mas bkang// g.yon na

lcags par nag po'i nang// bdud rtsi 'chi med zas kyis bkang// sha khrag dmar dang sbyar ba yi// zhal zas pU dza 'di bzhes la// sgrub po la sid+d+hi stsol// oM ma hA kA la ha na ha na badzre na swA hA/

zhes pa zhag lngar drang bar bya// ban de bya nag g.yag nag 'ong// rta pa nag po dom nag khyi nag 'ong// mgon po'i zhal ni mthong bar nges// 'jig rten dbang sdus las/ mgon po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// de nas yang ni bshad par bya// nub tu rten la k+Sha gcig bsam// de la 'brog gnas skyed par bya// dza:hUM baM hos spyan drangs bstim// hUM/ nub phyogs 'brog gnas mchod lnga ni// rgyal ba khyu

mchog yang dag shes// gang pa bzang po nor bu bzang// gnod sbyin sred spong lnga brtsegs te/ gcig dang 'dra ba'i zhal lnga po// dbus la byol song mgo bo can// rgyal ba khyu mchog glang gi mgo/ yang dag shes

ni spre'u'i mgo/ gangs pa bzang po rta yi mgo/ bu bzang po lug gi mgo/ sred spongs ra yi mgo bo ste// phyag ma g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis// rin chen sgrom bu thugs khar 'dzin// phyag ma g.yas kyi bar pa

na// rin chen gser gyi 'khor lo bsnams// phyag ma g.yon gyi bar ma na// zan dron 'bras kyi sder bzang bsnams// g.yas kyi tha ma sman sna tshogs// g.yon gyi tha ma shing thog 'dzin// bzhugs pa'i gnas la
nges med de// res 'ga' g.ya' spang mtshams na bzhugs// res 'ga' chu gling tshal na bzhugs// res 'ga' me tog gling na bzhugs// 'dzam gling kun tu rgyug byed cing// 'gro ba rnams kyi bkrag mdangs

'phrog/ bu ram 'bras dang sbyar ba yi// zhal zas pU dza 'di bzhes la// sgrub pa po la sid+d+hi stsol// ces bstod la/ oM badzra yak+Sha de ba pany+tsa rA dza dza dza/ zhes pa zhag lnga drang bar bya// rta dang glang po lug dang
sprel// ra dang sku ni dngos su ston// 'jig rten dbang sdud las/ 'brog gnas kyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang ni bshad par bya// byang gi rten la bai ljang las// de las rnam sras

bskyed par bya// dza:hUM baM hos spyan drangs bstim// hUM/ byang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa yi// rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras// sku mdog ljang khu 'bar ba la// g.yas na gser gyi spa lca bsnams// g.yon pa dngul gyi

gzhong pa ru// gser gyi nye chung sil mas bkang// chibs su ngang pa gser dra chibs// rnam thos bu ni mthu rtsal can// gnod sbyin stong sde'i 'khor dang bcas// lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas// skad cig tsam gyi

'dir gshegs la// sman dang spos su sbyar ba yi// zhal zas pU tsa 'di bzhes la// sgrub pa po la sid+d+hi stsol// ces bstod la/ oM ma hA rA dza bai shra ma Na ye hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa zhag lnga drang bar bya// rta pa dmag
dpung chen po dang// byis pa khye'u chas bzang dang// rnam sras sku ni dngos su ston// 'jig rten dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ rnam thos sras bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag

bshad par bya// mtshams ma chod cing rgyun du sgrub 'dod na// rten dang bca' lugs gong ma la// gang du 'gro yang sngags 'di stong stong bgrang// oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ge hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ar+ya dzam+b+ha la

hri da/ ma hA kA la yak+Sha de ba pany+tsa bai shra ma na ye/ sa ma ya/ zhes rgyun du byas na bsam pa thams cad 'grub bo// 'dzam bu gling la dbang byed dang// 'gro ba 'dus nas nor 'bul dang// gzhan gyi kha lo sgyur ba

dang// gter rnyed bud med 'du ba dang// srid pa'i bdag po byed par 'gyur// de nas ngan pa'i rtags bstan pa// 'jigs shing phya sangs khyer ba dang// yo byad 'phang sems byed pa dang// khro dang bying dang

'gro snying 'dod// gzhan gyis zas nor khyer gyi rmi// de ltar byung na bar gcod yin// ting nge 'dzin gsar zhing drag sngags brdeg/ 'jig rten dbang sdud las/ sbyi sgrub rgyun du bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas yang ni bshad par bya// rtags rdzogs thod pa mtshan ldan du// chang dang bu rim ka ra sbrang// sbyar te dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag/ rang gi gos rgyan g.yu khrag sdigs la

sogs// dkyil 'khor de yi mdun du spungs// spyi dril sngags la 'di gdags zhag gsum drang// rat+na sid+d+hi pa la/ oM AHhUM sid+d+hi sid+d+hi sdus sdus phob phob a la la ho/ zhes zhag grangs thim pa dang/ gnod sbyin
dpon g.yon la bstod pa bya zhing/ thod pa'i chang lan gsum la zad par btung// sdigs rnams nor rta'i bum par bcas/ mis ma mthong bar mdzod du sba/ 'jig rten dbang sdud las/ dngos grub blang ba'i
le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang ni bshad par bya// snod bzang nang du chang bu lnga// rgyan dang ldan par bsham bya ste// rang nyid gtum por bsam byas pa'i// mdun du gnod sbyin dpon g.yog

bsam// oM AH hUM zhes lan bdun gyis// ro mchog brgya dang ldan par byin gyis brlab// oM na ma:sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+ya: sarba thA khaM ud ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga Na khaM swA hA/ zhes lan bdun dag
gis rgya che grangs med spel// de nas rang re'i sngags dag la// 'di btags lan bdun dbul// ma hA ba liM ta pU tsa kha kha khA hi khA hi/ zhes pas dpon g.yog rnams kyis gsol bar bsam// gtor ma dbul

ba'i gong du// spyi dril sngags ni brgya rtsa bgrang// khA hi zhes pa'i rting la/ hUM/ gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul dpon g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la// gnod sbyin bye ba dung phyur dang bcas pa
rnams// mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bdag gi gnas srungs 'khor skyongs shig/ rigs brgyud dar zhing rgyas par mdzod cig/ longs spyod spel la rgyags 'thud cig/ 'jig rten dbang

du sdus la srid gsum zil gyi gnon// mi chen bran bu khol la snyan grags sid+d+hi stsol// bgegs dpung choms la g.yul ngo zlog/ hUM/ gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul po// mthu rtsal khyad 'phags gzhan
gyis 'gran du med// byang phyogs gnod sbyin kun gyi gtso bo ste// dgos 'dod gter mdzod mnga' bdag khyed la bstod// gang zhig khyod la dad pas gang sgrub pa// rnal 'byor de yi mthu dang dpung byed
cing// bar gcod dgra bgegs tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa// rdo rje bdud 'dul 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces yi ge brgya pa tshar gcig bgrang/ badzra mu zhes pas gshegs su gsol la/
gtor ma khang thog gtang/ de ltar rgyun gtor ma chad par btang na/ stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang sdud las/ rgyun gtor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de
nas yang ni bshad par bya// 'di la ma grub spogs pa dgos mi srid// man ngag gud na yod pa min// rgyud ltar sgrub pa shin tu zab// gzir dang log gnon dgos mi srid// rta gtor nya la gtang ba

dang// rgyun gtor rtag tu gtang ba shis// mchod gtor dag la ma gtang na// 'khor mangs bye ba dung phyur yang// bza' btung med pas 'thab cing rtsod// de phyir rnal 'byor kha smas mang// de la man ngag 'di
ltar bya// 'jig rten srid pa'i zas nor ma lus pa// rdo rje bdud 'dul bye ba dung phyur dang bcas pa la// mchod par 'bul lo bzhes shig dges par mdzod// ces pas thun mtshams skabs su dbul// de la

gnod sbyin rnams ni rol bar bsam// rgyud ltar sgrub pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che// 'di sgrub rnal 'byor dbang phyug te// bsod nams rigs brgyud dar ba dang// snyan grags chen po thob pa dang// mang po'i ded

dpon byed pa dang// nor rdzas longs spyod gter mdzod bdag por 'gyur// khros pas dgra ni 'chi ba dang// 'di la yon tan bsam mi khyab// dam tshig bla ma dung dung dran pa dang// rgyud ltar bsgrub pa'i sgrub
lugs 'di// 'gro ba gzhan la spel mi bya// rten dang dam rdzas bstan mi bya// gtor ma rgyun du 'chad mi bya// 'jig rten dbang sdud kyi rgyud las// gdams pa chings kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de
nas yang ni bshad par bya// rgyu 'di yid bzhin nor bu yin// rgyud 'di dgos 'dod 'byung ba yin// rgyud 'di 'jig rten dbang sdud yin// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs
pa'i 'khor bye ba dung phyur yi rangs te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ 'khor rnams yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// zha 'on rdo rje

bdud 'dul gyi rgyud 'jig rten dbang du sdud pa'i rgyud ces bya ba lha yul du grags pa/ o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis skyid mkhar rong du gter du sbas/ 'khon nag bdud kyi sprul pas phag gi lo la thon// brag
btsan dang gza' mig dmar la gtad do// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ yak+Sha ya se nA badzra i b+hi d+ha ra gu h+ya rat+na tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin zha 'on rdo rje bdud

'dul gyi gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud ces bya ba/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// ri rab kyi pha rol/ ri gnya' shing 'dzin gyi tshur 'gram/

lcags ri nag po'i phar 'gram/ dur khrod kyi ro sna tshogs pa/ me tog sna tshogs skyes pa/ gzhi gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng na lcang lo sna tshogs gtibs pa/ gnam lcags kyi gzer btab ba/ mi rgod kyi pags pas

g.yog pa/ tshangs pa'i gdung byas pa/ nyi zla 'char ba'i skar khung can de'i nang na gnod sbyin zha 'on yab yum bzhugs so// de'i yab ni gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs zhes bya ba/ de'i ma ni gnod sbyin pad+ma

bzang mo bya ba'o// de'i 'khor du gnod sbyin dzam+b+ha la dang/ lha chen ma hA kA la yab yum dang/ lha chen 'brog gnas mched lnga dang/ lha chen rnam thos sras yab yum dang/ kun tu 'jigs byed dang// gnod

sbyin rnon po dang/ nyi ma'i mig dang/ 'khor gnod sbyin stong sde dang lhan cig na bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na gsang ba'i bdag pos sngags 'di gsungs so// oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na hUM phaT/ ces phyag
g.yas pa'i rdo rje lan gsum gsor nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg go/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ mtho dman
can du 'gyur ro// de'i tshe gnod sbyin 'khor bcas lus rab tu 'dar bar gyur to// de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di ci'i rgyud ci'i rkyen lags/ zhes gsol ba dang/ bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams ni mi'i
srog dang dkor rnams la dbang bas/ de la sngags kyi sgra de smras pa yin gyis/ dam las ma 'da' zhig ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang
po'o//// de nas zha 'on gyis gsol pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// bdag cag rnams kyi zas skal ni gang la bya/ btung skal ni gang la bya// mu tig rin chen gang du dbab// 'bru yi phung po gang
du spungs// rkang 'gro mi yi bsod nams gang du spel// ces zhus pas/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ legs so zhus par rab tu legs/ khyed kyi zas skal ni gsang phyi dang dam rdzas la

gyis// btung skal du bdud rtsi dang tsit+ta'i khrag la gyis// rin po che'i char ni rnal 'byor sgrub po la phob// ces bka' stsal to// yang gnod sbyin zha 'on gyi zhus pa/ bdag cag bsnyen bsgrub ji ltar

bgyi// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhis mdzes// gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhir ldan// 'khor lo'i kha dog lha dang mthun// dbus su
zha 'on yab yum ni// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas na nor bu rin chen bsnams// g.yon pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o// rin chen rgyan nor gyi lha// yum chen gnod sbyin kun dug mo// sku
mdog yab 'dra nor bu g.yas// g.yon na gter gyi ne le 'dzin// sku la rin chen rgyan gyis spras// shar du lha chen yab yum bskyed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// g.yas na rin chen g.yon na
ga'u 'dzin// yum yang yab 'dra g.yas bum pa'o// g.yon na ne le rin chen gyis spras// lho ru mgon po yab yum sku mdog gnag/ g.yas pa beng dang lcag spar g.yon// yum ni bum par g.yon na ne'u le
'dzin// nub tu 'brog gnas zhal gsum phyag drug ser// g.yas g.yon dang po rin chen sgrom bu 'dzin// bar ma gser gyi 'khor lo sman chen 'dzin// tha ma shing thog sder bzang bsnams// byang du rnam thos
yab yum sku mdog ser// g.yas pa rin chen g.yon pa ne'u le 'dzin// yum ni g.yas na bum pa g.yon na 'phreng ba 'dzin// de lta bu ru bskyed par bya// dbus su gtor ma legs par bzhag/ de bzhin phyogs
phyogs dag la bzhag/ phan dang dar yang phyogs su bzhag/ dbus su chang phud ma nyams bzhag/ gnod sbyin gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor dang/ rdzas dang/ lha bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis

pa'o//// de nas zha 'on gyis/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po// bdag cag gi gsang ba'i snying po 'bul gyis/ oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ra ti/ ma hA kro d+ha ar+ya dzam+b+ha la hri da/ ma hA kA la ha na ha na badzre na/ yak+Sha

de ba pany+tsa ra/ ma hA bai sha ma Na hUM phaT swA hA// zhes ni snying po gsang ba 'di// dpa' bo nyid dang sgrub pa'o// zhag bdun bar du rgyun du drangs// 'bru yi phung po ster ba dang// rin chen gter rnams rnyed pa
dang// rang gi slob dpon 'khor bcas dang// lung ba dar gyis khengs pa dang// me tog 'bul dang lha phyag byed// mon nag ston 'khor chos ston pa// de rnams grub rtags yin par 'dod// gnod sbyin
gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ srog snying dang rtags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// zha 'on nyid kyi chu sbyin dbul ba 'di gsungs so// dang po mdun

du zangs gzhong nang// druM las rin po che yi snod// pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa la// zha 'on yab yum dbus su bskyed// slob dpon dang ni gnas bzhi dang// bud med na chung chas bzang dang// shar du dzam+b+ha la

ni yab yum mo// nub tu 'brog gnas mched lnga bskyed// bum pa bdud rtsi'i rdzing du bsam// oM AHhUM gsum gyi bdud rtsir bsam// de nas lha la dbul ba ni// oM badzra Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la/ ma hA kA la yak+Sha de ba/ bai

shra ma NA ya/ dzam+b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas la dbul// lha rnams mnyes nas dngos grub blang// gnod sbyin gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ chu sbyin gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas

zha 'on drag pos// rigs brgyud spel na 'di ltar bya// ma la khrus dang gtsang sbra bya// dar sna lnga la lha lnga bskyed// ma yi lus la rtag tu bcang// zla ba re la phud gtor gtang// 'o dod 'bod cing bgegs
rnams gzir// bsrung ba'i mdud pa dag kyang gdags// sri rnams thar nas gtang rag gtang// ling ga gnan cing sngags rnams bzlas// gnod sbyin gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ sri'u gso ba'i le'u ste
lnga pa'o//// de nas zha 'on chen po yis// gser ba bsrung ba 'di gsungs so// rang nyid zha 'on chen por bsgom// shar du lha chen yab yum bskyed// lho ru ma hA kA la yab yum bsgom// nub tu 'brog

gnas mched lnga bsgom// byang du rnam thos yab yum bskyed// nam mkha' dar gyis khengs par bsam// oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ma hA Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la ma hA kA la yak+Sha de ba bai shra ma Na rak+Sha ser ba ur na ma ni ye swA
hA/ oM dzam b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/ ser ba bdud rtsi'i chu ru bsam// gnod sbyin rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ser ba bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bla rdo bca' ba 'di gsungs

so// shel dang byi ru mchong dang ni// pha wang cho long zha nye dang// dar sna lnga dang seng ldeng ge'o// sngags ni mthing shog gser gyis bri// de rnams lus la rtag tu bcangs// rang nyid phyag na rdo rjer bsgom// oM

badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha na hUM phaT/ des ni 'gyur ldog byed mi nus// gnod sbyin gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ bla rdo bca' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas zha 'on drag po yi// bsgrub pa po la dgra

dar na// bsnyen pa gong ma ji bzhin bya// zhag bdun bar du bsgrub par bya// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor gong bzhin bya// oM badzra rat+na tsit+ta ra ga ma hA Ar+ya dzaM b+ha la ma hA kA la yak+Sha de ba bai shra ma Na ang+ku sha dza/ de nas
rtag tu bzlas pa bya// rtags ni dam nyams 'ded pa dang// 'brub khung nang du bcug pa'o// de nas las sbyar bar bya// ra sogs dag la ling ga bris// gong gi sngags la 'di yis brdeg/ che ge

mo'i badzra snying gong chod// kha la mu lo ha khri tra la rbad/ pu na pra ti rbad/ rmug rbad/ ma la ga lci lci la rbad// ma ri kha ri ya rbad// nyungs kar nyungs nag rdzas kyis brab// ling ga dag la phur pas bdab// nyin
gsum mtshan gsum phur bas gdab// gnod sbyin gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ gsad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bsreg dang mnan pa 'di gsungs so// ling ga sman ma te rel de/ chu shing ngam

gla ba'i me spar la// me nyid zha 'on 'khor bcas skyed// he raM tang raM hi raM dza la raM/ dam nyams dgra bgegs dz+wa la raM/ de'i ling ga bsreg cing lha'i zhal du phul bar bsam// tho'i sa dang thal ba la gnan pa

bya'o// glang gi thod par bcug nas ni// lha khang chen po'i them 'og mnan// gnod sbyin gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ mnan bsreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas tshe bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bum pa

b+huM las gzhal yas khang du bskyed// nang du dkar gsum mngar gsum chang yang blug/ zha 'on dpon g.yog nang du bskyed// oM badzra A yur khe b+h+ruM a badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ sku ni rdo rje lta bu ste// gsung ni 'gag pa
med pa'o// thugs ni 'gyur ba med pa'o// bum pa'i dbang bskur zha 'on thim// gnod sbyin gsang ba'i rin po che'i rgyud las/ tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis

rgyud gtad ba 'di gsungs so// lus thung gzi brjid che la ngam nag pa// bla ma snying bzhin 'khur zhing dam tshig mig gi 'bras bzhin srungs// bsgrub pa'i rdzas dang yo byad rtag tu 'chang// sngags dang ting

'dzin mi brjed rtag tu dran// kun la mi smra rang gi snying bzhin bcang// de lta bu yi slob bu la// rgyud dang ma bu tshang bar btad// ces gsungs nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po mi snang bar gyur to// gnod sbyin
gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// gnod sbyin gsang ba rin po che'i rgyud rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la gu ti ha la gu ti ha la so ri mU la tan tra/ bod skad du/ mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje gtum po nyid/ dur khrod chen po lcang lo can gyi gnas/ gsang ba'i pho brang gnam lcags rngur mos gtams pa'i gzhal yas na/ byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs dang/ khro bo 'jigs byed rol po'i tshogs dang/ lha dang mkha' 'gro 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs dang// sha za rngam pa dregs pa'i tshogs dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ dregs pa can
'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis bstan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ mthu stobs bdag po rdo rje'i sku// gsang sngags bka' yi 'khor
lo la// rtse gcig bsrung ba'i dpal mgon te// ma hA kA la gtum chen sku// don gyi ngo bo ji ltar lags// gnyen po gang gis 'dul ba yin// gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad par mdzod// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// kA la 'od 'bar drag shul can// 'bar byed 'jigs pa'i rgyal po 'di/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi srungs ma ste// dug gsum nad kyi sman pa yin// rigs 'dzin rnams kyi srog shing

yin// rnal 'byor yongs kyi dgra bla ste// bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug yin// dgongs pa mya ngan 'das mod kyang// sku nyid 'jig rten tshul bzung nas// dam pa'i chos skyong bsrung ma mdzad// sangs rgyas

legs pa'i blo gros la// rdo rje snying pos lung bstan te// bstan pa de la mngon sangs rgyas// gnyen po nga yis 'dul ba ste// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// rdzogs ldan bskal pa 'dzam gling lhor// ma nor ma
bcos de bzhin nyid// dngos po bzhi la gnas bcas kyang// nam mkha'i sprin bzhin rnal 'byor lam// dge slong gdams pa'i don ma mthong// gsang sngags bka' bsgo legs pa yis// dus min tshe zad
mnar med lhung// dmyal ba yi dgas kha 'khor gnas// ri rab lho nub srin po'i gnas// lang ka pu ra'i lus blangs te// grong khyer brlag pa'i dregs par 'gyur// lang ka mgrin bcu la sogs pa// gzugs
khams man chad dbang du bsdus// khams gsum 'khrugs pa'i bdud du 'gyur// bde gshegs thugs rjes bka' gros te// zhi ba'i bden pas ma thub ste// stongs pas nag po'i gnas yang stengs// khro bo de
bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// sku yi ngo bo nyid sprul pas// nag mo mthu chen ma thul te// de bzhin gsung gi rnam 'phrul gyis// smyon pa drag po ma thul nas// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyis// las kyi
khro bor dbang bskur ba// mthu stobs bdag po nga nyid la// nag po 'dul ba'i gnyen por mngags// sangs rgyas thugs rje khro bo yis// thabs kyi bye brag mang po yi// 'khor rnams dbang bsdus
nag po gzir// zhal du rngubs te snam nas phyung// sgrub sbyangs las mkhan chen por bskos// dam tshig gcan la gdungs pa dang// bka' yi 'khor lo bsrung ba dang// dam chos skyong bar dbang bskur

te// byin gyis brlabs te gsang mtshan byin// rdo rje sgrol byed drag po rtsal// mgon po nag po zhes su btags// yum ni 'dod pa'i dbang mo ste// rnal 'byor bsrung ma rtse gcig mdzad// nga yi las mkhan sprul

pa ste// byang shar rlung nag tshub ma'i dbus// me dpung 'bar ba'i nang na gnas// dam tshig bka' yi bya ra ma// rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa la// ma bcol nyid kyis zhal ches ma// 'khor ni dregs pa 'jigs

pa'i tshogs// myur mgyogs las rnams mdzad pa ste// bdud dang gnod sbyin srin po btsun// klu dang ma mo srog bdag gi/ sprul pa'i las mkhan chen po ste// mngag pa las kyi pho nya yin// bgrod pa sum thob

shi la ldan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i srungs ma ste// dam chos skyong bar dam bcas so// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang
po'o//// de nas gnod sbyin rnam thos sras kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba// rnal 'byor kun gyi dpal mgon mchog/ kA la 'od 'bar chen po yi// lta spyod 'khor lo rim pa gang// mthu stobs kyi

bdag pos bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yi// gdod nas dag pa'i chos nyid la// sku dang gsung dang thugs yon lnga// snang ba ye shes sgyur ma ste// 'dul yang 'khrul par snang ba bas// ngo bo
nyid la gnyis med pa'o// zhing khams gzhal yas gdan dang bcas// don la gnyis su med pa'o// de na chos dang chos nyid la// sangs rgyas sems can ye shes rtog/ don dam kun rdzob btags pa

rnams// ming gnyis su ni btags par zad// chos rnams thams cad rang sar bden// de yang de bzhin nyid yin pas// kun gzhi byang chub chos kyi sku// ngo bo nyid du sangs rgyas so// spyod pa don rtogs blang

dor bral// yin min blo dang bral ba yis// 'gag med par rang yan pa'o// dam tshig spyi dang khyad par te// spyi ni rtsa ba yan lag go/ rang bzhin dag pa 'di dag bsrung// yi dam mi spang gu ru yang// kun gyi

mchog tu bskur bar bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// gsang don dman la bsgrags mi bya// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// dug lnga yang dag mi spang zhing// dam rdzas dngos po mi dor ro// brag mi
bshig cing sgron mi gsad// phyag rgya mi dbye 'phreng mi gcad// sdig dang bdag chags rdul rnams spang// rdo rje mi ri'i go mi bshig/ mtshon cha mi gsal phyag mi bya// sgog btsong rme sha nya rnams
spangs// de dag dam tshig sdom pa'i don// rnal 'byor yongs kyi srog yin pas// rang gi srog ltar bsrung bar byos// bsgrod pa'i rim pa dbang yin te// 'khrud cing nus pa 'joms pas na// gnas mchog

gtsang ma bkra shis par// sa yi maN+Dal ru mtshon bri// bum pa sman spos chu yis dgang// gzhal yas khang du lha tshogs bskyed// de dag bkra shis phyi yi rdzas// gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsi phud// bla ri gling bu gsur

chen tshogs// rgyan dang phyag mtshan sku yi rgya// byin brlabs ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// bkra shis dag pa nang gi rdzas// gzungs ma mtshan ldan sems bskyed bshad// las gzhung dang sbyar tshogs kyi

mchod// zhag grangs bdun du bsnyen bsgrub brtsam// yol bas bar chad rdo rje grang// dang la dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bu// bag chags rtog pa'i sgrib pa sbyang// de nas phyag rgya rgyan dbang bskur// mgon po
'jigs pa'i sku ru 'gyur// phyag mtshan rdzogs gtad lag na 'bar// de nas mchod pa dbul bar bya// dam rdzas dbang phyugs bdun no na// de nas slob dpon gzungs ma sbyar// dkar dmar thig le gsum
blugs blang// gsang sngags 'khor lo man ngag ste// gsang bdag longs sku'i gzhal yas mthong// rgyun gyi man ngag rdzogs par gtad// rgyud kyi man ngag tshig gsum po// mi ldan las la sbyor 'dod pa// sa
bon me yis tshig pa 'dra// bskal par bsgrub kyang 'bras bu med// ston pa'i man ngag gsum ldan par// ston ka'i lo tog smin pa bzhin// 'bras bu rang dbang med par 'byung// dngos grub 'thob sgo dbang
yin pas// bla ma'i byin brlabs yod pa la// rab tu gces dang yid 'thad 'bul// bka' lung 'thob na nye bar 'grub// 'khor lo zhes su gang gsungs pa// stobs chen rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dang// me dbal
'joms pa'i 'khor lo dang// mtha' sdud stobs kyi 'khor lo yin// ces gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lta spyod dang dam tshig gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de
nas rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdud 'dul dbang phyug chen po yi// lta spyod dbang dang de ltar na// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// mthu stobs bdag pos bka' stsal
pa// dkyil 'khor chen pa'i las mkhan te// nag po chen po drag shul can// de yi bsnyen bsgrub bshad bya ba// ri gsum rtse 'dus dmar la gzar// mtsho gling dur khrod gnam lcags mda'// dben la byin che
gcan gzan 'grim// nags tshal rtsub pa'i gnas mchog tu// rdo rje 'joms pa'i gzungs sngags 'don// sbyin gtor rgyas pas gnas bslang zhing// bsod nams bsags pa'i rim

pa bya// phung sa gsum dang srin rdo sas// maN+Dal khru gang khru bzhi brtsig/ dri spos dug khrag chag chag gdab// ni ru spu yis kha dog dbye// dbus su gru gsum zla gam ldan// zlum po thod pa rlon pas

gtams// gru chad sgo la rdo rje rwa// rtsig pa 'dod yon dra phyed dang// rta babs 'khor lo pad+ma khyung// mtha' ma rdo rje me ris gtams// dbus su dung chen ga 'u ru// steng 'og bsnyen pa'i sngags bkod de// nag

po gsum dang bya rog mon// tsit+ta bdud rtsi nal bu'i snying// mthing nag dar dril rgyas btab la// dam rdzas dam pa'i rten du gzhug/ dpal gyi gtor ma ka pa la// shar lho 'bru sna sha khrag tshogs// la phug la d+hu
rgun chang dang// shing thog sna tshogs dpal bshos dang// bdud rtsir rag ta gtor ma dang// mchod pa lnga bsham rgyan rnams dgos// mthu stobs bdag pos las gzhung bsrang// sku bskyed gsal bar 'dzab
bu grang// rdzogs dag nag po'i las gzhung bsrang// rnam gsum sgo nas cho gas bskyed// bdag gi thugs ka'i theg le las// rgyu las dbang chen yig 'bru las// gzhal yas dbus su dreg pa bsnol// gdan
la me 'bar klong dkyil du// nag po 'jigs byed gtum po'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug kham na gsang// thod pa sbrul gtams zhal gdangs shing// mche gtsigs sma ra smin ma ser// dar nag dgu brtsegs

me tog brgyan// stag gi gong ras zhing chung brgyan// snyan cham gur chu sbrul gyi brgyan// thod 'phreng nyi zla brgyan pa ste// rdo rje be con phur pa dang// dung dmar dbyug to zhags pa'o// g.yon nas bud med nag po

stobs// gru chad mon pa pho mo'i tshogs// bskyed dang spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs// phyi nang gsang mchod dngos grub blang// thugs dam bskang bshags bstod 'dzab bgrang// thugs kar nyi zla hUM dang
sngags// gsal byas bka' sdod snying kar sog/ yi ge'i 'phreng ba rgyun mi gcad// gnyis byas slar 'dus dngos grub mchog/ mgal me 'khor lo lta bu yin// de la drod rtags rnams pa gsum// dngos
gsal bka' sdod las byed dang// mon pa bya nag g.yag rgod sprin// rlung nag me 'bar sgra 'byon pa'o// rmi lam phyi nang nyams byung na// dngos gsal shugs chen lung yang gsang// zhes gsungs so// mgon
po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// nag po chen po 'jig byed sku// bsnyen pa'i rim pa

de ltar na// de nyid bsgrub pa'i gsang sngags gang// mthu stobs bdag pos yang dag bshad// dun mahA kA la ga na gu ti// oM gi shwa ri ki ya hUM/ ka ma la shwa ri nag mo ting lam b+h+yo/ sa ma ya hUM dza

dza/ dza hUM baM ho/ a ti pu ho/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha badzra/ sarba ud ga te spa ra na khaM swA hA/ d+hu pe/ puSh+pe/ A lo ke/ gan d+he/ ne bi d+ye swA hA/ mu tra sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta shri ban khA hi/ ka ya sid+d+hi oM/ bAka sid+d+hi aM/

tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA maM sa/ tsit+ta/ keM ni ri ti/ pany+tsa pa ri ye/ ba su ta go ro tsa na khA hi/ ma hA ba liM ta pu tsa kha kha khA hi hi hi/ sha ra g+ha tsa me/ shrI kA la ko ta ga na gu ti a la la ho/ e

A ra li/ badzra yo gi kA ya/ yo gi shwa ri hring hring dza dza/ pra be sha ya phaT/ kha raM khA hi/ kha kha le le kha hi ho/ oM shri ma hA kA la ga na gu ti/ yo gi shwa ri ba tra dun hring dza dza/ ka ma la shwa ri nag mo ti lam b+h+yo sa ma ya dza
dza/ gsang sngags 'phreng ba'i rgyal po ste// nag po chen po de nyid yin// grangs ni 'bum phrag gcig tu brjod// byas na dgos pa thams cad grub pa ste// bdud dpung thams cad brlag par byed// gsang
sngags drag po rdo rje che// yid bzhin nor bu chen po'i sku// lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang// ma rungs pa dag 'joms mdzad cing// 'jigs pa rnams las yongs su thar// 'khor dang longs spyod 'phel ba

dang// mthu stob che zhing dbang dang ldan// 'jig rten mi nub rgyal mtshan te// bla na med par yang dag rdzogs// mthu stobs bdag pos yang dag bshad// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/
gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang gnod sbyin rnam thos sras kyis// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// nag po 'jigs byed gtum chen gyis// gsang sngags 'phreng ba de ltar
na// bdud 'dul bstan pa bsrung ba yi// las kyi sbyor ka bshad par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ mthu stobs bdag pos bka' stsal pa// bka' dang bstan pa bsrung ba yi// drag po'i las kyi sbyor ka
bshad// dpa' bo gcig pa'i drag sngags dang// yab yum gsang ba'i dmod pa dang// dkyil 'khor dregs pa'i dmod pa gsum// las rims rdzogs par ngas bshad kyis// srog don bka' las nyams pa

yi// bsgral ba'i zhing du gyur pa rnams// dam tshig chen pos bsgral bar byos// dang po sbyor ba bshad bya ba// gru gsum sbag ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyi nang rgya sol dug khrag byug/ kha khyer gdug pa'i rtsang gis

bskor// rten drug zhing khang skra shad la// sor brgya dbang po yan lag dod// dug khrag tsha ba'i rdzas dag gi/ ming rus lo khams srog yig bri// dpral ba mgrin snying lte bar gzhug/ skud pas dril la gri thod
gzhug/ 'bru gsum dug bzhi khrag gsum la// thun byas zhal gyi dmod pas gdab// rdo rje gtum po'i nga rgyal gyis// pho nyar mgon po nag po mngag/ bka' sdod bskul la bla rkun mngag/ bla
dgug lha dbye rten la bstim// ma yengs gsal bar sngags bzlas bskul// zhag grangs bdun nam dgu ru bya// lha khang dur khrod la sogs par// gnan pa'i las ni 'them par bya// bskyod pa kha gso zor gyi
las// nya stong dus su bya bar bshad// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mgon po nag po mngag cing nyams pa bsgral ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs bdag po
yis// mgon po yab yum gsang ba yi// dmod pa nges par bshad pa ni// gnas mchog nags tshul rtsub pa der// gdug pa'i rgyud las maN+Dal brtsigs// kha dog nag po rtsang gis bskor// zhing ras rgya shog

khru gang tshad// dug gi ngar blud khrag gis bri// mu khyud bzhi dbus e dang dbang// phyi rim lcags mkhar nag po la// yang logs tsakra rtsibs bdun pa// mtha' ma gdug pa'i sbrul gyis brgyan// dbus e A mu

ka dang ldan// dbang gi pho brang lo bsrungs te// lcags mkhar rtsa ba rtsibs spu gri// gdug pa'i gnas su gnan cing 'phang// kha sbyar sdig pa'i lto bar bca'// ling ga gri thod e dbus bzhag/ kha sbyar tsakra pa

snang lding// rdo rje gtum po'i ting 'dzin gyis// zhag lnga dmod sngags bar mi gcad// srod dang tho rangs drag tu bskul// drag sngags dbugs kyi rta la zhon// gsang lam dgu nas bla dgu gnas// me lce mtshon
cha dgu thogs kyis// gzer dgu gtam nas gnan dgu 'joms// rtsa gcad khrag gzhung bag chags bsreg/ srog gi me gsad rang nyid phye// gdug pa'i dmod pa 'bru bdun la// nyin gril mtshan mo gtor te
bgrang// kun gyi slad du yig 'bru dgu/ stobs chen drag po'i yi ges bya// rdzogs nas ling ga 'khor lo rnams// gri thod zhabs ma re bas dril// tshas ldan gdug pa che ba la// 'gran gyi zlar gtad dmod pa

gdab// nya stong tho rangs yang yang bskul// drag sngags dmod pa'i sbyor ba yin// gzhan la chu rgod 'bebs pa na// rgya shog dgu la tsakra bri// dbus su dbang po lcags mkhar la// rtsa ba 'bru bdun mtshon cha

la// gza' rgod drag po'i mtshon cha bri// kha sbyar gti mug phag pa'i ltor// mi rta khyi phag thod par brnag/ zo bar khrag lnga blugs la thun// dgun zla tha chung zhag bdun dril// nyungs dkar nyungs nag ske tshe

'bru// brgya stong dong bur yid brnag brab// dpyid zla tha chung zhag lnga dril// nya la yul du rta bcu la// dbyar gyi tha chung ston zla 'bring// zhag bdun chu 'khyags 'phang bar bya// khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus gzung la/
zor 'phang bskul te khri yis 'phang// rdzas bseg thab bya thal 'jim 'phang// rdzas bsreg thab bya thal 'jim gtor// rang dbang med par gzir la dbab// de yis chu rgod ri ltar
spungs// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mgon po yab yum dmod pas 'gal byed bsgral zhing lo nad dbab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs bdag po yis// nag
po chen po 'khor dang bcas// 'khrul 'khor las kyi mgon po yis// drag po'i dmod pa bshad bya ba// gnas mchog gzhung dang mthun pa der// phung sa'i gru gsum sbag ma ru// rgyu rkyen drug las ling ga

bya// mon nam rabs chad thod par brub// dug khrag 'bru dang chang sbyar la// gri rgod thod par brub nas kyang// gsang ba'i rdzas kun dgod par bya// rgya shog rgyu la 'khor lo bri// e dang dbang la brnag pa'i

lha// phyi rus mu khyud rtsa ba yi// yang logs de bzhin spu gri ste// mtha' ma thod pa'i ra bas gtams// rang rang rdzas kyi bri byas te// kha sbyar las mkhan lto bar gzhug/ sngo dmar brgyangs te rtsang la bskor// rdo
rje gtum po'i ting 'dzin gyis// bka' sdod pho nya rim pas bskul// ma yengs gsang sngags zhag dgur brdeg/ rdzogs dang rang rang lag tu gtad// bdud rgyal ma mo klu dang btsan// skyes bu la sogs las
kyis so// gang yin lag tu mtshon cha bskur// stobs chen mgon pos las mkhan mngag/ rim pa bzhin du bzlas pa ni// gsad pa las kyi rgyal po yin// spogs gnad dkrugs bzlog tu brdeg/ mchog gi
gnas kyi ngan sngags te// phyir byung srog chags yod tshad 'chi// nad byung rang gi rtsa srog gcod// des na gdab pa'i gsang sngags rnams// zhing rkang sbu gur gdab par bya// rlung gi thos su mi rung

bzlas// dmod pa gnas kyi gdab pa'i sngags// shAka thub bstan pa 'jig ka'i dus// rtsi shing nags tshal zad pa'i dus// tshe lo lnga bcu tham pa'i dus// rnal 'byor nang dme 'khrug pa'i dus// lha srin dpa'
rtsal 'gyed pa'i dus// skye bo dpa' rtsal 'gran pa'i dus// de tshe gdab pa'i ngan sngags 'byung// gzu lum ra chod spyad gyur na// stobs chen rang 'chi brlag par 'gyur// sngags bdag mgon po nyid la

dri// cang mi smra na dus min pas// rang gi snying sbyin brnag la sba// bka' gsal thob na drag sngags spyad// de la nus pa dbang med 'byung// yang gsang thugs kyi rgyal po zhes// mthu stobs bdag pos rab tu
bshad// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dmod pa yang snying gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs bdag po yis// 'khor gyi dregs pa dbang bsdus nas// las kyi
bdag po bsgrub pa bshad// bdud kyi bdag pos gsad pa na// bo nga ra rtsa rta khyi mon// rgod khrag bra gnag mtsho lkugs chu// thun dang ling ga tsakra byug/ gri mda' bshos bu dar nag brtan// nag
po 'jigs pa'i ltor bcas la// mun pa'i gling du gzugs kyis gnan// lha yi mgon po'i las sbyor na// dkar gsum gangs chu rgya tshwa la// lha khang ka rten snying sa la// thun dang 'khor lo bya bar
bshad// mda' dang bshos dkar rta tu gzung// lha yi khang par gzugs kyis gnan// dme khrag dug sna mtsho yi zhags// dme sha 'bru dug gtor mas gsad// klu bdud mo la gzugs kyis gnan// klu gnyan
mgon po'i las sbyar na// ba dmar mdzo khrag sbal pa gzugs// rnya ra dgu yi sa chu shing// gdug pa gnas par gzugs kyis gnan// btsan gyi mgon pa'i las sbyar na// dmar gsum khrag dang gong gsum

sa// mda' dang bshos dmar sha khrag brten// gong gsum btsan rgyu'i gnas su gnan// ging gi mgon po'i las sbyar na// spu gsum ra khrag dug la sbyar// pha ba thal chen la brtsas khrag/ khra tshang sum mdor

gzugs kyis gnan// rang rang rgyud las tsakra bri// dregs pa can gyi lto bar gzhug/ lo zla zhag dang dus tshod kyis// dregs pa can gyi snying gzung la// 'bum gnas e la rtsang thod me// dong tsher thod ngan ling
ga brnag/ 'khor lo kha sbyar bar snang dgram// stobs chen dregs pa a mu ka/ tha ma dug gi spu gris gcod// rnams la gsad pa mchog gi las// dgu bskor drag po'i sngags kyis brdeg/ bzlog dang dkrug
dang spogs pa dang// shi sa drag po'i ngan sngags yin// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ las kyi mgon po las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas gnod sbyin
rnam thos sras kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ nag po 'jigs byed gtum pa'i sku// las kyi rim pa de ltar na// stobs chen drag po dmod pa'i mchog/ dug gi spu gri ji ltar lags// rdo rje gtum pos

bka' stsal pa// stobs chen drag po'i sngags kyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par 'di dag 'thon no// oM badzra pA Ni nI laM pa ra hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags so// e badzra pA Ni ad+hi pa ta

ye// drag po'i tsham ngam brjod pa'o// e badzra hril rngubs ni lam ba sa a ne u na hri da ye/ dregs pa can gyi klad gnon stobs kyi snying pa'o// e badzra hril a ti pa ta e/ badzra nI laM adz+nyA pa ya ti hri la ya/ ye

shes drag po'i stobs so// e badzra pA Ni hri da ya na u sa da ni/ nI lam par sha ri raM/ a bri ti/ u ne u ne/ hri da ye tsit+ta ye/ a ti pa ta ye/ dregs pa can gyi srog 'phrog pa'i stobs so// badzra ma hA kA la dun ya/

ding ka ra kro d+ha ni hring/ ga na gu ti pa tra dun badzra yag sha tri sna d+ha sha/ ma ma hrag he da rag mo sham/ tig sna ka li tsa bdun ti/ yag nag mo tsit+ta sham/ mgon po yab yum gyi dmod sngags dbab

pa'o// dgra bo'i srog la breng shag rbad// tsit+ta byung rag ta thibs rbad/ rtsa la thang thang thum ril rbad/ ni hur thums dza dun dun shag srog la dum mugs myags khram rbad/ tsit+ta ro myags ling shag rbad// snying

khrag tshal pa yaM ling rbad/ spu gri bdun pa zhes bya'o// ra hu la ya ma snying ya ma khrag/ badzra ya ga sha ke ta badzra rag sha thims/ dus tog 'ur 'ur kem/ phroM phroM hril hril/ yaM yaM hraM la/ mu ti skya rings se raM ha/ shar

shar yang drag tu phob/ ya ta a hral shar phob/ yaM shar yaM hril/ drag tu phob/ pa ta ra a be sha ya/ 'di ni chu god kyi drag sngags so// badzra yag sha kA la kA la mahA kA la ga na gu ti hring la/ badzra ging kA la rag

shakA la/ ma ma mu khraM khrag la mu sha hring/ mgon po yab yum gyi dmod pa'o// dun ru tra ru thuM b+ha ti/ ra tsa tsa pa la u u shug me/ ma ma trag rag sha nag mo ting laM b+h+yo/ nA ga hUM sti nA ga du ru ha/ shu la dza raM tri shaM dza

yaM/ badzra tri na sa du kha thuM traM/ dregs pa drug gi yang snying ste/ snal ma sad pa de nyid do// bzlog na spogs pa'i las yin te// bsnol te dkrugs pa'i shi sa yin// srog la thuM rul rtsal breng shag/ tsit+ta dun rmugs

khrag thibs rbad/ ling sha rbad/ nri hur thuM dza khraM rbad/ gsad pa'i mtshon cha nag po ste// dug gi spu gri lta bu yin// kun gyis mthong 'gyur so yis gcod// drag sngags me dang mtshon cha dang// dug dang 'dra ba spu
gri'i ngar// gang la rgyab pa thogs med gcod// ces sbyangs so// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dmod pa ngan sngags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas gnod sbyin rnam thos bus/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ ging chen nag po chen po ste// sgrub dang dmod pa ngan sngags la// dus med bshad na rang phung bas// gsal byed rim pa'i sbyor ba 'tshal// mthu stobs bdag pos nges gsungs

pa// gtsang ma'i maN+Dal gdan dang ldan// mkhar phor gtsang mar rdzas bsags pa// thang bya srin bya'i lce dang ni// gser mig 'phrul bya ku ku'i snying// bzang drug dang bcas dar dkar dgab// 'bru gtsang lha

shos rtsi mar byug/ gsang bu mar gyi byugs la bzhag/ rdo rje gtum pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mgon po'i snying kar 'od spros te// spos dud gtang zhing zhag gsum brnag/ de yi thams cad mngon shes smra// bdag
gis mgon po dngos su mthong// de yis snga phyi phan gnod smra// mna' bsgag lha bshos phud btang la// lhag ma rol cing dam rdzas rnams// rang gi mgul pa g.yon par gdags// 'og tu mi btang 'gom mi

bya// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag go/ oM kA la kA la/ mA la mA la/ ki li ki li/ sid+hi sid+hi/ du ru du ru/ spu ru spu ru/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ kas ma kas ma/ hri hUM sa ma ya dza/ yo gi A dz+nyA tsa pra be sha phaT/ sa

ma ya na ra kha na sid+hi hUM/ sgra snyan dang bcas rdzas mchod de// ye shes rim pa'i las su bshad// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mgon po zhal mngon du lta ba'i le'u ste bcu
pa'o//// de nas gnod sbyin rnam thos sras kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ mahA kA la drag shul can// gal te las g.yel 'tshe ldog na// dbang du bsdu zhing srog 'phrog gang// gnad gcod spu gri
ji ltar lags// mthu stobs bdag pos nges gsungs pa// gal te 'tshe ldog las 'gor na// bdag nyid khro bo'i rgyal po yi// thugs kha'i hUM las 'od zer ni// lcags kyu dmar po gsal spros te// dmar po

dbang gi 'od zer gyis// mgon po'i srog gi snying po dgug/ rang dbang med par rtsa srog bsdu// oM nI laM ba ra d+hA ra adz+nyA u ne ging ka ra gu na gu/ trag dun dun/ srog hring hring/ aM ku sha dza dza/ thum ril breng
shag dun ma hur thuM dza a a dbang bsdus srog 'phrog bdud rtsis gso// de nas las la mngag par bshad// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mgon po'i dmod pa bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu
gcig pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs bdag po yis// gnad gcod spu gri drag sngags bshad// las rnams kun gyi mtha' rgya ru// bla ma mchod cing/ bshags pa bya// gnad gcod spu gri'i gsang sngags

las// gru gsum sbag ma'i nang rol du// thod ngan mon nam rabs chad yin// rten 'brel khang sa zhing sa dang/ dme khrag sbrus te gzugs byas la// snying khar ming rus bris la gzhug/ mi 'am lug gam tsit+ta

gzhug/ tsit+ta srad bu sngon dmar gdams// thod ngan nang du 'phyang du gzhug/ nyungs kar nyungs na ske tshe dug/ ra rog khrag dang gri rgod khrag/ drag sngags stong la thun re btang// khra yi rkang pa gri lcags

mde'u// dug shing gzhu yis mda' re brdeg/ zhag gsum drag sngags mi tshig spang// de yi drag sngags 'di dag go/ e badzra hril ma ne// se na pa ta ye/ badzra ging ka ra/ ya ma ka la/ badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha kro d+ha/ pa tra

pa tra da sha gri ba/ na ga gu ti/ ma ma ti khra la mu sha tsa mun ti/ dgra bo yi tsit+ta baM ril thun rbad/ rag ta thibs srog la breng shag rbad/ ni kha la dza phyung/ yaM rbad rbud thum sod/ drag sngags sbyor ba rdzogs pa

dang// dur khrod 'on lkugs rnying par gnan// tsit+ta gtubs la bsreg par bya// dgra bo'i srog la thum ril rmugs// rtsa khrag thibs breng shag rbad// tsit+ta phyung ni hur thum dza// ag ne de ba kro d+ha kha raM dz+wa la raM raM
raM/ ling ga dang bcas bsregs bstab la// thal ba ba yu rlung la phyar// 'di ni las kyi mtha'/ ya ga bag sha zhes su gsungs// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gnas
gcod spu gri'i lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ sngags dang gnad gcod de ltar na// ma hA kA la 'khor dang
bcas// las la mngag cing bskul ba gang// mthu stobs bdag pos bka' stsal pa// rbad ba las kyi pho nya ste// phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du bskul// hUM/ dur khrod chen po lcang lo can// ma la ya yi gnas

mchog na// gnam lcag ur mo rab tu ta la la// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho rba klong me re re// zhing chen keng rus lhu dum khro lo lo// 'dab chags sha za'i tshogs ni nyi li li// gsur chen dud pa'i tshogs kyang langs se
langs// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i tshogs ni lhubs se lhubs// de 'dra'i gnas mchog rab tu 'jigs pa na// ging chen mgon po yab yum sku skyod cig/ hUM/ bdud 'dul sgrol ging chen po mi bzad pa// pho brang
lcags mkhar 'bar ba'i dbus phyogs nas// bdud dang srin po byi chings bsnol ba'i gdan// baM chen nyi zla pad+ma 'od du 'bar// sregs byed me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// bdud 'dul dbang phyug
sgrol ging chen po ni// sku mdog nag po dug chen 'khyil ba 'dra// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi gshog pa bgrad// g.yas ser g.yon ljang nag po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// spyan gsum sdang mig bskal pa'i
me ltar 'bar// dam nyams lus srog dbang po bag chags bsreg/ zhal dang ljags 'dril mche gcigs mtshems kyang bgrad// khams gsum zhal du rngub cing dam nyams srog rtsa gcod// zhal nas rngam pa'i
nga ro 'brug ltar sgrog/ khams gsum dgra bgegs ma lus zil gyis gnon// sma ra smin ma bskal ba'i glog ltar 'gyu// bdud dang srin po dgra bgegs rdul du rlog/ shangs nas rims dal rlung dmar phyogs
bcur 'phro// dgra bgegs ma lus brgyal zhing rlag par byed// ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar// thod skam 'bum gyis dbu rgyan thod du bcings// sku la dar nag ber chen la// dar lce 'bum dang me

tog sna tshogs brgyan// stag lpags rlon pa'i gong ras la// zhing gi g.yang gzhi mang po 'phrul// snyan cha mgur chu sna tshogs la// sbrul nag chen po'i rgyan gyis brgyan// thod pa rlon pa'i 'phreng ba yis// do shal

se ral brgyan du byas// nyi ma zla ba gza' skar gyis// sku yi phyogs mtshams rgyan du byas// zhal nas mi ro gsol zhing 'phrul// phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// dam nyams dgra bo thal bar rlog/ g.yon
na yum chen dbang phyug ma// sku mdog mthing nag ral pa can// sku stod zhing chen g.yang gzhi la// sku smad re lde sham bu can// sbrul dang thod pa dril bus brgyan// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs za
byed ma// g.yas 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stobs// 'dir spyon bcol ba'i las rnams mdzod// hUM/ yab yum stabs gcig spyan 'dren na// ma thogs myur du da tshur sbyon// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje
yis// dbang bskur byin brlabs snam nas ston// de tshe phyi yi mtshan btabs pa// mgon po nag po zhes kyang bya// nang du mtshan du btags pa ni// bdud 'dul sgrol ging chen po bya// gsang ba'i mtshan du

btags pa ni// rdo rje sgrol byed drag po rtsal// phyi nang gsang ba'i ming nas 'bod// khas blangs bros bor ma bsnyel bar// rnal 'byor pa yi las rnams kyis// gal te las la 'gal gyur na// rdo rje srin po

khros po'i ngang// snying khrag bsreg nas na rag ltung// de bas las rnams myur du gyis// de nas sdongs zla'i bskul bya ba// bdud yul kha rag sgo dgu nas// bdud rgyal ri nas spungs pa khyod// bdud mkhar

nang nas 'dir sbyon la// dgra la thibs nad drag po phog/ rgyal yul nam mkha' phyad phyod nas// rgyal po 'od la dkar po khyod// shel dkar nang nas 'dir sbyon la// dgra la smyo 'bog thong la sgrol// ma yul

byang shar mtsho gting nas// ma mo rdo rje sder chen khyod// mthing nag gur nas 'dir sbyon la// dgra la rims dal glang thabs thong// klu yul nA ga gsing sngon nas// klu gnyan nag po srog gcod khyod// rin
chen mkhar nas 'dir sbyon la// dgra mdze shu ba phol 'bras thong// btsan yul zangs thang dmar po nas// btsan rjes shu po lag rings khyod// dgu rtse'i nang nas 'dir shog la// dgra la rims thabs yams

su thong// shar lho rin chen thang dkyil nas// ging chen rdo rje legs pa khyod// lung thang mkhar nas 'dir shog la// dgra la pho log gzer thabs thong// srid pa'i dregs pa chen po khyod// phyag na rdo rje'i bka'
'byung gis// rang rang las kyi skal long la// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par gyis// gzhan yang gza' rgod bskul bya ba// khyab 'jug chen por hu la// du ba mjug rings sgra gcan 'dzin// lha chen dbang po
bgegs kyi rgyal// byi tri ba tra dmag dpon mdzod// sku mdog dud ka 'jigs pa la// sbrin gyi na bza' g.yang gzhi 'ja'// dbu la glog dmar thod du bcings// chibs su g.yu 'brug sngon po chibs// bar
snang khams su brda ngar sgrogs// thog ser skyin thang dgra la 'bebs// gzim dngas glog 'gyur lams se lams// nga ro 'brug stong ldi ri ri// shangs nas rlung nag spu ru ru// kha rlangs sprin du thibs
se thibs// zhal nas thog ser shar ra ra// lo tog snar pa dbang du bsdus// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bskul ba las
kyi pho nya'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs bdag po yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la rgyud gtad pa// bka' yi gsang rgyud spu gri ste// bstan pa rin chen gter gyi bdag/ drag sngags

dgu thog rba chen dug/ me dbal spu gri mtshon cha'i dbal// don gyi ngo bo rgyud ces bya// sgrub dang dmod pa'i drag sngags te// byang chub sems de sems dpa' che// khro bo rol pa 'jigs byed dang// lha dang

mkha' 'gro'i tshogs chen dang// 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs rnams la// lag na rdo rje'i mthu stobs kyis// thugs kyi klong nas byung ba yi// drag po spu gri gsang bar bshad// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rigs can

la// nga yang dam las mi g.yel bas// khyod kyi byin brlob bka' 'khor skyong// rgyud 'di rtsa gcig legs 'chang na// nga yis thugs kyi sras su byed// dam tshig bsrung la thugs brtse'o// sngags bdag nyid
kyis srungs dang skyobs// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// dpal mgon po legs ldan nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu
bzhi pa'o//// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la nA tha ha la so ri gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad

du// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje snying po rngam pa'i rgyal po nyid/

dur khrod chen po lcang lo can gyi gnas bam ro brtsegs pa'i pho brang gnam lcags ngur ma'i gzhal yas khang na bzhugs pa'i tshogs la/ sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ khro bo rngam pa rol pa'i
tshogs dang/ 'jig rten dregs pas rgyal ba'i tshogs dang/ ma mo mkha' 'gro gdug pa 'dul ba'i tshogs dang/ gtsang ris gyi lha dang/ rgyal po'i tshogs dang/ sha za rngam pa'i tshogs thabs cig tu bzhugs

so// de'i tshe rgyal po rnam thos sras zhes bya ba rang gi stan las langs nas/ brkyang phyag lan stong du stsal nas gsol pa/ kye ho rdo rje snying po che// gsang sngags bka' yi 'khor lo la// rtse gcig bsrung ba'i sgrol
ging che// mgon po nag por mtshan gsol ba// rabs brgyud gtan tshigs ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa/ rdo rje snying po bka' stsal pa// legs so rigs kyi bu khyod nyon// ging chen mgon po nag po
'di// rnal 'byor yongs kyi dgra bla yin// rigs 'dzin rnams kyi srog shing yin// bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug yin// nga yi bka' yi las mkhan yin// 'di yi rabs brgyud gtan

tshigs kyang// gtan la dbab pa 'di lta ste// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bskal pa rdzogs ldan bya ba la// lho yi 'dzam bu gling 'di ru// khyim bdag khye'u ka ya zhes// bya ba de la bu gcig yod// de'i
ming thar pa nag po bya// kho des dad pa'i sems g.yos te// yul phyogs de yi dgon pa na// dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu zhes// bya bas sngags kyi don rtogs nas// yod pa de kho des thos pas// dan
'phags g.yog tu bcas pa yis// de ru phyin te gdams ngag zhus// de nyid kyis kyang gdams ngag bstan// de bzhin nyid de ma bcos na// dngos po bzhi la gnas bcas kyang// nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin
te// 'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'i lam// de skad gdams ngag phog pa las// kho dag dga' mgur rangs te dengs// rang gi gnas su phyin pa la// don de'i gdeng ni ma rnyed par// dngos po bzhi la dgra bzhin
bshad// nam zhig dpon g.yog ma mthun te// rtsod 'gyur dge slong dpon la dris// thub dka' rang bzhin srong po des// thar pa nag po sun phyung ste// dan 'phags bden no zhes gsungs pas// thar pa nag
po khams 'khrugs nas// nges par dpon du 'dra ba la// mnyam mo zhes kyang mi brjod par// nges par bdag ni sun phyung bas// khams rings spyugs la gtang zhes sems// de nas dpon g.yog
gnyis spyugs te// thams cad rang gi khams su byas// sha za'i jag pa mang po sogs// snang snang 'dug pa'i sems can gsad// rig byed sngags kyi brdas spros te// mi rigs 'dug pa 'phrad sar sbyang//

gsur chen dud pa sprin du gtibs// rnag khrag chu ser mtsho ru bskyil// keng rus sha rnams ri ru brtsigs// pags pa g.yang gzhi thang du bkram// khro bo rang rgyud 'jigs par bsgom// gnas las nam zhig tshe
zad de// tshe yi 'du byed byas pa las// mnar med rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// de bas brel zhing yun rings su// gcig nas gcig tu 'khor zhing gnas// de yi gnas nas mthar thon nas// yi dgas gnas su
bkres skom bshad// phyi nang me lce gsum du skyes// yun rings dus nas 'thon pa dang// byol song gnas su glen lkugs bshad// lus rnams khyab par blang pa las// gnyen pos bsad cing de thon nas// 'bu
sbrang la sogs lus su blangs// kun khyab bsad de mthar ston nas// gcan gzan gdug pa'i gnas su skyes// sha zos khrag 'thung srog bcad byas// lus blangs khyab blang gsad thon nas// 'dab chags bya
yi lus su blang// kun skyes gsad de mthar ston nas// lho nub mtshams kyi grong brdal te// lang ka pu rangs bya ba ru// smad 'tshong ma zhig mngal du chags// bu de thon pas ma de shi// yul
phyogs de yi mi rnams kyis// ma med bu 'u ku 'u 'di// gzhan na yul phyogs dme bas na// ma yi mchan du gzhug par rigs// bgros te ma yi ro mchan bcug/ bu des ma yin nus ma drangs// zhag bdun 'tsho
ba de yis byas// de nas khrag dag chu ser drangs// de nas ma yi nu ma zos// ma yi pags pa gos su gon// de nas bu de lus rtas te// dur khrod ro yi sha khrag zos// pags pa dag kyang gos su gon// thod

'phreng sor 'phreng rgyan du byas// dri chen rgyu mas lus la brgyan// rang gi lus rtas stobs rnyed nas// dur khrod gnod sbyin bran du 'khol// dur khrod gsang ba'i ma mo rnams// chung ma byi slas bran mor
byas// rang lus thal ka 'jigs pa la// ral pa dmar nag gyen du 'greng// mgo gsum phyag drug gshogs pa can// mig gsum sdang mig me ltar 'bar// khag gdangs mche gtsigs skye 'gro

gsod// gnam la bya bzhin sa la byi// chu la nya bzhin 'phyo bar byed// sen mo kang ka'i mchu sder gyis// gang zhig sha rus myags pa byed// kha nas rtsa ba'i dbugs phyung bas// nad dal rims dang yams su
'bebs// sna nas grang ba'i dbugs phyung bas// phyogs bcu kun tu khams 'khrugs byed// kor kar thang dmar mtsho yi gling// byan lag mchong ri gnam lcags yod// rang gi g.yod dang yang g.yod

dang// 'dam gyi phru mas yongs su bskor// srin po lang ka mgrin bcu dang// gzugs khams man chad dbang du bsdus// ma tang ka ru rdul du lhogs// ru tra ma tra mA ra tra// rang gi rngam sgra drag tu bsgrags// ha

la ru lu ha li rag sha b+h+yo/ 'jigs pa'i rang sgra phyogs bcur sgrogs// ha la ru lu rag sha b+h+yo/ 'khor rnams las la myur du rbad// ru tra ma hA rag sha khram tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad khraM/ ha la ru lu rag+sha b+h+yo/ ngan sngags
gdug pas thams cad gsod// de ltar smyon pa drag po des// rang gi nga rgyal cher rnyed de// log pa'i lam la gnas pa las// thugs rjes 'brel ba'i byin brlabs kyis// bde gshegs thugs rjes bsgral
bar dgongs// dus gsum bde gshegs rigs lngas sgrol// dang po zhi ba stong pas btul// bcom ldan 'das shAka thub thad du gshegs// ston pas nag po ma thul te// bu chung rang gi gnas su dengs// khyod
kyis nga thul ga la 'gyur// zhes brjod bde gshegs mid par bzas// de nas rta mgrin dbang gis btul// kho na'i thad du rngam sgra bsgrags// rdo rje rta yi stabs mdzad pas// kho na de yis yang smras
pa// mgrin bu rang gi gnas su dengs// khyod kyis nga dbang ga la 'dus// brjod pas rta mchog slar la gshegs// der ni kho na khong du mid// dpal gyis gshegs te hUM sgra bsgrags// rgyas
mdzad nag po sdug bsngal te// gdung ba'i skad ngan 'tsher zhing 'don// rta mchog spyi gtsug bton te gshegs// de nas bde gshegs kun gyis bgros// mthu stobs bdag por dbang bskur ba'i// rdo rje snying
po nga nyid la// nag po 'dul ba'i ming du mngag/ bdag ni bka' yi las mkhan te// smyon pa nag po gdug pa nyid// bdag gi bsgral ba'i bgyi'o zhes// khas blangs dam du bcas pa las// kho bdag lings

la song ba'i tshe// dpal chen rdo rje gtum po de// khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rgyal po de// kho nar sprul te gnas su gshegs// 'dod pa'-i bdag mo kA ma la// nag po rang gi rngam sgra bsgrags// 'dod pa'i dbang
mo sbrul bzhir 'khril// lhums su rdo rje snying po bcug/ dpal chen gshegs te kho 'ongs nas// dbang gi dbang mo bran g.yog 'khor// sngon dang mi 'dra zhes snyam pas// dbang mos e ma dbang phyug

che// bdag gis ngal yang mi bde ste// khyod kyi dngos po mchi bas kyang// sgyid lug sems gnyis ka'i bka' stsal te// 'khor gyi nang 'dir gsung ngam ci// brjod pa kho nas yid ches te// rang gi pho brang
gdan la phebs// de nas pu tra thon byung bas// kho na lta bu'i rigs su thon// nag po dpon g.yog yi rangs dga'// de nas gzhon nu lus rtas pas// nag po stobs ldan dbang thang phrogs// kho des 'khor
dang bran g.yog bskul// nga nyid bsgral bar gzas pa las// ma thub bran g.yog nga yir byas// de nas nag po kho na de// lus kyi rdzu 'phrul stobs rnyed kyang// ma phan bdag gis bsgral bar 'gyur// 'khor
g.yog dkyil 'khor pho nyar mngags// nam zhig nag po sgrib sbyangs te// nga yi snam nas bton pa las// dkyil 'khor chen por sprul pa dang// dam tshig can la gdung ba dang// bka' yi 'khor lo bsrung ba

dang// nga yi las mkhan bya ba dang// sgrol ging chen po bya ba ru// khas blangs dam bcas bro bor te// de nas rdo rje srin po ngas// dbang skur byin brlabs gsang mtshan byin// rdo rje sgrol byed drag po
rtsal// mgon po nag po zhes su btags// yum ni 'dod khams dbang ma yin// rnal 'byor dgra bla rtse gcig mdzad// nga yi las mkhan sprul pa mdzad// de phyir sgrol ging chen po yis// rabs brgyud gtan
tshigs rgyas par mdzad// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud las// mgon po nag po rabs brgyud kyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis gsol pa// kye kye rdo rje snying po che// ging
chen mgon po yab yum gyi// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// gsad rbad las kha ji ltar bgyi// gos sngon rdo rjes rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol pa dang// rdo rje gos sngon gyis bka' stsal
pa// nyon cig rgyal po 'khor bcas khyed// nga yis ma nor gsal bar bshad// drag po'i gdul bya khyad par can// bsdus te sgrib sbyang dbang bskur nas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal yang mthong// dkyil
'khor chen po'i las mkhan de// nga yi bka' yi sprul pa byed// de don rgyas pa 'di lta ste// ri gsum rtse 'dus dmar la gzar// mtsho gling dur khrod gnam chags 'dir// dben la byin che gcan gzan
'grim// nags tshal rtsub pa'i gnas mchog der// rdo rje lcam dral gzungs dag gdon// sbyin gtor rgyas gtang tsha tsha gdab// de mthar gtsang ris rgyas bzhi mnyam// phung sa gsum dang srin rdo la//

maN+Dal khru gang gru bzhi brtsig/ dug khrag dri spos chag chag gdab// ni rangs kha dog lnga phyed la// dbus su zlum po thod rlon bskor// gru chad sgo bzhi'i phyogs dang ldan// rtsig pa 'dod yon dra phyed dang// rta

babs 'khor lo pad+ma khyung// tha ma rdo rje me ris bskor// dbus su dung chen ga 'u ru// steng 'og bsnyen pa'i sngags bkod de// brnag gsum bya rog mon gyi don// bdud rtsi gnam snying dri rgyas gdab// lho yi

sgor zhig kA pa lar// dpal gyi gtor ma rgyas par bshams// shar sgo 'bru sna sha khrag tshogs// dpal bshos dang ldan gtor ma bsham// bdud rtsi rak+ta phyi mchod lnga// gling bu keng rus gsur chen dud// zhing
gi bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan// phyogs bcu khor yug gang bar dgram// de nas rdo rje las gzhung bsrang// sku bskyed gsal bas 'dzab 'bum drang// rdzogs nas las kyi ging gzhung bsrang// mtshams cad ting

'dzin dkyil 'khor bskyed// rnam gsum sgo nas cho gas bskyed// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na sa mA d+hI hUM/ d+harma d+ha tu sa ma ti hUM/ dz+nyA na badzra sa ma ti hUM/ e ga ga na yaM b+ha yu raM dza ya/ ra rak+ta swa mun tA/ lang sarba maN+Dal/ bruM bi

sha maN+Dal la hUM/ ru tra rag sha sti ra baM/ sU r+ya tsan+Da/ pad+ma maN+Dal/ dun ma hA kA la ga na gu ti/ yo gi shwa ri/ kA ya hUM/ ka ma la shwa ri nag po ting lam b+h+yo/ bdag gi thugs kha'i thig le las// rgyu yi sa bon b+h+ru?M
'phros pas// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gdan stengs su// bdud dang srin po nyi zla pad// gdan la me 'bar klong dkyil na// nag po dbu gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas ser g.yon ljang mig gsum 'phro// ral

pa kham nag thod sbrul gtam// kha gdangs mche gtsigs sma smin ser// dar nag ber cher me tog brgyan// stag gi gong ras zhing chun sbrul// snyan mgur lhu tshigs sbrul gyis brgyan// thod rlon 'phreng ba do shal
can// nyi zla gza' skar rgyan du kram// rdo rje be con phur pa g.yas// dung dmar dbyug to zhags pa g.yon// g.yon na mthing nag mig gsum bgrad// mche gtsigs ral pa mun ltar

gtibs// zhing chen re lde stod smad gyon// thod sbrul nyi ma rin chen brgyan// g.yas 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// yab yum dbus su bstan par bskyed// gru chad mon pa pho mo'i tshogs// sprul pa gdod
nas grub par bskyed// dur khrod lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog nas// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// phyi nang gsang mchod dngos grub blangs// thugs dam bkang bshags bstod 'dzab

grang// tshogs bkye longs spyod grangs la brlag/ bskang bshags rjes la bstab pa bya// de dag las kyi 'khor lo 'di'o// sa ma ya hUM dza dza/ dza hUM baM ho/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ sa ma ye lhan s+t+wam/ sarba ud ga

te s+pha ra na khaM swA hA/ d+hu pe/ puSh+pe/ A lo ke/ gan d+he/ nai wi t+ye swA hA/ mu dra sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta shrI ba na khA hi/ kA ya sid+hi oM/ bkA sid+d+hi aM/ tsit+ta sid+hi hUM/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta/ mahA maM sa/

tsit+ta keng ni ri san tsa pa ra ye/ ba su ta go ro tsa na kha hi/ ma hA ba ling ta pU tsa kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sha rang lam ga tsa me/ shrI kA la kro d+hi ga na gu ti a la la ho/ e a ra la li/ badzra yo gi ka/ yo gi shwa ri/ hring hring
dza dza/ bra be sha phaT/ kha raM kha hi/ kha kha le le/ kha hi ho/ de nas bdag nyid gos sngon can// thugs kha'i nyi zla hUM dang sngags// gsal byas bka' sdod mgon po yi// thugs khar nyi gdan hUM
dang sngags// gsal byas 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// spros pas mchod bskang thugs dam bskul// 'dus pas dngos grub bdag dbang 'dus// spyan drangs bzhugs gsol gnyis med bstim// mgal me'i

'khor lo lta bur drang// de la drod rtags rnam pa gsum// dngos gsal ci bgyi las byed gzhug/ mon pa bya nag g.yag rgod sprin// rlung 'tshub me 'bar sgra 'byin 'od// rmi lam phyi ste nyams byung na/[ (]/ rmi lam

phyi ste nyams byung na/[) ]/ mngon gsal shugs che lus yang gsang// de nas drag po'i las rnams brtsam// gang 'dod grub par gdon mi za// sngon du bsnyen pa'i rim par bshad bya// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i
rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag pa'i las 'di bshad do/ bsnyen pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang// gtor ma lho yi phyogs su gtang// dkyil 'khor bsdus la

gtsang sar bskyal// dbus su 'brub khung khru gang la// gru gsum gnyis sbag mtho gang dpangs// tsher ma gru gsum grangs med bskor// phyi nang rgya sol dug khrag bsku// bsnyen bsgrub zhing khams skra bshad
la// sor brgyad dbang po yan lag dgod// gro ga dug khrag tsha ba yis// ming rus lo kham snying po bri// dpral mgrin snying kha lte bar gzhug/ de skus byad gzhug gri thod brnag/ gcig pu tsher
bstan dong du gzhug/ nyungs dkar dug bzhi khrag gsum dang// khram phung phye gsum rang rang dpung// dong gi mtha' ma bskor la gzhag/ de nas rdo rje gos sngon can// mdun du mgon po yab yum ste// bka'
sdod bskul mngag las la rbad// bla bkug bla phral rten la bstim// ma yengs gsal bas rbad cing bskul// dmag 'dren gcan gzan ri dwags 'ded// shwa brgal rbab 'dril me 'bar na// las la tshud pas
dgug par bya// lcags kyus snying drangs bzhag pa ste// stobs chen rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dang// me dbal 'joms pa'i 'khor lo dang// kha gnod 'dul ba'i 'khor lo dang// las grub sgrol ba'i 'khor lo

dang// drug pa stobs kyi 'khor lo dang// kha sbyar yab yum lto ru bca'// dug dang tsher shing dud pas bdug/ dug khrag bdud rtsi ngar gyi blud// dong kha gtsang ma'i rgyus pas btsem// las rim 'dod pa gang
rung sbyar// bsnyen pa'i drod ldan rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid rdo rje gos sngon can// mdun gyi 'khor lor drag sngags la// mgon po yab yum 'khor dang bcas// bdag gi bka' bsgo las bcol
bas// gang yin las de mngon du byed// thogs pa med par 'grub nges pa'o// de ltar nyin gtor mtshan mo dril// gsad pa'i rten drug ling ga bca'// rbad bkug dbye bstim stong brgyad cu// thun 'gor

grangs la gsad pa tsam// thon nas 'khor lo ling ga dril// gri thod gdug pa'i klu la gtad// kha gso tshul ni gong bzhin no// dza la'i nad stong de bzhin las// sbal sbrul mdze can rag tas byug/ sbal sbrul
shun dril klu la rak+tad// smyo ba'i las ni de bzhin las// dmigs ldan lug mig mkhar khrag sku// de nyid thod pa gong gsum mnan// lkugs las bsnol khrag rgya tshil byug/ bsnol thod dme mo'i zhabs mas
dril// mun gling ri rab chen po gnan// rengs la bse zho ho phan khrag/ bskus la ha le'i ga 'ur gzhug/ sha za mkhar gyi rked la mnan// dbye bskrad sa lnga'i gzugs byas la// khong bar 'khor lo ling ga
gnag/ cig ni ri gsum rtse la sba// cig ni lung gsum mdo ru sba// dgug pa tsan dan rgya skyegs sman// cong zi mngal khrag tsha bskus la// pad can thod par rang 'og sba// chu rgod 'bebs na zung bzhi

bcu// yul gyi sa chu sngo sna byug/ ming byang khyi rta thod par brnag/ dong bur khrag sna dug blugs la// gzhal yas khang du lha tshogs bskyed// gsal byas bsnyen pa phrom gnyis gdags// mtsho dkyil bka'
'bebs rlung 'tshub na// chu dril 'bru gsum dong pur dril// lha rnams gzi mdangs glog tu 'gyu// nga ro 'brug sgrogs sdang ngar che// sna nas rlung dang bu yug 'tshub// kha nas lcags kyi ser chen
'bebs// lo thog bcud sdud rdul du rlog/ skya shar lug khyur 'khyag pa 'dril// mthong na dbab pa'i 'khrul 'khor bskor// rdzogs nas lha klu btsan dbus gzhug/ zhag gsum yul mthong rtse nas
bskor// khyab 'jug khyi yi so la btang// stobs gzhan rten la tsher shing dug/ dred mo tshil bzhi dug gsum brun// zho gnyis mu zi bsres byas la// sngo sna lo thog mchod par dbul// dkar dmar dug
gso'i thabs yang bya// thal 'jim gtor zhing 'og brdungs bya// de dus bskul ba drag tu gtang// gnam gyi chu rgod ri ltar spungs// gnam thog 'bebs na me long du// mon tshil rta tshil gser khram
lcags// ro gsum tshil gsum nyungs kar spung// gri tod gsar pas kha nas dgab// sku bskyed 'phro 'du byin gyis brlabs// zhu 'phel chad cing me 'bar nas// phyed ni dri ma'i bcas nas blugs// 'phrul
'khor nyin mtshan bskyed la bskor// 'khor lo gri thod rten la gzhug/ gri mda' dgra la zor du 'phang// gza' rgod btsan dang sdongs la bya// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i las yin no// ltas ngan thod pa ja ril

gnyis// dug khrag sna tshogs sbyar ba yis// phyi ru kha mig dmar po bri// nang du sngags dang ming rus bri// phung sa gsum dang chu yis dgang// 'khrul 'khor dril gtor sbyar ba tsam// rdzogs nas rten sba rgyug

cing 'thab// rgyu bas du rgod gnyis su 'byung// gzir na gdon gyi ling ga bca'// mi brda snying po dong du brnag/ bka' rten byin can mgon pos mnan// gcad pa seng ldeng phur ba la// sngags bri nyungs kar
'khor lo sbags// yul gyi dbus su de sbas la// dus byung ram mda' nyungs kar 'phang// gso ba slungs dang sre'u ste// sngags la bzlas la rang lus bcang// rang lus stag gi lo yis bskor// de yis las
rnams rdzogs pa ste// bcu gsum 'khrul 'khor las su bshad// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud las// 'khrul 'khor bca' ba dang las kha'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku

gsung thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags 'di dag ston to// oM badzra pA Ni nI laM badzra yak+Sha ma hA kA la dun trag rag sha ma/ badzra pa badzra yag sha ma ne badzra/ badzra ne ma hA kA la ni badzra/ badzra ni la dun tra ga ra ga la badzra/

badzra lam rag sha ma badzra pa badzra/ dgra ba'i srog la thu ril pra ma ya tsit+ta breng yaM raM rag ta tsa ma ya rbad/ badzra pa badzra ma sha ra laM badzra/ badzra laM rag ta dun la ni badzra/ badzra nI la ni la ka ha ma ne badzra/ badzra ne ma

sha yag badzra pa badzra/ ya ma rA dza ta rag raM raM yaM breng ta tsi ya/ mu du ril thumu la srog rbad/ badzra pa badzra yag sha me ne badzra/ pha badzra yag sha ma ne badzra pa badzra/ badzra yak+Sha ma ne badzra pa badzra/ yag sha

ma ne badzra pa badzra/ yag sha ma ne badzra pa badzra/ yag sha ma ni badzra pa badzra yag sha ma/ me badzra pa badzra yag sha ma ne/ badzra ni ma hA ka la ni badzra/ ne ma hA kA la badzra pa ne/ ma hA kA li ni badzra ne/ ma hA kA la ne badzra ni

ma hA kA la ni badzra ne mahA kA la ni badzra ni ma hA kA la ni badzra ni ma hA kA la ne/ badzra ne la dun trag rag laM badzra pa ni/ la dun trag rag laM badzra ni la/ dun trag rag lam badzra ni la dun/ trag rag la badzra ni la
