dun trag rag laM badzra ni la dun trag rag laM/ badzra laM rag sham badzra pa badzra/ laM rag sha ma ra badzra pa badzra laM/ rag sha ma badzra/ pa badzra laM rag sha ma badzra pa badzra laM rag sha ma badzra/ badzra laM rag sham/ badzra badzra

sha ne pa yag ma/ badzra ma ka ni ne ma la/ badzra la trag la ni dun raM ga/ badzra rag sham laM sha badzra/ srog la raM thuM tsit+ta ya/ ril rag ta breng yaM pra ma tsi ma ra ya rbad/ de dag gis gsad pa'i drag sngags so// badzra pa

laM rag tra dun la ni badzra/ badzra na la ka ham ne badzra/ badzra ne ma sha ya ga badzra pa badzra/ phroM phroM thibs phroM 'ur hril hril/ badzra sha laM ba ma rag badzra rag dun ni lang trag ma/ badzra la ha ne ni ka ya/ badzra ma yag sha pa

ni sha phroM phroM ta tu la hril hril/ pi pi shar yam snying khrag du b+h+yo phob trig nan dza/ de dag ser ba'i drag sngags so// badzra pa badzra ma sha rag lam badzra pa badzra ma sha rag laM badzra/ pa badzra ma sha rag laM badzra/ badzra ma sha

rag laM badzra pa badzra/ ma sha rag laM badzra pa badzra ma/ sha rag laM badzra pa badzra sha rag laM badzra pa badzra ma sha rag laM badzra pa badzra ma sha rag laM/ badzra laM rag tra dun la ni badzra/ laM rag tra dun la ni badzra/ laM rag trag

dun la ni badzra laM/ rag trag dun la ni badzra laM rag trag dun la ni badzra laM trag dun la ni badzra laM trag dun/ la ni badzra laM rag rag trag dun la/ ni badzra laM rag trag dun la ni/ badzra ni ka ha ma ne badzra/ ni la ka

ha ma ne badzra ni/ la ka ha ma ne badzra ni laM/ ka ha ma he badzra/ ni la kA ha ma ne badzra ni la ka haM/ ma ne badzra ni la ka ha ma/ ne badzra ni ka ha ma ne/ badzra ni ma sha yag badzra pa badzra/ ne ma ra yag badzra pa badzra ne/ ma sha

yag badzra pa badzra ni ma sha yag badzra pa badzra ne ma sha yag badzra pa badzra ne ma sha yag badzra pa/ badzra ne ma sha yag badzra/ hring hring/ sa ma ya dun dun hri sra sa rbad/ thub sbur ya dza nan trig nan rbad/ de dag gzir

ba'i drag sngags so// badzra sha pa ma badzra ne yag badzra ka na la ma ni ha/ badzra trag ni rag lam dun/ badzra ma laM badzra rag pa na/ badzra badzra laM raM srog la rbad/ sing khrod trag 'u ra nal to sog la rag sha rbad/

de dag gnam thog drag po'i sngags so// badzra pA ni badzra la/ badzra ne lam ma rag badzra ni pa li badzra/ badzra lam ni ma rag phra ma ka ra ya sa ma ya/ u u ma hA su ka sarba sha tru?M phaT/ de dag gso

ba'i drag sngags so// badzra pA Ni badzra/ yag sha ma/ badzra na ni ma hA kA la/ badzra ni la dun trag rag badzra laM pa rag sha ma badzra/ dgra bo'i rtsal ha la ro ga nan dza la dzin shu khraM myags thibs rbad/ de dag dza le'i

drag sngags so// badzra yagaSha pa ni badzra ma/ badzra ha ka ne ni la la/ badzra dun trag li laM la trag badzra sham laM pa ra ga badzra/ thob 'ur yaM thor thor phaT/ ser ba shag drung na sha ya phaT/ staM pa la big nan/ kha tham

b+h+yo/ de dag gser ba bsrung ba'o/ badzra yag sha dun trag ka ne sha/ badzra dun trag sha yag badzra sham ka ha/ ru pi sarba g+hu yaM ka pa la ti rgya la hal hal du ling has phob ya/ de dag ltas ngan dbab pa'o// badzra pa ma

ni badzra/ ma ni rag laM badzra/ la ni badzra pa badzra/ rag laM ya ne badzra/ ud ma lta phyad sangs sa la shaM shaM tsi tra ha la yaM ti pa ra rbad/ de dag smyo ba'i drag sngags so// yag sha badzra trag ha/ sha badzra du na ka sha ha badzra

ma yag trag ka badzra sha sha dun/ bi de sha ya pra tsa li tra shan shag pra be sha ya phaT/ traM phaT/ de dag bskrad cing dbye ba'o// badzra pa badzra/ badzra nem/ badzra ni la/ badzra la rag traM traM/ hring hring/ hri ta ni ru pi hril/ ru

ti ru ti/ a yang tshe sha de dag rengs pa'i drag sngags so// badzra yag sha badzra ka la/ badzra dun trag badzra rag sha dzi ho hur thums/ mu la big nan phag thum ril khril ya dbang po thum ril thaM/ de dag dkrugs

pa'i drag sngags so// badzra pa Ni badzra yag sha ma/ badzra ne ni ma hA kA la/ badzra nI lAM la dun trag rag badzra pa rag sha ma badzra/ pa shang ku ru aM gu sha ya dun breng g+hu hril A kar+Sha ya dza dza/ de dag dbang du bsdu
ba'o// nyin gtor mtshan dril kun gyi las// dril ba rtsa ba'i spyi rgyugs yin// 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i stobs chen 'di// bcu gsum las kyi sbyor ba grub// 'di de las kyi gnad de bshad// dug gi spu gri
gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'phrul 'khor sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang rnam thos sras kyis gsol pa// drag po'i ngan sngags gsang ba yi// dmod pa las kyi 'bru rgod rnams// rdo rje
snying pos bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// rigs mchog dam pa'i rgyal po nyon// dmod pa las kyi sngags rgod la// gsad bsrung dbab gcad don bzhi rdzogs// de
dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// mchog rnams tshang ba'i gnas de ru// zhing ras rgya shog khru gang la// dug snas byugs la khrag snas bri// dbus dang rim bzhi e dang dbang// phyi rim lcags mkhar nag po
yang// logs la rtsibs bdun tha ma sbrul// dbus su bsgrub bya zla kham lha// lcags mkhar rtsa ba tshan re ste// rtsibs la spu gri tshan re gnas// sbrul nag gnan dang 'phang ba'o// kha sbyar sdig pa'i
lto bar bca'// ling ga gri thod dong btsan nang// 'khor lo bar snang mkha' la sding// bdag nyid rdo rje gos sngon can// mdun du ging chen yab yum 'khor// rdzogs tshul bskyed la bka' sdod mngag/ zhag
lngar dmod par bar mi gcad// srod dang tho rangs drag tu bskul// drag sngags 'od zer sbubs la zhon// gsang lam sgo ru rtsa la thim// me lce mtshon cha dgu thogs kyis// rtsa bzhi brgyad dang bcu rnams
gcad// khrag sbal zhu bsreg bag chags bsregs// dam ma mtho ris thar pa'i sa// snyigs ma 'khor lo thod pa'i 'khong// phung po lhag ma bstod de rol// gdug pa che la 'gran zlar gtad// rdzogs nas

ling ka 'khor lo rnams// gri thod zhabs ma re bas dril// tshas ldan gdug pa che la gtad// nya stong thod na yang yang bskul// dmod pa'i drag sngags 'di lta ste// e badzra a ti pa ta ye/ badzra ma hA kA la dun ya/

ging ka ra kro d+ha ni hring/ ga na gu ti ba tra dun// badzra yag sha kri sna d+ha sha ma ma trag hed rag mo sham/ tig sna ka li tsa mun tri/ yag sha nag mo tsit+ta shaM/ dgra ba'i srog la breng shag rbad/ tsit+ta phyung rak+ta thibs rbad/

tsa la thang thang thum ril rbad/ nri hur thuM dza dun dun shag srog la dun mugs myags khram rbad/ tsit+ta ro myag ling shag rbad/ snying khrag tshal pa yaM ling rbad/ thuMm ri li li dun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ staM pa dza nan/ nyin mo 'di

bzhin dril ba ste// mtshan mo rtsa ba'i bdun po la// spu gri re re stobs la brdeg/ rdo rje stobs chen kun 'khor drang// drag sngags bdun pa'i 'khor lor bshad// gzhan yang chu god dbab pa'i las// rgya shug
'bru yi chu yis byug/ dug bzhi dbus nas rim bzhin bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// yul mi ser srun lha klub btsan// phyi rim khor yug drag sngags bdun// yang logs gza' rgod spu gri
bdun// tha ma gzir ba'i drag sngags dgod// kha sbyar zung bzhi phag ltor bca'// mi rta khyi phag thod par brnag/ dong bur khrag lnga rlugs la bzhag/ bdag mdun dong bu'i gzhal yas su// lha tshogs gsal

byas dmod pa dbab// dgun zla tha chung zhag bdun dril// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe'i thun// brgya brgya dong bu'i nang du brab// dpyid zla tha chung zhag lngar brab// nya la yul du lha ma gzhug/ lha klu btsan dang
dbus su sba// dbyar chung ston rab 'bring po yin// gang rung zhag bdun dbab pa tsam// ging chen bka' sdod bza' rgod che// gang dmigs yul du 'khyags dpung sdud// dud ka sprin gos bzhi yis
brgyan// 'od zer ser chen 'brug la zhon// gnod sbyin 'bum dang bcas pa bskyed// bdag gi sa chen zil gyi bza'// bskul te gza' yis yul gdon bskul// chu rgod ri ltar 'phungs shing
gtibs// dgra yul rdul du brlag par byed// de ltar kun la gsal bar bya'o// de nas khyab 'jug rgyu dus su// zor 'phangs skul te khri yis mdag/ gal te stobs zhan yul rten pa// rdzas bsreg thal 'jim

gtor// rang dbang med par gzir la dbab// de na chu rgod byi ltar 'bebs// de dag dmod pa 'di lta ste// ra hu la ya ma snying// ya ma khrag/ badzra rag sha ga te/ badzra rag sha/ thibs 'dus tog/ thog 'ur

keM/ phroM phroM hril hril/ yaM yaM hril mu ti rgya ri se ri ta/ shar shar yaM shar/ drag tu phob/ da ya da ya hril shar phob/ yaM hril yaM shar drag tu phob/ yul 'dir ser ba nal nal phob// trig nan snying gzir spur nan dza/

rtsa ba'i drag sngags bdun la/ mgo la rdo rje stobs chen te// mjug tu khyab 'jug gza' rgod gdags// spu gri stod bzhi 'dril te rgyun// bzhi sprel drag sngags de la sbyar// smad gsum dpyid dbang dbab pa
gdags// de dag nyin gtor mtshan mo dril// stobs chen gza' rgod mgo zhabs sbyar// gzir na rang sngags mtha' la gdags// yul gdon de yi snying po blang// chu rgod dbab pa'i sbyor ba bshad// gzhan

yang bsrung zhing gzir ba'i las// rgya shog dug sna gu gul byugs// khrag snas bris te thig bskor bzhi// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// gang yin gdon dang sdongs zla bri// phyi rim rtsa brgyad rtsa ba'i

sngags// yang logs rtsibs bdun spu gri gnas// tha ma me yi raM dang ldan// rtsibs mchan gnod byed sdongs zla'i srog/ kha sbyar rus sbal lto bar bri// sa gsum ling ga mi mda' srog/ thod chen dong gi nang du
brnag/ gri lcags phur mda' yungs kar brdeg/ gsal gsum bka' sdod zhag bdun btsan// thod nang ling ga 'khor lor dril// thod chen mgon po nyid kyis gnan// nya stong ngag dus stong stong
bzlas// thug phrad yungs kar gdab cing mngag/ de ltar dmod pa 'di lta ste// trig nan/ big nan/ staM pa ya/ u nan/ e nan/ spur nan gzir// snying gzir thum ril 'drid na gzir// ha la ha la tsam ri

phyung/ ha la bi dang dza la raM/ dun dun breng shag hUr thum sa dza/ khaM shag ro myags thum ril rbad/ nyin gtor mtshan dril gzir ba'i don// yang gsang dmod pa'i rgyal por bshad// gzhan du chu rgod gzhom pa

ni// gri lcags seng ldeng phur pa la// stong du rtsa ba smad la sogs// dug snas bris la byin gyis brlab// mgon po yab yum gsal bar bskyed// yungs kar thal 'jim skye 'braM tsha// sha za mon pa'i tshogs su
brlab// bdag nyid rdo rje gos sngon gsal// mdun du bka' sdod gtso 'khor bcas// bskyed la dmod pa khri dgur bzlas// rdzogs nas byung dus phyag rgya bskyed// rdzas 'phang ram mda' phur pa
'dril// chu rgod ri ltar phungs la bzlog/ sprin gtor lo la za ba bcing// 'brug gi ngar bcag glog bang bcing// ser ba'i bka' bcag bzhu zhing bsreg/ rlung sdod dgra la lam bstan no// de yi dmod pa

'di lta ste// thibs thibs hur khaM yaM thor phaT/ d+ha ki mu ka big nan thuM/ 'ur tog thuM ril gzer thun nan// keM keM ha ri hur thum ril// ser ba ro myags ha sta rbad// sha truM nA sha ya b+h+yo/ drag sngags bdun pa'i

'bru rgod 'di// dang po nyin gtor mtshan dril te// thug phrad dril gtor brnol mar brdeg/ ngan sngags 'bru bdun gsang bar bshad// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags bdun pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmod pa ngan sngags sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gnas mchog gzhung dang ldan pa der// dmod pa ngan sngags sbyor ba bstan// dang la gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// phung sa

gru gsum sba ma ru// rgyu rkyen drug gi ling ga bca'// gro ga ming rus lo khams bri// snyings dpral lte ba gsang bar gzhug/ mon nam rabs chad thod par brnag/ dug gsum khrag bzhi 'bru dang tsha// bsres la

khram kyi thod par blug/ rgya shogs gnyis la 'khor lo bri// e dang dbang la brnag pa lha// phyi rim mu khyud rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs de bzhin spu gri ste// tha ma thod pa'i rwa bas gtams// rang rang rdzas kyis
bris byas la// kha sbyar las mkhan lto bar gzhug/ spra lag dong rtsa mkha' la lding// bdag nyid rdo rje snying por gnas// bka' sdod mgon po yab yum 'khor// de yi bka' sdod gang yin dregs// bdag gis
ging bsgrub mgon pos dregs// bskul te mtshon rnams me tog mtshon// rtsa bcad khrag skam shes pa phya// ling ga brnag pa rang du gsal// de ltar ma yengs zhag dgur brtsam// rdzogs dang rang rang lag tu

gtad// de dag spyi yi rim pa yin// sdebs pa'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// ging dang bdud du sdong 'dod na// bong nga ra tsa rta khyi mon// rgod khra bran nag mtsho lkugs chu// thun dang ling ga 'khor lo byug/ gri mda'
bshos bu dar nag rten// mi gsad mi rgod brag nag la// khru gang gzugs byas rgya sol byug/ nag po 'jigs tshul ras pas gtams// khri shing zhags pa beng nag shing// gsal byas snying khar dar nag

sngags// mun pa'i gling du gzugs kyis gnan// 'thom nag dug zor nya stong mngag/ ging dang rgyal po sdongs 'dod na// dkar gsum gangs chu rgya tshwa byug/ lha khang ka rten rnying pa la// khru gang gzugs byas cong
zis byug/ mda' dang bshos dkar rta ru bca'// dkar po brjid pa'i 'khor lo bri// dar dkar gos lhan rtsa dang sngags// lha khang nang du gzugs kyis mnan// mgon po ma mor sdongs 'dod

na// dme khrag dug sna mtsho sbus byug/ dme sha 'bru sna dug gtor rten// grog mkhar nal sha srin mo sdong// khru gang gzugs byas rgya sol byug/ nag mo 'jigs ma ral pa khrag/ zhing rtag re lde ban dmar

mdung// snying kar ma mngags gsal bar bya// klu bdud mo la gzugs kyis gnan// ging dang klu gnyan sa bdag sdong// sbal sbrul ba mar mdze khrag byug/ gnyan ra dgu yi sa chu shing// klu sman sbyar la cu gang
gzugs// dkar gtong klu sman sna tshogs rten// ljang nag sbrul gyi thod gdengs can// gcer bu sbrul zhags rgyal mtshan thogs// snying khar phu sngags gsal byas la// gdug pa nyid la gzugs kyis
gnan// ging dang btsan du sdongs 'dod na// dmar gsum khrag gi rag tas byug/ gong gsum dmar khrag sa dmar la// khru gang gzugs byas gri khrag byug/ mda' dang bshos dmar sha khrag brten// dmar po
dar dmar bse khrab gon// dar mdung zhags thogs dza sngags bskyed// gong gsum 'gyu sar gzugs kyis gnan// mgon po dge bsnyen sdongs 'dod na// gangs bzhin gri khrag dug gis byugs// pha

bang thal chen la btsas khrag/ rgyu la khru gang gzugs su bya// dar mda' za 'og bshos bu bsten// ljang zer zab slag rdo rje snying// stag thod snying khar dri sngags gsal// khra tshang sum mdor gzugs kyis

gnan// rang rang rkyang bar sdebs pa dang// kun sdongs snying po 'bru re blangs// drag po dmod sngags dril la brdeg/ thibs nad smyo 'bog dal rims g.yo// mdze shu gri rgod hUr thums sod// sprul pa'i sbyor ba

dpag med 'di// rang yang rang la gab pa ste// bdud kyi rgyal mo gdug pa can// the brang sdongs pa'i las yin no// de yi dmod pa 'di lta ste// a+ye badzra hri la rngubs ni baM ba sa u ne u nu hri da ya// badzra yag sha

kA la kA la/ ma hA kA la ma hA ga na gu ti hri ya/ badzra ging kar rag sha ka li// ma ma mu khraM khrag la mu shaM hring// du na ru ta thuM b+ha ti// ra dza tsa pa la a shug me// ma ma trag rag sha nag mo tig laM b+h+yo/ nA ga hu ti nA

ga du ru ta/ shu la rA dza tri sha ma dza yaM/ nA ga hU ti pha na ga du ru ha/ badzra tri na sa thuM tri/ srog la thuM ril rtsa la breng shag tsit+ta dun rmugs khrag thibs rbad/ ling shag rbad/ ni hUr thums dza/ khraM rbad/ gsad pa las

kyi rgyal po 'di// spogs na bzlog dkrugs mchog tu brdeg/ mchog gi gnas kyi ngan sngags te// phyir byung srog chags yod tshad 'chi// nang brngubs rang gi rtsa srog chad// des na zhing rkang sbu bur gdab// rlung

gis thos su mi rung sba// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// a+ye ye ta hri ne u ne a sa pa laM ni rngubs hril badzra/ li ka sha rag ra ga'i ging badzra ya hring ti gu na ga la ma hA ma la kA la k+Sha yak+Sha badzra/ hring

sha mu la khrag mu ma ma/ sti b+ha thuM ru tra ru thuM/ me shug a la la pa tsa tsa ra/ b+h+yo laM ti mo nag sha rag trag ma/ ha du ru ga na sa sti hu ga na/ yaM dza shaM tri ra rtsa la shu/ tri thuM kha du sa na tri badzra/ kham rbad dza thuM hU'u ra ni rbad/

shag ling thibs khrag rmugs thun ta tsi shag breng/ rtsa la ril thuM srog la rbad/ e a ye badzra/ sa hril/ ne ni rdubs u pa ne ni laM/ badzra ling ga yag sha na k+Sha k+Sha la kar ga gu la ra ma ka ka ti la/ ging hring ma badzra

ha ya/ ma ting khrag ma sha khram mu ma la/ dun ting ru ru b+ha tra thuM/ mar me la tsa shug a/ ma b+h+yo nag trag laM shaM rag ting mo/ na hA nA ga ru hu du ti kha/ shu yaM tri la dza/ ra tsa shaM/ badzra tri du na thum sa ga/ srog la khraM ling

rbad/ tsit+ta dun rmugs ril shag thun rbad/ rtsa la ni shag thuM/ khrag hur dza thibs breng rbad/ e rngubs e badzra ta pa hril/ pa tri u ni ni a la ni/ na ni badzra g+hu ka yag ga k+Sha k+Sha ti rag ka la la ra hring ka ka ma la

ging ka badzra ma ya/ khrag ma hring khraM sha ma la ma mu/ ru ti dun thun tra b+ha ru/ a ra me la tsa pa shug tsa/ nag mo b+h+yo sha laM trag mo rag ta/ na na ha sa ga ru ga ti du ru/ tri shu yaM/ ra shaM la dza tsa/ sa tri badzra na ga srog

la thun rmugs ling shang rbad/ tsit+ta thum ril nri hur thuM dza shag tsa la khrag thibs breng khraM rbad/ dmod la gnad kyis gdab pa 'di// blo la mi gnas thug phrad brdeg/ blo dman rmongs la bgrod med kyis// spyad

na rang nyid brlag par 'gyur// shAka thub bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus// rtsi shing nags tshal zad pa'i dus// tshe lo lnga bcu mi thub dus// rnal 'byor nang rme 'khrugs pa'i dus// lha srin rtsal 'gran 'gyed pa'i

dus// skye bo dpa' rtsal 'gran dus su// de tshe gdab pa'i ngan sngags 'byung// gzu lums ra chod spyad gyur na// stobs med rang 'chi brlag 'gyur bas// sgrol ging mgon po nyid la dris// cang mi smra na dus
min pas// rang gi snying bzhin brnag la sba// bka' gsang thob na ngan sngags spyad// des ni nus pa dpag med do// gdab dang gnad dmod pa yi// yang gsang man ngag 'bru rgod bshad// dug gi spu gri
gsang ba'i rgyud las// dmod gnad dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos drag po sngags rgod kyi sbyor ba 'di dag bshad do// sprul pa las kyi sbyor ba dpag med 'dis// las kyi

rim pa du ma 'grub// dbye ba'i rim pa 'di lta ste// de la sbyor ba bdun dang ldan// gsad dang bsrung dang dbab gcad bsgyur ba dang// dbang sdud rim pa'i sbyor ba'o// dang po khram thod sar pa ru// khrag lnga
dug lnga rten drug sbyar// ling ga ming rus nri dang bcas// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe tshe// sngags la sgrol ging yab yum gsal// khri gsum drag sngags bar mi gcad// spyang khu'i rgyud pas gzhu

byas la// khyi yi rgyud pas rgyud du bya// khra yi rkang mgos mda' byas la// gri lcags lnga gsum mde'u gzhug/ brgya na thun re mda' dang lcag/ dkar nag snying gi mtshams su brdeg/ mtshon chas rtsa gcad shes pa

'pho// rdzogs nas khraM thod ling ga rdzas// sha za shing gi rtsa ru sba// sngags rnams rlung gis mi thos bzlas// rtsa ba lnga'am gsum na 'pho// gzhan yang gri lcags seng ldeng phur// yab yum gsal rdzogs dug

khrag ngar// zho gnyis khrag gnyis gu gul ldan// yungs kar rA dza bsregs la brnag/ gang gnod rgya shog gzugs bris la// snying khar 'bru re spu gri lus// rtsa bas mtha' bskor thod chen brnag/ bdag nyid rdo

rje snying po che// ging chen phur pa dril zhing gdab// khri gsum rdzogs nas ling ga dril// bka' rten mgon po'i 'og tu gnan// rdzas kyi dud pas steng nas bdug/ nad pa dme lag dud phur gdab// spre'u rdzas

phur dpung g.yas gdags rten bcud las snod nyid bdug/ gnod byed smyo zhing brgyal bar 'gyur// gzhan yang yul gyi sa chu shing// lo thog sngo sna 'bras bu shing// lha klu btsan dang ser srungs kyi// rdzas la
ling ga dbang po dod// ming byang snying po snying khar brnag/ thod chen brnag la 'bru gsum thun// khrag gnyis dug gnyis lo ma gsum// ma 'dres blugs la dmod pa gdab// bdag nyid rdo rje bka' sdod

ging// bskul bas ging gi khyab 'jug bskul// de yis yul gyi lha klu btsan// rang dbang med par bskul zhing mngag/ ser srungs srungs ma rdo rjes gzir// khri gsum rdzogs nas yul rten la// dug shing tsher
shing dred mo sbar// yul bcud ling ga rdzas dgod bsreg/ sum cha thal ba phyogs mtshams gtor// de dag gnyan zla gza' rgod la'o/ chu rgod gnam lcags ri ltar phungs// gzhan yang sa gsum gnag

gsum khrag/ bsres la mgon po yab yum gzugs// khru gang lnga byas rgya sol byug/ sngags rnams gro ga khong du gzhug/ dgun 'bring khri gsum drag po bzla// sngags pa rdo rje lte so ging// rdzogs nas ched

rdzogs dbus su sba// khri yi bka' rten de la gtad// yungs kar thal chen 'phang zhing bzlas// chu rgod rir stibs rnam thar skyel// gzhan yang thod pa ja ril gnyis// sa lnga brdzangs la khrag gis mnan// ming

rus dbab sngags nang du bri// kha mig dug khrag phyi ru bri// mkhar la sbas na sgra 'byin 'thab// wa spre byi la sram 'phar wa// sha khrag spu dang rang rang gzugs// rten la sbas la de nyid dbab// khrag 'ug srin bya
de mo dang// chu skyar gang ka ti bya gzhad// sha khrag spu la ma 'dres gzugs// rten sbas der dbab sder 'dzings 'thab// nya sbrul sbal sdig gnyan ra'i rdzas// sha khrag bsres la der gzugs

bya// gong ma ma la bres khang kha 'gram// sbal pas de bsgyur gdon mi za// khri gsum sngags bzlas smin drug sba// slu ba med pa'i las mchog yin// gzhan yang gro ga'am bri shog la// mngal khrag rgya skyegs gi

wang gis// gzugs dang ming bris snying khar srog/ tha mar rtsa ba lus la so// bris la tsan dan cong zis byug/ bdag nyid rdo rje ging chen gyis// dmigs pa lcags kyu zhags pas drang// rang dbang med par

bdag dbang 'dus// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas snying nas drang// khri gsum rdzas brlab rang 'og sba// gi wang cong zi tsan dan dmar// rgya skyegs sug smel nyam khris sbrang// ru rta shu dag zhib btags la// gzugs

med ling ga dud pas bdug/ gzugs can pho mo rkang mgor gdab// gzugs khams yan chud dbang du 'gyur// de dag dmod pa 'di lta ste// e badzra hril a ti pa ta ye/ badzra ni laM a dz+nyA a ne/ badzra ging ka ra

ma hA kA la/ badzra rag sha kro d+hi pa tra dun/ trag shig rag sha mu sha ma ma/ srog la myog tsit+ta khas rag ta thibs hUM ling yaM ling mA ra ya rbad/ kI li ki la ya trig nan/ big nan snying gzer sbur nan/ hur thum dza

myag thuM ril rbad ya/ ra hu la ya ma snying rag sha de ba pi pi/ de ba a tsa yaM tri sa nA ga ti gnan myag sbur ya dza la raM/ thibs 'dus 'ur 'ur/ phroM phroM/ hril hril/ yaM shar yaM shar/ nal nal ser ba drag tu phob phob/

hUr khi yaM thor big nan ser ba sha truM nA sha ya phaT b+h+yo/ ka pa ti rgyal hal hal/ bi sha rtse ru pi khraM khraM/ ling ling pu ra dun shaM/ nA ga ba 'u nA ga ya/ du li ha sa phob/ pa shang ku ru dza ya/ ka ra sha hri ma 'gyur ma na ya

dza dza/ de dag dmod pa rgod kyi sngags// las drug rdzogs pa'i sbyor bar bshad// gsal byed rig pa'i sbyor ba ni// gnas mchog gtsang ma yid 'ong der// maN+Dal sman dang spos kyis byug/ steng du ras dkar

gtsang ma'i gdan// de steng 'khar gzhong gtsang ma ru// lco ga srin bya'i lce dang ni// 'ug pa pha wa khyi rgya'i mig/ bzang drug blugs la ngar dkar dgab// 'bru gtsang lha bshos rtsi sman byug/ de stengs gsang
lug mar bskus bzhag/ bdag mdun rdzas kyi steng du bzhag/ rnal 'byor dkar gsum kha zas bza'// sha chang sgog btsong myos pa spang// stong nyid ngang las rdo rje'i sku// mdun du sgrol ging yab yum
bskyed// bdag gi hUM las 'od 'phros pas// mgon po'i thugs khar thim pas kyang// thams cad dbang med bdag la smra// ting 'dzin gsal bas dud pa gtang// bdag gis sngags bzlas zhag gsum
gdon// de yis thams cad mngon du smra// nas la smod la bshos steng bzhag/ rgyas pas bshags pa bstod pa bya// de ltar mngon shes grub pa'i rtags// ging chen bdag gis mngon gsal

te// tshe nyid snga ma gar skyes dang// phyi ma gar skyes dge sdig dang// phan gnod bzang ngan rna bar smra// de yi dus su mnas bsgags la// lha bshos rol la rdzas rnams bsdu// rang gi mgul pa g.yon du

gdags// 'og tu mi gtang 'gom mi bya// de nas 'beb pa'i dus nyid du// lha bshos 'bru dkar steng du bzhag/ de yi sngags rnams 'di lta ste// oM badzra pA ni/ oM ka la ka la/ ma la ma la/ ki li ki li/ sid+d+hi

sid+d+hi/ du ru du ru/ spu ru spu ru/ dza la dza la/ kal ma kal ma/ hri hUM sa ma ya dza/ yo gi A dz+nyA na tsa kru pra be sha swA hA/ sa ma ya na ra khan sid+d+hi hUM/ nas dang lha bshos phud gtor la// dril bu'i sgra dang ldan par
bya// gsal byed rig pa'i sbyor ba 'di// brtson 'grus ldan na myur bar gsal// ye shes gnyan gyi las su bshad// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gnod pa'i las drug gsal byed pra'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas yang rnam thos sras kyis/ kye kye gsang bdag rdo rje can// las kyi mtha' sdud bsreg pa yi// me yi rim pa rgyas par mdzod// ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa// gsad gzir las kyi mtha' sdud du// bsreg pa me yi sbyor ba mngag/ de don rgyas pa 'di lta ste// maN+Dal steng du dong rtsa bca'// me thab gong ltar ji bzhin las// dgra la rten drug ling ga ming// gdon

la gang gnod sa la gzugs// khru gang gong du gan rkyal gnag/ hoM shing zur gsum snying khar gzug/ yaM shing dur tshe bse dri can// bsreg rdzas ma ta bya khyi sha// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe til// de khrag

ra dug bong nga tsha// 'o ma rtsi sman yungs dmar chang// dug dang bag phye'i ril bu la// ming rus khong bcug mar nag btso// me thab mtha' ma khor yug bzhag/ bdag nyid rdo rje gos sngon gsal// mdun du
ging chen yab yum 'khor// de mdun me lha dmar nag 'gying// 'jigs tshul dur khrod sbrul gyi chas// me dar ral gri g.yas dang g.yon// bka' nod las byed gsal byas la// zhag bdun sngags bcus
dbul// sum yar bsreg pa mthar rdzogs nas// thal ba phur skor phur pas gdab// zhag gcig rdzas dag thal 'jim de// 'thom gnag gnod pa'i phyogs su 'phang// las kyi rjes gcod sbyor ba yin// de

yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// e badzra pA Ni n-I laM ba ra d+ha ra a d+hi pa ta ye A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ hril ya/ badzra ra ga sha badzra ging badzra yag sha badzra ging ka ra ma hA kA la ga na gu ti du/ ma trag ma hig dun ting mu khraM trag rag

sha dgra ba'i srog la thuM ril rmugs rtsa khrag thibs breng sha rbad/ tsit+ta phyung ni hur thuM dza/ trig nan/ sbur nan/ hur thuM dza/ myag thuM ril khi shag rbad/ ag ne de ba kro d+ha kha raM dza/ raM raM raM/ badzra kI

li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn rbad rbad/ thuM ri li li breng breng/ thuM ril b+h+yo/ bsreg pa las kyi rgyal por bshad// gzhan yang bum pas bsrung ba ni// rin chen bum pa mdzes pa la// kha rgyan mgul chings ldan byas

la// sman lnga 'o ma chu gtsang blugs// maN+Dal mdzes pa'i steng du bzhag/ bdag nyid rdo rje gsal byas la// bum par mgon po yab yum bskyed// lus rnams ba spu khro chung gtams// bdag gi spyi bor 'khor lo

sngags// mgrin pa snying kha lte bas gsang// 'khor lo sngags kyis bskor bar bsam// bdag gi sngags las 'od 'phros pas// bum pa'i lha rnams 'od du zhu// ye shes chu rgyun khro chung 'bar// bag chags dri ma
sgrub pa bsreg/ tshur 'dus bdag gi sngags rnams zhu// ye shes rgyun gyis bag chags bsreg/ de ltar gsal pa zhag gsum bzlas// rdzogs nas bum chus khrus yang bya// de yi yon tan 'di rnams
te// bgegs ris stong phrag brgyas mi tshugs// 'chi bdag bdud rnams zil gyis gnon// rang gi lha srung khon sor chud// sdig pa phra mo bag chags 'byang// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis dgongs don 'khur// ye

shes spyan gsal khams gsum gsal// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// e badzra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya te yi ngan ni laM ba ra d+ha ra/ badzra kA li ging ka ra/ ga na gu ti pa tra pa tra/ sha gri ba/ ma ma ka ma la shwa ri/ ta ki ni dz+nyA

na baM raM/ sarba sha truM bi g+h+nan/ ha la ro ga gri da phyung dza la raM hri shag rbad a/ bsam gtan bum pa'i khrus su bshad// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud las// rjes gcod bsreg pa dang bsam gtan bsrung ba'i le'u
ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis// gal te 'khu ldog las mi byed// log pa'i ltas byung dbang sdud gzir// srog 'phrog rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas// gsang ba'i bdag

pos yang gsungs pa// phyi rabs ging chen 'di bsgrub pas// 'dzab rdzogs drod med las mi byed// 'khu ldog g.yeng zhing tshul ba na// dam rdzas ma tshang gtor tshogs nyams// sgrub ched dam nyams stobs chung

bas// dam rdzas gzhung du bltas la gsol// rdo rje slob dpon mnyes pas mchod// tshogs dang gtor ma dus drug bskyed// tsha tsha sbyin gtong mdo sde bklag/ phyi nang mthol bshags dam par bya// lta ba rjes
dran ting 'dzin bsar// dpon mi bzhugs na rigs 'khor mchod// de yang med na gtor tshogs gtang// des ni dngos grub ci 'dod 'byung// rdo rje slob dpon thugs bskang zhing// ma mchod mnyes par ma
byas na// dpag med 'dzam skong mgo dkrugs kyang// rtsa ba chad pa'i me tog la// chu yis blugs kyang skam pa bzhin// dngos grub thob par ga la 'gyur// de bas rang phung srog chad
lhung// mthar yang rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// de bas rgyun du dran byas la// yon tan rdzogs pas 'di bshad na// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// dgos pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// gsang ba thabs kyi
rim pa yin// gal te des kyang stobs med na// sngags bdag rang gis nges pas su// dbang bsdu srog 'phrog gzir zhing bsgag/ de dag rim pa 'di lta ste// bdag nyid rdo rje gos sngon can// 'jigs khro
brjid pa'i cha lugs la// thugs khar nyi zla hUM dang sngags// de las lha mo dmar nag 'bum// lcags kyu zhags pa thogs pa 'phros// ging gis ske mgrin snying kar drangs// bdag gi zhabs 'og gdan du

bsgyel// ci bgyi skad ngan mnas bsgags la// gdan las gsol la gtang// dbang du bsdu ba'i rim pa yin// hUM nI la ba ra d+ha ra i tan tra ma ste ha ha pa la badzra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ging ka ra ka la gu na/

trag dun dun/ srog hring hring/ aM ku sha dza dza/ bdag nyid rdo rje gos sngon gyis// thugs kha'i sngags las 'od zer 'bum// rno myur ngar dang ldan pa ste// dmar nag nyi zer lcags kyu ltar// 'phros pas spyi snying
mgrin lter thim// mgon po brgyal brlams myos 'gyur te// rang srog se la khab lus ltar// rang dbang med par 'di phrogs te// bdag gi thugs kha'i hUM la thim// lnga brgya dus dang dmigs dang sbyar// de

nas mnas bsgag bdud rtsi gso// gang 'dod las la mngar par bya'o// e badzra pA Ni hri da yan/ ud sa d+ha naM nI laM ba ra shwa ri raM/ ya pra ti ha te u ne hri d+ha ye/ tsit+ta ye a d+hi pa ta ye/ mahA ma la ka pa g+hu na gu te/

ma ma trag sha thuM ril breng shag dun ma hur thuM dza/ a a dza dza a ya tse dza/ gzhan yang rnag gsum gri rgod sa// rgyal sol byin can mgon po'i sa// dug gis brus la nag po 'jigs// khru gang dbang po dod par

bya// snying khar e nag gro ga la// snying po sngags bris brnag la sba// dong rtsang nang du gan rkyal bzhag/ gri lcags phur pa dug ngar blud// sngags bris rdo rje 'chang gsol brlab// rang gi bsnyen pa 'bum gyis
dgug/ las gzhung bcas la gzugs la bstim// rdzogs nas sngags pa gos sngon can// gsal ba'i snying po sngags las 'od// 'phros pas mgon po'i tsit+tar thim// gzir myos brgyal te shes pa
brlams// lus kyi dbang po me ru 'bar// me lce dgu thogs mtshon char 'phros// rnam shes rang dbang med par phrogs// bdag gis thugs khar rten la bstim// phur pas gnas gsum yang yang
bsdig/ dngos su mi gdags tshul du bya// de la khri gsum stong du gzir// rdzogs nas gzugs de tsog pur blang// snying ka'i sngags gdon ming rus dril// bdud rtsi gsol la rak+ta
gtig/ mna' chu blug la gsad pa brtsam// sngags drug ling ga thun gyis brdeg/ zhag gsum bar ma chod rdzogs nas// mun gling ling ga gzugs kyis gnan// e hril rngubs badzra pA Ni/ a ne u ne/ hri ta na

tra ya nI laM ba ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ hri di na/ i dan ka pa ye tsit+ta ye a d+hi pa ta ye/ kI li ki la ya tig sna a/ badzra yag sha ging ka ra gu ti ka la ma trag kha khi trig nan/ snying gzir sbur nan/ myag thuM ril dun

ma hu ra thuM dza a/ a mri ta/ u tsi ti nan kha d+hi/ rak+ta khA hi/ sa ma ya badzra kro d+ha/ daM daM sa ma ya na ra kha na/ e badzra hril pA Ni/ se na pa ta ye/ badzra ging ka ra ya/ mahA kA la ya/ badzra yag sha kro d+ha kro d+ha/ pa tra pa tra/

sha gri ba/ ga na gu ti/ ma ma ting trag rag sha khrag la mu sha tsa mun tri/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta baM long thun sod/ rak+ta thibs srog la breng shag rbad ni dza kha la phyur aM rbad sod/ shi sa las mchog gsang ba 'di// lta ba
dbang bgrod dam rdzas sngags// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i rgyun dang 'brel// 'brel med gzu lum ra chod du// brtsams kyang dregs pas bka' chad 'ong// 'di la bag chags gsang bar bshad// dug gi spu gri
gsang ba'i rgyud las// log non gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang rnam thos sras kyis gsol pa// gsang ba'i rgyud 'di'i lta ba dang// dbang dang dam tshig gang lags pa// rdo rje gsang
bas bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje gsang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'khor tshogs rigs ldan khyed// rgyud 'di mdams ngag tshig gsum po// ma ldan las kyi sbyor rtsom pa// sa bon me yis tshig

pa la// myu gu 'bras bu 'dod pa 'dra// bskal par bsgrubs kyang ga la grub// ston pa'i gdams ngag gsum ldan na// ston gyi lo thog smin pa bzhin// 'bras bu rang dbang med par 'byung// dngos grub thob sgo

dbang yin pas// dang la bgrod pa'i rim pa ni// gnas mchog gtsang ma bkra shis der// sa yi maN+Dal rdul tshon bri// bum pa sman spos chu yi dgang// gzhal yas khang du lha tshogs bskyed// de dag bkra shis

phyi yi rdzas// gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsi phud// bla re gling bu gsur chen tshogs// rgyan dang phyag mtshan sku yi rgya// byin brlabs ldan pas dkyil 'khor bskyed// bkra shis dag pa nang ni rdzas// gzung ma mtshan ldan
sems bskyed bshad// sbyangs pa gsang dbang las kyis rdzas// las gzhung dang sbyar tshogs kyis mchod// bsnyen pa bsgrub pa bdun du brtsam// yol bas bar gcad rdo rje drang// dang po dkyil 'khor bum
dbang bskur// bag changs rtog pa'i sgrib pa sbyang// de nas phyag rgya rgyan dbang bskur// ging nyid 'jigs pa'i sku ru 'gyur// phyag mtshan rdzogs gtad phyag na 'bar// de nas mchod pa ging la
dbul// dam rdzas dbang phyugs sa gdon non// de nas slob dpon gzungs mar sbyar// dkar dmar thig le gsum blugs blang// gsang sngags 'khor lo'i mnga' bdag ste// gsang bdag longs sku'i

gzhal yas mthong// rgyud kyi man ngag rdzogs par gtad// gsang lam phyi yi bgrod par bshad// dam tshig spyi dang sgos nyid de// spyi ni rtsa ba yan lag go/ rtsa ba lnga ste yan lag bcu// de dag rang bzhin thub

par bsrung// yi dam mi spang bla ma bskur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// sdig dang bag chags rdul rnams spang// rdo rje mi 'gom ri mi bshig/ mtshon cha mi gsal phyag mi btsal// sgog btsong dme sha

nya rnams spangs// de dag sgos kyi dam tshig go/ lta ba yang ni 'di lta ste// 'khrul pa phyi nang snod bcud ni// sbyor ba don gyi kun gzhi las// lhan cig skyes dang kun tu btags// ma rig nyid las yul sems

snang// de nyid lo thog sgyu ma'o// rgyal ba'i sku dang ye shes dang// zhing khams gdan dang gzhal yas khang// 'od zer du ma snang ba yang// gzhi mchog don gyi kun gzhi las// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan
las// snang ba ye shes sgyu ma ste// gdul bya 'khrul pa snang bar bas// ngo bo nyid las gnyis med pa'o// de bzhin chos can chos nyid dang// sangs rgyas sems can ye shes rtog/ don dam kun rdzob btags
pa rnams// ming ni gnyis su btags par zad// chos rnams thams cad rang sar bden// de yang kun gzhi nyid yin te// de phyir chos rnams kun gzhi der// kun gzhi byang chub sems kyi sku// ngo bo nyid kyi

sangs rgyas so// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud las// dbang dang lta ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis gsol pa/ ging chen mgon po nag po 'di// las la mngag cing
gshed bsgo ba// rdo rje snying pos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag pos ging po las sna tshogs la bskul ba 'di gsungs so// hUM/ dur khrod chen po lcang lo can// ma la ya yi gnas

mchog na// gnam lcags rngur mo rab tu ta la la// rak+ta 'i rgya mtsho rba klong me re re// zhing chen lhu ldum keng rus khra la la/ 'dab chags sha za'i tshogs ni nyi li li// gsur chen du dpa'i tshogs yang langs se
langs// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i tshogs ni lhubs se lhubs// de 'dra'i gnas mchog rab tu 'jigs pa nas// ging chen yab yum 'khor bcas sku skyod cig/ hUM/ bdud 'dul sgrol zhing chen po mi bzad
pa// pho brang lcags mkhar 'bar ba'i dbus phyogs nas// bdud dang srin po byi chings bsnol ba'i gdan// baM chen nyi zla pad+ma 'od du 'bar// bsreg byed me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil
nas// bdud 'dul dbang phyug sgrol ging chen po ni// sku mdog nag po dug chen bskyil ba 'dra// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bgrad// g.yas ser g.yon ljang nag po 'jigs pa'i
dbu// spyan gsum sdang mig bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// dam nyams lus srog dbang po bag chags bsreg/ zhal gdangs ljags 'dril mche brtsigs tshems yang bgrad// khams gsum zhal du rngub cing dam
nyams srog rtsa gcod// zhal nas rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug ltar sgrogs// khams gsum dgra bgregs ma lus zil gyis gnon// sma ra smin ma bskal pa'i glog ltar 'khyug/ bdud dang srin po dgra bgregs rngul du
rlog/ shangs nas rims dang rlung dmar tshub ma 'phro// dgra bgegs ma lus brgyal zhing brlag bar byed// ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar// thod skam 'bum gyis dbu brgyan thod du bcings// sku la

dar nag 'bar ba'i ber chen la// dar lce 'bum dang me tog tshom bus brgyan// stag lpags rlon pa'i gong ras la// zhing gi g.yang gzhi mang po 'phrul// snyan cha mgur chu lhu tshigs la// sprul nag 'bar ba'i

rgyan gyis brgyan// thod pa rlon pa'i 'phreng ba yis// do shal sa ral rgyan du byas// nyi ma zla ba gza' skar gyis// sku yi phyogs mtshams rgyan du bkram// zhal du mi ro gsol zhing 'phrul// g.yas kyi dang po be
con bsnam// dgra bgegs ma lus rdul du rlogs// bar ma rdo rje rtse lnga yis// dgra bgegs lus la tshal par gshog/ tha ma gnam lcags phur pa yis// spyi gtsug rgyab nas rkang mthil 'don// g.yon gyi dang
po dung dmar bsnams// dgra bo'i yul du nad rims phob// bar ma dbyug thos nyams su chug/ tha ma sbrul nag zhags pa yis// bla tshe khug la srog sbrubs long// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par
mdzod// g.yon nas yum chen dbang phyug ma// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// ral pa nag po mun ltir gtibs// sku la zhing chen g.yang bzhi la// nyi ma rin chen 'bar bas brgyan// sku smad re lde'i sham
bu la// sbrul dang thod pa rlon pas brgyan// spyan gsum bgrad pas khrag tu 'khyil// zhal mdangs mche gtsegs ro za 'brul// g.yas pa rgyu zhags yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa ban dmar gtso la
stobs// 'dir spyon dam skong 'phrin las mdzod// hUM/ yab yum stabs gcig spyan 'dren na// ma thogs myur du da tshur spyon// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// dbang bskur byin brlabs bsnams nas
bton// de'i tshe phyi yi mtshan btags pa// mgon po nag po zhes kyang bya// nang gi mtshan du btags pa ni// sgrol ging bdud 'dul chen pos bya// gsang ba'i mtshan du btags pa ni// rdo rje sgrol
byed drag po rtsal// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshan nas kyang// spyan 'dren 'dir sbyon 'phrin las mdzod// bros bor khas blang ma mnyel bar// rnal 'byor pa yi las rnams kyis// gal te dam las 'gal gyur

na// rdo rje srin po khros pa yis// snying khrag bsregs nas na rag ltung// de bas las rnams myur du gyis// sa brgyad legs pa'i blo gros la// rdo rje snying pos lung bstan pas// khyod kyis sprul pa dpag tu
med// mchod rten nag po mer 'phro dang// lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba dang// mun pa gtibs shing 'khyil ba dang// rlung nag tshub ma g.yo ba dang// mon pa nag po brda' mi phrad// me 'bar 'od nag 'khyil

ba rnams// khyod kyi sprul pa g.yo ba yin// de phyir mthu stobs bdag po khyod// gnas 'dir sku bskyod 'phrin las mdzod// gzhan yang las mkhan gza' rgod bskul ba ni// hUM/ khyab 'jug chen po ra hu la// du
ba mjug rings sgra gcan 'dzin// lha min dbang po bgegs kyi rgyal// byi tri pa tra dmag dpon mdzad// tshur spyon bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// sku mdog dud kha 'jigs pa la// sprin gyi na bza' gzha'
yis brgyan// dbu la glog gi thod dmar bcings// chibs su g.yu 'brug sngon mo chibs// bar snang khams su gdangs ngar sgrogs// g.yas kyi thod zor dgra la 'phen// g.yon pa ser ba'i 'khor lo
bskor// dgra yul thal ba rdul du rlogs// gzim dngas glog 'gyu lams se lams// nga ro 'brug sgrogs di ri ri// shangs kyi rlung tshub 'u ru ru// kha nas ser 'bebs shar ra ra// kha rlangs sprin du thibs
se thibs// dgra bo'i lo tog gtub tu spyon// lo tog snar po dbang du bsdus// bcol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod// gzhan yang sdong zla bskul ba ni// hUM bdud yul kha ra sgo dgu nas// bdud rgyal ri
nag spungs pa khyod// bdud mkhar nang nas 'dir spyon la// dgra la thibs nad gzer thabs thong// hUM/ rgyal yul nam mkha' phyad phyod nas// rgyal po 'od zla dkar po khyod// shel dkar nang nas

'dir spyaun la// dgra la smyo 'byog thong la sgrol// hUM/ ma yum byang shar mtshams dkyil nas// ma mo rdo rje sder chen khyod// mthing nag gur nas 'dir spyon la// dgra la rims dang dal thabs phob// hUM/ klu
yul na ra gsing chen nas// klu gnyan nag po srog gcod khyod// rin chen mkhar nas 'dir shog la// dgra la mdze shu phol 'bras thong// hUM/ btsan yul zangs thang dmar po nas// btsan rje shu bo lag rings
khyod// dgu rtse'i nang nas 'dir shog la// dgra la gri 'thab yams su phob// hUM/ shar lho rin chen thang dkyil nas// ging chen rdo rje legs pa khyod// dgra la pho log gzer thabs thong// srid

pa'i dregs pa chen po khyod// phyag na rdo rje bka' byung gis// rang rang las kyi skal long la// bcol ba myur du grub par gyis// las la mngag cing bskul bar bshad// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud las/
las mngag pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos// 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag la rgyud gtad pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// khro
bo rngam pa rol pa'i tshogs// 'jig rten dregs pa rnams kyi tshogs// ma mo mkha' 'gro gdug pa'i tshogs// gtsang ris mgon po lha yi tshogs// rgyal po sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas// sha za rngam 'jigs srog
len tshogs// nga yi 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// bka' yi gsang rgyud spu gri 'di// bstan pa rin chen gter gyi mchog/ drag sngags dgu thog sbab chen dug/ me dbal spu gri mtshon cha dbal// dug gi spu gri

gsang rgyud 'di// don gyi ngo bo ma nor gtad// dug chen bya bar gang gsung ba// drag sngags dbal gyi nus pa yis// log pa'i blo can phung byed pa'o// spu gri zhes bya gang gsungs pa// drag po so yi ngar mchog
gis// gang yang gdug med myur du gcod// gsang ba zhes su gang gsungs pa// blo dman rmongs pas rtogs pa dka'// spyad na rang nyid phur bar 'gyur// rgyud ces bya bar gang gsungs pa// lha dang sngags
bdag ting 'dzin dang// dam rdzas mchod pa rgyan dang gnas// lta ba dam tshig dbang gsum dang// bsnyen bsgrub sngags kyi rim pa dang// thun dang 'khor lo ling ga dang// dmod pa gdab pa'i drag sngags
dang// las kyi rim pa ma lus kun// rgyas shing 'dus nas 'bral ba'o// de phyir mtshan gyi nges tshig ldan// don 'di ma nor khyed la gtad// rig pa sems kyi rtsal gyis long// chags pa chen po'i brda yis
bzung// snying la gab cing sba bar gyis// e ma gsang ba'i rgyud 'di yang// brnag pa las thabs drag po rnams// 'di 'dus rin chen gter mchog yin// kun gyi thun mong ma yin gsang// nus pa dpag med

brjod las 'das// de phyir gsang rgyud spu gri 'di// nga yi thugs kyi klong nas byung// 'di la rdzu 'phrul stobs yod kyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rigs chen rnams// rgyud 'di rtse gcig len 'chang na// gsang

ba'i bdag po rdo rje can// nga yi thugs kyi sras su dgongs// 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// sras dang spun bsgom byin gyis brlob// sngags bdag nyid kying bsrung zhing 'khur// 'di 'chang yon tan
dpag med do// blo dman bgrod med rmongs la med// mi mos smad pa'i skyon rnams kyang// gsang bdag ngas kyang brjod du med// thabs rnams ldan dang mi ldan pas// bya ba kun 'grub brlag

par 'gyur// de phyir yun ring gter du 'gyur// myur du 'dod na tshi chad 'gyur// yun du bsgrubs na slu ba med// drag sngags rnol dbal gang chen rnams// ra chod byas na rang gcod brlag/ bag dang ldan zhing
nyid las bgros// 'di bshad dgu thog rbab chen bzhin// gang la phog kyang 'joms par byed// glu ba med pa'i las yin te// gzu lum ra chod phung ba'i rgyu// bka' gsang thob na ren chen gter// lta de

drod ldan mtshon cha'i mchog/ 'di byung dus na bstan pa 'jig/ de tshe sngags rgod nus pa 'byung// gang la rgyab kyang 'chor mi srid// sgrol ging rdo rje nag po yis// mthar thug gnad kyi gsang rgyud yin// nus pa
rang dbang med par 'byung// gang brtsams las la thogs med 'grub// dam tshig ldan zhing lta ba rtogs// dbang bgrod sdig pa'i phyogs tsam spang// mchog tu slob dpon mnyes pa gces// de ldan nus

pa thogs med do// gsang rgyud dug gi spu grir bshad// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa la thams cad yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gtad cing
gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// dpal mgon po nag po dug gi spu gri gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ shri ma hA kA la a man tr-i kraSh+Na gu h+ya tan tra/

bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po drag sngags nag po'i gsang ba'i rgyud// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum khros rngam pa nyid/

dur khrod chen po lcang lo can baM ro brtsegs pa na/ gnam lcags brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ dregs pa dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rngam par bzhugs te/ ye shes khro bo chen po dang/ rdo rje khro bo rol
pa dang/ 'jigs byed dregs pa can rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor de dag gi nang nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnam thos sras stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa/ rang byung ye shes chen pos kun khyab kyang// bde don nam rtogs log par 'khrul pa yis// bstan pa 'jig cing 'bras bu dmyal khams 'khor// de bsgral thar lam bstan pa'i 'phrin las
mdzod// ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bo de nyid/ sems can las kyis khams gsum du 'khod de/ bstan pa'i bar gcod cing 'bras bu dmyal khams su 'khor te/ thugs rje
chen pos bsgral zhing thar lam bstan pa'i phyir/ ma hA kA la dregs pa 'dul ba'i dbang du sdud pa'i yang snying 'di dag ched du gsungs so// e rngubs e badzra sa ta hril ba hi u ni ne a laM ne/

stobs chen khro bo rngam pa nyid// gnad kyis btab pa'i drag sngags mchog/ 'di nyid ched du gsungs pa la// dregs pa thams cad brgyal bar gyur to// de nas 'khor de dag gi gtso bo rgyal po rnam thos sras

kyi 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o/ sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i khro bo gos sngon can// gsang tshig rngam pa'i gsungs sgrogs gsang tshig can// dregs pa 'khor bcas rab tu skrag cing brgyal// lnga 'dus dngas ma
'od kyi ga ru nas// rtsa lcugs las kyis 'brel pa'i srog snying 'bul// ces gsol ba btab pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis kun la khyab

par mdzad do// de'i byin brlabs kyis dregs pa de dag dran pa rnyed de/ rang rang gi srog gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// na nri badzra g+hu ka/ yag g+ha k+Sha k+Sha/ ti rag ka la/ la ra hri ka ka ma li gir ha badzra

ma hA/ khrag ma hring khram sha ma la mu mu/ ra ti dun thun tra b+ha ru/ a ra me la tsa pa shug tsa/ nag mo b+h+yo/ sha laM trag mo rag te/ na ha sa ga ti du hUM/ tri shu yaM ra sham la dza tsa/ sa tri badzra ru thuM nA ga rtsa lcugs 'brel pa

snying gi tig/ srog gi khro bo grong khyer dkrug pa'i mchog/ dmod pa gnad kyi btab pa'i las// sdebs dang rkyang bar shes par dbye// srog 'brub shes pa nye bar 'du// rtsa srog 'brel pa'i spu gri gcod// dmod

pa gsang ba'i spu gri bsnol// dgu bskor las kyis de shes bya// las mi byed na shi sa bstan// ha la nag po spu gri 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// drag sngags nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las// gleng bzhi sngags kyi
le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ nag po chen po'i bsgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// yang tig gsang ba'i mgon po 'di// bsgrub pa yang gsang
snying po'i mchog/ de dag don mchog snying gi tig/ ha la nag po las kyi gcong// snyigs ma lnga ni mar bsgribs la// lta spyod ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rab tu 'jigs pa rtsub 'gyur tshal// shan pa

mtshon thogs gcan gzan 'grim// der ni maN+Dal ched du bya// gru gsum mthing nag kha khyer rtsang// dar nag lding khang bya rgod mda'// rab tu mnyes pa'i mchod gtor bsham// de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug
che// gsum mam rdzogs la skad cig la// rdo rje gtum po khro bo skad cig mas// mdun du las mkhan nag po che// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rab du rngam// stag gi sma ra me ltar 'bar// beng chen par bu khrag
gis bkang// dpa' brtul myur mgyogs stag la chibs// 'dod khams dbang phyug chen mo yang// tshub ma'i nang na dred mo chibs// gsang sngags 'di yis bskyed par bya// oM mahA ka la g+ha na g+hu
ti/ ka ma la sha ri nag mo ting la ma b+h+yo/ 'khor gyis las mkhan dregs pa'i tshogs// rang rang sprul par bcas pa khyod// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs mchod bstod// dur khrod rngam pa'i gnas nas
bskul// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ las kyi srin po gdong dmar gdul ba'i ched du mgon po nag po spu gri re ched drag sngags bcu bdun gyi ngan sngags 'di gsungs so// drag po
shugs kyis sgrol ba'i mchog/ zhing ras rgya shog khru gang la// dus lngas byugs la khrag gsum gyis// dbus nas rim pa bzhi ru bskor// gru gsum zla kham lcags mkhar mdun// phyi rim rtsibs bdun tha ma
sbrul// sdig pa nag po lte bar bri// ling ga gri thod 'brub khung nag/ gcod pa'i 'khor los kha gcad la// drag sngags dmod pa lnga 'am dgu/ bcu gnyis gcig tu drag par bzlas// srod dang tho rangs dregs

pa bskul// dam rdzas gtor mas mnyes par bya// e man tra yaM gu h+ya b+h+yo/ tsit+ta si ra hU ra thuM dza/ sha truM hUM gi ljang khu ni// dkar nag mtshams nas thod par sdud// rdzogs nas ling ga 'khor bcas

rnams// zhabs ma re ba tshas kyis dril// nag po gsum la 'gran zlar gtad// nya stong dmod pa zer kha gsod// de nas yang rdo rje gtum pos drag sngags 'bru bdun grong khyer 'di gsungs so// e badzra pA Ni

a d+hi pa ta ye/ ging kar kro d+ha ni hring/ g+ha na g+hu ti pa tra dun badzra yag sha tri sna d+ha sha/ ma ma trag he da rag mo sham/ snying sna ka la tsi mun ti/ yag sha nag mo tsit+ta shaM/ dgra bo'i srog la breng sha rbad/ tsit+ta ro myag

ling shag rbad/ snying khrag tshal pa yaM ling rbad/ thuM ri li li thun/ b+h+yo b+h+yo staM pa dza nan/ nyin dril mtshan gtor drag po'i las// stobs chen khro bo nga yis bshad// ces gsungs so// drag sngags nag po'i rgyud
las/ mgon po bsgrub cing ru ta bsgral ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas/ las thams cad kyi thugs ka gnam sa zhabs bzlog lha srin la dkrug cing dgra la rang
gshed dbab cing srog la chan pa gdab pa'i las 'di gsungs so// shAka thub bstan pa 'jig ka ma// rtsi shing nags tshal skam dus su// drag pos gdab pa'i sngags rgod de// bdud kyi 'on khug sbag ma

ru// bdud chad rdzas la ling ga bya// dri bo'i thod par ling ga brub// thod pa'i nang du 'khor lo bkram// tha ma maN+Dal chag chag gdab// dbus su ba ling rten dang bcas// lho la sogs pa dgram par bya// gri
mda' bshos bu dar nag dang// sha khrag mda' dmar bshos bu dang// bshos bu mda' dkar dar dkar dang// dme sha 'bru sna ha la sba// dkar gtor klu sman sna tshogs dang// dar mda' za

'og bshos bu'i rten// rgya shog dag la 'khor lo bri// dbus su drag po dbang dang ldan// phyi rim yab yum sngags kyi lus// nyi shu rtsibs bzhi spu gri so// bar du dregs pa rtsa ba'i sngags// tha ma thod pa'i ra
bas gtams// dregs pa nag 'jigs lto bar bri// kha sbyar bar snang mkha' bri// dregs pa 'dul dril las su rig/ sdebs kyi las su bshad bya ba// bdud rgyal btsan dang klu gnyan dang// ma mo dge bsnyen

lto ba ru// sngags kyi 'khor lo rdzas kyis bri// sngags bdag nyid dang grong khyer sbrel// rkyang pa sgo yi grong khyer dkrug/ sngags kyi sbyor ba gsum du bsdeb// klad du stobs chen snying po ste// bar du dregs pa'i

srog snying gtam// tha ma ming srog spu gri gcod// bco lnga stobs chen dregs pa 'dul// sum cu rtsa bzhi yab yum sngags// 'bru bdun bdud la 'bru brgyad ging// 'bru ma mo drug sum cu// 'bru brgyad btsan la

'brug drug ging// bar du ming dang snying po bsdebs// tha ma spu gris bsdebs pa ste// dregs pa'i grong khyer dril de dkrug/ dregs pa'i mgo ru stobs chen sngags// dregs pa rkyang pa'i grong khyer dkrug/ gtad pa

'chi bdag nyid la ste// bsdeb dang rkyang pa so sor gtad// ces gsungs so// de nas mthu stobs bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ drag po sngags rgod rtsa srog gi chan pa/ srog gi spu gri lus srog rtsa mdangs 'brel ba

'di gsungs so// srog la thun mugs/ ling sha ga tsit+ta thuM ril nri hur thuM dza shag rtsa la khrag thibs bred khraM rbad/ dmod pa nag po'i spu gri ste// blo la me gnas thug phrad du// sngags ni zhing rkyang sbu gu
gtad// drag sngags nag po'i rgyud las/ dkrug pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rjes/ las kyi mda' thun snying la gzer 'debs pa'i
las 'di gsungs so// dri bo'i thod pa kha yel du/ gru gsum khrag dang dug gis bri// rten drug rdzas la ling ga bya// bdud mda' gsum dang rak+ta hal// gcan gzan rgyus pa dug gi gzhu// sri gcan nag po'i

rgyus pas rgyu// khra yi rkang pa'i mda' dag la// gri lcags med bcug brgyal bar brdeg/ mtshon chas rtsa gcad shes pa phro// rdzogs pa'i las sbyor zhag lnga bya// de nas mda' zor gyi sngags rgod nag po 'di

gsungs so// e badzra hri a d+hi pa ta ye badzra nI lAM A dz+nyA mu ne/ badzra ging ka ra ma hA kA la badzra/ rak+Sha kro d+ha ni bdun trag shig rag sha mu kha/ ma ma srog la myog tsit+ta khas rak+ta thibs/ hur ling yaM ling/ mA ra ya
rbad/ dkar nag snying la rgya bar brdeg sha za snying gi rtsa ru gtad// drag sngags nag po'i rgyud las/ mda' thun gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs bdag pos/ shi sa nag po las

byed du ma/ 'dod na srog bskul bar byed pa 'di gsungs so// dang po spyi yi las rnams bya// las rnams kun kyang ma grub na// gsang ba las grub yang gsang 'di// dril ba'i las su shes par bya// rtags kyi

mtshan ma ma nye bar// myur bar 'dod na rkyang par bsgrub// nye yang las byed ma nus na// srog gi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// 'jigs byed dregs pa'i lte ba ru// mkhas pas tsakra rab bris la// drag po'i rdzas

kyis rab brab cing// drag sngags 'di dag rab tu drang// e badzra hril rngubs nI la a ne u ne hri dang ye/ ma hA kA la gA na gu ti srog breng breng dun/ ma ma mu khraM khrag la mu sha ti srog breng breng dun dun ma

hUr thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad dun dun ru tra ru thun b+ha ti/ srog breng breng/ dun dun dza dza/ d+ha hur thuM mA ra ya rbad/ rA dza tsa pa la a pa la a shug med srog breng breng dza dza dun dun/ tsa hur thuM mA ra ya dza/ ma ma trag

rag sha nag mo ting lam srog breng breng/ dza dza dun dun/ ma hur thums mA ra ya dza/ nA ga hU ti nA ga du ru ha/ srog breng breng dza dza dun dun hUr thuM mA ra ya rbad/ shu la rA dza tri sha ma dza yaM/ srog breng breng/ dza dza dun

dun dza hUr thum mA ra ya dza/ badzra ti na swa d+hu sha truM srog breng breng dza dza dun dun/ tri hUr thuM mA ra ya dza/ zhes pas drag po gnad kyi sngags// 'khor lo bris te bcang ba ni// srog gi gnad kyis zin pa
yin// bzlas na snying khrag skyug pa yin// ces gsungs so// drag sngags nag po'i rgyud las/ srog 'phrog shi sa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i snyigs ma la rnal 'byor

pa'i drag sngags sgrub sngags kun rdugs na/ mtshan ma sgyu rtsal gyi ngan sngags 'di gsungs so// ha la nag po rtsa ma ri// las kyi gcod du gsungs pa ste// gal te hol gyi las zhes bya// las kun rdugs na bya ba

las// snang snang byas na bstan pa 'jig/ gcong drug las kyi mtha' ru sbyar// sbyong ba 'du bas las 'phreng dag/ bya nu rkang gcig dag gi bcud// dgun zla rab 'bring nya dang brgyad// dan tra zhes bya'i mar khu

dang// rta zho dag las mar byung dang// zar me'i mar khu dag dang ni// sbrul gyi tshil bu rab sbyar la// ba ru dbugs can nang dag tu// zhag grangs gsum du mnan byas la// sbrang rgod btsan dug kha da ra// phye ma
zhib btags chang dang sbyar// rang gi lus la ma reg par// tshags su bcug la gzhan la brdeg/ tsi tsi dza la'i nad kyis 'gum// gso ba'i rig pa byang bu shes// ne le bzung nas zangs su bca'// sha yis
gsol la skom kyang blud// dri chu brun dang bcas pa dang// de gsad rgyu long nang du bsre// ti tsa nag po thang phrom gnag/ rgya tshil dkar po rab sbyar la// skar ma'i rgyal po dbyug gu la// zhag

dgur lug lud nang dag tu// ston zla tha mal sba bar bya// zhag grangs thim na spru dang sbyar// spra ba'i me la thabs kyis span// tsha ba rims bzhin skyes nas kyang// zhag bdun grangs kyis 'gum par 'gyur// de

yi bsrung ba 'di lta ste// ga bur tsan dan mu zi dkar// mar dkar ka ra dkar por sbyar// khong du zos pas tshugs thangs med// gzhan yang dza la nag po yi// klad pa rus pa chu ser dag/ sbal pa sdig pa rkang

mangs dang// ti tsha nag po thang phrom dang// rgya tshil dag tu mnyam sbyar te// sra ba gzhang nag nang cha bru// nang du gos kyi rdzas brubs te// skar ma'i rgyal po smin drug la// zhag drug dag tu na bun dus// rus
myags bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste// me yi dud pa yal ba la// mkhas pas phyogs su shes pa na// rdza lis mdze yams 'chol bar 'bab// thabs maid sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu// zhag grangs dgu na sha mdangs

'chor// sems yengs lus sbred skabs su smra// tsi tsi dza la'i las zhes bya// de yi log non 'di lta ste// mi yi tshil te a mr-i la// gur kum tsan dan smug po dang// brag zhun mar dkar ka rar sbyar// zos na

nad kyi 'jigs dang bral// gzhan yang ngan sngags spyad bya ba// gu ya rag ta'i mdzod chen dang// btsan dug sha sbrang ro dag dang// sbrang rgod dbyi mo sbyar te bca'// ston zla rab 'bring dus su bya// ra yi thod

par sbyar te yang// nyi grib mtshams su sngo gseb sba// 'bu ru song nas dgra yi yul// mkhar khyim 'gram du dri med dang// sgrags te bzhag na sbrang bu dag/ mchu rings ldan ma myos mdog can// rmig pa'i lus

la za bar byed// gar zos chu ser der 'dus nas// lus la lhog pa 'bras bu 'gyur// rnam smin rab tu che bas nas// snang snang byas na dmyal khams rgyud// gzhan yang nang gi sbyor ba'i las// khyi smyon chen po
mgo 'khor ba'i// go ro tsa na ga bur dang// btsan dug kha shog sbyor ba mnyam// ra yi thod par zhag dgur bsrul// khong du gtang na dmigs pa de// chu rgal lus sprid mgo 'khor nas// chu grir 'gum par

nges pa ste// sran ma'i tshad do zla ba gnyis// ha la nag po'i las yin no// gzhan yang lhum pu sa nu dang// gser mde'u phu ron brun du cha snyams te// rwa ru'i nang du la chas gtums// kha shog gser tu zhag
gsum gnan// sran tshad khong du song ba na// zhag gsum dag tu smyo 'bog ste// zla ba gcig na 'gum par 'gyur// de nas ngan sngags bshad bya ba// rabs chad gri thod shi ba 'am// mon dug gri ru shi
ba'am// thod pa de yi nang dag tu// dgra bo'i gos dum dri ma can// phyi sa dri chu rnam pa gsum// gom pa'i rjes kyi sa dang ni// mu zi nag po pi pi ling// spru ma nag po bse zho dang// ra

dug btsan dug thal nur dang// thang phrom ti tsa'i dud pas bdug/ skar ma'i rgyal po smin drug la// ne la'i blud pur zhag bdun gnan// zhag bdun song nas phar la kha phye la// dan 'dra nag po po son cha// rgya tsha byang pa

kha ru tsha// phabs dang sbyar te thod par brub// sgo 'am 'gram pa'i lang kar sba// ldang ba'i dus su nges med da// sa la rlangs pa byung dus su// 'gom na sbyor ba 'du bar 'gyur// shes pa mi gsal dbang po
'grib// myos te rims sam dug gi nad// zla ba gcig na 'gum par 'gyur// sbyor ba 'du ba'i las zhes bya// ya bag sha yi las zhes bya// tho chor spyad na dmyal khams 'khor// bstan pa rin chen nub pa

yis// chos la yid chad byung na bshad// dus tshed spyad na bskal pa 'byung// 'bras bu med na mnar med 'gyur// drag sngags nag po'i rgyud las// mtshan ma sgyu rtsal gyi ngan sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag pos rgyud gtad de/ drag sngags nag po gsang ba'i rgyud 'di ni// ma nor ma bcos chos nyid yangs pa'i klong// 'gag med ye shes drag sngags rol par
bshad// mnyam nyid mi g.yo'i ngang la mi 'da' na// rig par rang dbang chen po'i mchog tu bstan// ma rig bag chags srog gi dngas snyigs 'byed// stobs chen mi 'gyur mi bshig phyag rgya'i sku// mi 'da'
chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang la rol// bka' yi snying po gsang ba'i rgyud// dregs pa'i yang snying gdab pa'i drag sngags 'di// dus med spyad na las kyang 'bras bu med// des na bstan pa nub na dar cing
bshad// rab tu srung zhig dregs pa 'dus pa'i tshogs// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// drag sngags nag po'i gsang ba'i rgyud las// bshad rgyud gtad pa'i
le'u ste bdun pa'o//// drag sngags nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ ma krig kr-iSh+Na nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ mun pa nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das

ye shes sprul pa'i sku'i gtso bo ri rab kyi steng gi byang phyogs na/ me ri 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang na 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa'i rigs sna tshogs pas bskor te bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs
dgongs mthar dbyung ba dang bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba gdul bar gzigs nas nag po chen po'i rgyud mun pa nag po zhes bya ba/ 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rten kyi sku yi bca' thabs

dang// dkyil 'khor bri zhing brtsigs pa dang// sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba dang// dpal ldan mgon po bskyed pa dang// dam rdzas gtor ma bsham pa dang// 'khor lo bskor la gsad pa dang// rdo rje me thab cho
ga dang// gzhan yang rbad pa bzlog pa dang// zor gyi las kyis gsad pa dang// drag po hom gyi cho ga dang// ltas dang mtshan ma'i rim pa dang// thugs dam bskang ba'i rim pa dang// las kyi mtha' bsdu'i
rim pa dang// de ltar spyi don bcu gsum du// bshad kyis rab tu mnyan par gyis// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las// gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// dpal ldan nag po chen po ni// rten gyi lder so

byed pa na// sa mnyen bzang po rdo rgyus dang// dug dang tsha gsum sha khrag la// khru gang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas na gcod byed gri gug ste// g.yon na ban d+ha khrag bkang gsol// kham nag ral pa
gyen du 'bar// dar nag ber dang cod pan dang// bsgrub pa po yi g.yas su bzhag/ mi nag rta nag gzhon pa la// nam mkha' nag po lag na thogs// stag ral gzig shul btags pa'i tsheg/ rbad pa bzlog
pa'i rten du bca'// khru gang gzugs la gdug pa can// lto bar drag po'i 'khor lo bca'// dme 'thab byed pa'i rten du shes// smug po ber thod 'khor lo can// bsrung ba byed pa'i rten du shes// mchod dang
gtor ma bzang du bsham// bla ma gus shing shes rab can// dad can g.yo sgyu spang ba yis// de la 'dod pa'i don gsol na// nag po chen pos dngos grub ster// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las// rten bca' ba'i
le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// srog dbugs mnga' bdag lha chen gyi// dkyil 'khor bya ba'i rim pa ni// dur khrod grog po phugs rdugs sa// rgyal po phung shul ri hrul dang// mu stegs rten las blangs pa'i

sa// dug dang khrag gis bran byas te// khru bzhi pa yi gru bzhi la// gru gsum khru gang zla kham can// 'khor lo'i rtsibs drug mu khyud bcas// thod pa 'phreng ba me ris bskor// gru gsum kha khyer rtsang dmar
la// ling ga btags te gzugs par bya// gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor gshin rje'i phyogs// gru gsum dur khrod sol bas byugs// nub byang gru gsum mtho gang bar// lha dang dbye ba'i cho ga

bya// byang shar lug nag gdags par bya// lho nub mtshams su thun yang bya// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bca' ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas nag po chen po yi// spyan drangs sngags ni brgya

rtsa brgyad// bzlas nas nag po chen po 'gugs// oM e h+ye hi mahA kA la ka ru ni/ dza dza hUM/ srog gi snying po drang ba ni// oM mahA kA la trag shad ma hA ka la sid+hi ya du dza dza hUM/ oM ma hA kA las snying 'byin no// snying

la su ni tsit+ta rbad// ming phyo las la rub par byed// oM ma hA kA la nri/ thum lam thum ril rbad// bu ni mA ra ya dza/ rbad cing gsad ba'i sngags yin te// dam nyams lus srog 'brel bar byed// che ge mo nag po

srog khrag sbal// subs tubs mug ti/ khrag sha du pi baM thuM ril rbad/ dme 'thab rnam smin rab tu che// nri sha ku ru tsi tsi/ muM khrag k+Shi ba ta du ru ti hUM zlog/ gsang sngags yang dag bzlog pa 'dis// gshin rje'i

'phrul ba bzlog par byed// ma su ka li bi ta pa ra ma tra/ tsin d+ha s+ya ya rak+Sha ku ru hUM/ de yis thams cad srun par byed// oM mahA kA la ya ka shak+Sha/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha khA hi/ des ni sman phud dbul

bar bya// oM tsaN+Da ma hA kA la rag mo 'di la ti ba li gr-ih+na khA hi/ de nas gtor ma sbyin par bya// sngags ni dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las// gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi
pa'o//// de nas lha bskyed bsgom pa ni// bdag nyid skad cig lha dag gis// sa bon 'di 'phros spyan drangs te// phyag dang mchod sogs rdzogs nas kyang// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya// rang
bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod la// gur sogs bzhi yi bsrung bar bya// me yi sa bon rta bdun la// hUM las gri gug de yis mtshan// don byas gdug pa kun 'dul nas// 'dus pa ma hA kA lar gyur// zhal
gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag gzugs// ber nag gyon zhing thod nag bcings// sbrul nag 'bar ba'i gdu gu can// bskal pa'i me dpung nang na gnas// spyan gsum zhal bsgrad smra ra ser// phyag gi gri
dang kA pA la// thugs kar hUM yig 'phro 'du can// ro yig gdan la gnas pa yi// nag po'i sprul pa 'bum dang bcas// rnal 'byor pa ni kun srung byed// bstan la gnod pa thams cad sgrol// yi ge gsum gyi

byin gyis brlab// ye shes dgug cing gzhug par bya// spro bsdu bya zhing sgom par bya// de nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya// thun mtshams yi ge brgya pas bshags// 'dod don gsol zhing dge ba sngo// mun pa
nag po'i rgyud las/ lha bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas nag po chen po yi// dam rdzas mchod pa bsham pa ni// gri rgod snying la sman lnga blug/ dar nag nang du dril bar bya// bya
rgod mda' la dar nag dang// snying dang dri bo'i srin lag gdags// lug nag g.yag la phyi rten bya// gsang sngags swo la bri bar bya// de la dar nag le brgan gdags// dur khrod ral pa nag po

gzugs// bris la rab gnas tshul bzhin bya// nang rten dag tu bcang bar bya// skyes pa dar ma'i zhing chen la// nag po chen po'i sngags bris la// dkyil 'khor steng du dbub par bya'o// g.yag rgod snying dang

rta nag snying// de yang nag po'i dam rdzas rten// sha chen khrag dang chang dang ni// la d+hu tsan dan a ka ru// 'bru sna bur chang sbrang chang dang// rgun chang 'khur ba 'bras sran chan// la phug sgog pa sha sman lnga// nag po
chen po mchod pa'i rdzas// rnal rnal pa yi 'tshogs gyur na// bung bas me tog mthong ba bzhin// myur du yongs nas ci bsgo byed// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las// dam rdzas bsham pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas dregs pa srog bdud kyi// 'khor lo cho ga bya ba ni// 'khor lo yang ni rnam pa lnga// spung 'khor lus la gdags pa dang// nang 'bras 'khor lo 'og tu gzhug/ gsad pa'i 'khor lo gru
gsum gzhug/ brten pa'i 'khor lo mda' la gdags// bzlog pa'i 'khor lo lto bar gzhug/ de la gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni// me yi dkyil 'khor gnyis 'gyur dbul// bsgrub pa'i ming rus bla rtso
dgod// mu khyud gsum la me ri dang// gsang sngags bcas pa bri bar bya// rabs chad pho mo'i thod par gzhug/ dug dang khrag gi thun yang brab// mgon po dpag tu med pa spro// bsgrub bya bkug la de la
bstim// sde brgyad mtshon cha'i char pa dbab// gri gug gtubs cing gtor mar btab// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro las la mngag/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba las// gang zhig rbad cing bskul gyur na// 'jig rten mes po
tshangs pa yang// brlag pa 'gyur bar the tshom med// gus pa'i tshul gyis 'bad par gyis// dad ldan dpa' zhing bla ma gus// gsang thub las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// mun pa nag pa'i rgyud las// 'khor
lo'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// gang zhig bskal pa tha ma la// dus ngan sems can gdul dka' ba// log lta mu stegs bstan pa la// 'gras na nag po chen po yi// nang rgyas cho ga bya ba ni// gri rgod dag gi
pags pa 'am// dur khrod ras la khrag gis bri// gdug pa brlag byed khrag gis ni// me yi dkyil 'khor gnyis 'gyur la// mu khyud thod pa me dang bcas// rbad cing gsad pa'i sngags bris la// ci shos dag
kyang bri bar bya// bar dang ling ga rid pa la// mu stegs lha dang sngags bcas bri// khyi nag thod pa'i nang bcug la// nag po chen pa'i 'og tu gnan// srod la sngags thun brgya rtsa brgyad// rdo rje
dag gis brdeg par bya// mgon po'i snying kha'i sa bon las// las mkhan mang po spros pa yis// lha dang rig sngags bcas bkug la// sde brgyad dam tshon char dbab gsad// rtags bzang mthong bar gyur pa
dang// mchod rten rgya gram 'og tu mnan// 'di ni gsad pa'i las yin no// kun tu spel na nyams par 'gyur// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las/ nang 'gras bsgral ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// nag po chen
po'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan gyis rbad pa bzlog pa dang// mi nag rta nag zhon pa la// g.yas su mun pa nag po bskur// g.yon du zhags pa nag po bskur// 'khor lo rtsibs drug lto bar gzhug/ zur drug la

ni rdo rjes mtshan// mu khyud drag sngags thams cad dgod// mtha' rten bcas pa nyi shu gcig/ bzlas la bshos bu nag po la// dam tshig can gyi rgyang bus brgyan// nyi shu rtsa gcig bsgrubs phyogs bskyal// gal
te bzhi ni phyogs bzhir bskyar// nam phyed nag mo'i chas su zhugs// dam nyams bdud la phob cig ya// rbad sngags brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// nag pos 'khrul 'khor bzlog 'gyur na// mu stegs ngan
sngags smos ci dgos// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las// gzhan la rbad cing bzlog pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas nag po chen po yi// zor gyi las ni bshad bya ba// nag po chen po'i rnal 'byor

pas// mda' zor 'phangs pa 'di ltar bya// seng ldeng skyer pa gtsang ma la// bya rog kha yi sgro yi sgron// zur gsum mde'u la habyo gsum bri// gsang sngags thun habyo btags pa ni// 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas
nas kyang// bsgrub bya'i khang khyim bdag la brdeg/ gtor ma zor du phen gyur na// 'dzin gtor bshos bu'i ming byang gzhug/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bsgrub par bya// bshos bu dus gsum rtag tu dbul// gang la
'phang ba brlag par byed// the tshom yid gnyid spangs byas nas// gdams pa gzhung bzhin bsgrub byas na// 'jig rten brlag par 'dod na yang// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// mun pa nag po'i rgyud
las// zor 'phangs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// drag po sbyin bsreg 'bar ba yis// gang zhig bsgrub bya bsreg par 'gyur// gshin rje'i gru gsum khru gang par// seng ldeng gla ba rnga mo'i sbangs// dur

khrod shing dang dug shing dang// maN+Dal steng du brtsig par bya// mchod gtor bsreg rdzas tshogs bshams la// mtshams dang bsang gtor byin brlabs bya// hUM las skad cig lhar bskyed de// nag po chen po
zhal gdangs pa// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// khams gsum po yang za bar byed// sbra tshil ling ga sor bzhi pa// rkang pa nas gtubs brgya rtsa brgyad/ gsad pa'i sngags kyis dbul bar

bya// btsan dug bong nga sbyang dug la// nim pa 'da' ru ra dang ni// dme khrag gsum dang sha chen dang// mar nag mar me bshul tshil rnams// shin tu khros pa'i sems kyis su// nam phyed bdud kyi spyod yul
la// gcer bu ro yi gdan la 'dug/ kha yang bgrad la lus la tshil// gdong yang khrag ste skra yang tshil// kang ka sha za zhing lpags gdab// de ltar 'bum tsho gcig byas na// ma hA de ba brlag par
'gyur// bsgrub bya lta bu smos ci dgos// mun pa nag pa'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas nag po chen po yi// bsgrub pa'i rtags rnams bshad bya ba// mon pa nag po 'jigs pa

la// gos su dar ber nag po gyon// lag na tsit+ta thogs pa na// myur du las ni byed pa yin// dar ber sngon po gyon nas kyang// mtshon cha thogs nas myur tu 'gro// dar nag ru mtshon phyar gyur nas// snang srid
lha 'dre'i dmag dpon byed// thog 'tsheg glu gar byed gyur na// chang dang a mr-i ta yis mchod// bla ma chos 'chad lung ston dang// khri la 'dug dang gdugs dbub dang// dung 'bud gri dang thod pa

ster// dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya// me dang rlung nag tshub ma dang// bya nag lug nag bud med tshogs// mchod rten bskor ba byed gyur na// bskang ba bya zhing dngos grub blang// gcan gzan sna tshogs mchong

ba dang// shags byed go mtshon gdung gyur na// las la sbyar ba'i cho ga bya// khro zhing 'du long cho ga dang// bya nag 'thab dang khyi nag 'dzin// g.yag gis gdung dang mtshon cha'i char// tshur la ltogs pa'i rtags
yin pas// ting 'dzin stobs bskyed ye shes sngags// ma yengs brtson bya srog gis bskang// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dang// mchod pa bzang pos thugs dam bskang// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las/ ltas
dang/ mtshan ma dang/ thugs dam bskang ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas nag po chen po yi// mnan pa'i cho ga byed gyur na// mnan pa'i sa ni 'di lta bu// bdud kyi hom khung chen po dang// btsan

gyi rgyu srang yod pa dang// sman gyi bro ra yod pa dang// klu yi pho brang chen po dang// dge 'dun lam dang skye bo'i lam// mchod rten dang ni lha khang 'og/ dur khrod gnas su gru gsum bya// 'khor lo bcas pa'i ling

ga dang// sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang// thod pa mtshan ngan nang du blugs// zhabs ma re bas dril byas la// rgya gram dag tu bcing bar bya// 'jig rten lha la chu gtor btang// nag po chen po gtor mas
mchod// dur khrod g.yam pa nag po la// ri rab gling bzhir bcas pa dang// sna tshogs rdo rje bris byas la// gru gsum steng nas mnan par bya// rkang pas bcag cing dmod bcol bya// nang du
tshogs gtor bskang bya zhing// rnal 'byor pa la bza' ston bya// de ltar byas na thams cad 'grub// mun pa nag po'i rgyud las// mnan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// rdo rje 'dzin pas de skad ces bka'

stsal pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa dang// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// bdud dang srin po lha ma srin// ma mo bdud mo sha za rnams// thams cad dga' zhing spro zhing yi rangs te// thams cad bka'
nyan cing gsung bstod la dam tshig bzhin du bstan pa bsrung bar 'gyur ro// mun pa nag po zhes bya ba dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la

gu h+ya tsit+ta so ri phri ta nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon po gsang ba spu gri phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum pos/ khro bo bdud rtsi

'khyil pa la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig bdud rtsi 'khyil pa khyod// ma hA kA la 'od 'bar 'di// drag po 'jigs byed chen po yis// las kyi rtog pa phyi ma dag/ dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud// nga yis

bshad kyis yang dag zung// oM mahA kA la rag sha du beng na dza/ oM shrI kA la ru pa hUM phaT/ ces pa ni thugs dang sku sbrel pa ste// thugs nye bar byed cing sku dngos su 'byon pa'i snying pa'o// de ni rgyun du bsnyen pa'i

sngags so// oM ma hA kA la ya hUM phaT/ ces pa ni las kha tshar gsung gi sngags te thun mtshams su drang ba'o// sngags snga ma gnyis gnyis la 'di btags la gsad pa ste/ u mu kaM mA ra ya/ da ha da ha tig sna/

yag sha che ge mo rbad rbad tsit+ta su ri rbad/ mA ra ha la dun myags rbud rbud/ rmugs tsit+ta la breng shag kha la baM rbad/ rngubs rngubs dun dun che ge mA ra ya rbad rbad/ ces pa ni shin tu yang dag par gsad pa'i snying

po ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pas brnag par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rtog pa'i skabs de dang po'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la mthu stsal can// de'i bka' nyan re ma ti'i snying po ni/ trag

rag sha re'u ma ti snying kha rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo// zhes pa ni 'bod pa'o// che ge mo mA ra ya rbad ha la rag mo re'u ma ti che ge mo myos rbad rbad/ sa ma ya hur shag b+h+yo// zhes pa drang ngo// las 'gor na// oM nri dza snying la

yaM thum ril ril sbra 'dus la ya/ rbad pu ni sha snying la ya zhes so// de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rtog pa'i skabs gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// oM dzaM b+ha la dza len tra ya
su ru su ru sarba big+h+nan/ a ta ya ho swA hA/ zhes pas dpal ldan mgon po yi// drung du dzaM yig nag po las// dzam+b+ha la na nag pos te// g.yas na bi dza a ru ra// g.yon na thod pa bsnams
pa'o// zhabs 'og gnyis na gter bum pa// bsnams pa bskyed la spyan drangs bstim// mchod dang gtor ma dbul bar bya// sngags de khri ru bzlas pa na// gang bsam grub par gdon mi za// zhes gsungs

so// rgyud phyi ma las rtog pa'i skabs gsum pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje gtum pas// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ma 'ongs dus su bstan pa nyams pa'i tshe/

ma hA kA la'i rgyud 'di gzung zhing sba bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po'i rgyud las/ rtog pa'i skabs bzhi pa'o//// dpal nag po chen po mahA kA la'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba/ rgyud snga ma las
sngags ma tshang pa la kha bskang ba'i rgyud gnad du phyung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// bdag 'dra sangs rgyas ye shes la// gu ru dam pas gnang ba yin// las 'phro can la btsas su bzhag/ dam can rnams

dang 'phrad par shog/ rgyud 'di ni rgyud snga ma na mgon pa'i sngags dang re ma ti'i sngags ma tshang ba 'di skong ba la dgongs pa'o// de'i man ngag la thugs dang sku la bsnyen pa bskyal ba rgyud snga ma dang las byang du

gsal/ gsad dus su rgyud 'di yi gsang sngags gdags/ re ma ti'i rtsa sngags dang gsang sngags gnyis rgyud phyi ma nas sbyar/ de ma yin pa rgyud snga ma dang las byang ltar bya'o// dpal mgon po'i yang tig
rdzogs so//// rim pa rgyud nas yang dbang gter la babs// las 'phro can dang mjal bar smon// mgon po rgyu ba'i dus ni zla ba gang la yang/ tshes brgyad/ bcu bzhi/ nyi shu gsum dang/ nyi shu dgu la

rgyu'o// khyad par dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes gsum la rgyu/ de'i dus su srungs ma byin dang dam bsre/ zhag gcig la rgyu ba ni nyi phyed nam phyed rtag tu rgyu'o// mgon po nor phyir 'brang ba'i sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la rag

sha che ge'i zung kyi zung hUM dza/ zhes so// gzhan dag 'gras na 'di gdags so// oM hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo/ ka ta ma hA ya/ pra ha ha ra hUM/ sa ma ya a ti pra ma bzlog a la la ho/ zhes so// ser ba bsrung ba ni/ ma hA kA
la ser ba ur Na ni swA hA/ mgon po'i yang tig a+thi+-i////
rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la sid+hi ma hA ti Shi nA ma tan tra u pa de sha bod skad du/ dpal mgon po nag po dngos grub bstan par gzigs pa man ngag gi rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin

pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba lcang lo can gyi gnas na/ ri rab kyi rtse la 'dus pa'i 'khor
dpag tu med pas bskor te gnas/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dpal mgon po nag pos rang gi rig pa mdongs gsol du phul te bstan pa bsrung bar dbang bskur ro// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas
dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ gnod sbyin nor bdag gis gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das shin tu dregs pa'i dpal mgon po de bsgrub pa la/ bstan pa bsrung ba dang sngags kyi rim pa dang bcas pa bshad du
gsol/ ces gsol pas/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig nor bdag chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ dpal mgon po bsgrub par 'dod pas/ thog mar dben pa'i gnas

su song la/ dkon mchog mchod cing bgegs gtor gtang/ de nas rdo rje gtum po bsgrub// de nas mgon po'i maN+Dal ni// zla kham nag po khru do pa// zheng du khru gang yod pa la// ban d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa
ru// dri bo'i tsit+ta ma nyams pa// a mr-i ta dang khrag tu bcas// sha chen chang phud la sogs pa// gzhan gyis mi mthong bsnyen pa'i rdzas// gtor ma rak+ta bsham par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje gtum por

bsgom// mdun du pad+ma'i steng dag tu// hUM las tsan dan beM du gyur// de las mgon po bskyed par bya// spyan drangs bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal lo// mchod pa dag kyang dbul bar bya// de nas rtsa ba'i snying po

bzlas// rtags byung bstod dang gtor ma btang// de ni mngon du 'grub par gsungs// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal te// las kyi rim pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i sngags rnams bshad kyi nyon// oM badzra

pA Ni hUM phaT/ ces pa ni gnya' gnon gyi snying po'o// oM badzra pA Ni sarba big+h+naM nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ces pa ni bgegs bskrad pa'o// dza hUM baM ho/ zhes pa ni spyan drangs pa'o// oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/

zhes pa ni bsnyen pa'o// oM shrI mA' hA kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ ces pa ni bsgrub pa'i snying po'o// a mA hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ oM shri ma hA kA la rU pa che ge mo mA ra ya hUM paT/ ces pa ni las sbyor gsang pa'o// ba

ling khA hi/ ma hA mam sa khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ ma hA a mr-i ta khA hi/ zhes pa ni gtor ma sbyin pa'o// oM hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo/ ka ta ya ma hA pra ha ra hUM sa ma ya a tig kra ma che ge mo'i byad kha bzlog bzlog a la la
ho// zhes pa ni byad dang sbod gtong bzlog pa'o// zhes gsungs so// bsgrub pa'i rim pa dang gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa// rtags kyi

rim pa rgyu dus rnams// rim par bshad kyi gus par nyon// bsnyen dus ban d+he mon pa dang// bya nag khang thog 'tsheg pa dang// 'od kyi rang bzhin ston par 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i dus su de nyid bstan// las
la sbyar ba'i dus nyid du// ri dwags gsad dang sems can gsad// gco bor jag pa byed pa dang// lings dang ri dwags shor ba dang// g.yag gsad pa dang bkyigs pa 'byung// mgon po rgyu ba'i dus nyid

ni// tshes brgyad bcu bzhi nyi shu gsum// nyi shu dgu dang gsum la rgyu// nam gung nyin gung rtag tu rgyu// de dus gtor ma gtang bar bya// zhes gsungs so// rtags dang rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum
pa'o//// de nas gnod sbyin nor bdag chen pos gsol pa// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// las kyi mgon po rtags 'gyangs na// gnad la dbab pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas// bka' stsal
pa/ nyon cig gal te 'gyangs par gyur na/ rnal 'byor pa dam tshig bshags/ bka' bsgrags/ mchod pa dang dam rdzas la nan tan bya'o// mgon po gnad la dbab pa la gsum ste/ gsang sngags 'chol pas

gsad pa dang/ des kyang ma grub na 'chol pa'i yang 'chol pa'o// des nges par 'grub pa'o// oM shrI ma hA kA la ru pa hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ ma hA kA la da ha tig sna tig sna yag sha rbad rbad/

che ge mo mA ra ya/ zhes pa'o// de dus su phur pa brdeg pa ni/ oM nri dza snying la ya thuM ril pra 'dus la ya// rbad pu ni shag snying la ya/ zhes pa'o// gal te des ma grub na/ 'dis gnad la dbab ste/ oM du beng ni

ma hA kA la rag sha dza/ oM shri ru pa ka la hUM phaT/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ gal te tse log byed pa dang/ rtags byung nas dgra ma shi na shas tsam bzlas so// des ni gang yang grub par the tshom med do// zhes
gsungs so// sbogs pa las kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa// las la sbyar ba'i dus nyid du// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gsum nag po bru// phyi rim zla

kham dmar po gsum// de la mu khyud thod 'phreng ldan// tha ma rtsang gis bskor bar bya// dgra yi ling ga bca' ba ni// bdud rtsi rkang rjes 'tshub pa'i sa// de rnams bsres la ling ba bya// 'brub khung nang du
gzungs thag gdags// seng ldeng phur pa dag la bstod// dug dang kyi tshes yungs dkar brab// rgyun du rten pa'i dam rdzas ni// lcags kyi ga bu'i nang du ni// dkar gsum mngar gsum la d+hu dang// rgun
'brum shing thog sna tshogs brtsal// dar gyis gcad la dbul zhing bcang// zhes gsungs so// ling ga bca' ba dang dam rdzas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal
pa// bstod cing bskul ba 'di ltar bya// hUM/ bde chen 'du 'bral med pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// yang dag rngam pa'i sku cig byung ba ni// mthing nag mi bsrun 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i sku// nyid kyi sku mdog
