mthing nag chen po la// dbu skra kham nag thor gtsug gcig tu 'khyil// smin ma nag po khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal// spyan bzlog zhal bgrad mche ba rno gtsigs nas// sdang ba'i dgra bgegs ma lus snying rtsa

gcod// shangs nas me dang dug gi tshub ma gtor// phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel// g.yas kyi phyag na tsan dan beng chen bsnams// gsor zhing gsor zhing klad pa'i rgyas su brdeg/ g.yon gyi
phyag na bar bu sku la rten// dam nyams dgra bgegs ma lus snying khrag gsol// sku la dar nag sngo ba'i 'jol ber gsol// gser skegs rin chen 'bar ba sked la bcings// zhabs la za 'og 'bol can
sag ri gsol// ma hA kA la'i tshogs ni sprin ltar gtibs// dam nyams dgra bo ma lus rtsad nas gcod// thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// ma hA ka la mgon po'i tshogs// shAkya thub
pa'i bstan pa la// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// dam las ma 'da' da tshur byon// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// ces gsungs so// bstod pa'i le'u ste
drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin nor bdag gis gsol pa/ dpal mgon po'i bsgrub pa dang// gsad pa'i las kyi rim pa gsungs lags na// las kha tshar rim pa bshad du
gsol// ces gsol to// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ nor bdag nyon cig las kha tshar 'di lta ste/ ser ba dbab pa dang/ ltas ngan dbab pa dang/ mkhar bshig pa dang/ nor la 'breng ba
dang/ jag chings dang/ sri'u gso ba dang/ gzhan dbang du bya ba dang/ nor sgrub pa dang gzhan zil gyis gnon pa dang/ dgra bo lha dang dbral ba dang/ bsam pa bsgrub pa'i rim pa'o// ser ba dbab par

'dod na/ bsnyen pa sngon du song bas/ mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru/ yul gyi ming dang/ lha dang/ dgra bo bris la/ yungs dkar yungs nag la bsngags la/ oM mahA ka la rag sha du beg ni dza/ ra hU la sa ma

ya snying kha rag sha de bi yi de bi a dza yaM tris nA ga trig nan yaM phob/ ces sngags bzlas la/ thab bya zor 'phangs nas thod pa bcug nas phebs so// ltas ngan dbab par 'dod na/ khra dang/ 'ug pa srin bya
dang/ ti bya la sogs pa dang/ wa dang/ spre'u dang/ byi la la sogs pa'i sbu dang/ sha khrag la gzugs byas te maN+Dal steng du bzhag la/ oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ ling li su ra dun shal

du ling has phob/ bi tsa ru pi khraM du ling has phob ci ya yA/ zhes bzlas te/ rtags ni rang gi rmi lam du byung ba dang/ dgra'i 'gram rtsar sbas pa'am// khang pa'i nang du 'phang ngo// gcan gzan dang/ bya mang po
brgyal ba dang/ 'dzing cing 'bab par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// ser ba dang ltas ngan dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rim par bshad kyis nyon// de yang dgra bo'i mkhar bshig par 'dod

na/ mon thod dang/ rabs chad dang/ dig pa dang/ sbyang khu'i thod par/ oM badzra hring sha rbad phye mA ra ya shag phaT/ yung nyung khas phaT swA hA/ zhes bzlas te thod par sngags bzlas pa'i khrag dang/ yungs dkar
blugs nas 'gram rtsar sbas na myur du 'jig go/ nor la ma hA kA la 'breng bar 'dod na/ ma hA kA la grub pa dang las gnyer gtad de// snying po 'di shas tsam bzlas la las gnyer gtad do// ma hA kA la rag

sha du beng ni dza/ oM shrI kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ bdag gi nor dang yo byad la 'breng zhig gang khyer yang srungs shig 'od dang cho 'phrul ston cig sa pa ri wa ra nor rdzas la rak+Sha hUM phaT/ ces brjod yungs kar la
bsngags la nor la gtor na/ gang khyer dang/ 'od dang/ cho 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro// jag pa bcings par 'dod na/ rang gi gnas kyi phyogs bzhi 'am them pa'i 'og tu me'i gzugs yan lag bskum pa byas

la/ tshon skud kyis bcings la/ oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ che ge mo shi krin a na ya hUM hUM phaT/ ces bzlas te rkun mo la sogs pa jag pa rnams bstim la gru gsum du mnan/ yang na rang gi mal 'og
tu bya'o// des nges par 'ching bar 'gyur ro// de la sri'u gso na/ bdag lha bsnyen rdzogs par byas la/ de nas ma hA kA la'i gtor ma bzung/ las gnyer gtad/ de nas oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/

che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM shrI kA la ru pa hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags mdud byas la gdags/ gdon bskrad/ las gnyer gtad na sos par 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ bdag lha'i

nga rgyal las mdun du mgon po bsgom la/ de'i thugs kha nas hUM 'phros pas gang dbang du bya ba yi snying kha nas phar thim pas/ 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu des kho'i rnam shes dbang du bsdus nas tshur rang la thim

par bsams te/ oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ che ge mo pa shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ ces pa rgyal po la sogs pa gang dregs pa dang ldan pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// las gnyer gtad par bya'o// zhes gsungs
so// las kha tshar rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang las kha tshar bsgrub par 'dod pas nor bsgrub par 'dod na/ mahA kA la'i sham du dzam b+ha la

nor bdag dang 'brel ba ste/ bdag phyag na rdo rje'i mdun du mgon po bskyed/ de'i mdun du yi ge dzaM las dzam b+ha lha sku mdog nag po g.yas na thod pa/ g.yon na gter gyi ne'u le yod par bsam/ de la ye
shes pa bstim la gtor ma dbul lo// de nas oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len tra ye swA hA/ zhes bzlas pas mgon pos bka' bsgo nas/ dzam lhas bdag la nor ster bar bsam

mo// lan brgya rtsa brgyad rgyun du bzlas na nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzhan zil gyis gnon na/ rang ma hA kA lar nga rgyal bskyed do// gang zil gyis gnon pa de yod de na shin tu rid cing stobs dang bral bar
bsam la/ de kha sbub tu gnas pa'i steng nas bdag gi 'od zer gyis gnan nas yod par bsam/ rang gi mal 'og tu ling ga kha sbub tu gnan la tshon skud kyis bcings dgug gzhug bya'o// rang lha'i dpa'

dang ldan pas/ oM mahA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ che ge trig nan rbad staM b+ha ya nan hUM hUM phaT/ ces bzlas la gzir na/ gang yang zil gyis non par 'gyur// dgra bo lha dang dbye ba ni// sha chen dang ni khyi lud

dang/ gu gul dud ba la/ oM badzra dun b+h+yo yag sha yag sha rtig sna dza dza a nri mA ra ya phye/ de wa pha ga ca shag phye/ zhes bzlas te rang rlung phyogs su brdad la ling ga la brdugs na/ dgra bo lha lnga dang bral bar

'gyur ro// de nas rang nyid bsam pa gang yang 'grub par byed na/ sngags 'di bzlas so// oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ oM sarba big+h+nan phu ru phu ru a ta ya ho swA hA/ zhes bzlas na rgyal khams gar 'gro
yang gnas gang na 'dug kyang bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// gang bsgrub las kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ ma hA kA la 'di bsgrubs
na/ thams cad dbang du 'du ba dang// nor dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang// nor la yan pa thub pa dang// mthu che grags pa thob pa dang// 'khor rnams bsrung bar byed pa dang// snang ba zil gyis gnon la
sogs// yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung// zhes gsungs so// bsgrub pa'i yon tan gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyud 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
gnyan po'i don du bstan pa yin pas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su dam la gnas pa rnams kyis shin tu gsad la gzung bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ nor bdag chen po la sogs pa rnams yi rangs par gyur
to// dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// dpal mgon po nag pa'i dngos grub bstan par gzigs pa man ngag gi rgyud chen po rdzogs
so//// gu ru ba su d+ha ra dang yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya rgya rgya//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la gu h+ya tsit+ta so ri phri ta sid+d+hi stiSh+Tha na ma tan tra/ bod skad du/

dpal mgon po nag po snying gi dngos grub bstan par gzigs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gtum pos/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil
pa la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ ma hA kA la 'od 'bar 'di// drag po 'jigs byed chen po yi// las kyi rtog pa phyi ma dag/ dngos grub bstan par gzigs pa'i rgyud// nga yis bshad kyis

yang dag zung// oM mahA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ oM shrI la kA la ru pa hUM phaT/ ces pa ni thugs dang sku gnyis sbrel ba ste thugs nye bar byed cing/ sku dngos su byed pa'i snying po'o// de ni rgyun du bsnyen pa'i

sngags so// oM ma hA kA la yang hUM phaT/ ces pa ni las kha tshar gsung gi sngags te/ thun mtshams su drang ba'o// sngags snga ma gnyis la 'di btag la gsad pa de/ che ge mo hA da tig sna tig sna yag sha che ge mo

rbad rbad tsit+ta so ri rbad ma ra ha la dun myags rbud rbud rmugs tsit+ta breng shag kha la baM rbad rngubs rngubs dun dun che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ ces pa ni shin tu gsad pa yang dag pa'i snying po ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pas

brnag par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rtog pa'i skabs de dang po'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa ni// ma hA kA la mthu rtsal can de'i bka' nyan re ma ti'i snying po ni/ trag rag she re'u ma ti snying kha

rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes pa ni 'bod pa'o// che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ ha la rag mo re ma ti che ge mo myos rbad sa ma ya hur shag b+h+yo/ zhes drang ngo// mgon po'i las 'gor na// oM nri dza snying la yaM thum ril ril pra dus

la ya/ rbad bu ni shag snying la ya/ zhes so// de bzhin sbyar bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rtog pa'i skabs gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// oM dzam b+ha la dza len dra ya su ru su ru sarba

big+h+nan a ta ha ya swA hA/ zhes pas dpal ldan mgon po'i dza yig nag po las/ dzam b+ha la nag po ste g.yas na bI dza pu ra bsnams pa/ g.yon na thod zhabs/ 'og gnyis na gter bum yod par bskyed la spyan
drangs bstim// mchod dang gtor ma dbul bar bya/ sngags khri ru bzlas pa/ gang bsam 'grub par gdon mi za/ zhes gsungs so// le'u rtog pa'i skabs gsum pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
dmag chen po zil gyis gnan pa ni/ rnal 'byor pa 'am 'khor gang yang bsrung ba'i gnas su mgon po'i rten sku dgram la bzhag zhag gsum gong nas gtor ma bzung la bsnyen pa bskyal// des
nas dmag byung dus gtor ma gtang la 'phang/ dpal mgon po re ma tis zil gyis gnan par bsams na gang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// lam mam 'jigs par 'gro na bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed/
mgon po g.yon du bskyed/ g.yas su mon pa rnams bskyed la/ shul nas re ma ti dang gcan gzan 'brengs pas jag pa thams cad zil gyis gnan par bsam ste lam mkhar gtor ma gtang ngo// des zil
gyis non par 'gyur ro// 'gran sems can zil gyis gnan pa ni/ dpal mgon po 'di nan ltar grub na rnal 'byor pa de la bsam ngan gtong tshad la skyon 'ong ste/ 'di la rang dam la gnas pa cig gal che

bas/ dam tshig dang ldan par byas la las gnyer gtad cing bsnyen mchod bya'o// de ltar byas na rang bkra shis 'khor 'phel nor 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i gsang sngags ni// oM mahA kA la dam tri ni b+ha ra ha

na ha na gr-ih+na grih+na u tsa ta ya staM pa ya/ b+he ha phaT phaT/ dmag dang jag pa sarba bzlog b+h+yo/ che ge mo trig nan spur ya nan he hi rbad b+h+yo/ zhes bzlas par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rtog pa'i skabs bzhi
pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa ni/ jag pa bcing bar 'dod na/ khang pa'i phyogs bzhi nas sa tshom pa re blangs la/ bag phye dang bsres pa'i gzugs gu gu brdul du 'dug pa bzhin byas la/ snying khar

jag pa dang rkun mo sarba a na ya nan bya ba bris la/ rang gi dri ma ma song bar byas la tshon skud kyis sngags gong ma bzlas la bcing/ de nas rang gi mal 'og tu 'brub khung du kha sbub tu bcug la g.yam pa la rdo
rje rgya gram bris pas mnan la/ jag pa dang gnod sems can bkug la bzhag nyal khar skabs su dgug gzhug bya/ de'i steng du rang 'dug nas mgon pa'i bsnyen mchod bya zhing las gnyer gtad na/ rkun mo

dang jag pa 'ching bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ de nas dpal rdo rje gtum pos/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bstan pa nyams pa'i tshe/ mahA kA

la'i rgyud 'di bzung zhing sba bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rtog pa'i skabs lnga pa'o//// dpal nag po chen po mahA kA la'i rgyud dngos grub bstan par gzigs pa snying gi spu gri lta bu zhes bya ba/ rgyud snga
ma las sngags ma tshang ba kha bkang ba'i rgyud gnad du phyung ba'o// rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ shrI mahA kA la so ri tsit+ta tsakra gu h+ya tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon po nag po chen po spu gri snying gi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal

lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ dur khrod chen po mA la ya zhes bya ba/ gnod sbyin pho brang 'dus pa'i gnas mchog tu/ dpal rdo rje snying po gtum chen rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ dregs pa

can bran du 'khol bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rdo rje rnam thos sras la sogs pa rgyal po bzhi dang/ phyogs skyong pa bcu gcig dang lha dang drang srong rdzu
'phrul dang ldan pa dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang/ klu chen 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ bdud dang srog bdag skyes bu ging gnod sbyin dregs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs

so// de nas rdo rje gtum pos dregs pa dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang/ 'khor gyi nang nas rdo rje rnam thos sras stan las langs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i

bdag/ 'jig rten dregs pa'i srog bsdus la// sngags 'chang rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// mahA kA la drag shul can// gsang ba'i sgrub pa bshad par mdzod// de nyid bsgrub par bya ba gang// myur du las la ji
ltar rbad// gcad cing las mtha' brtul ba gang// ma grub spogs na ji ltar spogs// dregs pa'i la mkhan ji ltar brdeb// ltas ngan cho 'phrul dbab pa dang/ lo tog gzhom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig
chen po ji ltar lags// dam tshig chen pos bdag la stsol// ces gsungs te/ rdo rje gtum po'i sku la 'khril bar gyur to// mgon po spu gri snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang

po'o//// de nas rdo rje khros pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gzi byin 'bar ba gyur pa de/ kA la 'od 'bar zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag ched du brjod do// thog mar shes ldan rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas
bstan pa rmas gyur na// ri gsum rtse dang brag nag spungs// dben la byin che nags tshal stug/ rang nyams dben par gnas btsal la// sbyin gtor gtang zhing mtshams gcad la// nag po chen po bsgrub par

bya// phung sa lha khang rnying pa'am// sna tshogs sa la maN+Dal brtsigs// dri spos sman gyis chag chag gdab// dbus su drag po 'brub gnas bzhi// khru gang rkyang pa sor lnga spangs// phyi rim zla kham dmar po la// gru
chad sgo bzhi mdzes pa la// rdo rje rwa bzhi rnam par bgrad// dbus kyi 'brub gnas gru gsum du// lcags sam nag po de dag la/ ga 'u nag po kha sprad bca'// steg 'og 'khor lo sngags bkod la// gti mug
snying dang smug chen du// a mu ka yi ming bcug la// srog rtsa dgug pa'i rten du bzhag/ byang shar thod pa nag po ru// rgyu rkyen drug la gzugs byas pa'i// dbang po tshang ba'i 'dra 'bag bzhag/
nub tu khrag dang dug sbyar ba'i// zor gyi thod pa bzhag par bya// lho ru phur ba dug shing la// sor brgyad ldan pa gsum byas la// mon pa gsum du mnga' gsol dgos// dpal bshos 'bru nag me tog

nag/ ba li ta dang ar+g+ha dang// d+hU pa mar me dri zas dang// sgra la sogs pa rim pas so// de nas bdag nyid skad cig gis// khro bo'i rgyal por bsgom byas la// gdug pa can la bka' bsgo la// gzhal med rdo

rje 'phreng ba'i dbus// dkon mchog bla ma yi dam lha// chos skyongs srung ma la sogs pa// spyan drangs la sogs cho ga bya// thams cad stong la nyid mos bya// de yi ngang las hUM yig bsgom// de las rdo rje rtse lnga
pa// yongs su gyur pa 'jigs pa'i sku// rdo rje sdigs mdzub 'jigs pa'i tshul// de yi mdun du las mkhas tshul// mahA kA la drag shul can// sku mdog nag po mun nag 'dra// lag na tsan dan beng chen

las// nyi khri chig stong bdun khri dmag/ lcags kyi bya khra steng nas lding// chibs su dpa' bo stag la chibs// rol du seng ge dkar po khrid// gcan gzan gdug pa za byed kyis// nyams pa brdzis pa'i gdan

la bzhugs// las kyi mon pa nag po yis// tri shul kha T+wAM rtse gsum la// mi ro dmar po'i rgyal mtshan 'phyar// dar nag ru mtshon na nag po yis// snang srid lha 'dre dmag la sdud// bdud kyi zhags pa nag po
yis// nyams pa'i mgul nas 'khrid par byed// las kyi mon pa nag po gcig/ spu gri g.yas la tsit+ta g.yon// zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs par byed// las kyi mon pa nag po cig/ ma he'i rwa dung rab 'bud

cing// lcags kyi phur pa rdeg par byed// mdun na lha mo nag mo yang// dre'u la zhon nas tshub ma'i dbus// khrag gi thod pa 'thor bar byed// de ltar bskyed cing spyan drangs te// drag po sngags kyi dbang bsdus

la// mchod pa dbul zhing 'phrin las bcol// rgyun du gsang sngags 'di dag go/ oM shrI ma hA kA la triM yaM dza dza/ a mu kA ma ra ya hUM/ ye shes lha dang las mkhan dang// dmigs pa'i srog rtsa dgu pa zhes// rtsa ba
las su 'brel pa 'di// ma yengs rnal 'byor ldan pas bod// 'od dang sgra dang sku ston dang// rmi lam rtags rnams mang du 'byung// drag po las la 'jug par bya// gal te grub par ma gyur na// dam tshig

bshags la bsnyen la spongs// zhes gsungs so// mgon po spu gri snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ mgon po nag po sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje khros pa zhes bya ba des/ 'byung po yi bu
rtogs 'dod can zhes bya ba ma hA kA la drag po rbad de/ dgra bo gsad pa'i las 'di ched du gsungs so// mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru// brnag pa'i ling ga bcug nas ni// yungs kar yungs

nag skye tshe dug/ khrag dang sbyar ba'i thun bcas la// drag sngags 'di rnams bzlas shing gsad// oM shrI ma hA kA la tri yaM dza dza/ a mu ka mA ra ya nan/ mA ra ya sod/ nag pa'i dgra bo'i sha rgyus snying 'di thon thon/

bdud po dgra bo yi srog rtsa 'di chod chod/ nag po dgra bo yi srog la dza dza/ nag po dgra bo yi bla rtsa la dza dza/ nag po dgra bo yi snying la dza dza/ nag po dgra bo yi klad pa'i rtsa la dza dza/ nag po dgra bo yi snying rgyud

dbugs la dza dza/ nag po dgra bo'i sha rgyud srog rtsa la dza dza/ tsa ti ba ta tsakra hUM/ ma ti bya tsakra ni hUM/ baM ni ra hUM b+h+yo/ ma ma ling ling du b+h+yo/ ma ma cho las la gram/ ha la ha la hUM phaT/ dug khrag tsha ba'i rdzas brab
cing/ gsad cing dgug pa'i gsang sngags bzlas tha ma'i nu mo phur pas gdab// mtshan ma rtags la phebs pa dang// gnan pa yi ni cho ga bya// ling ka gris gtubs mnan tod gzhug/ lha khang sgo 'am lder

so'i 'og/ gdug pa yod sar mnan par bya// oM shrI ma hA kA la tri yaM dza dza/ ma hA kA la thar nan shar nan/ du beng ni dza da ra nan dza/ oM laM hUM laM staM b+ha ya nan/ de yi mnan pa the tshom med// ces gsungs
so// mgon po nag po snying gi 'khor lo gsang ba las/ gtad pa'i rtog pa ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje khros pa yis// kA la 'od 'bar drag shul can// rnal 'byor kun gyi mgon gyur pa// lha yi ded
dpon bskul zhing rbad// nges par gsungs pa 'di lta ste// che btsan dpe med mgon po nag po ni// sku la dar nag 'jol ber gsol// sku mdog nag po mun pa'i mdangs// dbu la gdug pa'i ral pa
can// mi yi thod pa dbu rgyan byas// sdang mig dmar la mche ba gtsigs// stag gi sma ra me ltar 'bar// snyan cha mgur chu mi thod dmar// zhabs la sag tig lham po che// chibs su dpa' bo stag la

chibs// phyag na tsan dan beng chen bsnams// gsor zhing klad pa'i rgyas su brdeg/ sor zhig rgyu gcig khong nas snying phyung zhig/ lha chen mgon po nag po khyod// nga la sdang ba'i dgra bo 'di// myur du song la rnam

par rgyob// smyo ru chug la 'bog tu chug/ lha chen mgon po nag po dang// lha mo nag mo dgyes par 'khril// lha mo gnyan dang gnyis su med// lha mo nag mo gshegs su gsol// lha mo nag mo chen mo ste// sku
mdog dmar nag ral pa can// g.yas na bdud kyi khram bam thogs// g.yon na nad kyi rkyal pa thogs// chibs su drel rta rkang gsum chibs// dra ba bdud dgu'i tai len bkal// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la
bab// bka' nyan mon pa nag po gsum// las kyi mon pa gtum bag can// sku yi sprul pa las mkhan ni// sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa la// zhal sdang mche bar rab tu gtsigs// zhal gcig

phyag ni gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum la// mi ro dmar po'i rgyal mtshan 'phyar// dar nag ru mtshon chen po yis// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpung 'gyed// bdud kyi zhags pa nag po yis// nyams
pa'i mgul nas 'khrid par byed// lce spyang nag pos khrag rjes gcod// lcags kyi bya khras rgyu ma 'dren// bla 'gugs mon pa'i dus la bab// gsung gi spul pa'i las mkhan ni// las kyi mon pa gtum bag

can// sku mdog smug nag chen po la/ khrag gi ral pa gyen du brdzes// g.yas pa lcags kyi phur pa yis// nyams pa'i snying la 'debs par byed// ma he'i rwa dung g.yon 'bud cing// sde brgyad dmag dpung sdud
par byed// srog gcod mon pa'i dus la bab// thugs kyi sprul pa'i las mkhan ni// lcags kyi mon pa las mkhan ni// nag po gsod byed ces bya ba// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa srog gcod
spu gri yis// nyams pa'i tsit+ta dmar thon byed// g.yon par lcags kyi sder mo yis// srog rtsa dmar ba rtsad nas gcod// zhal bgrad ral pa gyen du brdzes// gcer bu nag po bdud kyi gzugs// dgra la
rbad kyis las rnams mdzod// gsod byed nag po'i dus la bab// rnal 'byor kun gyi dpal mgon te// mahA kA la drag shul can// chos skyong mgon po 'khor dang bcas// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dam nyams
rnams// ma btang myur du rnam par sgrol// smyo 'bog khrag skyug gzer dang thibs// rims dal thang mar 'dar du chug/ bdud kyi skya dmag mang po yis// nyams pa dgra yi sgo non cig/ dam rdzas gtor ma
'bul lags kyis// rnal 'byor las bcol grub par mdzod// ces bskul lo// mgon po spu gri snying gi 'khor lo las/ las la rbad cing pho nya dgye ba'i rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje khros pa

yis// gsang ba nye bar gyur pa yi// gsad pa mchog gi las bshad pa// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// gri rgod nag po'i thod pa ru// rak+ta ha la lnga gnyis dang// rten drug sbyar ba'i ling ga bya// ras
sam rgya shog de dag la// sdig pa'i lto bar 'khor lo bri// dug dang khrag gis ngar blud la// 'khor lo mon pa'i tsit+ta gzhug/ dar nag gtums la thod par gzhug/ bdag nyid rdo rje gtum por bsgom// drag

sngags sbyor ba'i 'di lta ste// oM shrI mahA kA la tri yaM dza dza/ dgra bo nri mA ra ya srog la myogs/ tsit+ta khas rak+ta thibs hUM li yaM ling mA ra ya rbad/ yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang// drag po dug pa mda' yis
kyang// stong dang khri yi bar du rdeg/ zhag bdun sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// thod pa gdug pa'i gnas su mnan// zla ba gsum mam lnga ru 'pho// las 'di ya bag sha res grags// rbad gsad

mgon po'i dmag dpung dbab// dus drug dag tu shes par bya// gal te g.yel nas rtags 'gor na// snying gi 'khor lo bzlog cing dkrug/ de yis las grub the tshom med// oM dza dza yaM tri la kA hA ma shrI mA ra
ya ni// dgra bo'i srog la khas tsit+ta myogs rak+ta thibs// yaM ling mA ra ya rbad/ bcun gzir ar la gtad pa ste// snying gi 'khor lo dkrugs pa yin// gsang ba'i las su 'di bshad pas// zhag grangs
gsum las mangs pa min// mgon po spu gri snying gi 'khor lo las/ khyad par ma grub spogs pa drag po ste rtog pa lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje khros pa yis// dregs pa'i las mkhan bsdebs bya ba// 'thom

byed nag po bdud kyi gtso// shan pa gri thogs gsod byed ging// shu bo rag+sha gsod byed gtso// nag po mgo bdun klu yi bu// gnod sbyin 'gong po sgrol ba'i ging// srin mo mgo 'phyangs gnod sbyin mo// 'di
rnams bka' yi las mkhan te// 'byung po'i bu zhes byed pa'i tshe// las kyi gsod byed pho nya 'gyed// de yi don bstan 'di lta ste// sna tshogs 'bru bcud gser brdar la// dregs pa'i tshogs la dus su

gtang// rgya shog dag la 'khrul 'khor bca'// mgon po mkhan sngags bkod la// rtsang dmar kha la rab rgyangs te// drag po rdzas kyis brab par bya// dril gtor sngags kyi mtshon chas brdeg/ oM shrI ma hA kA la

tri yaM dza dza/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ dun ru tra ru thum b+ha ti srog la thum ril/ rA dza tsa ba la a shum me/ btsal breng shag ma ma trag rak+Sha nag mo ting laM tsit+ta thun rmugs b+h+yo/ nA ga hu ti nA ga du ru ha/ khrag thibs rbad/

shu la rA dza tri shaM dza yaM ling shag rbad/ badzra tri na sa d+hu kha thum tri nri hur thums dza khraM rbad/ ces pas nyin mtshan dgu ru brdeg rdzogs dang rang rang gnas dag gam// dregs pa'i pho brang dag tu gnan// mgon po
spu gri snying gi 'khor lo las/ dregs pa'i las mkhan bsdebs pa ste rtog pa drug pa'o//// de nas dregs pa chen po yis// sprul po'i sbyor ba nges bshad pa// thod pa skad 'byin gtang ba dang// gcan gzan

gtang dang 'dab chags gtang// nA ga klu yi cho 'phrul dbab// dang po thod pa'i sbyor ba ni// gri thod ja ril gnyis bsags la// phung sa gsum dang gnyan ra dang// brag ri 'gram pa'i sa dang ni// thod pa'i

nang du sngags dang ming rus bri// mig dang kha la dug khrag byug/ mkhar la sbas na sgra 'byin 'thab// bzhad dang khra dang 'ug pa dang// srin bya de mo kang ka dang// thi ba bzhad sogs sha khrag la// gang 'dod
gzugs byas mkhar la sba// bya nag 'du dang 'thab pa dang// sder 'dzings mang po 'bab par 'gyur// gzhan yang wa spre byi la dang// sre mo 'bar ba'i sha khrag spu// ma 'dres gzugs rnams

legs byas la// rten la sbas na nyes par 'bab// gzhan dag nya sbrul sbal pa sdig/ klu gnyan yod pa'i sa chu bsre// brten la sbas na klu gnyan 'bag/ de sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// khri gsum bzlas la smin
drug sba// de yis las grub the tshom med// oM shrI ma hA kA tri yaM dza dza/ ka pa ti rgyal hal hal du ling has phob/ byi sha tse ru pi khraM khraM/ du ling has phob/ ling ling spur dun/ shaM du

ling has phob/ na ga b+ha du na ya du ling has phob/ de yis nges par 'bab par 'gyur// mgon po snying gi 'khor lo las// las ngan dbab ba bstan pa ste rtog pa bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje khros pa yis// b+ha ri sha yi las gsungs

pa// phu chu rdzing dang zhing sa dang// lo tog 'bras bu sngo sna dang// lha klu yul srungs dam sri yi// ling ka bris la thod chen brnag/ rta dang rnal khrag tsan dug dang// ra dug ba mar mdze yugs kyi// 'o ma ma

'dres dmod pas gdab// bdag nyid rdo rje gtum po bsgom// drag po sngags kyis dbang du bsdu// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ drag sngags sbyor ba khri phrag gsum// rdzogs nas dug gi hom spar la// yul

bcud rtsas dgod ling ga bsreg/ thab gsum byas la thal 'jim gtor// chu rgod khyags pa spung bar bshad// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// oM shrI ma hA kA la tri yaM dza dza/ a mu ka lo tog mA ra ya hUM/ ra hU la ya

ma snying rag sha de ba piM pi/ de ba a tsa yaM tri/ sa nA ga trig nan/ myags sbur ya/ dza la raM thibs 'dus/ 'ur 'ur/ phroM phroM/ hril hril yaM shar nal nal ser ba drag tu phob phob/ lo 'bras brlag par rdo rjes

bshad// mgon po spu gri snying gi 'khor lo las/ b+ha ri sha'i rtog pa brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje khros pa yis// 'khor gyi dregs pa pho mo la// lha yi ded dpon ku ru Na// 'byung po'i bu nyid gtogs 'dod
can// ma hA kA la srog ste/ spu gri snying gi 'khor lor bshad// lnga brgya dus kyi mnar dus na// dam tshig ldan la thugs brtse'o// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ ces gsungs nas mi snang bar gyur
to// mgon po spu gri snying gi 'khor lo gsang ba las rtog pa dgu pa'o//// spu gri gsang ba'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la gu h+ya tsit+ta tso ri nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba thugs kyi spu gri'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje khros pa la phyag 'tshal
lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang na/ dpal rdo rje gtum po nyid las mi zhan pa'i 'khor khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa las/
dpal mgon po nag po ma hA kA la zhes bya bas bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas so// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pas
gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas bstan pa gnyan par bya ba'i phyir/ ma hA kA la'i rtog pa bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje gtum pos bka' stsal ba
ni/ nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams tshogs// ma hA kA la 'od 'bar 'di// bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa'i// de yi rtog pa nga yis bshad// dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// dben pa'i gnas su
stegs bu brtsig/ lcags sam kham pa'i spar bu ru// dkar gsum mngar gsum rgun 'brum dang// shing thogs la sogs bsham par bya// de ni dang po bsnyen pa'i rdzas// yang na gtor ma nyid la

brten// bsgrub pa byed pa'i dus nyid du// zla gam nag po khru do pa// zheng du khru gang ldan par bya// ban d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa ru// nri yi snying gi rtsa lag bcas// bdud rtsi khrag dang sha chang phud// khru byed dag tu
bsham par bya// las dus maN+Dal gru bzhi'i dbus// gru gsum phyi rol zlum po la// thod pa'i khol ma bdun btang la// rdo rje ra bas bskor bar bya// dur khrod sol bas dbus su byug/ zla gam gsum ni dmar

por bya// tha ma rtsang gis kha bskor la// dgra yi bdud rtsi rkang rjes dang// mchil snabs ming rus ling ga bris// gzungs thag nag po btags byas la// seng ldeng phur pas brtod par bya// dug dang yungs
kar sngags byas te// lig ga dag la bsnun par bya// gzhan yang bshos bu mda' nag dang// rim par bshams la bsnyen bsgrub bya// de yis don rnams mngon du 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal mgon
po nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dam rdzas bsags pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mgon po nag pos smras pa'i sngags rnams bka' stsal pa/ oM shrI kA la la rU pa hUM phaT/

sku'i sngags so// oM ma hA kA la ya hUM phaT/ gsung gi snying po'o// oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ thugs kyi snying po'o// 'di rnams bzlas na mngon du 'ong// 'od dang sgra dang ban d+ha mon// bya nag khang pa
'tsheg par 'ong// de dag dril nas las la sbyar// mA ra ya dang bcas pas brdeg/ bsnyen pa'i dus su gsung gi drangs// de rjes sku yi sham bu gdags// thugs kyi snying po thun mtshams

bzlas// yang na gsad pa'i las byed na// oM ma hA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ oM shrI ma hA kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ che ge mo mA ra ya/ da ha da ha/ tig sna tig sna/ yag sha rbad rbad/ ces so// bkra shis la tshan che

bar 'dod na re ma ti'i snying po ni/ trag rag sha snying kha rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ mA ra ya rbad/ ces brdeg go/ las 'gor na/ mon pa 'dis las thams cad byed pas/ oM nri dza snying la yaM thuM/ ril ril sbra lus la ya rbad/

pa ni shag snying la ya/ zhes brdeg par bya'o// nor 'phel bar 'dod na/ 'khor gyi dzamab+ha la'i snying po ni/ oM dzaM b+ha la dza len drA ya su ru su ru sarba d+h+rig nan/ a ta ya ho swA hA/ bzlas pas ci bsam 'grub

pa'o// nor la 'breng bar 'dod na/ oM ma hA kA la rag sa du beng ni rdzi sarba 'breng ba su ki b+h+yo/ bud med la 'breng bar bya na/ oM ma hA kA la ya bud med che ge mo hUM hUM dza dza'abreng hUM phaT/ ser bsrung na/ ser ba
pra tang ki ra ya shag phaT/ u tsa ta ya raM phaT/ ces gsungs so// dpal mgon po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bka' stsal pa/ bsgrub pa'i
gnas su rgyal ba yi// rten dang mgon po'i bris sku dgram// mchod pa dag gis mdzes par bya// gtor ma gsob dang rgyan dang bcas// rim par bshams te bsgrub par bya// de yi mgon po bka' bzhin
du// mngon du gyur te las rnams 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal mgon po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mgon po nye bar bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa// bstan pa bsrung
bar 'dod pa yis// bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed// mdun du hUM las mgon po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa// g.yas na tsan dan beng dang ni// g.yon pa spar bu dku la brten// dar nag

'jol ber gser sked can// sag ti'i lham chen stag la chibs// g.yon na lha mo re ma ti// drel rta zhol nas khraM shing rkyal// mon pa dmar nag sngon po dang// las kyi mon pa be con thogs// lce spyang dom dred

bya khar bcas// dzam b+ha la ni nag pos te// bI dza pU ra thod pa can// mos bsam bka' nyan tshul du bskyed// rang bzhin spyan drangs bstim phyag 'tshal// de la gtor ma dbul ba ni// hUM/ nga ni khro bo'i rgyal po

ste// lag na rdo rje rtse lnga 'chang// rdo rje'i lus la rdo rje 'phro// thams cad ma lus zil gyis gnon// de yis bka' nyan chos skyong mgon// ma hA kA la mthu bo che// khyod la dad pas mchod par 'bul// bdag

gi 'phrin las myur du mdzod// oM mahA kA la rag sha du beng ni dza/ oM shrI mahA kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ oM mahA kA la ya hUM phaT/ trag rag sham b+h+yo/ dzam+b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/ mon pa sa pa wA ra li i

dam gr-i h+na gr-i h+na kha kha khA hi/ zhes dbul bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// ma hA kA la gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mchod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor ba bsnyen pa byed dus su

las gnyer gtad pa ni/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po shrI ma hA kA la bdud 'dul gyi dbang phyug rigs 'dzin gyi srog shing/ rnal 'byor gyi dgra lha dam pa/ chos skyong ba'i srungs ma/ srin po lang ka pu rangs

grong khyer gtan nas brlag par byed pa/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma srin ma 'dul bar zhal gyis bzhes pa/ myur mgyogs kyi dpa' bo stag la chibs nas snang srid kyi lha 'dre thams cad dbang du

sdud pa/ phyag g.yas na tsan dan gyi beng chen po bsnams pa la/ bdud dang srin po'i dmag nyi khri chig stong 'gyed pa/ g.yon pa lcags kyi par bu bsnams pas thams cad sgrol zhing dgra bo'i snying khrag 'thung ba/

lho phyogs kyi gshin rje chen po brgyad dom dred dang stag gzig tu sbrul te sngon la rol ba/ byang phyogs kyi gnod sbyin brgyad lcags kyi bya khra sprul nas phyi nas 'breng ba/ dpal lha mo re'u ma ti khraM shing dang nad
rkyal thogs pa rlung nag 'tshub ma'i dbus na bzhugs pa/ nor bdag dzam+b+ha la dang bcas pa dam rdzas kyi gtor ma 'di gsol/ bdag gi 'khor du bcas pa srungs shig nor dang rigs brgyud spel cig dgra bo
brnag pa 'di sod cig ces pas gnyer du gtad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ las gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa ni/
bsgrub bya sgrol bar 'dod pa yis// rang nyid gtum po'i nga rgyal gyis// dpal ldan mgon po drag tu bskul// ling kha dag la thun du brab// rtags ni shing gcad g.yag gsad dang// sems can gsad dang
dgra dngos gsad// ling dang jag pa 'gro ba na// ling ga thod par bcug la mnan// de yis gzas pas gtan nas 'pho// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ man ngag don gyi le'u ste
bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bka' stsal pa// rgyud 'di mgon po gsang rgyud de// rnal 'byor nad pa gso ba'i tshe// sri'u la sogs thams cad la// rtag gtor bcas las 'phrin las bcol// 'di
bsgrub yon tan dpag tu med// rang nyid tshe ring nad med dang// longs spyod grags pa 'khor rnams srun// nor dang chu ma yan du btub// rnal 'byor gshis ngan 'gum mi 'gyur// dam chos sgrags nas
gtor ma dbul// 'di grub yon tan dpag las 'das// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i yon tan gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang

dag bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la'i bka' nyan ni// lha srin thams cad 'khor yin te// 'khor du ma gyur gang yang med// de rnams btags na las myur te// dngos su mon nam re'u ma ti// dzaM b+ha la nyid bsgrub
par bya// rnal 'byor bkra shis mchog tu 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bka' nyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtum pos 'khor

rnams la bka' stsal pa ni kye ma'o lnga brgya dus mtha' ma'i dus su/ rnal 'byor ma 'ongs dam tshig can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ dpal mgon po'i rgyud 'di gsang la yongs su bzung zhing bcang bar bya'o// zhes
bka' stsal pa dang/ 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba'i thugs kyi spu gri'i rgyud las/ yongs su bzung zhing gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// dpal mgon
po nag po gsang ba thugs kyi spu gri'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rdo rje yang dbang gter bdag la gu ru ba su d+ha ras gtad nas mngon du bkol te/ chos thams cad kyi bka' bsrungs su gzhag
go/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dam tshig la gnas par byas te bsgrubs na/ dngos su zhal ston par 'gyur ro// dam la gnas pas tshe ring grags pa thob/ bsod nams rgyal por 'gyur ro// zhes

gu ru ba su d+ha ra'i zhal nas gsungs so// mgon po rgyu dang sgrub thabs mi mthun pa dang rgyud dang bcas pa mang du gyur te/ rong gi rdza la thams cad sbas/ thugs kyi yi dam rdo rje yang dben 'phrul gyi gzhal yas

su sbas so// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dud 'gro sprel lo pa bong ring ba sha ser ba lus spra bas rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas las 'phro can 'ga' dang 'phrad de dam tshig la gnas par bya'o// zhes rdo rje yang dbang
gter gyis smras so ang/ dam med lag tu nam yang phrad par ma gyur cig phrad na yang 'tshig par gyur cig/ rgya rgya rgya/ a+thi+-i/ kha thaM////
rgya gar skad du/ mahA kA la shrI trai d+ha du b+hai ra wa nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po khams gsum 'jigs byed kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ston pa'i mchog bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal mchog rdo rje 'chang chen gnas kyi mchog dur khrod na bzhugs/ 'khor mchog sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po rnams dang/ byang chub sems mchog bsrung mdzad pa// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa yi// skal ldan skyes bu rnams dang thabs cig go/ de tshe ston mchog bcom ldan
'das nyid kyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa la gnod cing de spyod pa'i// dge 'dun dkon la 'tshe mang don ched du// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung thabs rgyud mchog gsungs// mos mchog sangs rgyas bstan pa
bsrung 'dod pas// log dad sel sogs rgyal ba bsam yas kyis// dbang bskur bstan pa bsrung bar rjes gnang ba'i// gdul dka' 'dul mchog nag chen dpal bsgrub bya// bstan pa'i don bsdus sdig
spang dge sgrub yin// de bas nyon mongs dbang gis gsad pa'i las// sbyor byed bstan pa'i don dang 'gal bas na// sdig 'gyur drag pas bstan bsrungs ma yin te// byams dang snying rje dge bas bdud
bsgral phyir// rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin drag po'i las byas na// sdig can gnas spor dge 'gyur nyes pa med// sems dge bkar bzhin byas na bsgral phyir dge ba yin// mdo rgyud kun las gsungs pa'i

don// kun rdzob dang ni don dam bden par bstan// kun rdzob ma rig rtog pas brtags pa ste// snang ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin// kun rdzob chos nyid don dam stong nyid de// dngos po ci yang grub

pa med pa yin// dngos po med nyid 'khrul la dngos por snang// dngos snang nyid la snang la dngos med kyang// stong nyid rtogs pa gom mthar ma phyin par// kun rdzob dge sdig rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams// med
min sdug bsngal rgyur gyur sdig pa yang// bde ba'i rgyu mthun dge la 'jug bya ste// dge la 'jug tshul sna tshogs thabs gsungs kyang// thabs chen spyod pa gsang sngags theg pa'i mchog/ thabs
mchog shes rab dam pa zung 'jug lam// thabs mang bsgrub sla myur 'grub 'di ltar bslab// dam tshig dbang bskur thob byas ma nyams pas// lta spyod mthun pa'i grogs bzang da 'grogs shing// dben zhing
nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas btsal la// gang dgos yo byad bsgrub sla nyer bsdogs nas// maN+Dal chos rdzas la sogs legs par bsham// dpal ldan mgon nag chen po bsgrub pa yi// thabs 'di las
gzhan dge sbyor sna tshogs pa'i// bya ba mang po spangs la mchog 'od sgrub// drin can mchog gsum dkon mchog gsum rnams la// khyad par can gyi skyabs 'gro lan mang bya// dang po gsum
dmigs byang chub mchog sems bskyed// rgyu mthun sa bon yongs 'gyur thugs mtshan las// bsnyen byed sngags brjod lha sku bskyed// lus ngag yid la sku gsung thugs byin brlab// mthu ldan sngags kyis

bgegs bskrad gnas bsrung zhing// dgos pa'i rdzas gsum khyad par 'phags par bya// byang chub mchog tu sems skyed cho ga bdun// sbyong phyir tshad med bzhi dang bcas pa yis// kun rdzob rgya chen byang chub
sems bskyed pas// bsod nams tshogs bsogs don dam sems skye'i rgyud// bsod nams tshogs sngon song nas ye shes tshogs// bsag thabs don dam zab mo byang chub mchog/ sems ni bsgom bskyed de

las gzhan gyis min// don dam par na chos kyi chos nyid ni// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yin te// 'khrul pas dngos med nyid de dngos brtags snang// snang tshe dngos med sor sor rtogs pa yis// shes rab

kyis rtogs bya de mnyam par gzhag/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis don bsgom/ de ltar bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes tshogs// mdo rgyud phyi nang thun mong mngon byas

nas// de nas thun mong ma yin lam gyi mchog/ gsang sngags bskyed dang rdzogs rim bsgom bya ste// gang gis stong nyid sgom pa'i ngang nyid las// snang ba rten cing 'brel pa 'byung tshul ni// rang sems paM yig

pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// lte bar raM skyes tshe 'gyur bsam steng du// hUM yig mthing nag 'od zer 'bar ba bsgom// de las 'od 'phros sna tshogs rdo rje bsam// de dag 'od 'phros rdo rje sa gzhi dang// ra ba gur dang
me lce 'bar ba bskyed// de nas b+h+ruMM las gzhal yas khang legs pa// lha yi gdan dang bcas pa bskyed par bya// dbus gdan mthing kha 'od 'phros pa// rgyal mchod sems can sgrib sbyangs mgon por gyur//
'od zer mgon po'i phyag mtshan kun bsdus te// tha la thim 'gyur ral gri thA mtshan bsam// tha ya ra na phaT ces sngags brjod do// tha las 'od 'phros don gnyis byas// mgon po'i skur gyur ma lus kun

'dus nas// 'og min gnas su rnam snang sku la thim// de yi thugs nas tha de mdun du 'byung// saM ta ra ni hUM zhes gsang sngags brjod// de'i rjes rang mthun tha de las// dpal 'bar mgon nag chen po khro
bo'i sku// bdud bzhi'i dgra dpung 'dzems pa yi// dpa' bo chen po khams gsum 'jigs byed pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis sku chen mchog/ gzi brjid bskal pa'i me ltar rab tu 'bar// nyi ma
'bum las lhag pa'i 'od zer 'phro// sku dang zhal ni char sprin mthing nag mdog/ phyag na glang po'i rgyal mtshan ral gri dang// dbyug pa dang ni zhags pa'i phyag char ldan// khro gnyer gnyer zhing

smin ma glog ltar 'khyug/ mche ba gtsigs shing zhal du khrag 'thung 'dzag/ sma ra dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// rin chen mgo skam spel mas skra tshar brgyan// rgyal ba rigs lnga dbu rgyan tshul du bzhugs// mi

mgo brgya phyed 'phreng bas do shal byas// mgul do dpung rgyan rin chen mdzes ba mnga'// klu chen brgyad ni sbrul gzugs sku la brgyan// ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// pad+ma 'od mchog steng du
sprul pa'i sku// lha yi gtso brgyad zhabs gnyis kyis mnan te// bzhengs nas gong zhing bsdigs pa'i tshul du bzhugs// de ltar dam tshig mgon nag cher gsal bsgom// de yi thugs khar ye shes sems
dpa' bsam// ye shes sems dpa'i snying na ting nge 'dzin// sems dpa' gsal dmigs de las 'khor bskyed pa// gcer bu pa dang ye shes ma mo bdun// rgyal chen bzhi dang klu rigs lcam dral lo// legs

ldan nag chen gcer bu pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs byed gzugs// kha T+wAM kha dang be con thogs// khro bo rgyan ldan ro stong bzhugs// ye shes ma mo kang ka bdun pa ni// nag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis
gri thod thogs// yi dwags gdan bzhugs khro bo rgyan cha can// 'khor gyi gtso chen brgyad po de la yang// nag po che dang ma mo'i tshogs// bdun 'bum bdun 'bum gyis bskor bas// 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa
dgus bskor// gtso 'khor dgu yi lus ngag yid de nyid// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab// de nas ye shes mgon nag chen po nyid// 'khor bcas spyan drangs byas te rkang dung 'bud// mda'

dar nag po g.yab cing sman khrag phyar// gal te 'khor bcas spyan 'dren tshig la ni// sngar gyi sngags mi brjod par skad ni 'di skad brjod// mgon po chen po'i bka' nyan gsung sdod ni// dur khrod chen po'i
gnas brgyad nas// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag po ni// legs ldan nag po chen po chos skyong gtso// lha yi dmag dpon chen po gshegs su gsol// kang ka mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas te gshegs// klu dang
rgyal chen lcam dral ma lus pa// dam chos skyong ba'i bsrung ma thams cad dang// lha yi dmag dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol// bdag cag sgrub pa'i

gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// e h+ye dz+nyA na mahA kA la sa pa ri wa ra sa dz+nyA dza sa mA dza/ chos rnams chos nyid gdod nas gnyis med cas// bdag dang lha yang gnyis su med mod kyang// 'khrul pa'i rtog pas
btags par snang// de las sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'khor 'gyur phyir// rtog 'dul gnyen por dam tshig ye shes lha// gnyis med yin te yin par go bya'i phyir// dam tshig lha la ye shes lha yi

sku// gnyis 'dres tshul du thim zhing bzhugs su gsol// sa mA ya dz+nyA na de ba sa ma tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ya hUM hUM swA hA/ oM/ lha min dmag dpung g.yul bzlog cing// lha dmag dkar po'i dbugs 'byin pas// dpal

'bar nag chen 'khor dang bcas// sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// na ma dz+nyA na ma hA kA la ya/ na ma:karma bya mahA kA la ya/ na mo ma tri rdA ki ni nA ga na ya/ de nas rnal 'byor rgyud bzhin mchod pas
mchod// bstod pas tshigs bcad dbyangs dang bcas pas brjod// de rjes gsang sngags dag par bzlas par bya// oM mahA kA la trag shar/ ma hA kA la sa ho yaM du dza/ gtso bo'i bsnyen sngags yi ge bcu drug

pa'o// bka' bstod sngags kyang rtsa sngags de nyid do// oM badzra yak+Sha prah+ma hUM b+h+yo dza/ yi ge bcu pa dbyangs can ma'i sngags so// oM badzra yak+Sha shrI ma hA kA li hUM b+h+yo dza/ yi ge bcu gsum pa nag mo'i sngags so// oM

badzra yak+Sha pa ta li hUM b+h+yo dza/ srin mo mgo 'phyang ma'i sngags so// oM badzra kaM ka ri kaM ka ri hUM b+h+yo dza/ yi ge bcu gnyis pa rdo rje pho nya mo gtso mo'i sngags so// oM badzra ro ru ru tsa la a shu ga me hUM b+h+yo dza/ yi ge bco lnga

pa 'phags ma nag gru chen mo'i sngags so// oM badzra re ma ti hUM b+h+yo dza/ yi ge dgu pa bdag nyid chen mo'i sngags so// oM badzra he he he hUM b+h+yo dza/ yi ge dgu pa rdo rje dga' mo'i sngags so// oM kling baM byin no snying la

ya/ su tri tsit+ta rbad/ ma hA kA la hUM hUM phaT phaT/ yi ge nyer gcig 'khor gyi sngags so// ma ni shag trag a ni rak+Sha sha tse tse srog rbud/ oM mA ra ya shig ma trig rak+Sha sha mA ra ya phye/ ma ni rak+Sha sha mA ra ya phye/ ma tri su

tri rbad/ a mu kaM dzi pa ta rbad/ rak+Sha shi ni sha ku ru thuM thuM rbad rbad rbud/ kha 'dar yed yed/ srog la rbad thibs rbad myos/ srog la thun rbad b+h+yo ya/ yi ge bdun bcu don dgu pa gsad pa'i drag sngags so// oM

tsit+ta tsit+ta ni ra ni ra ma sha ma tang ka ru sha/ yi ge bco lnga pa dgug pa'i sngags so// che ge mo aM ku sha dza dza/ yi ge brgyad pa dgug pa'i sngags so// oM laM hUM laM ma hA kA la che ge mo stam b+ha ya nan/ yi ge bco lnga

pa mnan pa'i sngags so// bi sha dza ra pi khaM du lang bi sha dza ra pi khaM du lang ha sod ya/ yi ge bcu gcig pa ltas ngan dbab pa'i sngags so// oM dz+nyA na ma hA kA la sa pa ri wa re/ i dam ba lin+ta gr-i h+na gr-i h+na kha kha khA
hi pU dza swA hA/ yi ge sum cu gcig pa gtor ma'i sngags so// de dag las dang po gtso dang bka' bstod kyi bsnyen sngags bzlas/ thun mthar mchod gtor gtor ma bsngo// smon lam gdab cing bskul tshig
brjod// ye shes lha mo gshegs// de ltar 'grug pa'i rtags ma byung bar du bsnyen pa bya ste/ gal te mi 'grub pa'am ldog pa'i rtags byung na/ man ngag ldan pa gang dgos 'byor byas la/ dam
tshig legs par bsrung/ bsgrub pa la nan tan bskyed/ de la ldog pa'i rtags ni/ sdom dang sdigs bu rmi ba dang// gcan gzan rang la rmugs pa dang// mi la sogs pa'i sems can 'khrug pa dang// nang

'thab dang/ sngags pa rang la brdeg pa dang/ rgol ba dang// khro ba dang/ mi sdug pa ston pa dang/ dud pa dang/ khug rna dang/ mi gtsang ba'i 'dam rdzab la sogs pa rmi ba 'byung// mi 'grub pa'i rtags ni

rta'am/ bong bu dang/ dre'u khyim du byung ba dang/ zhon pa la sogs pa lug khyu rmi ba la sogs mi 'grub pa'o// 'grub pa'i rtags ni slob dpon dang/ dge bshes dang/ btsad po dang btsun pa dang/ sngags pa

dang/ yul gyi gtso bo la sogs pa'i mi chen po mang du rmi ba dang/ chos pa gang dag rang la chos smra ba dang/ legs nyes kyi gros smra ba dang/ bden brdzun ji ltar 'ong ba'i snga ltas ston pa dang/ gzhan yang

mchod khang dang/ gdan khri bzang po dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ bla re dang/ dung chen dang/ rnga dang/ dril bu la sogs pa sgra dang ldan pa dang/ thod pa bzang po la sogs pa'i phyag

mtshan dang/ bya nag dang khyi nag rmi ba mang du 'byung/ grub pa'i rtags ni sngags par rang nyid grong khyer gyi dpon du gyur pa dang/ dmag dpon du gyur pa dang/ 'gro ba gzhan phyag 'tshal ba dang/ rang gi g.yog

byed pa dang/ gter chen po rnyed pa dang phrad pa dang/ rlung tshub chen po dang/ dar nag gi gur phub pa rmi ba dang/ dngos su yang khang sgra 'khrog cing gdung sgra 'tsheg 'od 'byung thug chem gyi sgra 'byung/ sku gzugs

bzhad pa dang/ rdzas las 'od 'byung ba dang/ dri zhim po 'byung ba dang/ dngos su lha'i mtshan ma byas pa rnyed pa dang/ mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sku mthong ba dang/ gsung thos pa dang/ lhag par lha'i sku

mthong ba dang/ gsung thos pa dang/ nyams dga' ba dang/ lus bde ba dang/ byin che zhing ting nge 'dzin gsal ba rnams 'byung ngo// grub pa'o// ye shes kyi nag po chen po 'grub na/ las kyi nag po chen po
dang/ ma mo mkha' 'gro rnams shugs la 'grub bo// de bas na bdag gis 'khor rnams kyi sgrub pa po'i bran dang g.yog tu gyur te/ ci bsgo ba'i las byed do// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
ro// yongs su brten pa bstan pa'o// rdzogs so//// de nas khro rgyal gshin rje gshed pos dpal nag po chen po bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi rgyud 'di gsungs pa/ drag po'i las la sogs pa gang sgrub par
'dod pa gang shis pa'i gnas su sa sngon po 'am nag po las dkyil 'khor pang du khru gang pa la rgyar 'dom gang ngam/ mda' gang gru bzhi byas la ba'i lci ba chu dang bcas pas byug dur sol dang

dug khrag sbyar bas dbus su gru gsum nag pos byug de'i phyi ru re ga zlum pos lan gnyis bskor/ bar du zla gam gsum 'byung po dang khrag gis dmar por bya/ zlum po dkar po la mi mgo smug po nag po sngon

po gsum spel ba'i 'phreng ba dang rtsang gis bskor/ gru chad ljang khu/ lha snam ser bo/ sgo bzhi spyi dang mthun/ phyi'i rtsig pa lnga rim du bya/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi lha mo'i snam bu dmar po/ pha gu ser po/ dra ba

dang dra phyed dkar pos bya/ lta bas kha dog sna tshogs par bya/ sgrub pa'i yo byad rnams phun sum tshogs par byas la bsgrub pa nyams su blang par bya'o// mthun pa'i rdzas 'bru sna dang/ tsan dan la sogs pa
bsogs te/ shing tsher ma can gyi mda' la khra dang 'ug pa'i sgro btags la gzugs/ dom mam/ khyi nag gam/ gri snying mda' la gdags shing rtar gzung ngo// gzungs ston las la gnyer gtad cing dmar thag

chad pa'i dus su ting nge 'dzin bstar la/ oM badzra yak+Sha de ba ma hA shrI hUM dza/ oM badzra yak+Sha ye ta li hUM dza/ oM sarba dza la ku lo hUM dza/ oM kaM ka kaM ka ro ro hUM dza/ zhes bzlas so// de nas gzhan yang mnan pa dang/

bsreg pa dang/ zor gyi las byas te myur du bsgral bar bya'o// bstan pa la gnod pa rnams myur du bsgral ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos gsang sngags kyi snod dang ldan pa las dang po pa

rnams kyi don ched du/ dpal nag po chen po rje mgon po sgrub pa'i thabs rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog 'di gsungs te/ che'o skyes bu chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar 'dod pas dam pa chos skyong kun gyi gtso

bo chen po bsgrub par bya'o// 'di ltar dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can blangs te/ byang chub dam par sems bskyed pa byas nas/ dam tshig dbang bskur thob par byas la rgyud rnams thos
bsam byas te/ sgrub pa nyams su blang bar bya'o// de nas dpal nag po chen pos phyi'i rten gos nag dang/ zhwa nag dang/ lug nag dang/ mchod rten dang/ gsung rab dang/ ye shes lha'i sku gzugs dang/
dkyil 'khor mchod rdzas rnams bshams/ nang gi rten dpal nag po chen po'i sku gzugs dang/ phyag mtshan dang dkyil 'khor bris pa dang/ nang gi dam tshig gi rdzas rnams bsham/ gsang ba'i rten skyes pa

grir shi ba'i snying ngam/ de ma rnyed na g.yag gam/ rta nag dang/ khyi nag dang/ lug nag dang/ bya nag gi snying dang/ dbang po lnga la 'am/ tshang bar ma rnyed na gang rnyed kyi snying dang/ de dag gang rnyed pa'i gsob
dang/ rta gtor dang/ bshos bu ri rab gzugs rnams bsham par bya'o// gnas gang shis pa dben pa bzang por dkyil 'khor legs par byas la/ mchod rdzas dang rten rdzas ci 'byor pa
bshams la/ sngags pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ bla ma dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa gnyis kyi tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i rjes su/ sngags pas sngar gyi yi dam
gyi lha gzhan gtso bor bsgom pa'i mdun du/ dpal mgon po chen po bsgom pa'am/ yang na dpal nag po chen po nyid gtso bor bsgom kyang rung ste/ ye shes kyi dpal mgon po spyan drang ba ni 'di ltar/ hUM/
bcom ldan dpal chen nag po gshegs su gsol// rdo rje nag po chen po gshegs su gsol// rdo rje mgon nag chen po gshegs su gsol// ye shes lha chen dpal 'bar gshegs su gsol// dam pa'i gtso

chen chos skyong gshegs su gsol// ma mo tshogs rje tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// chos skyong dpal mgon tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// oM hri:e h+ye hi b+ha wa te shrI mahA kA la kA ru Ni ka sa pa ri wa ri

dza hUM baM ho sa ma ya staM/ zhes bya bas 'og min gyi gnas nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la/ bcom ldan mgon po nag po chen po la// lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes ma mo'i
tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po che la phyag 'tshal lo// ma mo mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan bsrung dpal mgon rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams gzi brjid 'bar la phyag
'tshal lo// mthu chen drag shul che la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes phyag 'tshal la/ bzhugs su gsol te/ ye shes tshogs rdzogs chos skur sangs rgyas kyang// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs longs spyod rdzogs

pa'i sku// smon lam dbang gis mya ngan mi 'da' bar// sa mchog la gnas rgyal sras la snang zhing// sprul sku gdul bya dman la snang 'gyur te/ khyad par bsgral bya'i zhing bzhi bsgral ba'i phyir// bdud 'dul
nag po chen por sku sprul pa// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhugs su gsol// ye shes ma mo legs ldan nag chen dang// ma mo'i gtso mo rnams dang dpal mgon tshogs// chos skyong bsrungs ma mchog

bcas bzhugs su gsol// 'gro mgon rten mchog bsrung phyir bzhugs su gsol// oM ma hA kA la shrI dz+nyA na maN+Dal i daM sa ma ya maN+Dal pra be sha ya tiSh+Tha ya swA hA/ zhes brjod cing dza hUM baM hos dgug pa dang/

gzhug pa dang/ bcings pa dang/ dgyes par bya'o// de nas rang las sprul pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo 'thon nam rgyud gzhan du bstan pa bzhin mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ tshogs sam rnal 'byor gyi ston mo bya ste/ phyi
nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab pa ci rigs byas la/ mchod pa dbul te/ yan lag brgyad ldan gtsang chab 'o mas sbyar// dri ro mchog dang sbyar ba'i yon chab dang// dri mchog sbyar ba
byas pa'i byug spos dang/ me tog shin tu mdzes pa'i spos mchog dang// rin chen 'od dang rkyen las 'byung ba'i 'od// bshos bzang po dang la phug la d+hu sogs// ro mchog ldan pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs
dang// sgra snyan la sogs rol mo tshogs dang bcas// nag po chen po 'khor bcas mchod par bzhes// zhes brjod de bstod pa yang byas las/ dza hUM baM hos dam tshig la bstims te/ oM ma hA kA la trag shad
ces pa'i sngags kyang bzlas la/ de nas las la sbyar bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal nag po chen po khams gsum 'jigs byed kyi rgyud rdzogs so//// raM kr-iSh+Na dz+wa la'i 'gyur ro// 'di gsang sngags
gsar ma'i lugs yin gsung ngo//
rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la ni ka pA la nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po mi'i thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ nag po chen po dpal 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gyi rna zhes bya ba rab tu gdug cing rtsub pa/ 'jigs shing yang ba'i gnas/ mun nag chen po'i gling na/ baM ril thod pa'i mkhar/ rmang gnam lcags ngur mo

las byas pa/ nang bskal pa'i glog stong 'gyu ba/ steng na thog gi tsha tsha 'phro ba/ zhabs khrag gi rgya mtshor 'khrug pa zhig gnas te/ de na nag po chen po mi'i thod pa can zhes bya ba lo 'dren thams cad kyi sde
dpon/ spyi tshugs kyis gar bsams par skad cig gis phyin pa/ mdog nag pa/ gser mig tu 'khyil ba/ lcags kyi so yod pa/ mche ba lcags kyur gtams pa/ mi'i thod par sems can thams cad kyi rang

ba'i 'khor nang blon nag po drug dang/ phyi blon bcu bdun bkye ste/ 'jig rten gyi lha 'dre mthu bo che thams cad kyi ded dpon byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ 'khor lo

dang/ dgra sta dang/ khraM baM dang/ nad kyi rkyal pa dang/ mtshon gyi gru gu dang/ spu gri dang/ an d+ha dang/ shang ti la sogs pas khengs par byas te tshe srog la dbang sgyur ro// de nas de'i tshe 'jigs byed rgyal po
nag po chen pos/ mi'i thod pa can nag po chen po 'dul bar dgongs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'ga' sna der byon te/ baM ril thod pa'i mkhar chen po'i rtse la byon te bzhugs so// de'i tshe nag po

chen po des brtsad par gzas pas mthu nyams te/ stobs zhum nas brtsad pas ma tshugs te/ 'jigs byed chen po srog gi snying po phul te 'bangs su khas blangs so// srog gi snying po smras pa 'di lta ste/ hring dz+wa

la ma hA kA la ni kA pA la ye/ ra tri ha Shi ro ho/ kru ba ri ha/ bi tan ta ru ba/ yaM a ne yaM a ne e dza/ rag sha ru pi ni hUM dza/ zhes srog gi snyingapo phul lo// dpal nag po chen po mi'i thod pa can gyi rgyud mun pa
glog 'byin las le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dus kyi mtshan ma yis sdang bar sems pa la sogs pa la nag po chen po 'di nyid kyi las bshad do// dang po srog gi snying po la// rtags rnams myur du rdzogs
par 'gyur// mi 'jigs pa yi bzlas pa bya// gnas ni dben par bya'o zhes// lha chen nag pos bshad pa'o// ling ling pu tra 'am pu tra'i// shun pa bshus la 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'bag gi mtha' ma 'khor
bar bya// ga'u dmar po kha sbyar gyi// nang du khrag gis byugs nas ni// de ni khrag byug der gnas bya// steng nas ko ba dmar po ste// srin po'i gnas sam chu bdag phyogs// lcags kyu stan la gzugs par
bya// gtor ma phag rgod sha la bya// bdud srin la sogs gzugs kyang bya// 'brang rgyas sha snas 'khor bar bya// le brgan gur gyis phub la bod// zhag gsum bzlas pa thag gcad la// lnga yi nub mo tho
rangs 'ong// de yis ci bsam 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan ma ci yang 'ong bar 'gyur// 'jigs skrag pas ni zhi bar byed// 'gal ba sdang bar sems pa'i gzugs/ ro bsregs thal ba dag la bya// phag rgod

sha dang tshil bus byug/ dug dang khrag gis ming rus bri// de yi rlung rgyu'i gnas su gzhug/ spyi tshugs mtshan mo mdun du ling ga gzhag/ srog la mA ra ya yis bskul// de nas las la sbyar bar bya// 'khor lo kha

du slad bu'o// de la 'khor lo bca' ba dag/ pho 'khor mo 'khor gnyis su bya// dbus su zlum po spyi'u tshugs bri// spun zla nang blon byed pa drug/ sngon po spyi bor thal sbyar bri// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu

bdun// snying po lag sbrel dmag por bri// phyi rim me long la sogs pa// lag cha sna tshogs bri bar bya// spyi tshugs snying khar dgug sngags bri// 'bag gzhan snying khar yang ni bri// me long la sogs khram par

bri// dmod pa yang ni sna tshogs bri// pho yi 'khor lo gcod byed yin// mo yi 'khor lo bri ba dag/ dbus su nag mo chen mo bri// snying khar mo sngags bri bar bya// phyi ma 'bag kyang mo gzugs la// srog gi
dgug sngags bri bar bya// gzugs brnyan 'khor lo'i bar du gzhug/ me long gdangs la bzhag la brab// nyi ma bdun du 'khor lo bskor// nyin bdun pho sngags brdeg par bya// mtshan mo mo
sngags ldan pas ni// de yis myur du brlag par byed// dpal nag po chen po mi'i thod pa can gyi rgyud mun pa glog 'byin las nag po chen po'i bsgrub pa dang 'khor los las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas dus kyi mtshan ma yis// nag po chen po gsad bya ba'i// ga'u nag po bshad par bya// dur khrod gnas sam brag ri gnag/ nags tshal rtsub pa'i sar phyin la// mi gsad sa dang brag ri'i

'gram// lha khang rnying pa'i sa dag la// srog khang nag po gru gsum brtsig/ khrag dang dug gis zhal zhal bya// kha khyer rtsang gis bskor bar bya// kho yi pha mes mgo bo rab// gri rgod smyon pa'i thod pa 'am// yang

na rabs chad thod pa ru// ling ga ldan pa dong du gzhug/ a mu ka yi rdzas dag la// bag phye dug shing lo ma dang// phag rgod sha la gzugs brnyan bya// shin tu nag po'i skye gnas gdags// thod pa'i nang du
lding bar bya// steng nas dar nag gur chen dbug/ dme khrag gsum dang yungs dkar bsres// g.yag rog rwar blugs thun du bsags// yung kar dug chus ngar blud la// gsad pa'i dus su brab par
bya// sha chen gtor mas mnyes par bya// srog gi sngags la rtags rdzogs nas// sngags gsum bris la gsad par bya// skabs su gzugs la dug mdas brdeg/ de nas thun gyi las kyang bya// tha ma mnan pa'i

sngags rdzogs nas// lha khang mgon po chags sar mnan// de yis mA ra ya zhes pa'i// dbang phyug lha yi rgyal pos bshad// dpal nag po chen po mi'i thod pa can gyi rgyud mun pa glog 'byin las/ ga 'u gsang
ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas dus kyi mtshan ma yis// blud bu'i sgrub pa bshad par bya// dben par phyin te phung sa la// 'brub gnas byas te rtsang gis bskor// gtor ma rgyan dang ldan pa

dang// mda' nag dar gyis brgyan pa bzhag/ 'gal ba'i rdzas la ling ga bya// ling ge'i mtha' ma sngags kyis bskor// ling ga gnyis ni kha sbyar te// bu chung blud bu'i nang du gzhug/ 'brub khung nang du bcug
nas ni// steng du lcags kyu dmar po bzhag/ bshos bu nag po rteng du gzugs// phag rgod snying ni rta ru bzung// rtags ni blud bu'i gzugs byung la// me long phyar la drag sngags brdeg/ bdud mdas bsnun
cing lcags kyus brdeg/ de nas zhags pas dkri bar bya// zhag gsum bar du brnag pa bya// lha khang gnas sam gdug par gnan// thun 'phang dmod pa gdab par bya// dpal nag po chen po mi'i thod pa can
gyi rgyud mun pa glog 'byin las/ blud bu bsgrubs te las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas nag po chen po'i drag sngags bshad par bya ste/ kaM b+hi ra yang 'di lta ste/ oM ma hA kA la hriM/

dza ma hA kA la ni/ kA la pa ye/ ra tri ha shi ro ha kru pa ri ba ti dan ta ru pa ya/[xxx]rag sha ru pi ni hUM dza/ kA la ra tri dza/ srog gi snying po'o// kri sna de ba rag sha b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma hA kA la b+h+yo/ che ge mo tsit+ta rbad

na thuM ri li li/ rbad pa srog gi snying po'o// dgra bo ru pi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta ma ra ya hUM phaT/ sha ta ra ga sha dgra bo'i srog long/ mA ra ya rbad/ gsad pa srog gi snying po'o// kri sna kA la ra tri hUM phaT/ che ge mo ra

ya nan laM laM hUM phaT/ mtha' sdud mnan pa'o// kA la ra tri rak+ta sha tsa ra tsa b+h+yo/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ zor gyi sngags so// dgra bo'i tsit+ta baM long thun rbad/ rag thibs srog la breng sha rbad/ ni dza kha la phyung yaM

sod/ dgra gnad la dbab pa'i sngags so// ma hA kA la ru tra che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ ma hA kA la ra tri che ge mA ra ya phaT/ 'khor lo'i gzugs brnyan la bri'o// dgra bo gang na yod ltos shig khraM la thob cig rde'u
dkar nag rtsis shig dbyug pa rgyob cig ral gris chod cig zhags pas chings shig mgo bo chod cig slud bur shus cig lcags kyus zung/ mi reng sod/ nad kyi rkyal pa rdobs shig mtshon gyi gru gus chings

shig kA la ra tri ye phaT/ dmod pas bskor ba'o// oM dza hUM ni bi ru sha rag dza/[xxx]yaM/ pa ru d+ha d+ha b+ha shi ta kru ha ro shi ha tri ya re pa ka ni ra/ la ka ha ma dzar+d+hi/ sa ma ya thuM ril breng shag hu re thuM dza rbad
ya/ sngags bdag shi sa bstan pa'o// dpal nag po chen po mi'i thod pa can gyi rgyud mun pa glog 'byin las/ sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// dus rtags mtshan ma'i rtags bshad pa// 'jigs pa can gyi
mgo bo la// mgo bo ras kyis gtums pa dang// phag rgod mgo can 'jigs byed pa dang// gnas khang 'bag gis khengs pa dang// mgo la ras kyis phur ba dang// mi nag dngos su 'ong ba dang// mon pa spre

nag brid pa 'ong// rgya gar mon pa sha 'dod zer// 'od dang sbyugs pa dir dir 'ong// lag na me long thogs pa dang// khraM dang rde'u dkar nag dang// dbyug pa ral gri zhags pa dang// slud bu mi mgo lcags
kyu dang// mi reng nad rkyal sngon dmar 'ong// lag pa dag dang skra nas 'then// mi nag spyi'u tshugs 'gro ba ste// lus kun spu yis gang ba 'ong// mig ser so nag mche ba rno// rkang lag sen mo rno ba

zhig/ spyugs pa 'bod cing dngos su 'ong// de la dam rdzas sbyin pa dang// 'phrin las bsgo ba shes par bya// der yang nges par ma zad de// cho 'phrul ci yang sgyur zhing ston// nag po chen po mi'i thod pa
can gyi rgyud mun pa glog 'byin las/ rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas dus kyi mtshan ma can// nag po chen po bskul bar bshad// hUM/ dpal ldan mgon po nag
po ni// 'jigs byed mi bsrun bstan bsrung mgon// mi bzad gcer bu mthing nag srin po'i gzugs// ral pa kham nag spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs// dur khrod chas brgyad me dpung nang na 'gying// spre nag

sprul pa gtong zhing smyo 'bog gtong// tsan dan beng chen bsnams nas dgra sdang srog rtsa gcod// ma rungs lha yi dmag dpung bzlog mdzad cing// ru mtshon 'phyar zhing 'gal byed phung bar mdzod// sngon gyi tha
tshig dam las ma g.yel bar// sdang ba'i dgra bo dus mtha' myur du bsdus// dus mtha' brtul la tshe yi 'du byed bskul// thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i las mdzod cig/ ces bskul lo// gtor ma

bdud rtsir byas te/ mahA ka ra tri dan d+ha/ nri ka pA la ba lin ta sarba pu tsa gr-i h+na gr-i h+na kha kha khA hi/ zhes dbul lo// dbang phyug lha yi rgyal po ste// mi yi thod pa can zhes pas// 'jigs byed nag po chen po
la// 'ga' sna'i 'jig rten khams dag tu// srog phul rang gi bstan pa yi// gang zag bskyang bar dam bcas nas// de yi 'phrin las bshad pa la// rjes su yi rang mi snang 'gyur// nag po chen po dus mtshan

mi'i thod pa can gyi rgyud mun pa glog 'byin zhes bya ba las le'u ste bdun pa'o//// lha dang mkha' 'gros dur khrod phung lung du lung bstan pa dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud dpal nag po chen po mi'i thod pa can
gyi rgyud rdzogs so//// de nas yang dpal mgon po nag pos zhus pa/ bsnyen sgrub ston pas sngar gsungs pa// bstan pa bsrung zhing bskyang ba dang// 'dzin spel dkar phyogs dga' ba la// phan pa ji ltar
bsgrub par bgyi// bstan la gnod cing dbu 'phangs dmod// nag pa'i phyogs la dga' ba la// de la gnod pa ji ltar bsgrub// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ phan gnod

sngags kyi rim pa 'di// mgon po khyod la bshad par bya// A yur dz+nyA na A yu: tshe a pa na ye bruM swA hA/ tshe sgrub pa'o// ci 'dod dngos grub bsgrub pa la// kA ya wA ka tsit+ta gu Na karma sarba sid+d+hi tha hUM/ gsal ba

ma thon 'bebs 'dod na// tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ me ru man te sri to kan/ a be sha a be sha ke la sha ku tra pra ta nA ma/ oM yar rma ba ra de/ de ba na nA ga li sta badzra a pa na ya/ A be

sha ya A be sha ya/ bgegs rnams gzir gnon byed 'dod na// che ge mo aM ku sha dza dza hring dun a/ hUM hUM hring hring mA ra ya kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hri gu h+ya g+ha ma ma rak+sha dun tse tsaN+Da li mA ra ya dza dza/ 'gugs

pa'o// che ge mo staM b+ha ya nan/ sha truM a mu ka ku ru na na laM/ gnan pa'o// ma ma trag rag+sha/ ma ma ra dza snying kha rag nan/ nA ga nan phung staM b+ha ya nan/ badzra da tri tri yaM nan/ ra dza trig sho baM rmugs rA

dza ku li tshu du/ thuM tshu 'u thum swA hA/ kha ta kha ta ya/ mtshan tri nan/ 'gong po ya tri nan/ 'gong po sri nan/ 'byung po nan/ tsa ma ra tsa ma ra nan/ ma ru tse ma ru tse nan/ ya hu tri ya nan/ ha na tri tsa staM pa ya nan/ hUM

badzra mA ra sa tri dza/ ma zhung tri ya ma zhung tri ya dza dza naM/ dgra bo rgyab dang bral ba ni// lha sbyin dang sngo bsangs ba ti sha ya hUM phaT/ mi rgod kha 'ching ba lha sbyin gr-i h+na gr-i h+na/ A kan+d+ha ya A ka ra Sha ya hUM dza/ sngags kyi

bsnyen sgrub mthar phyin nas// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// e dang yaM dang raM dag gis// sngags gyi mgo yang drang byas la// mas yar bzlog la bzlas pa bya// de la rtags ni ma byung na// dam tshig bskang zhing

dbang yang blang// de nas las la sbyar ba yang// gong du gsungs pa'i sngags bzlas bya// dgra yi dmag dpung gnan 'dod na// ro yi ras la rgya gram bri// lte bar sngags dang dmag dpung ming// sna tshogs rdo

rje'i phyi rol tu// lam brgyad dag ni bris byas la// gong gi sngags ra kha sbyar ste// tshogs bdag gzugs byas tsa krar gzhug/ rabs chad nag po'i thod par gnan// pha rol sde yi so mtshams su// gnan bya
yang na dur khrod gnan// grog mkhar sa la gzugs byas pa'i// rkang mthil sngags bcug bzhi mdor bskyal// thal chen sngags bzlas gtor bar bya// 'gro 'ong thams cad sdom par byed// dgra bo dbye bar
'dod pa yis// gro ga ras la rdo rje ni// rgya gram sngags bzhin bris pa la// nag po bskyed la sngags bzlas pa'i// 'od zer gyis ni sems dkrugs nas// rang dbang med par 'thab par bsam// thun gyis
brab cing sngags drag bzlas// dgra bo yul nas bskrad 'dod na// skra tshil gzugs byas thod par bcug/ las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yi// gling bar mun par 'khyams par bsam// dgra bo gsad par 'dod pa

yis// dal e gru gsum kha lhor bstan// nang du dur khrod gsol bas byug/ pad+ma rdo rje sngon por bris// phyi rol gru bzhi dmar por bri// sbrang rtsi dgra gzugs snying kha ru// dmar chen ming rus bris pa

gzhug/ sngon dmar skud pas phur ba bsrel// de ni e nang gzhug byas la// 'gal byed bkug la bstim par bya// gsad sngags brjod cing thun gyis brab// rtags dang ldan na las la sbyar// lcags phye zangs phye rdo

phye dang// yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang// khrag dang dug sna tshogs tshad dang// rabs chad thod par bcug la brab// phur ba gnas lnga dag tu gdab// phyi rol thun mtshams phur pas gdab// tshad dang
ldan na rtsang gis bsur// gdug shing mda' gzhu tshad la ni// 'ug sgro bskyon la brdeg par bya// ma mo rnams ni zhags pas bsdams// nag po gcer bur mtshon bsnun nas// kha nas khrag dron
skyug par bsam// drag po ral gri so yis gtub// mi rkang rta rkang g.yas pas brdung// gtor ma blud la sbyin sreg bya// thal ba rlung chu rgya gram gnan// sa rdo la sogs gnyan pa yi// sar ni bden brdar
gnan pa bya// mgon po nag po smad las drag po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+ha me go ro pa ni sa d+hi b+ha ba ma hA tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spu gri

klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba bka' rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje srin po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag g-is thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje srin po zhes bya ba/ de'i sku
dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi 'od zer sna tshogs ston pa las/ 'jig rten khams thams cad na 'khrug rab tu 'khrug nas/ dregs pa thams cad brgyal nas/ chos nyid kyi don la dgongs pa'i thugs rjes dbang
du bsdus nas/ dregs pa can gyi gshin rje dang/ chags pa can gyi ma mo dang/ gdug rtsub can gyi srin po dang/ phrag dog can gyi klu gnyan dang/ gti mug can gyi sa bdag dang/ gdug pa can gyi sa bdag

dang/ nga rgyal can gyi rgyal po dang/ phrag dog can gyi klu btsan dang/ de las gzhan pa'i 'khor bye ba 'bum phrag dang/ chags pa can rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe dpal chen po rdo rje srin pos

sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar dgongs nas/ dang po gang nas byung zhing bstan pa ji ltar bsrung ba dang/ bar du bstan pa gang du bcas nas bstan pa ji ltar bsrung ba dang/ tha mar bstan pa gang gis
bsrung bar smon lam btab pa'o// dang po sangs rgyas bstan pa gang bsrung na/ bdud kyi rgyal po gar ba dbang phyug des dam pa'i chos ni bsnubs/ log 'dren gyi spyod pa dar du bcug nas yod pas 'gro drug

mun pa'i nang na gnas pa las/ byang chub kyi myu gu skye mi srid pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can rnams ma thul nas// dpal chen po rdo rje srin por sku sprul nas/ nam mkha' la rdo rje khro bo sku sprul nas/
nam mkha' 'brug gis gang/ bar snang glog gis gang/ sa gzhi me dpung dang khro chung gis tsher bar bkang nas/ gdug pa can thams cad ni brgyal zhing myos par gyur nas/ dpa' bo chen pos dbugs phyung
ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// dregs pa can rnams brgyal ba bsangs nas/ de nas dregs pa'i gtso bo de rnams kun na re/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig ji ltar gsungs pa'i bka'
bzhin du byed gsungs nas/ byang chub kyi lam la bkod do// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas
'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu 'dus te/ dpal bo chen po lha'i gtso bo// bar du bstan pa gang gis bsrung zhes pa las/ dpa' bo chen po ston pa dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas/ de'i ngang las chu bur gyi tshul du gyur te/ legs ldan nag pa'i skur gyur te/ dus ngan bstan pa byung ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas bstan pa nyams par 'gyur// ma hA ka la nag po che// 'di yis bstan pa bsrung
bar bya// lha chen dpal 'bar khros pa ni// thugs mgon nag po chen po ni// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yas kyi dang po b+he tsi'i 'bras bu dmar// gnyis pa ral gri bsnams pa'o// g.yon gyi dang
po rak+ta yis// rab tu bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin// gnyis pa kha twAM 'dzin pa'o// stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing// dbu sgra smin mtshams ag tshom ser// spyan gsum mche gtsigs 'jigs par byed// thod
pa rin chen sbrul gyis brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi stengs bzhugs// dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs gnas pa'o// nga yis sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung// dkon mchog dbu 'phangs bstod par byed// ces gsungs te
zhal nas 'od 'di ston to// oM ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs te 'jig rten gyi khams gul gu shig shig byed do// 'od zer de'i sna la rig pa'i rgyud sngags 'di thon par

gyur to// dpal chen po rdo rje srin pos nyid la nyid kyi che bas/ dpal nag po chen po la 'di skad du bstod do// oM si hib ha ha hUM kar tre/ kI li gi li ta ri li ri hUM ta/ bya ta la bri bri hUM hUM ka red min sba u nur

b+ha sa hi mu khe na tra/ ma ma ku la/ aM ge kha T+wAM ka sha ku de ba'i ni nan ra ka kar ha ra/ ka ma ru si li tu pa'i buM gaM ya k+Shi saM/ gaM ge sa sha pa ka man ta re/ k+She tra sol/ a pa dur tha phem phem sem sem ta k+Sha ra b+ha/

phrid dza ni bri ha ngi h+ni gar b+ha tsam pa ga kri tra rma la ma b+hi ta la spra kar b+ha ya b+ha yur b+hu sha hUM go ya ma b+he/ bi ta ka ra hra pra po g+ha ni ku ba ku laM phri ti ma ra ni mu grangs pa nan/ tri ha na tra pa ni he ra na shag ha na b+hu b+hi k+Sha

pra pa ra tu Sh+ma na/ k+shuM k+shuM k+SheM ti mu ra ni/ ka la ka la ra ba tri ta k+Shan tis dA pra du shing na tran de ka bi sha swa ka ha ka ha ka tha ner ni la dzi mun ta sa rad d+ha hi/ k+Shi k+Shi man tra de ha/ pa tsa pa tsa ha ha re na dza ti man tre/ sa

man+ta bi ga nan/ kro d+ha pa ra ma na/ sa man tha ha no haM d+ha kan k+Sha hra sa la ha ha ha Du ha pe ra ni sa sha ya krad sarba ta ya/ pa shu nuM ba pa ni baM g+han ha na d+ha pra ti d+ha pa sam laM phral ti aM ma b+ho d+ha ran+Da/ hUM hUM phaT tri tra ni d+ha

ni hi d+ha b+hu ba na ka ha raM su ka na b+ha shag ti pe la kra k+She pra pA la/ ka pi la ha/ ra dza ta a sha ste ma pru ke sho u pa ta ra khaM khaM khaM ge ka ba ni ra la la la ho laM ma ba ti rag ka da pa na hA/ raM raM raM ka pa te

kro ru ru ru rna ni ga re sha ra tsi ta tsi na be ka/ truM truM truM truM dA triSh+ti/ ku ru ku ru ti ku nyi ta she sha rush+ta TaM TaM TaM mA ra slob/ ma ru ka ya hi ste/ rak+Sha tra ta k+She tre pa la/ kraM kraM kraM trid ti pa ya/ tri tra ri pu ne ya mA/ ke daM dA ke shi

ta naM kaM kaM kaM pa ya ma lika ka li ti ka lo bA rA/ ka len tu ne tu b+ha ka ka ya/ tsi tsi tsaM tsa na be ka pra tsa la ti/ ka ra b+ha lo ka la ka saM saM saM sang g+ha ta ma ta sa ma sa ma ya swa na d+ha ra/ se ta tra uSh+ma na yaM yaM yaM ye di/

tsi shaM ya ma i pa ho pa ma lo ya ba ti/ baM baM baM bAM bA ta b+h+yo dz+nyA na d+haM di tan trim/ pra pa to lo ka pra tsa ra/ bruM bruM braM bi sha a bi/ ku ti tri ba ta b+ha yam shaka di ma ta yA/ pra pa to la k+Ta k+Ta ko naM k+Sh+ri k+Sh+raM ka ma ki rak+sha sa hi ru

ru ti haM pa k+sha na k+sha pa pa la/ kloM kloM kloM sna mu ti tri byung ba na min shoM bu dang yod phed sarba ta ya/ saM saM ba sha ha b+ha/ pa pa shu pu pu bi hri sa ga rang pa ma ya b+h+ya b+h+ya ya la man+t+ra ed ma tra/ mu ti ra ma ra ti ba la to ni ma tra

ru la khyi tra na ma pa la go so so ka la dza na ta na par tu su na ra tsa raM/ man tra nA' ma Sh+ta ka ya sra pa kha di ma na ma na b+ha ga ti yu ka ti pa na d+ha a tsar+ya/ yad ko sa ba ma ya/ su ka d+ha ri/ pa byung pa na dza/ ya ti nu A a shi

gi d+hi la k+Sh+ma nri ba la ma hU la ka ni/ da su Sh+ta b+ha bra b+ha 'dzin yan/ ha ha ya ni t+ya bya hUM baM shan ha ta ma na sa ha ya te be g+ho na dza lam/ zhes de ltar bstod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyi gong bur
gyur te/ thams cad bde ba la bkod do zhes bstan par rab tu gnas par gyur to// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ bar du bstan pa gang bab na ji ltar

bsrung ba gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor de rnams kyis 'di skad du zhus so// rdo rje srin po lha'i gtso/ tha mar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gang gis bsrung bar smon lam
gdab ces zhus pa dang/ dpa' bo chen po thugs kyi dkyil nas drag po rtse rab rngaM pa'i 'od zer nag po gcig thon par gyur to// 'od zer des 'jig rten gyi khams lan gsum dkrugs te/ slar dpa' bo chen

po'i thugs khar thim mo// thim pa dang zhal lhag lhag pa'i ngang las/ hUM hUM phaT ces rngam par bsgrags bas/ thugs kha nas mi'i lus la bya rog gi mgo can phyag g.yas na gri gug 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa thod khrag

zhal du rngub pa/ sku la gdug pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba/ rkang pa sa la brdabs pas thams cad rdul du rlog pa dang/ skad cig gis stong gsum rlog par mdzad/ log 'dren can rnams brgyal zhing khrag tu skyug pa/
drag po btsan du srog gi spu gri nyams pa'i srog gcod/ bka'i bstan bsrungs ye shes kyi spyan can/ nag po chen po'i snying thig 'di thon par gyur to// thon pa dang 'jig rten gul gul shig shig

par gyur te/ zhal tshig skad du ston to// bstan la sdang ba'i dam nyams dang// rgyu rku bla snying bsgral don du// dur khrod sa dang shi sa gnas// nag po bdud kyi nyi ma la// phung ba'i shul nas sa blangs la//
dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por byug/ de yi nang du thod pa ni// rabs chad thod pa kha sbyar te// dam nyams rkang rjes la sogs pa'i// gzugs kyi snying khar srog 'khor gzhug/ thod nag mi shas nang du
ni// yungs kar yungs nag tshe la sogs// brab pa'i rdzas bsags par bya// rdo rje srin po bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor zur gsum nang du ni// phung byed las mkhan chen por bsgom// don dang ldan pa'i gang
zag gis// bdun phrag bdun du thun gyis brab// gnan la gnas shing snying rje yis// yengs med par bzlas pa yis// dregs pa rnams kyi srog kyang gcod// sdig can dam nyams smos ci dgos// a la a la

a ha hi hUM hUM hri hri/ oM ma hA ka la sid+hi ya ma du dza/ oM ma hA ka la ni thuM luM thuM ril rbad/ tsit+ta la rag ni dza dza/ ni dza tsit+ta la ya ril rbad/ thuM ril rbad ni shag shag che ge mo tsit+ta la ya/ mahA kA la ging kar ra ya/

ging srog la yA/ snying la ya/ ru ru tsa la ya/ ma hA ka la b+h+yo/ mahA kA la che ge mo'i snying khrag la lcibs lcibs/ chod chod srog rtsa thum ril rbad rbud/ ces pa bsgrags so// gsang ba yum gyi mkha' dbyings
ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// shin tu rid la ke rus lus// dang po ral gri dang ral gri shul// g.yon gyi dang po mda' dang gzhu// 'og gi mi mgo thod khrag can// gcer bu skra grol spyan

gsum ba// ro langs ma mo'i dbus na bzhugs// zhal nas drag po'i sba los bstan pa bsrungs// oM ma hA kA la li te bi hUM si ni hUM phaT/ bri dza tsi ti la ya/ rag mo ni dza thuM ril rbad ni shag che ge mo'i tsit+ta la

ya/ ma ma trag rag mo ru tra mA ra ya dza/ maN+Dal cha gnyis mkha' dbyings su// dar nag gdugs dang khyi nag g.yang gzhi dgram// bla rdo gting du gzhug cing phyi rten nang rten bca'// dam tshig bsrung ba shin tu
ces// ma hA ka li'i rag sbyor ba yis// shar phyogs sha yi gtor tshogs bsham// byang du rus pa'i rkan dang klad pa tshil la sogs// dmigs gzugs ni khrag gis bkang// gtor mar btsugs pas myos
shing brgyal// bsgrub pa thon nas gtang rag gtang// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang bsad dang mnan// ngag gi nus pa nyams gzhug dang// ltas ngan dbab dang rten bcas dang// dam tshig bsrung dang bshags pa
dang// drag po thog gi rim pa dang// ma ra yas ni smyor gzhug dang// phung byed lto dkrugs las kyi gsar// de yis nga yi las sbyor rdzogs// nyid la nyid thim par gyur to// 'phags pa spu gri
klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ tha ma bstan pa gang gis bsrung ba'i smon lam btab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ rdo rje srin

po lha yi gtso// bka' dang bstan pa bsrung ba la// dam tshig gnyan po ji ltar bsrung// nyams par gyur na gang gis gso// zhus pa las/ rdo rje srin pos zhal khro gnyer 'di ltar du gtsigs so// bla ma sangs
rgyas dkon mchog la// lus ngag yid gsum dang sems ni spyi dang khyad par dam tshig yin/ mgon po'i thang ka rtag gser la// chos skyong sku yi dam tshig las// mi tshig gtam gyis bar ma chod// mgon po'i
drag sngags rgyun du bzlas// chos skyong gsung gi dam tshig yin// chos skyong srin po'i dgongs pa yis// mdun gyi nag po 'khor ba ni// chos skyong thugs kyi dam tshig yin/ dar nag rag sha'i 'phreng ba

dang// dam rdzas tshogs par bsogs pa ni// sprin ltar 'du ba'i daM rdzas yin// be chon nag po khru gang tshad// mda' gang 'dom gang khog pa ru// nag po'i sngags gsum dar nag la// 'o ma mtshal gyis bris la

gzhug/ 'gro na khyer la dgra byung brdeg/ chos skyong phyag mtshan dam tshig yin// rta nag khyi nag ra nag gsum// chos skyong bla rdo'i dam tshig yin// bla ma la sdang gsang sngags dmod// mi nag po ni lo rgyus
mkhan// tho phyir mi bsrel dam tshig yin// mi mthong mdze po mdze mo yugs sa yin// phyogs su mi bsrel dam tshig yin// dam bcas drag po byas gyur la// 'byung lnga'i bshags pas dag tshangs gdon// sku
yi dam tshig nyams na tsha tsha 'bum// gsung gi dam tshig nyams na klog 'don 'bum// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams na bshags pa 'bum// yan lag dam tshig nyams na tshogs mchod 'bum// khyad par dam tshig

nyams na srog 'don 'bum// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig gzhung bzhin bsrung// chos skyong mkha' 'gro gang la sprin ltar 'du// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i
bka' rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig gnas par bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ rdo rje srin po lha yi gtso// bskang dang bshags pa ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa las/
rdo rje srin pos bka' stsal pa// thugs kyi 'gal 'khrul byung gyur na// bskang zhing bshags pa 'di ltar bya// phyi ru g.yag dang lug gis bskang// nang du zan lug dpal bshos dang// spyan gzigs gtor
mas thugs dam bskang// gsang ba dam tshig gnyan pos bskang// de kho na nyid du bskang ba na// nag po sku dang rdza sa la// tshig 'dis rab tu bskang bshags bya// hUM/ mahA kA la mthu bo che// nag
po chen po lcam dral dang// chos kyi dbyings nas sku bzhengs la// gshegs shig bu yi gnas 'dir gshegs// bu yi gnas mchog dam pa nas// khyod kyi mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'di// g.yag lug nag po mar
gyis byugs// dar nag ru mtshon rwa la brgyan// phrag par dgra bgegs ling ga bskyon// gser skyems bdud rtsis bran pa 'dis// nag po chen po'i thugs dam bskang// bya rog gdong can la sogs

pa'i// 'khor gyi ma dang mkha' 'gro tshogs// snang gsal 'od kyi zhu mar dang// sha chen spos kyi dud sprin gyis// nag po chen po'i thugs bskul nas// mkha' la sprin ltar gtibs nas kyang// sgrub pa po la bu
