bzhin skyong// dar nag lcags kyi ru mtshon skyong// bya rog gdong can dpon dang g.yog/ thugs dam gnad nas bskul ba'i tshe// myur du sbyon cig mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// ro langs dang ni gcan gzan sna
tshogs dang// bstan bsrung bka' yi bya ra byed pa rnams// bskang ngo thugs dam gnyan po bskang// rnal 'byor bdag gis thugs dam skongs// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// 'phags pa spu gri
klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ thugs dam bskang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// thugs kyi 'gal 'khrul byung na ji ltar bshags/ hUM/ lha chen mahA kA la gsan cing dgongs
su gsol// ma hA ka la'i dal gyi bsgor zhugs nas// mkha' 'gro dam tshig gnyan po bsrung rgyu las// bka' ltar ma gyur gzhung bzhin rngo ma thogs// bsnyen bsgrub dus 'das phud dang gtor ma chag/ rtsa ba
yan lag dam tshig nyams pa kun// rdo rje srin po'i dur khrod tshogs la bshags// lug nag gcan gzan bka' yi las mkhan rnams// bya rog gdong can 'khor dang bcas pa bshags// bstan srungs mthu yi
dngos grub stsal du gsol// gzhan yang bshags chen mchog la rtar gzung nas// dus bzhin phud dang nang nub mchod rgyu la// mchod pa'i 'byor tshogs chung ste sku ma mnyes// bzlas brjod sngags tshig long
gtam bar du chad// nag po'i srog snying gnas nas ma 'gul te// bzlas brjod sngags kyi dam tshig nyams pa kun// lha chen 'khor dang bcas la bshags// yi dam rtse gcig gzhung bzhin sgom rgyu la// ting
'dzin rtse gcig ma gsol nag po bskyed// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// dar nag dag dang dam rdzas tshogs// bsnyen rdzas ma 'tshogs yan lag dam tshig nyams// nag po 'khor bcas
tshogs la mthol lo bshags// gnong ngo 'gyod do ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ bskang
bshags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas 'khor de rnams kyis/ yang dag dpa' bo la 'di skad ces zhus so// rdo rje srin po lha yi gtso// nag po'i mnan thur bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ thugs kyi
'od zer gsungs so// ma hA ka la'i 'phrin las las// bsad pa'i las bzhi drag po'i las// gnan pa'i bshed la gtad pa ni// sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang// bsgrub bya ling ga'i lhag ma dang// thod pa

nag po'i nang bdugs te/ khrag 'thung rgyal po'i nga rgyal gyis// dgug gzhug drag tu byas nas ni// sngags 'di bzlas nas gnan par bya// oM ma hA ka la sha truM che ge mo nA shA ya/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ mA ra ya mA ra

ya/ mar d+ha ya mar d+ha ya/ nan hUM phaT/ ces bya ba'i sngags phrag gcig tu bzlas/ chos skyong gnyan po'i them 'og gam// rang gi ma la 'og la sogs gnan// bskal pa khri ru thar mi 'gyur// dpal chen pos
gsungs so// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ drag po gnan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor de rnams kyis/ rdo rje srin po

lha yi gtso// rbod gtong nag po ji ltar lags// zhus pas/ yang thugs kyi 'od zer gsungs so// bstan la sdang ba'i dam nyams la// ma hA ka la'i cho 'phrul gyis// shin tu bsreg cing sdang bar byed// de yis

bdun du 'chi bar 'gyur// ro bskyed gsum gyi steng du tsha slang btsugs la// sla ta'i nang du gru gsum bri// tsher ma can gyi shing brtsigs la// bya rog dbang lnga dang rgyal mtshan 'phyar// bya'i snya don snying sha khrag
la// gtor ma chen po rgya chen bsham// rak+ta gser skyems dag gis mchod// ma nyes bshags dang dpang po bcol// dgra bo'i ming byang mang du bri// ling ga bya rog khrag gis bri// dmigs pa de ru dgug

gzhug bya// gong gi rdzas rnams tshogs pa dang// dmigs pa drag pos 'di ltar bya// oM ma hA ka la nA ga ma ra yA/ trag shad thum thum chod chod// rtsa srog nA ga gu le ci ba cig trag rag mA ra ya/ nA ga rtsad nas

gcod/ trag shad che ge mo tsit+ta phur// thum chod rbad sod/ ces sla nga'i nang du rdzas dang ling ga bsreg go/ nag po bskul zhing las la rbad// de ltar zhag bdun bar du bya// des ni brlag par gdon mi za// bya
rog mang po'i skad 'byin dang// mon pa mtshon cha thogs pa dang// ca nga'i nor slad zer ba dang// grangs nas thal nas 'chi bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub
'byung ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ltas ngan rbod gtong gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ rdo rje srin po la 'di skad zhus so// rdo rje srin po lha yi gtso// ngag
gi dbang phyug mi la 'das// gnad kyi gdams ngag bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ thabs kyi 'od zer 'di gsungs so// las kyi lha mo 'od zer 'bar// maN+Dal gru bzhi mnyam pa la// dbus su gru

gsum thur du brub// gting dang logs sor nyi shu gcig/ phyi nang med par nag por bya// de yi nang du tsher ma blug/ gang la dmigs pa'i phyi sa la// ling ga mdzub mo gang ba cig bya// gro ga shog shog gang byung

la// ming rus bris la snying khar gzhug/ lcags kyi kha T+wAM mdzes pa las// de yi snying khar gzhug par bya// gru gsum tshil chen mar me dkri// lo gsum dag la gtor ma re// lha ni ma hA ka la ste// zhal gcig
phyag bzhi sku mdog dmar// shin tu skem pa kem rus lus// g.yas gnyis thod pa'i Ti shu las// g.yon gyi dang po gzhu dang mda'// 'og ma mi mgo khrag 'dzag pa// spyan gsum gcer bu skra grol ba// g.yas

g.yon gcer bu ro langs gnyis// phyag na rkang gi dbyug thogs ma// oM ma hA ka la d+haM gi na b+ha ling/ a mu ka khA khA kha hi kha hi/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ che ge mo ma ra ya/ ma ra ya/ pho Ta ya pho Ta ya/ kha hi hUM

phaT/ ling ga'i steng du tsher ma dang// me tog nag pos sbyin sreg bya// mi tshig mi zhug brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas shing rtag tu bsregs byas na// tshangs pa'i tshe yang rlag par byed// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer

nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ ma ma tsam gyis sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ rdo rje srin bu la 'di skad ces gsol to// drag po ma rung

lha yi gtso// dam nyams blo snying bsgral don du// srog gzer nag po ji ltar bya// zhes zhus pa las/ dreg pa'i bdag po des zhal rngam pa'i nga ro 'bru tshugs su gzigs nas/ drag po tshar rab 'di ltar du 'gyur

ro// bdud kyi nyi ma gung la// byang gi phyogs nas sa slangs la// maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi'i tshad// dug khrag bsres pa'i chag chag gdab// rabs chad nag po'i thod pas ni// dbang po lnga dang ma bral

ba// dgra phyogs kha ltas dbus su gzhag/ de yi nang du blug pa ni// rta khrag mi khrag bya rog khrag dang lug gi khrag/ tsan dug ra dug thar nur la sogs blugs// gru gsum zur la rtsang dmar gsum// bla srog

'khor lo 'di ltar bri// gro ga shog shog gang rung la// ya khab ma khab gri gug rtsibs// rtsibs la pho mo bsnol ba bri// mu khyud drag po'i sngags rgod kyis// bskor zhing myos byed khu bas 'khor lo byug/ kha sbyar
rtsangs kyi kha la bskyon// nyi shu rtsa gcig srin mo 'gros// bkra shis sku dkar sa la na// bzang drug gi wang tsan dan dri la sogs// gla rtsi dag gi chus bkrus la// bya rog gdong can sku gzugs
bsham// stegs bu bcas la zur la gzugs// mkha' 'gro ma yi sku gzugs ni// stegs bu bcas la logs la gzugs// de yi mtha' mar dgod pa ni// nang rten gsang rten rnams kyang dgod/ rtag gtor
rgyun gtor rim pas dgod// sha chen dam dus tshil chen sran// dug dang gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi 'chad par gtang// steng nas dar nag bla ri dbub// bdag nyid bde ba'i stan 'dug ste// ra don nag po

yungs dkar yungs nag dang// lto dkrugs drag po srog gzer sngags// khri tsho gcig tu bzlas pa bya// de nas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// drag sngags pho mo phyed byas la// nyin gyi las su pho sngags bzlas// mtshan
gyis las su mo sngags bzlas// thun yungs kar nag thod pa'i nang du blugs// bdag nyid dgongs pa bstan pa ni// ye shes mgon por bsgom byas la// gdug pa'i srog gzer 'di ltar bzlas// rbud ril thuM

dza rag kha dza du ma/ chod rtsa srog rbad ril thum ya ti chod chod/ lcib lcib/ la khrag snying la thuM la ka che ge mo la ka ka ha nri la ha/ b+h+yo ya la ka ha ma la tsu ru ru ka ha ma oM/ ya la snying la ka ya ma oM/ la ya srog gi

ya ra ka ka la/ ging drag po pho'i srog gzer yin/ dza ya ra ma ya la ta phaT/ hUM bye mA ra/ tra ru mo tsi ni tsa ru ma trag ru b+hu mo tshe mo shag b+hi ha trag ru/ rag sraM ma ni rbad ril thuM dza ni/ mgon po yab yum gyi lto
dkrug mo rag li ka ha trag ma ya/ badzra ni ma oM/ khrag skyug gzer nas drag sngags yin// ces bzlas pa las mgon po yab yum gyi lto dkrugs/ las mgon yab yum gdug pa'i 'od zer thun la phog/ thun
la dug rlangs byung bas/ 'khor lo gri gug nang 'thabs pas/ dam nyams nyal gyis song bar bsam/ nyin mo pho sngags nub mo sngags// nyin mo pho thun nub mo thun// nyin mo bcol zhing nub mo bsgrags// nyi

shu rtsa gcig thim gyur na// tshangs pa'i tshe yang rlag par 'gyur// byang sems bsgom pas ma byas na// rang srog gcod par the tshom med// grub nas thun khrag dgra la 'phang// ling ga 'khor lo bcas pa de// lha
khang 'dre can dag tu mnan// 'dur shing yan chad rdzogs pa yin// ces gsungs so// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ srog gzer lto dkrugs ky-i le'u ste
bcu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis/ las kyi srin po la 'di skad zhus so// dregs pa'i bdag po lha yi gtso// ting 'dzin dgongs pa ji ltar gsal// zhes zhus pas/ rang gi rig pas rang la
phab// bsgom pa'i rim pa gang byed kyang// rang gi thugs la hUM la sngags bskor bar bsams la/ zhi ba la yi ge kha dog dkar po/ rang gi zhal nas mgon po'i zhal du zhugs par bsam/

mgon po'i thugs kha nas brgyud pa la zhi ba'i las bcol ba la mgon pos mi snyel ba dang/ rab tu gdon gang zhi bar byed pas zhi ba dang rang gi thugs kha nas brgyud pa des/ rang gi nyon mongs pa zhi bar

bsam mo// rgyas pa'i dus su yi ge ser po/ rang gi rgyal pa'i las bcol ba la mi bsnyel ba rang gi thugs kha nas 'khor ba'i dus su/ rang gi tshe dang dpal la sogs rgyas par bsam/ dbang gi dus su kha dog
dmar po/ mgon po'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs par bsam/ mgon po thugs nas 'khor dus su dbang gi las bcol ba la mi bsnyel bar bsam/ bar du 'khor dus su gang dbang du bya ba/ rgyal po la
sogs pa dbang du gyur bar bsam/ rang gi thugs kha nas rgyu dus su/ gang la dbang byed pa dbang du gyur par bsam/ mngon spyod kyi dus su yi ge kha dog nag po/ 'khor lugs dbang dang 'dra/ mgon
po'i thugs kha nas 'khor ba'i dus su/ mngon spyod kyi las bcol ba las mi bsnyel bar bsam/ bar du 'khor ba'i tshe dgra bgegs la sogs pa rnams bsad cing bsgral bar bsam/ rang gi thugs kha nas
'khor ba'i dus su rang gi bar chod zhi bar bsam/ zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ dgongs pa 'phro 'du'i le'u ste bcu cig
pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis dregs pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces zhus so// las kyi gtso bo rten gyi rim pa gang la bgyi zhus pas/ thugs gtad ba'i ting 'dzin la bzhugs te/ phyi nang

gsang ba'i rten la/ phyi rten ni lug pho dang g.yag nag po'i rwa la snying po bris la rten du gzugs/ nang rten mda' dang ngar nag po la snying po bris sngags dang bcas pas bcing/ gsang rten drag sngags bzhi/ gri

rgod g.yul du shi ba'i snying gi nang du srog gi snying po dril/ dar nag dril la lus la bcang/ de kho na nyid kyi rten bca' ba ni/ bsgrub thabs sbong len mi bya/ dam rdzas la thugs thub mi bya/ sngags la sel mi
gzhug nges ni lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ rten gong dris kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de
nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad zhus so// dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs 'gro ba'i mgon// nag po chen po brten 'dod pa'i// gtor ma'i rim pa ji ltar lags// nyon cig bka' 'khor las mkhan
rnams// gtor ma'i rim pa 'di lta ste// sha lnga bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// nya sha chang dang sran ma dang// nag po la sogs gtor ma'i rgyu// ji ltar 'byor tshogs che chung gis// thod pa la sogs snod du
blugs// me tog nag po la sogs pa'i// mchod pa dag ni rgya chen bsham// byin rlabs spyi dang mthun par bya'o// rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gnas pa yis// mdun du nag po la sogs bskyed// ye shes gzhug
dang gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs// rdzas ni hUM du gyur pa las// rdo rje hUM gis mtshan par bsam// dngos su mchod pa rgya chen bsham// yid kyi mchod pa 'di ltar dmigs// hUM gi 'od zer gtor ma la

gzugs par bsam dar nag bla re rgyal mtshan 'phyar// rnga sgra dril sgra cang te'u// bstod pa dag gis rgyas par bstod// sngags 'dis zhal du dbul bar bya// oM ma hA kA la sha sa na e ma ka ri e baM ta ya ba sa

tsi/ ma ko la a yaM i daM rat+na tra ya a pa ka ri ya ri ya ti tra trig dz+nyA sma ra si d+haM/ i ma dus ta sa ha/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ g+h+ri Na g+h+ri Na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di naM me ge na sarba duSh+tan ma ra
ya hUM phaT/ bod rbad gsad gsum la gtor sngags btags la dbul/ zhi rgyas dbang gi 'phrin las bcol/ sa mun dzas gshegs su gsol/ nag po chen ba'i rgyud 'di la rtag tu brtson par bya/ rang nyid skad
ci lhar bskyed la// bde mchog sku la dmigs pa gtad// de yi bar chod zhi bar 'gyur// sems bskyed drag po sngon 'gro bya// yi 'bru dag gis byin gyis brlabs// des ni bdud rtsir gyur pa'o// gtor ma'i
mdun du 'khor bcas dmigs// ye shes sems dpa' dbyer med par// 'di yis lan gsum brjod la dbul// oM ma hA kA la i daM b+ha ling kha kha khA hi khA hi hUM phaT/ rang nyid gang 'dod gsol ba
gdab// gtor ma 'di la brtson byas nas// bde mchog sku yi dngos grub thob// badzra muM gyis gshegs su gsol// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ gtor
ma dbul ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas 'dus ba'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dregs pa'i bdag po lha yi lha// rtags kyi rim pa ji ltar lags/ zhus pas/ dregs pa'i
bdag po des bka' stsal pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ltar du bstan to// rtags kyi rim pa 'di ltar 'dod// bsnyen pa'i rtags dang bsgrub pa'i rtags// drag po mthu yi rtags su bshad// sgom sgrub bsnyen pa'i

rtags bstan pa// yid 'ong 'du tshul nyams dga' dang// dri zhim lung ston sgra snyan thos dang me tog 'thu// de rnams byung nas sgrub pa brtsam// sgrub pa'i dus ni 'di ltar ston// rab tu sku ston 'bring thun khol
ba yin// tha ma gtor ma lud pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo// bran sran rta dang mdzo dang dre nag dang// rnga mo seng ge dom la sogs pa nag/ nag po bdud kyi cho 'phrul ci yang 'byung ba'o// drag po mthu

ltas 'di ltar 'byung ba'o// khang sgra 'khor dang dung sgra 'tshig/ bya nag babs shing khyi nag za// rnga brdung dril bu dkrol ba dang// dung 'bud ru dar 'phyar ba dang// de la sogs pa mang po byung ba'o// 'jigs
pa'i bsam pa bya mi dgos// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud las/ rtags kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams
kyis/ dregs pa'i bdag po la 'di skad zhus// nag po chen po'i bka' ni ji ltar bsgo// zhes zhus pas/ spyan 'bru tshugs kyis gsungs so// nyid la nyid khrol te nag po chen po khyod kyis sngon dam bcas ba
bzhin du/ dam las ma 'da' bar khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa rnams sngon dam bcas pa da sgrol la/ gtor ma bzhes shig ma hA ka la khrag 'thung gi rgyal po/ nag po stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba/
sha za 'bum gyis bskor ba/ ma mo bye ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba/ bstan pa'i bka' bsrung/ daM nyams kyi srog gcod/ rigs 'dzin gyi srog shing/ rnal 'byor gyi dgra bla/ dug gsum gyi sman pa/ gtsug lag

khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi bsrung ma/ bdag dang rnal 'byor srungs shig tshe dang dbang phyug spel cig dpal dang 'byor pa sgrub cig 'khor dang gang zag skyong zhig ces gsungs so// 'phags pa spu tri nag po

dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ 'phrin las bcol ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de skad gsungs pa'i ngang nas nam mkha' la 'brug dang thog dang/ bar snang la glog dang 'od/ sa gzhi la me

dang rlung gi cho 'phrul bstan nas/ nyid la nyid 'di ltar bstod do// dpal ldan nag po chen po lha yi gtso// 'jigs su rung ba lha yi lha// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis bsrungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod

kyis bstod// ces mi mngon par gyur to// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ nyid la nyid kyis che ba bstan de las mkhan la bstan pa gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu
drug pa'o//// de nas 'dul pa'i 'khor de rnams/ gong du bka' rgyud gsang ba'i gdam pas thugs tshim nas 'di skad ces gsol to// lha las lhar gyur lha yi lha// 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje
can// bstan pa yun du gnas par mdzod// legs so legs so rigs kyi bu// zhes bstod nas/ thal mo spyi bor sbyar te/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams gtso bo'i sku la rdo kha len la lcags 'dus pa'i tshul du thim
par gyur to/ 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// 'phags pa spu gri klad gzer nag po

dngos grub 'byung ba'i bka' rgyud chen po rdzogs so//// rjes pad+mas mdzad pa dgra bgegs kag langs su byung ba glo bur du dkrugs la/ skyin thang btsan thabs su gtang ba la/ oM ma hA kA la b+han dza/ sa
sros nas lag pas g.yobs kyin zhag bdun sngags bzlas bzhag la/ de'i steng du bshos bu gru gsum nag po cig gzhag srog sngags bri/ de nas sha dgab/ ba tsha rig po cig mun nag la khyi'am/ lug gam/

nag po sogs pa'i sha ba kogs la mon pa nag po nor la ngan gyis shul du rgyug breng breng/ nga yi nor khyer la shog/ des nas rang la a tsa ra yong ngo// nga gang du 'gro zer nas 'ong ngo// de nas rang mnos sar
rbad do// nor bre gang shul du yang phyin nas bkug nas yong ngo// rgya nas bod du 'gyur ba zab bo// a+thi+-i////

rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la su tra g+ha b+hi ra tan+d+ra/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po sa g.yo ba'i rgyud/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 'jigs shing skyi

g.ya' ba'i gnas/ 'jig rten slab byed ces bya ba na/ sa g.yos chen po dus rtag tu 'ong ba/ mun pa gling bzhi glog 'khyug pa/ 'brug rtag tu ldir ba/ de lta bu'i gnas nag po chen po shri mig dmar zhes bya ba skye
'gro thams cad kyi dbugs la mnga' mdzad pa/ 'jig rten phung bar byed pa gcig bzhugs pa las/ las dang nas nga sha 'dod khrag 'dod zer ba gcig yod pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar

dgongs nas/ dbu yi gtsug tor nas khro bo dbu stong mnga' ba/ phyag stong yod pa/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag brgya yod pa cig byung nas/ des nag po btul nas dam la btags te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung

bar khas blangs so// nag po chen pos g.yo ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// de nas rang nyid dam las mi 'da' ba'i don du dam tshig bsre ba'i srog rnams phul lo// kye/ dpa' bo chen po

'jigs pa'i nga ro can// bdag gi sgrub pa'i dus tshod ni// gza' ni phur bu dmag dpon dang// skar ma lag sor dbyug gu sme nag po// nyi ma bdud kyi nyi ma la// dus tshod tho rang stag gi dus// de dus rnal
'byor dam can gyis// mi gsad phung shul sa dag la// dkyil 'khor 'brub khung gru gsum pa// nang du dug khrag sol bas byugs// de stengs rtsang dmar rtse nag bdug/ bdun gzugs zag pa

zad pa'i dgra rdzas la// a mu ka yi ru ba bca'// ming rus bris la snying khar ru pa bcas// ming rus bris la snying khar gzhug/ gu gul dud bas lha dang dbye// de nas dri dgod thod par gzhug/ thod pa gru
gsum dbus su gzhug/ gdug pa'i phur pa steng nas gzir// bdag rang mgon po nag por bsgom// nag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// dang po gri gug thod pas te// de 'og sta re zhags pa'o// nag po chen
pos g.yo ba'i rgyud las// rdzas dang lha bsgom pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang smras pa/ bdag gi srog gi snying po 'di// mthu stobs can la dbul lags kyis// dpa' bo chen pos byin gyis

rlabs// oM ma hA kA la sa sha ris rna zas sna b+hi ha re/ g+hi sa Na g+hi sa Na/ Sha T+wAM kha mA ra na/ khA hi khA hi/ tag Na tag Na k+Sha shi swA hA/ srog sngags de yis nga bos la// dus rnams rtag tu bsnyen pa gyis// de la

rtags thon sngags 'di rbod// oM ma hA kA la ti ling ki pi/ dz+he dz+he/ dz+huM dz+huM/ dgra gzir khu shig mu khug ha yA ha yA/ ha na ha na/ badzre na badzre na/ ma ma mu ka ya/ sha truM dza sha hUM/ de nas gsad pa 'di gsungs so// oM

ma hA kA la de ni me ka ma ka na a ta re na/ ma ro sha e re na/ oM e ro she ya ya shi du na swA hA/ ya shi du na la hruM truM ma ra ma ra/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ bin d+ha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na bi ka na/ ma ra ya/ dgra'i sha

dung dung phaT/ ces smras so// nag po chen po sa g.yo ba'i rgyud las/ bod rbad gsad gsum gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang smras pa/ nyungs kar nyungs nag gzir ba dang// khrag sna dug sna rnyed tshad
la// a mu ka yi ru pa rnams// tsher ma can gyi me la bsreg/ de yis las grub gdon mi za// rtags kyi rim pa 'di rnams 'byung// dge bshes bon po mi nag dang// rta nag bya nag lug nag dang// yul mi

mi chen po dang ban de chen po dang/ bud med kyi tshogs dang/ 'od dang khang pa 'tsheg pa dang/ wa dang spyang khu tug com sgra la sogs pa'i 'byung/ bsnyen pa grub nas khugs pa'i rtags// mon dang rgya gar chen po

dang// dgra bo khrid nas 'ong ba dang// gnyid log tu mi ster ba dang// jag dang chom po byed pa rmi// de nas dgra bo'i sod pa'i rmi ltas ni/ mi lag pa dmar lhag ke ba dang/ bshad dang dmar g.yos byed pa

byung na las zin pa yin no// btsun pa dang bud med kyi tshogs byung na/ khros pa yin pa bshags pa bya'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan la gsang sngags drag tu bzlas/ mgon po dngos su mthong na dam bsgrags
sid+hi blang/ nag po chen po sa g.yo ba'i rgyud las/ bdug pa'i rdzas dang mtshan ma rtags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bskul ba 'di gsungs so// hUM/ shi mig dmar mo mthu bo che// mun
nag chen po'i klong nas spyon// zangs dang lcags kyi gzhu bdungs nas// las su dgra bo bsod cing rgyug/ chibs su ma he stag seng chibs// 'khor ni mi bsrun srin po'i 'khor// nub phyogs 'gar rna'i yul

nas spyon// rgya gar yul nas spyan drangs nas// dam nyams dgra yi sha khrag la// zas dang ltos skal de la gyis// nyin mtshan gnyis kyi dmigs pa bgyi// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// ces rak+ta spreng zhing
dgra la rbad do// nag po chen po sa g.yo ba'i rgyud las// bskul bar bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// khyod nyid las rnams byed du ma 'dod na// dgra la
rtags ni med gyur na// spogs pa'i las ni ji ltar bgyi// khyod nyid kyis ni legs par smros// zhes gsungs pas/ nag po chen pos smras pa/ bdag gis ma 'tshal dpa' bos gsungs// bdag nyid shin du smra

bar dka'// de nas dpa' bos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig nag po chen po nyid// khyod nyid las ni byed tu ma 'dod na// gzir cing gnad la dbab par bya// lto bar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// nang du sha truM phyi
rim la// rtsibs brgyad bod pa mu khyud rbad// de yi phyi rim gsod pas bskor// de dang dgra bo'i 'khor lo gnyis kyi bar du gsad// bla shing chu shing ma gal dum la// rabs chad nag po'i sha tshil
bsreg/ gong gi 'khor lo spro zhing ling ga sbyin sreg bya// me lha mgon po nyid la bya// mgon po'i zhal du phul bar bsams// de yis las rnams grub par bshad// gal te las de ma grub cing// rang la bar
chad byed gyur na// ru log snying gzer man ngag bya// gong gi 'khor lo de gnyis bsreg/ nyi shu rtsa gcig dag gis ni// mi bzad mgon po nag po khros// mod la sa g.yos chen po 'ong// de ma thag tu gsod

par 'gyur// thal ba rlung tshub che la 'phyar// mi rabs rtsad nas gcod par byed// de yis las grub gdon mi za// de nas sngags zlos 'di gsungs so// phaT phaT dung dung ya ra na ma ki mi di da/ pa tsa pa tsa/

ha sa ha sa/ d+ha bin d+ha bin/ d+ha tshin d+ha tshin/ ra ma ra ma/ truM truM shan tu sha ra ya son/ du shi ya sha ro e oM na ro/ a sha so ma hA na re A/ sa ro a na re A hA/ ke mi d+ha d+hi na/ 'di la kad ma sha oM/ dzA dzA/ truM truM ya ka

u a/ na dze na dz+he/ na ha na ha/ ya ha ya ha/ khug mu zi khug dgra gzir/ dz+huM dz+huM dz+he dz+he/ pa ki li ti/ la ka ha ma oM/ ha sa shi yag Na stis Na stis/ khA hi khA hi/ na ma ra kha to kha/ Na g+his Na g+his/ re ha b+his Na za/
Na ri ris sha pa la/ ka dang ma oM/ zhes gsungs so// nag po chen po sa g.yo ba'i rgyud las/ shi ba spogs thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang mgon pos 'di gsungs so// ming
rus mi khrag dag gis bri// de nas gri yi thod par gzhug/ dang po zhag bdun bod pas dgug/ de la rtags rnams rdzogs pa dang// rbad sngags brtags la bdun phrag gnyis sgrub// dgug pa'i pho nya gsad
par bya// gsad pa'i drag sngags zhag bdun gdags// thod pa'i eg tser thun dang phur pas gzir// bod rbad gsad gsum dril ba la// bdun phrag gsum du dril bar bya// bdag nyid mgon po'i skur
bsgoms la// drag sngags 'brug sgra lta bur bzlas// thun rdzas gsod pa'i rdzas su bsams// dus drug bskul dang gtor ma gtang// las rnams grub par gyur pa dang// ling ga thod pa dang bcas te// lha
khang mgon pa'i zhabs 'og gnan// yang na bod rbad gsad par dril ba dang// sbyin sreg zhag gsum bya// thal ba rlung chen dag la 'phyar// yang na klu gnyan gnas su gnan// des ma grub na lan drug

spogs// smin pa gsum gyi sbyor ba bya// snyen pos mi thub rang nyid bsgom// zhes smras so// nga yi srog rgyud dam pa 'di// phyi rabs dam tshig brtan la sbyin// nga yis de la stong grogs bya// zhes smras so// nag
po chen po sa g.yo ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas dpa' bos bstod pa/ e ma nag po ngo mtshar che// che ba'i che mchog khyad par can// drag po lha mi 'dul mdzad

pa// sum brtsegs 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces rjes su yi rang ba dang/ ngo mtshar che nas bstod do// dpal nag po chen po sa g.yo ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// tham than gaM thun:kha tham//// de
nas nag po chen po ni// 'dod lha dbang phyug dpa' bo yis// 'dod khams zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// rnam par bltas te rang sngags smras// nga yi yid la byung ba yi// gsang sngags 'di dag nyan par

byas// gzung bas dngos grub 'di la yod// thams cad 'grub phyir bshad par bya// oM ma hA kA la gu na hri d+ha hUM/ yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyi mchog/ gtso bo'i rgyu 'am bdag po'i phyir// ye shes 'dus pa'i byin

brlabs las// sngags kyi rgyal po ming can yin// de phyir nga ni chen po'i ming// gnyen pos bsnyengs pa med phyir gnas// de ni nga yi yon tan te// de dag snying pos smras pa yang// snying gi dbus na rang srog
yos// rin chen dpung rgyan lta bu yi// rgyud kyi sngags ni yi ge bcu// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ gsang sngags bsten pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas mgon po dpa' bos// rang gi
phyag rgya rnams gsungs pa// gang dag ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pa// las dang mthun pa gang dag gis// nga yi phyag rgya thob 'dod pa// sa bon rgyu las lhar bskyed de// yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis

ni// dpa' bo nag po'i nga rgyal gyis// gzugs ni yongs su 'dzin pa ni// rang gi rnam smin spangs pa ste// 'du byed phyag rgya mang po yis// sna la 'gro yi 'du shes te// de ni bzhi yi phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya gnyis

pa bstan bya ste// gang gis ting 'dzin rab brtan cing// lus ltar ngag kyang shes bya ste// rang gi rig pa 'dzin pa ni// de yi sngags bsam de ltar brjod// blang dor med par de nyid 'dzin// gcig pu de la
mnyam sbyor bstan// 'jig rten pa yi tshig spangs te// dam pa gzhan yang len med cing// gsang sngags de nyid rtse gcig pa// gzhan du mi 'da' brtan sbyor ba// ngag gi 'du byed mang po yis// phyag

rgya'i sngon du 'di 'gro ste// ngag gi bzhir bshad phyag rgya yin// de bzhin gsum pa 'di ltar bshad// gang gis lhar bsgom lung dang ni// ngag kyang de ltar shes byas nas// yid kyang 'di ltar brtan por

'gyur// nyid kyi lha nyid 'drar ma yin// mngon du gyur pa'i nga rgyal bya// gang dag gzhan ni bsam ma yin// gcig pu dpa' bas 'dir bstan byed// bag chags grong khyer mang po la// sems kyi 'khor lo rnam
par gcad// sems las byung dang 'du byed bral// rang gi zhi gnas de nyid la// rtse gcig sems pa'i dran pa can// sems kyi phyag rgya brtan mang po'i// dang po 'gro phyir gzhi zhes bshad// lus ngag yid

gsum phyag rgya ni// sbyor ba thun mong shes byas nas// lag gi 'du byed bstan par bya// sngon gyi tshul gyi 'di bya ste// lag g.yas mtheb mos mthe'u chung mnan// thod pa bzang po ltar bya ste// de yi mdung rtse

gsum po ni// sor mo gsum phyar phral nas bgrad// g.yas pa thad du cung zad stod// g.yon pa ban d+ha rab 'dzin cing// sor mo lnga skongs ban d+ha'i tshul// mthe'u chung nu 'jing g.yon la sbyar// 'jing pa

g.yon gyi phyogs su bkal// dkar nag mig kyang glog ltar 'gyu// man 'khal brkyang nas lce yang 'dril// mche ba gtsigs pa'i gnyer ma can// oM hUM A yi dbugs 'dren rngug/ kha T+wAM phyag rgya 'dzin pa yi// nga

rgyal stabs kyi 'du byed yin// 'di ltar 'dod lha'i nga rgyal gyis// beng gi phyag rgya bstan pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi mtheb mo dang// de bzhin srin lag gong mo yis// 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya ba dang// yang na
beng chen nyid kyang gzung// g.yas pa g.yas kyi nu ma'i rtsa// g.yon pa snyen gyi thad du phyar// lha yi dmag dpon byed pa'i tshe// lha min 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ste// mthing nag 'jol ber yang dag
bsnams// gtor ma bskyal dang dgye ba dang/ khrag thun la sogs 'phen pa'i tshe// sna 'dren thabs kyi phyag rgya yin// gri gug thod pa'i phyag rgya ni// dgra rnams gsod tshe gzung bya ste// g.yas pa

khur tshur bcas nas kyang// gri gug g.yon du so lta ba// dpal dang ldan pa 'dzin pa yi// phyag rgya nu ma g.yas pa'i steng// thod pa khrag dang ldan pa yis// mkhal ma g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag/ sngon ltar sor mo

sbyar ba ni// gri gug thod pa'i phyag rgya ni// gang zhig dgra bo gnod pa de'i// sha ni til tsam gri yis gcod// de bzhin khrag rnams thod par bsags// khrag kyang btung ba'i bsam gtan bya// bsgrub bya gsad

pa'i dus su 'o// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ phyag rgya drug pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de yi ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// hUM gi rnam pa 'di nyid las// gyur pa'i sku ni rnam par
'jigs// yang dag dpa' bo phyag rgya che// kha dog nag po char sprin 'dra// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// stag lpags la sogs bsnams pa dang// thal ba'i mtshan mas byugs nas ni// gri gug thod pa

phyag na 'dzin// mche ba zla tshes lta bur mdzes// mig gsum pa la khraM nag sra// khro gnyer bsdus pa'i gzi brjid can// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas do shal bya// gsum po 'phyang ba'i yan lag ni// thams cad thung la

sbom pa yi// mchu dang so la khrag kyang 'dzag/ mi ro skra yi skud pas dkris// ro yi steng na 'gying bag can// btsan dkyil dag tu 'dug pa'o// dur khrod mkha' 'gro mang pos bskor// yi dgas mang po yang dag
'dus// rang sems gyur pa lhun grub sku// rang bzhin gnas nas yang dag gnas// gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya bstan// ma g.yos zhi gnas legs par bde// bzlas dang bsgom pa de kho na// yi ge bcu pa
brjod pa yi// sku ni dus gsum kun tu bsgom// sngags kyang yang dag brjod par mkhas// de bzhin phyag rgya gtan sbyor zhing// sgo gsum dag pas dngos grub 'grub// dngos su grub nas bdag dang
gzhan// thams cad las rnams 'grub par 'dod// ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu dpa'// de bzhin brtan pas bde bar bsgom// thams cad dngos grub 'byung ba'o// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud
las// ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dam tshig ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// 'jig rten skyes pa thams cad la// brnyas pa nyid du mi byed pa// rdo

rje thabs kyi dam tshig yin// las las byung ba'i 'jig rten ni// bud med brnyas par mi byed pa// rdo rje shes rab dam tshig yin// las kyi rigs dang yum gyi rigs// 'di ltar shes nas ma nyams na// rdo rje
sku yi dam tshig ldan// phan dang gnod pa'i bsam pa yis// sems kyi sems can dga' bar skyong// yi chad sun bar mi byed pas// rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig yin// rdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub

dang// nam yang smra bar mi byed dang// snyan par smra bar byed pa ni// rdo rje ngag gi dam tshig yin// dri chen dri chu byang chub sems// maM sa rak+ta rgyal ba lngas// mnyam nyid rtogs phyir dam tshig ste// blang dor spang

bar mi bya ste// 'di ni rtog pa'i dam tshig yin// dam du bcas te 'dod lha la// mchod dang gtor ma rab tu brtson// gsang ba bsrung ba'i dam tshig ste// dam tshig kun gyi rtsa ba yin// 'phags pa rin po che
dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las// dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gsang sngags sgrub 'dod pas// bzlas pa'i thabs kyang bstan par bya// dang por gsang sngags gang 'dzin pa// dkon mchog

gsum dang yi dam can// slob dpon bla ma'i drung du ni// dam tshig sdom pa sngon du bya// yi ge mang nyung bzlas pa gang// dang por cung zad brjod pa yin// de nas ldabs te gdon par bya// de nas kyang ni cher

byang nas// ldabs te brjod pa kho nar bya// de bzhin ldabs te zhabs su ni// de yi bdag nyid kho na ste// khams mi bde dang ma snyoms med// bar chod dag dang med pa'i tshul// de ltar bzlas pas de sgoms

na// las gzhan 'jug par mi 'dod de// bzlas pa'i tshul kyang 'di ltar bzlas// thams cad myur min bul ba spangs// yi ge drag zhan rnam par phyed// yan lag sgra dang bcas pa tshang// A li kA li'i nang du
chud// sems dpa' gsum gyi tshul brjod pas// drag tu gzhan gyis mi thos par// bdag nyid kyis kyang lhag mi thos// mgo ni rma bya bzhin bkug ste// sems ni sa ltar brtan byas la// ngag ni thos med rdo
rje bzlas// 'di ni bzlas pa kun gyi gzhi// thogs med bzlas pa 'di yis ni// yi ge bzhi pa'i dngos grub thob// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ bzlas pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga

pa'o//// nag po chen po'i dum bu dang po rdzogs so//// dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba ni// mthing nag gru gsum khru gang yin// srid du yang ni mtho do pa// sor mo brgyad 'phags rim pa gsum// rdo rje dang

ni thod pa dang// de bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho ste// steng na gri gug yod pa'o// hUM ni gri gug lte ba la// gnas pa gzhi de nag po ste// sna tshogs rdo rje de dbus yin// phyogs dang mtshams rnams dur khrod
dag/ mdzes par byas nas bkod pa'i steng// sngon du bstan pa de nyid yin// sa ni dur khrod dag nas blangs// shi ba'i khrag gis rnam brdzis la// dpa' ba'i sems kyis dkyil 'khor brtsig/ dmar po khrag
dang nag po ni// dur khrod sol ba yang dag ste// gri gug kyang ni thal ba'i mdog/ 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las// dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas
gtor ma gtang ba ni// gtor ma'i rgyu dang de sbyang dang// sngags dang phyag rgya'i khyad par gyis// bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas ni// kun tu gtong dang gtong ba tshe// gtong ba med pa'i bsam gtan

bya// dang po hUM las gyur pa ni// cho 'phrul rdzogs las skur bskyed de// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa dang// dbu la sangs rgyas lnga ldan zhing// sems dpa'i skyil mo bgying ba'i lha// brtags nas bskyed pa'i 'og tu

yang// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// oM dkar AHdmar hUM mthing nag/ spyi bo lce dang snying kha dag/ yang dag byin brlabs sku gsung thugs// rnam par ldan pa'i bdag po yin// de yi gtor ma bskyed pa

ni// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kha yaM dmar po raM// dkar po a dag snang ba yin// pad+ma ban d+ha snod kyi dbying// nya dang chang dang 'bras chen dang// me tog dang ni bdug pa dang// la d+hu la phug sbrang rtsi

dang// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga yis ni// nag po chen po mchod par bya// rlung gis zla gam ba dan las// yaM gis sa bon spros te bskul// 'bud pa'i stobs kyis me sbar te// pad+ma \u0f84ban d+ha dros pa las// nang gi dam

rdzas zhu ba yis// bdud rtsi sbyang phyir rdo rjes bkrus// rtog par bya phyir a yis brtag/ 'dod pa 'phel phyir oM gyis byed// bzlas pa'i rim pa gtor ma'i sngags// oM ma hA kA la ya/ sha sa na a pa ra ha ri e

shang/ sa pas tsi ma ka lo yang/ i dam ma 'dus sha truM ta pa ha pa b+hi laM dA dA/ mi [(]radan[)] na tra ya/ a pa ra ka ri naM/ ya ti pra ti dz+nyA rma/ ra si ta tha i daM ma ma du sta sha hUM/ ta ba 'bar la mi dang kha kha khA hi khA hi/

mA ra mA ra g+h+ri na g+h+ri na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ni me ga na hUM phaT/ 'di dag gtor ma chen po ste// ci phyir dang po'i 'od zer gyis// sems can thams cad bskul sbyangs te// 'od zer dag
la thim pa'o// de nas bdag nyid chen po yi// rdo rje'i lce la btar ba dang// bza' btung la sogs kun kyang yin// kun tu gtong bar 'dod pa ni// sngags ni 'di dag rnams dang ldan// bzlas nas kun

gyis thos par 'gyur// oM a ra li ho dzA hUM baM ho/ badzra DA ki da ya/ yo ki ni shri sa ma stoM/ tri sha ho/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ a kha ro mu khaM sarba d+harma/ ar+ya nud pan na twad ta oM A:hUM/ dmigs pa sgo dang khyab

pa spyi// thams cad sngags ni rab ldan yang// rang gi 'khor la 'dis btang bya// oM in+d+ra ya ma/ dza la/ yak+Sha/ b+hu ta ba h+ni/ ba yu/ nA ga tsan+t+ra/ sur+ya/ ma ta baM ba ta la pa ta le/ a ta sa ma pa/ swA hA/ i daM ba
bun dza/ dzig d+hu pa/ puSh+pa/ d+hi pa/ gan+d+he ba ra swA hA/ 'di ni kun tu gtong ba ste// ci phyir de ni kun tu gtong// mchod dang gtor ma kun tshang bas// kha yod pa dang gdong pa yod// mdor na
chos can thams cad dang// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can kun// bdag nyid thugs kha'i sa bon las// 'phros pa dang pos rnam par sbyangs// gnyis pas 'dir 'dus thams cad 'ongs// 'od zer gsum

pas rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams su gyur pa'i lces// rdo rje spu gus bdud rtsi drang// bsod nams ye shes tshang ba 'di// dge ba'i zhing mchod kun kyang tshim// de phyir kun tu gtong ba yin// gtor ma'i lta

ba 'dod rnams la// gtor ma'i lta ba bstan pa ni// gtong ba med pa'i gtor ma ste// ci phyir 'di nyid gtong ba med// de ni lta ba shes phyir ro// gang phyir ban d+ha snod kyi dbyibs// yum ni 'jig rten phyi yi

snod// khyab pa nam mkha'i rgya dang 'dra// bcud ni gtor ma ye shes dag/ bdud rtsi'i ro mchog byang chub sems// skye ba med pa'i ngo bo ni// bdud rtsi dkar por gyur pa yin// sems can sangs rgyas kun yin

pas// de phyir gzhan la mchod byed su// de la blang dor med bzhin du// bya dang byed pa rtog pa gang// mi g.yo ba yi dngos po ni// thams cad pad+ma ban d+ha ste// g.yo ba rnams kyi ngo bo ni// thams cad bdud rtsi
byang chub sems// gnyis su med phyir rnam par dag/ snod ni chos dbyings rnam par dag/ bcud ni ye shes rnam par dag/ de phyir dbyings dang ye shes ni// chos sku bde ba chen po la// so sor 'byed pa'i

rmongs pa rnams// lta ba med pas 'khyams par 'gyur// gang zhig gtor ma'i lta ba yod// de yis gtong ba chen po dang// kun tu gtong ba brjod na yang// mkhas pa de ni don rnams thob// de la phyag rgya ston
par bya// lag gnyis thal sbyar phyir bkyed la// mtheb mo gcig tu bkras pa dang// mdzub mo 'khyud pa 'thur du bkug/ gung rtse sprad mthe' chung sbreng// srin lag gnyis ni nang du dgug/ de phyir gtor
ma'i thad du bcas// ma hA mu tra'i las byed do// dam tshig bdud rtsi sbyang ba dang// ye shes bdud rtsi dgug pa ni// gtor ma mkhan gyi cho ga yin// thams cad gtor mas dngos grub 'thob// 'phags pa rin

po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ gtor ma'i chog bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o//// de nas drag po'i man ngag ni// mkhas pa la ni sbyin bsreg bstan// bla ma la ni gus par bya// bsgrub bya'i rnam smin 'bum

du phyin// gru gsum bang rim nang stong can// me yi sa bon nang du 'ong// dbus su bsgrub bya de bzhin sngags// 'gro ba la ni gzugs dang sngags// yi ge bcu pa mtha' yas tshang// klad pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i
rlung// dpral bar shes rab ye shes te// brten pa la ni dag pa yod// thabs kyi ri la thabs kyi sgo// shes rab kyi ni ri la yang// mtha' lnga'i drung nas blang bar bya// srid pa dbu ma rin 'byung
gi/ ming ni yang dag 'brel ba yin// ming thob dbang po pho dang mo// snying po'i ming dang yang dag ldan// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yang// bzhi pa'i sgo yis mdzes pa'o// srid pa 'dzin pa byed pa
yi// chags sdang dbus na kun gyi gzhi// rang bzhin 'gyur med thig le gnas// 'bum phrag kun kyang 'di 'dra'o// 'od zer rgya ma 'am rkyen gang yin// spu dang tsher ma og shol can// ci rigs sbyar bas de
sbar bya'o// de yi 'bras bu de nyid kyi// me tog mchod pa yang dag yin// de dang rnam smin re rer ldan// phyi nag nad ser zla ba 'dra// las bzhi'i mtshan nyid yod pa can// zur gsum gnam lcags rtse mo

'dra// bye'u yi mchu 'dra nag mo dang// gzugs kyi tha chungs nag mo dang// rgyu dang 'bras bu mi 'dra ba'i// sa bon nag po gzhan yang shis// de 'dra'i nang gi nga rgyal can// lce yi sdug bsngal skyed byed pa// de

ni rgyud dang 'bras bu 'dra// thams cad yang dag mchod pa yin// khyad par gsang sngags 'di dang ldan// oM ma hA kA la ya/ sarba sha truM ru ba da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na hUM phaT/ yi ge bcu pa sngon 'gro

zhing// bsreg pa'i dus su bsreg pa'i sngags// re re la yang re rer ldan// sngags ni mang la ling ga nyung// ling ga mang la sngags ni nyung// thams cad nyes par bshad pa ste// 'di ni nges par mi rung ngo// re

re la yang re rer ldan// de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad// de bas sbyin sreg grub par 'gyur// grangs ni tha ma 'bum du bshad// 'bring ni bye ba sa ya rab// dpa' bos yang dag sgrub par byos// me pra rtags

kyi mtshan nyid ni// gzugs dang kha dog sgra dang dri// dud pa tsha tsha ma thod dman gyi// rtags ni rab tu bshad par bya// gzugs ni glang po 'dra ba yi// khro bo dbu skra dang yang mtshungs// beng gi gzugs 'dra gru

bzhi pa// 'phra la ring ba phyag mtshan gcad// gru gsum hoM khung dang yang 'dra// mi yi gzugs dang 'dra ba 'byung// mgo bo'i mtshan ma chad pa yin// sngo skya ser nag dmar na lam// ljang nag dud kha stag zil

mdog/ char sprin mdog 'dra hral hral po// sprin med nam mkha'i snying po 'dra// ljang ser dmar skya 'khyug la 'khyil// nub kyi dmar thag chad bzhin snang// smug nag dmar la gsal ba'i mdog/ shog sgra snyan

dang sa 'brug skad// 'khor lo bskor ba lta bu'i sgra// rtag sgra tsheg tsheg smra ba dang// sba yi sgra 'dra wab kyang 'dra// brdebs pa'i sgra dang dkrol ba'i sgra// bud pa dang ni nga ro ste// ngu ba dang ni rgod pa dang// 'bod
pa dang ni 'khun pa'i skad// 'jug dang gnas dang 'byung ba'i rlung// sgra rnams gang yang 'grub pa'i tshig/ sgog pa sregs pa lta bu dang// ldong ros tshig 'dra nre yi dri// 'byung po tshig pa yin par

bshad// mi sha bsregs dang gzhob kyi dri// bdug la dri rtsub nga ba babs// dgra bo gsod pa'i dri dang ldan// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ tsan dan dang ni spos kyi dri// lha rnams byon pa'i dri dang ldan// dud pas mi

gsal 'khyil ba dang// 'tshubs la thibs pas drang ba che// drag po'i mtshan ma tshang ba yi// tsha tsha 'phro ba zhabs su mang// bsgrub bya'i phyogs su rnam par 'thor// me stag che ba yang dag shis// gyen du mchong

ba 'dra ba dang// me stag kha phru btab pa 'dra// mtho la drag pa'i khyal bar ni// gnam du 'bar ba gyen du 'gro// 'thur du ltung zhing gyen du 'khyil// thab khung nang du thim nas ni// yang ni gnam du 'thor bar
'bar// 'di ni me yi rtags bdun pa// mkhas pas bla ma la bris te// brtson pas yang dag yang sbyor ba// de yi lus rnams de yis byon// me yi phyogs na me lha 'dug/ me ni 'jig rten khyad par bya// lha ni

dbus su spyan drangs te// las rnams byed pa bdag gis kyang// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ drag po sbyin sreg bstan pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o//// de nas dang po'i tsha ba'i nad// bsregs te

gsad par bya ba yin// gro ma chu 'gram phung ba'i sa// bsgrub bya'i gzugs ni khru gang pa// tsha ba'i 'bru dang 'dra// tsha 'bras smin pa gnyer ma can// tsha ba bskyed pa shing gi rigs// 'bras bu dmar po skye ba'i

rtse// yun la thung ba gnyer ba'i rtse// 'bras bu skyural khur ser rtse// yun can seng ge'i mche ba 'dra// zur gsum zug du'i 'bras bu nyid// gzhan yang 'di 'dra mang bshad de// rnam smin nang du dgang bar

bya// de yi rnam smin reg bya la// yungs mar dang bsres bskus pa la// de yi shing gi me sbar nas// ha cang mi drag dal bas bsro// dros par gyur na dmar ba'o// de yi 'bras bu tsha bas mchi// gal te de yis

ma byung na// sngon gyi sbyor bas brtsam par bya// 'phags pa'i rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ bsgrub bya'i gzugs bsro ba'i thabs tsha ba nad kyis gsad pa ste le'u dgu pa'o//// rnal 'byor drag po'i spyod

pa ni// mtshan byed dag na sra bshig ste// gcer bu thal bas byugs pa ni// kha T+wAM grol ba gar thabs yin// rnam snang mdzad kyis byugs pa dang// mtshan ma gyen du bsgreng ba yis// don yod grub pa gar thabs

byed// bskor dang bskor ba chen po yi// phyag rgya ro yi steng du byed// ha ha zhes ni lce yang 'byin// rin chen 'byung ldan yang dag za// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par 'bul// snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin te// rta
mchog rus pa'i steng na 'dug/ ma mo'i tshogs rnams sdud par byed// dur rnams su yang 'gro bar byed// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ nag po chen po'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u

ste bcu pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag po nyid// rab tu khros te sngags 'di brjod// yab yum rnam par gyur pas 'jigs// oM badzra yak+Sha de ba ma hA kA la kro d+ha hUM dzA dzA dzA/ bcu drug gsang sngags 'di nyid

ni// thams cad 'dzin par gyur pa la// tshogs bdag chen po'i sngags rnams bstan// oM badzra yak+Sha de ba/ ma hA yak+Sha ma/ be ti la dzA dzA dzA/ sngags ni bcu bdun gang 'dzin pa// pe ta li dang yang dag

ldan// g.yon du 'khril ba yum gyi tshul// rang sems rdzogs pa'i lha yi sku// rnam par bzlas pas 'grub pa yin// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ yab yum gyi gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste
bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang sgrub pa ni// gnam lcags phur pa ru sbal gyi// rma bya'i g.yon khrag bskus pa gzas zin tshe// mgo la btab na gnam lcags 'bab// rtag tu phyis ni phung ba'i

mchog/ dud 'gro sna yi pho nya ni// bsgrub bya'i sgra gzugs bris pa la// sbrul gyi steng du phung bar 'gyur// mgul pa brdeg pa de nyid la// ma hA b+h+yo zhes ldan pa sgrub// gang gi zhing la btab na srin// 'bu la

sogs pas za bar byed// 'thab byed gnyen pa'i sbyor ba ni// gnyis ka la yang de bzhin te// mig la sgrub bya mchu la bsngags// dri ma can gyi mtshan mo la// gzhan ni de bzhin nyi ma la'o// thams cad phung
bar 'thab pa'i mchog/ tshul khrims can gyi mgo gcad la// zla ba phyed pa'i mtshan mo ni// sngags su 'dug pa'i bskul tshig can// shes gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rmi// dran byed brjed ngas snying la

ni// gshegs pa'i nang du sgrub bya gzhug/ le brgan lce 'dra'i khar bcug ste// bzlas pa thebs na zor 'phangs smyo// ci cu'i nang du sgrub bya can// thabs la mkhas par khar bcug ste// gsang sngags rdzogs na

nges par 'chi// tshad pa'i rnam smin snying la ni// bsgrub sngags bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan// phyogs su bltas na myur du 'ong// lha mo klu yang de yis bod// rin chen 'bar ba de bris rdul// sngags dang bskul

tshig yang dag ldan// 'dod na nor rnams myur du 'ong// dud kha rlung gi rkang pa la// steng du yang las de steng ming// bskul tshig ldan na srod par 'gyur// ma yi khang pa'i nang du ni// gsod byed ma yi dbang po

lnga// de yi dbus na klu yi phyugs// de yi nang na bskul tshig gis// lo tog 'joms pa'i chu glang yin// rnam par blun pe lce ni ni// bsgrub bya'i ming ldan za byed kha// mi shel blangs te mnan pa lkugs// 'ug

pa bya rog sha ba khyi// byi ba byi la sre mong sbrul// rtsal ni mang bsdus de de yin// tsher mas me shel bzlog pa ni// de ni myur du rengs pa yis// byol song khyim nas longs spyod blang// rgya mtsho'i
'gram nas gser blangs te// rgyal po bcugs pa'i gzugs byas te// chu dkar gtsang ma la sogs mchod// bskul tshig ldan pa'i sngon du bsnyen// ldan na char yang yang dag 'bab// 'bras kyi phub
ma bsregs nas na// zhi ba'i sems kyi bskul tshig ldan// thams cad gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur// mngal na 'jug pa'i 'byung po la// 'dod khams bdag po'i mtshan ma ni// rdzas la de 'dra'i gzugs byas

te// lung pa sa de yul bya// nang du bcug pa'i bskul tshig gis// mngal gyi nang nas dros par 'gyur// brang gi mtshon cha can de la// mid pa skad kyi ma ning snying// bzhag ste bskul na nam yang gnon// chu ni

snyim pa du ma bsnams// blangs te yang dang yang gtor na// bskul tshig ldan pas me yang mchi// mun pa'i nang na gter gyi sa// de yi gzugs la de 'dra bri// byu ru sdong po zhon pa de// sngags dang ting 'dzin rab

ldan bskul// myur du gzhan gyi bran du 'gro// sgrib med 'pho ba'i skad cig ma// rus pa bsrungs can thal ba la// rdo stengs brdal ba'i de ming bri// rlung gis gnan na nor dang bral// gshog pa smug nag bdud

kyi sde// snying lpags med pa'i snying la za// de yi khar ni de bcug ste// shel gyi 'od zer nub na 'chi// drod gsher gnyis las khang pa 'dra// gzhon nu'i khang pa thal ba la// bskul tshig sbyar na gzhon nu

'chi// de ni mo sham 'dra ba yin// dre'u khye'u gzugs ldan pa// ri bong bu ni rwa can zhon// ru spal spu las byas pa yis// gos ni yang dag lus la dkri// nam mkha'i me tog 'thor byed pas// bud med 'khor

lo sgyur rgyal bskyon// bya rog 'ug pa phaT tshun tshe// 'di ni mi 'da' brtan pa'i rgya// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud thun mong gi dngos grub las/ phra mo'i sbyor ba brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis

pa'o//// sems can rnams ni drang phyir du// rgyal bas chos nyid ston mi mdzad// ci'i phyir de ni skrag pa'i phyir// thabs kyi lam du 'dud pa yin// thabs kyi cho 'phrul gang la yang// bstan na zhi gnas thob

par 'gyur// de yis lhag mthong rnyed pa yis// de phyir thabs kyi cho 'phrul ni// snying rje yod phyir rgya chen yin// rgya chen cho 'phrul thams cad la// thams cad rmad pa ma yin pas// 'jug par bya ba kho nar
zad// 'di ni rgyal ba'i byin brlabs pa'i// thun mong dngos grub sgo nas kyang// 'jug pa'i rten 'brel bstan pa yin// dam pas dam chos ston pa'i tshul// gzugs kyi sgo nas ston pa dang// dgra yi sgo nas
'dren pa dang// dri dang ro dang reg pa rnams// ji ltar bas 'dul ba yin// gang dag phung po lnga dang ni// dbyibs dang kha dog rdul gyis kyang// mos pa dma' ba 'dul ba yin// sku mdog phyag
mtshan gdan khri dang// bzhugs tshul la sogs bstan pa yang// mu stegs can rnams 'dul phyir ro// gdug pa'i chas mas ra bas bsnams te// sgro skur btab na 'dren pa yin// kha cig rang lus phung po
la// dam pa'i rigs rnams phye ste ston// de bzhin so so'i lus nyid las// rtsa yi drang ba gang yin pas// de yi sgo nas 'dren par mdzad// gzhan yang dbul dang yi ge dang// tshig dang ming la sogs pas
'dren// 'od gsal spros bral brjod pa med// kun gyi sna la 'di ston pa// drang ba'i phyir na thabs kyi mchog/ 'di ni 'od gsal rang la yod// thog ma med nas gnas pa ste// blun po rnams kyi rtogs pas

bsgribs// byang chub dri med gang thob pa// thob par bya ba rdul tsam med// thams cad sems ni mngon sangs rgya// lus ni nam kyang sangs mi rgya// gal te sems nyid sangs rgya na// de phyir lus na yod na

mod// de la zhen pa gang zhig yin// thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma// snang yang sgyu ma rtag mi bzod// ma rtogs nyams dga' sgyu ma'i tshul// mi snang na yang sgyu ma zhig/ blo bur 'ongs kyang blo bur med// chu yi chu bur

dang yang 'dra// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor lta bu ni// gsal la rnyog pa med pa yin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la ni// rgyal ba lta bar mi mdzad do// sems can rnams kyi lta ba ni// 'di ltar shes pa mngon sangs
rgyas// kha cig brtags pa'i dngos po las// rang sems bskyed pa lha sgom pa// brtags pa dor ba dgongs pa yod// byis pa shes nas mi 'dor na// nam kyang srin po'i skye ba blangs// rdzogs gsal ldan pa

cher gnas ba// sku rdzogs spangs kyang nam kyang 'chad// rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi gtsug lag ni// dam tshig dang ni lta ba dang// sgrub pa tshang nas rgyud kyi don// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las/ lta ba

bstan pa'o// nag po chen po'i dum bu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bar snang gi lha rnams kyis nag po chen po la bstod pa/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad snyan pa'i bar snang la// mtshan nyid mthun pa'i bstod pa me tog
shar// de dpon nag po chen po dge ba yis// sa gzhi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir bstod pa// mi 'jigs seng ge nyon mongs mtsho las rgyal// thub med dpa' yi lha min g.yul las rgyal// thub med dpa' bo
bdud dpung g.yul las rgyal// ma rig 'khrul pa kun nas rnam par rgyal// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa bstod sngags khyod// gnod pa 'dul ba'i des pa'i tshul ston khyed// skye 'gro phal chen kun gyi
skyabs gyur khyod// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad khyod// dge slong dgra bcom rnams dang tshul khrims mnyam// drang srong rigs 'dzin rnams dang dka' thub mnyam// lha dbang brgya
byin rnams dang longs spyod mnyam// khro bo stobs chen rnams dang spyod pa mnyam// yun rings dka' bas 'gro ba'i don brtson 'phags// smon lam phun sum tshogs pas 'grub pa 'phags// 'dod khams
bzhin du zhing khams skyong bas 'phags// rtag tu dmigs med chos la mi g.yo 'phags// sgron ma mun sel yid bzhin 'bar ba'i bdag/ gco bo tsam tsom med pa gsang sngags bdag/ rgyal srid 'byung ba chen
po tshogs kyi bdag/ dbang bskur bskal pa bzang po srid gsum bdag/ gang tshe gcig gis 'dul bar shes pa po// ci dang ci 'dul sprul pa shes pa po// ci rigs gang dag bshad pa shes pa po// shes pa
yongs shes ji bzhin shes pa po// dbang phyug chen po mthong na dga' ba'i gnas// spyod yul rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bstan pa'i gnas// des pa lha rigs phal tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas// 'jigs med 'byung ba

mthong na dam tshig gnas// 'dren mchog bsgyings pa srid pa ltar ltung ba 'dzin// 'phong pa mi bzad srog kyang gang zhig 'dzin// rgyal po yul 'khor bcas pa'i sbyor ba 'dzin// dbang phyug 'gying ba mchod pa
don du 'dzin// bstod pa 'os pa nyes pa sel bar byed// 'dam rdzab skems pa 'khrul ba zhi bar byed// mig rtsa dmar po srin po rmugs par byed// mdog nag tshogs kyis nag po bkra shis byed// mtshan dang

dpe byad bzang po rgyan dang bcas// spros pa yon tan mang po rgyan dang chas// sprul pa rnam pa mang po tshogs dang bcas// cis 'dul thabs kyis mtshon chas kun dang chas// dus dang sbyin pa lo bas mthu stobs
kyi rab// khyab 'jug brtsan po mthu stobs grub pa'i rab// gzi brjid 'bar ba bshes gnyen can gyi rab// bzhin 'dzum byang chub mchog gi lam ston rab// snying rjes 'khor ba mi stong thabs mkhas
mchog/ blo ldan skyon gyis mi gos ye shes mchog/ rtogs nas dad pas khyab par 'byung ba'i mchog/ nad rnams sel bar byed pa sman gyi mchog/ mtha' yas gsang sngags bzhir gyur nag po che// legs ldan

nag po chen po grags pa che// lag na rtse gsum log 'dren spa bkong che// kha dog so gtsigs glang chen pags gyon che// tshogs chen yang dag rdzogs pas sangs rgyas yin// dam tshig rgyas shis cir yang bstan
pa yin// khro zhing 'khor bzhi gnod pa med stobs yin// sgrib spangs dge 'dun legs par mchod pa yin// dkon mchog gtsug lag khang ni skyong bar mdzad// dge 'dun 'khor kun legs par 'phel bar
mdzad// gzhon nu gzhon de kun gyis rgyas par mdzod// log 'dren dgra bgegs ma lus 'dul bar mdzad// sems can kun la phan gdags snying la bsams// dad pas mchog bskyed dga' ba 'di mthong na// sdang
ba'i dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i mgon dang bcas// nad bral mthong na dga' ba'i rnam drug khyod// bsod nams dpal gyi rgyan pas rab mdzes te// tshogs bdag byin gyis grub na
gnod pa sel// 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar phun sum tshogs// 'dod pa gzhan yang 'di las byung ba yin// de bzhin 'dod pa thams cad 'di la grub lag tu// sman stong blta na sdug pa dug 'jil 'dra// pha

rol phyin bcu spyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrib pa rnam gnyis spangs la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pas lung bstan thob la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa grangs med 'das pa'i
sngon rol tu// mtha' yas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// rje mgon po dpal btsan sbyin la
goms pas nam mkha'i mdzod la rol// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas gnas gtsang mda' 'phang mtho// bzod pa phun sum tshogs pas mdangs gsal bkrag re gsal// brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs
pas stobs bcu rtsal dang ldan// bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pas mdangs gsal rdo rje gnan mi 'gul// shes rab phun sum tshogs pas rigs lnga'i spyan dang ldan// 'jig rten thabs kyi 'dul bas phyag rgya
tsan dan bzang// dge chos stobs su gyur pas spyi gtsug rdungs la 'phags// smon lam dbang du gyur pas 'jig rten kun la mnga'// ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// pha rol phyin
bcu spyod pas sa bcu'i gtso bo mdzad// sa bcu gtso bo lags pas chos kyi cod pan mdzes// mgon po spyan ras gzigs te thugs rje'i mnga' bdag can// nag po lha mchog khyod la bstod de gus phyag
'tshal// khyod la bstod pas bdag gi bsod nams dge tshogs 'phel ba dang// bdag gi bsam pa grub par thugs rjes mdzad du gsol// ma 'ongs pa na lung bstan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thal dbang

po// zhes bya bar ni 'gyur ba'i tshe// 'dren pa'i zhabs drung skyes nas kyang// chos kyi bdud rtsi 'thung bar shog/ 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud las// bar snang gi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'o// nag
po chen po'i rgyud dpal yon tan 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma'i bdag po'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po las dum bu gsum pa'o// 'phags pa rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la ka pA la ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po thod pa chen po'i rgyud/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab

ri'i rtse mo byang shar gyi mtshams na yongs 'du shing gi gnas mchog/ gnam lcags rngur mo gru gsum smug nag 'khar ba'i gzhal yas khang rgya khyon dpag tu med pa/ thod pa brtsegs pa'i 'khor lo la keng rus

kyi grong khyer gyi ra bas bskor ba/ zhing chen gyi ka ba dang mchog phran gyi dral ma can/ sprin med pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba dkar rgyas pa dang/ gza' dang skar ma rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ bse'i logs la
mchong gi zur btsud pa/ rmang gnam lcags 'bar bas byas pa/ kha bad g.yus brgyan pa/ zhing chen po kha gdengs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs dang mtshams brgyan pa/ mtha' ma lcags ri nag pos bskor ba/

phyogs dang mtshams thams cad khrag dang khrag gi rgya mtsho rba glong 'khrug pa/ ro dang ro chen dang/ ro'i rtsigs pa dang/ ro'i 'phreng ba dang/ ro'i rus pa dang/ ro chad pa dang/ ro 'chad pa dang/ ro zhe sdang gi mes

tshig pa dang/ phyed tshig pa dang/ keng rus phung po dang/ keng rus kyi phyed pa dang/ rus pa brul ba dang/ ro bam pa dang/ rnam par baM pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ 'khums pa dang/ langs pa dang/ 'gyel ba dang/

klad pa lug pa dang/ rnam par dmar ba la sogs pas/ gzhal yas khang bskor te gnas pa'i 'dam rdzab kyi nang na 'bu dang/ srin dang/ dus khrod kyi keng rus dang/ stag dang/ khyi dang/ spyang khyi dang/ lce spyang
nag mo dang/ kang ka dang/ gyi ling dang/ lin du dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya rog dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ dur bya la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis sha la za ba dang/ 'cha' ba dang/ 'thung ba dang/

lhag po dang/ mchong ba dang/ bskor ba dang/ lta ba dang/ rgod pa dang/ cho nges 'debs pa dang/ ku cho 'don pa la sogs pas bskor cing ya nga ba dang/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas mnam pa dang dri nga bas dpag

tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du khyab pa'i dbus na/ thod pa dgu brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas khang/ mi ro dang rta ro la sogs pa gcal du dkram pa'i nang du/ bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i sring mo// dpal lha mo nag mo

chen mo sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la/ lcags kyi dri'u rta rkang gsum la phyin phyogs su zhon pa/ re lde dang glang chen gyi ko bas dkris pa/ zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog tu bcug ste/ lte ba nas nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor 'char ba dang/ spyi bo'i gtsug nas mar gyi tshes brgyad 'char ba/ mche ba zur gsum rnam par gtsigs pa/ spyan dmar po sdang mig ltag pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar
ba/ g.yas pa gnam lcags kyi ral gri 'phyar ba/ lag pa g.yon pa na ne'u le rin po che'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi chas thams cad kyis brgyan cing/ rlung dud kha dmar nag

gi nang na zhe sdang 'du byed 'khrug pa/ me dpung dmar nag gi 'od las 'dod chags kyi tsha tsha 'phro ba/ de'u dbus na rab tu 'jigs par gnas pa'i 'phags ma lha mo nag mo chen mo/ 'khor srin po dang/ srin

mo dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ 'byung po dang/ 'byung mo dang/ dri za mo dang/ klu mo dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ ma mo mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dpag tu med pas bskor cing gnas te
'dug go/ gzhan yang lha ma srin sde brgyad 'khor mang po dang/ rnam thos kyi sras dang/ 'phags skyes dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ yul 'khor srung la sogs pa thams cad 'dus te gnas par gyur pa dang/ de'i
tshe dpal mkha' 'gro ma nyid drang srong gnam gyi bu la gzigs par gyur to// dpal thod pa nag po chen ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzh-i'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dpal mkha' 'gro ma nyid kyis sku

gsung thugs kyi gsang sngags/ las rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gsang sngags drag po 'di gsungs so// oM ru ru tsa ti a shug me/ ba ti ru ba kha sha la rag mo hUM/ ku ma ra da hUM nan/ tsa shi ku mA ra/ a

bud ta khug shi mug shi re ma ti khug nyi ki la kI tsa/ tud ta ke shu mud nya dgra la chug swA hA/ oM she ke mud nyid dgra bo kha la yan/ ta hUM tsakra/ dgra bo kha ma ya na/ ru ru a shug me/ ka ling ka ru ru a shug me/ s+ye

ta tud+ha dgra bo ma ra ya swA hA/ oM ma snying sha rag mo ma hring thuM rbad/ ma ma snying rtsa srog la chuM thuM sha rbad/ ma myos gug tsha ra ling sha snying rbad/ thuM ril li li lang to rbad/ snying to rbad mA ra ya phaT swA hA/ de nas
dpal ldan mkha' 'gro mas// gsang sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni// ri rab 'gul zhing rgya mtsho 'khrug/ sa gzhi rnam pa drug tu g.yos// drag po'i gnam lcags char du bab// nad kyi 'du 'phro skar ltar
'khrug/ mtshon gyi bskal pa me ltar 'bar// 'jigs pa'i dgra yi gnam sa khengs// thams cad phung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis// rang gi 'khor rnams mkha' 'gro mas// srog nas drangs bzhin ma mo 'dus// gcig
la gcig kyang rbod pa'i stabs// thams cad yang dag gsod la brtson// de tshe 'jig rten thams cad bsregs// rnam par bred nas 'dar bar gyur// mig rtsa rig rig lta byed cing// bstod pa sna tshogs byed
pa yin// 'jig rten dregs pa'i lha srin yang// thams cad gus bcas bstod pa spobs// sha khrag srog dbugs len pa'o// ma mo mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma// srin po gshin rje yi dgas sogs// pho mo
zhabs drung 'dus nas kyang// khrag tu skyug cing bka' nyan byed// dpal thod pa nag po'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags drag po cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////
de nas yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo dang/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis/ las rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa/ dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni//

tshogs kyis sbyangs nas don dam mthong ba'i sa// bsnyen po ye shes rim par bsgom pa las// mthar phyin sa la phyin pa'i don mchog lags// de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te//

dang po tshogs la yang dag bar bsags pas// dang po'i sar sbyor sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes// rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni// rnam par mi rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par te//

rang sems sa gnyis dag la rab bsten nas// de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son// rang sems bzhi bzhi'i sa la cher bsgoms pas// lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son// rang drug pa yi sa la cher sbyangs pas//

bdun pa la ni thabs kyis pha rol son// rang sems brgyad pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid// dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon tan bsgrubs// de yi stobs kyis ye shes 'phel bar bsgom//

'di ltar rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni// sangs rgyas sa la smin pa'i smon lam can// sa brgyad non pa gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma// 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag po'i tshul ston cing// gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//

bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub shog/ dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal nag po chen mo la/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa ste le'u gsum pa'o////

de nas dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pas/ dpal gyi lha mo dkar mor gyur pa dang/ dpal gyi lha mo ser mor gyur pa dang/ dpal gyi lha mo dmar mo gyur pa dang/ dpal gyi lha mo nag mo gyur pa de nyid la de ltar bstod pa/

sems nyid zhi bar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// mthun par bstan pa zhi ba dpal lha mo//

zhi mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// zhi ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu dag/ dus gsum kun tu thams cad zhi mdzad ma// bdag gi rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'di yi mthus//
sngon 'das zhi bar grub pa khyod la ni// bdag gi smon lam 'phrin las bcol
ba yang// bdag la phyi yi dgra bgegs nad rnams ni// phyi yi tshul gyis bar chad zhi bar mdzod// de bzhin nang gi nad dang dgra bgegs rnams// nang gi tshul gyis nyon mongs rnam rtog
rnams// thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// sems nyid rgyas par gyur pa'i khyad par ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun

rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// mthun par bstan pa rgyas la dpal lha mo// rgyas mdzad rgyas gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can// rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo rab tu
brjid// dus gsum kun tu thams cad rgyas mdzad ma// bdag gi rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'di yi mthus// sngon 'das rgyal ba grub pa khyod la ni// bdag gi smon lam 'phrin las bcol ba yang// bdag la phyi
yi dgra bgegs nad rnams ni// phyi yi tshul gyis bdag don rgyas par mdzod// de bzhin nang gi nad dang dgra bgegs rnams// nang gi tshul gyis bsod nams ye shes rnams// thams cad rgyas gyur cig pa'i
'phrin las mdzod// rang sems dbang du gyur pa'i khyad par ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// mthun
par bstan pas dbang mdzad dpal lha mo// dbang mdzad dbang 'gyur dbang gi ngang tshul can// dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dmar mo shin tu mdzes// dus gsum kun
tu thams cad dbang mdzad ma// bdag gi rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'di yi mthus// sngon 'das dbang mchog grub pa khyod la ni// bdag gi smon lam 'phrin las bcol ba ni// bdag la phyi yi dgra bgegs nad
rnams ni// phyi yi tshul gyis bdag don dbang du mdzod// de bzhin nang gi nad dang dgra bgegs rnams// nang gi tshul gyis nyon mongs rnam rtog rnams// nang gi tshul gyis thams cad dbang du mdzod// rang
sems drag por gyur pa'i khyad par ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob rgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// mthun par bstan pa dbang mdzad

drag po dpal lha mo// dbang mdzad drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can// drag po'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu 'jigs// dus gsum kun tu thams cad zhi
mdzad ma// bdag gi rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'di yi mthus// sngon 'das drag po grub pa khyod la ni// bdag gi smon lam 'phrin las bcol ba dang// bdag la phyi yi dgra bgegs nad rnams ni// phyi yi tshul
gyis gnod pa drag po sod// de bzhin rang gi nad dang dgra bgegs rnams// nang gi tshul gyis thams cad 'chi bar mdzod// khyod kyi rang bzhin ci yang ma yin pas// 'di ltar mtshan nyid ci yang
snang ba ni// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i 'gro don mdzad pa lags// bdag kyang las bzhi'i rang bzhin lhun grub nas// khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog/ dpal gyi lha mo gyur pa dri za'i 'khor gyis

bskor ba la// dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pas 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i sgo nas/ bstod pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser mig can gyis rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa
rnams dang lhan cig tu/ dpal lha mo nag mo la nam mkhar lding gi 'khor gyis bskor nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo la drag po 'jigs par gyur nas gnas pa la bstod pa/ dpal ldan nag mo dpag par

dka' ba'i don// thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mtha' la spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la// sgo gsum rdul snyed dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod ni bdag gi mchod pas ma bsgribs
kyang// dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char 'babs pas// mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis dbang po rgyas gyur cig/ dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig dbang po ste// bdag

gi lus ngag sems kyi sgrib pa'i tshogs// khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags nas// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod// khyod kyis khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni// 'gro ba'i don mdzad
bdag don phun sum tshogs// dga' mthun phrag dog med pas spro ba ni// rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyu la 'bul// 'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni// nag mo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcu

dus gsum kun tu 'gro don la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs// yang dag yon tan khyod kyi sku mchog ni// gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sems can zad par ma gyur bar du
ni// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba gdab// 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang// rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba 'di yis ngan song stongs gyur nas// thams

cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo// dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas yan lag bdun pa'i mchod brjod bstod pa ste le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas klu'i
rgyal po dga' bos/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo klu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i sku la/ yon tan rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma// yon tan rtags kyi sku mdog phyag

mtshan ni// don du snang ba med kyang 'dul ba'i phyir// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstod pa'o// hUM/ sngon tshe dpal chen thugs kyi lha mo ni// nyi ma byang shar mtshams shed na// g.yu mtsho bse mkhar
nang na bzhugs pa ni// 'phrin las rnam bzhi ma lus mdzad pa'i rtags// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis bzhugs pa ni// chos nyid skye med thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rtags// gdug pa 'dul
phyir dre'u nag rkang gsum zhon// khams gsum 'dul phyir blun po bung bu gnon// mya ngan mi 'da' rtags su lcags sgro mnga'// bdag don phun tshogs glang chen ko bas brgyan// gzhan don phun sum tshogs

phyir re ldes dkris// byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug zla bas brgyan// shes rab rtags phyir nyi mas lte ba brgyan// dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang// bsod nams gter 'byin phyag mtshan ne'u le
bsnams// dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral pa khams nag sprug/ nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dbal mche ba gtsigs// 'khor ba ljags la gtar phyir rkan sgra bsdebs// gdug pa zhe la gnan phyir sdang mig

bgrad// thams cad dbang sdud chags phyir spyan rtsa dmar// gnyen po'i tshogs bcom mi 'gyur sku mdog nag/ ma mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// sku gsung thugs ldan rtags kyi kha T+wAM gsor// sku
gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir tshubs mas brgyan// nyon mongs bsregs phyir me dpung nang na bzhugs// 'dod khams bskyang phyir yongs 'du'i shing la
brten// lha min 'dul phyir rdzong gi bka' bzlog ma// dpal brtul brten phyir stag gi sham thabs bsnams// bstan pa bsrung phyir drag po'i cha lugs rdzogs// nga rgyal dbang sdud bdag med sgra

sgrogs rtags// thabs kyi snyan cha g.yas pa seng ges brgyan// zhe sdang dbang sdud dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab bsnyan cha gdug pa sbrul gyis brgyan// 'du byed mi rtag rtags kyi dril bu sgrog/ chags

phyir rngam mdzad khrag gi rba glong 'thung// dam tshig bsrung phyir zhing lpags brgyan du mdzad// tha dad las rnams 'dul phyir rma byas brgyan// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas// ye shes rig
pa'i tshogs rnams bshad mdzad phyir// rang bzhin gnas mchog byang shar mtshams na bstan// dbu ma'i sa la gnas rten dre'u chibs// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir srin mo'i tshul// byang chub sems dpa'

khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bos rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa ste le'u drug pa'o//// de nas grul bum gyi rgyal
po sbrul mgo dgu pas/ dpal lha mo chen mo la grul bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya la bstod pa/ don dam gnyis med byang chub sems kyang med// srid pa gdul phyir

rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// rang sems rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang// rak+ta khrag gi rba glong 'khyil ba la// keng rus thod 'phreng zhing gi rgyan gyis brgyan// sku mdog gnag la rab brjid khro mo'i rgyal// sngon

mo ral pa 'dzings pa'i sprul pa 'gyed// sku yi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma dzu// gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo kha la bzhad// 'phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye
bar mdzod// gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti// gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// dmar mo chen mo dbang chen gtum mo ste// dbang gi 'phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// thugs

kyi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma dza// gru gsum sngo skya zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// dkar mo chen mo zhi ba'i pho nya ste// zhi ba'i 'phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho
la// dregs pa 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal nas kyang// 'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa rgyas mdzad
ma// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlobs// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya la
bstod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris chen pos/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la lha ma yin gyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i sku la/ don dam pa'i sgo nas shin tu yang
dag pas bstod pa/ spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang// thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yul// gdod nas gnyis med nam mkha'i snying po ni// dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par
lags// de yi rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la// byis pa rnams ni bstod pa byed pa ltung// blun po rnams kyi dngos por rab brtags nas// gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba'i dgongs

pa thugs chud khyod nyid la// tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams// nam kyang sgrol bar gyur pa'i chos nyid min// gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma rtogs par// khyod kyi smon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrul

la// don du gzung zhing gang zhig bstod pa rnams// khyod la brten nas thams cad ltung bar 'gyur// gang zhig skye ba med pa shes pa dang// gdod nas gnyis med snying po bsgom nus na// gang zag de yis khyod
ni bstod pa yin// khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yin// bskal pa grangs med 'das pas rab ltas kyang// khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus// gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin

rnams kyis mthong// sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa thams cad kyis// khyod nyid bos kyang bskal par mi thos te// 'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni// khyod kyang mthong la de yang khyod kyis thos// gang
zhig thos 'dod ngal bas khyod bsgrubs na// blun po de yis nams kyang khyod nyid spangs// lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod na// mchod nas dngos grub de yis thob par 'gyur// khyod ni rgyal ba

mang po'i yon tan sdud// chos kyi dbyings la rgyal ba rnams dang mol// zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa khyod// mi mjed 'jig rten shin tu rgyud rtsub pa// phyi rol tshul gyi thabs kyis 'dren mdzad ma// khyod

kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa// sdig pa mang po stong nyid ngang du bshags// stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod// stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod// 'di ltar bstod na bstod par 'gyur grang

bas// khyod nyid bstod bya'i yul can ma yin nga// byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod// dpal thod pa nag po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mor gyur pa la/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs

ris kyis bstod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o//// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo lha'i 'khor gyis bskor ba la/ dang po de'i dam chos dge ba bcu'i rnam par smin pa'i sgo nas
bstod pa/ 'jig rten 'khor ba 'di ni las la grub// las ni rnam gnyis dge sdig gnyis kyi mthus// mtho ris ngan song srid pa'i grong khyer smin// sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol nas// dge bcu'i

las la rang sems cher sbyangs nas// lam gyi khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang// mtho ris skyes pa rnams la dge ba bcu'i// tshul gyis ston mdzad phyi rol bsgyur ba yi// dpal ldan lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal
bstod// 'das pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas// sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byad phun sum chogs// gzhan gyi lan tshogs gnod pa'i rkyen dang bral// 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal
bstod// ma byin len pa'i tshul la rab sbyangs pas// bsod nams tshogs kyi longs spyod phun sum tshogs// bsod nams longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes// sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal

bstod// mi tshangs spyod pa'i dka' thub rnams bsrungs pas// mngal gyi grong khyer dman las khyad par 'phags// srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste// dge sbyong chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon
mongs brdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis// bka' btsan gsung gis 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso// gsung mchog rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te// bden pa gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal

bstod// phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan// nyid la rnam par 'dud pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad pa// dkar mo'i 'khor skyong khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ngag

'khyal spangs pa'i yon tan smin pa ni// ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo bar chad spangs// dgongs 'brel tshul du bstan pa skyong mdzad ma// byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal tshig rtsub

spangs pa'i yon tan ni// zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs can ma// tshig rtsub gshe ba'i gnyen po med pa ste// tshig rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par
ni// 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spang pa'i rtags// bdag med rtags su seng ge rna bas brgyan// brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam spangs pas// phyi
rol yul ni gnyis med chos su gzigs// gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags// sbrul gyi rna ba can la phyag 'tshal bstod// log par lta ba'i phyogs ni rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas chos las
'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can// spros bral don ldan ston la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag/ ma dag mi dge bcu las ngan song
grub// dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub// las 'di dge ba dang por rab spyad pas// gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang// dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan// gdug pa'i tshul

gyis 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma// bstod par 'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dang po dge bcu'i sgo nas
rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas bstod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o//// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la mi 'am ci'i 'khor gyis bskor ba la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/
dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste// don dam spros bral chos nyid 'di las 'tshal// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa gnyis med zab// sems can sangs rgyas
gnyis su med pas 'phags// las dang rnam smin gnyis su med pas bstod// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med yang dag smin// yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi dang// spros dang spros med don dam dbyings
kyis bsdus// bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen te// mtho dang dma' ba gnyis med dag pas bstod// bdag dang bdag gi chos ni ngang tshul gcig/ gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis ni
'khor ba'i mtha'// mtho ris ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing// bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod// bskyed dang rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun grub mchog/ sangs rgyas sems can gnyis
med sems nyid de// bsgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis med grub pa'i ngang// bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bstod// yab yum mkha' dbyings gnyis med byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab

gnyis med 'brel ba'i don// stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i ngang// 'gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i ngang// lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid
gcig gi tshul// rtsol byed rtsol byed gnyis med don gcig pas// rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis bstod// mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med don
rtogs// srid dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas// thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyi dang nang gnyis gnyis med gcig gi ngang// sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul// snang
dang mi snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong// gnyis med don mchog mthong la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul// spros pa med pa'i don dang 'brel ba de// khyod kyi rgyud la 'di
dag yongs su tshang// 'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog/ gnyis su med pas thugs su chud pa'i mchog/ gnyis med don la rtag tu gnas pa'i mchog/ gnyis su med pa de ni khyod nyid de// bdag
kyang gnyis med don gyis 'dir 'grub shog/ dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gnyis med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa ste le'u bcu

pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid kyis/ thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir drag po'i gsang thun gyi ngan sngags 'di gsungs so// trag rag+sha kha mun tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ra ya thun ya/ trag rag+sha snying

khrag snying b+h+yo/ ma ra ya thun ya/ spu ta spu ta b+h+yo/ ma ra ya thun ya/ sha sha trag sha trag mA ra ya thun ya/ trag mo tra ba/ snying trag snying trag mA ra ya thun ya/ trag mo trag ma/ ma ra ya thun ya/ 'di dag gsungs pa'i
mod la ni// 'jig rten thams cad phung bar gyur// gnam lcags 'phreng ba lta bu yi// mda' ni 'jig rten char pa 'bab// lcags sol mal nas phyung 'dra ba'i// phur pa 'jig rten snying la zug/ gnam lcags
tsha tsha lta bu yi// yungs dkar mang po thad du thim// las kyi dra ba 'joms pa'i phyir// kham bu'i thun ni snying la gnod// thams cad kha nas khrag skyug cing// kha thun shugs kyis myos pa
dang// 'jig rten dug gi char pa babs// gsang thun gsang ba'i sngags zor yin// de tshe 'jig rten dngangs nas bsreg/ thams cad skyabs nas bstod pa byed// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las drag
po gsang thun gyi gsang sngags bstan pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcus/ rang gi 'khor srin po'i tshogs dang bcas pas/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstod pa/

dbyings phyug dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba thugs rjes bskyang phyir yum gyis tshul// mtshan ma'i skyon spangs sku mdog dmar mor ston// drag shul spyod phyir gcer bu srin mo'i tshul// lha chen gdug
phyir sdang mig ral pa gsigs// skye shi rtsad gcod mi bzad mche ba gtsigs// byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug zla gsal rgyas// g.yul ngo bzlog phyir mdung dang ru mtshon bsnams// srid gsum bsgral phyir
shes rab ral gri bsnams// dgra bgegs 'dul phyir nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams// dbul ba sel phyir ne'u le'u rkyal pa thogs// 'chi bdag bzlog phyir snyan cha seng ges brgyan// gdug pa 'dul phyir klu dbang
