snyan char brgyan// 'byung po dngangs phyir thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rnal 'byor bskyang phyir dril chen sgra snyan sgrogs// klu chen 'dul phyir sbrul gyi ske rags bcings// bdud dpung sba bkong zhing lpags gos

su gon// smon lam mi 'dor sku smad re ldes dkris// mdzes par bya phyir rkang sgrog lcags las byas// nyon mongs mtsho skems lte ba nyi mas brgyan// srin po 'dul phyir chibs su bong bu chibs// stong gsum
bgrod phyir tshub ma'i nang na bzhugs// dur khrod gnas phyir g.yog 'khor ma mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba 'jig tshe sdug bsngal sems can rnams// khyod kyi zhal du thams cad bzhugs par 'gyur// brtse

ldan thugs rjes 'gro ba kun bskyang nas// byang chub spyod pa thar lam ston mdzad pa'i// lha mo mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la/ srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcus bstod
pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la 'khor thams cad yongs su bcas te/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i thad du song nas yongs su bstod pa/ nad kyi bdag mo dpal lha mo nag mo

chen mo/ 'gro ba kun gyi mnga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pa la// ro nyes rna chas bgegs shing cha lugs ma lus 'chang// rgyan du rkang sgrog lcags las byas pa gcig
gis// rang gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa yi// gcer bu bong bu zhon zhing kun tu rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod// bdag nyid mdzes par shes shing gzhan lta khyod kyis mkhyen// khyod kyi spyod pa dod la su zhig

shes// nag zhig 'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag du 'thul ba na// lha mo khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// nag mo mi thod thogs pas khyod ni grub

pa'i rnal 'byor ma ste dur khrod steng du dgyes// g.yon can rnam bzhi'i nad byed 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa sel zhing zhi la mi bzad dril yang sgrogs// khyod ni dpa' bo dag gis mgo bo mtshon gyis legs par bcad

pa'i 'phreng ba thogs shing gar yang byed// lag pa gnyis kyang bskum gyis gtso che la// klu dbang 'jigs pa'i ske rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang ral gri thogs pa la// khrag gi chang gis rab tu myos pa mig

rtsa dmar por 'gyur zhing mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba de ni 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis mthong// ko rlon chan pas dras te rkyang ba'i gos kyis gnam gyi phyed g.yogs ma// phyed ni smyug ma'i re ldes rab tu

dkris// mi yi rgyu ma lcags kyis bkang ba dag gis zhal gyi zla gam brgyan cing 'gram par sil// lus ni snum gyis byugs shing khrag dang thig les bris// mi ro'i sha la sos ni chem chem gtsod byed cing// nag

mo thod pa can ni bdag la skyong gyur cig/ drag mo mi sha kha ni thogs pa snga nas ma byung khyod mthong na// ma mo rnams kyang skrag cing dngangs 'thon nas// mig rtsa rig rig lha mo khyod la 'dud// nag mo lus
mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la ni// brgya byin la sogs nyon cig bzhin du bstod phyag 'tshal// gshin rje rnams kyang 'dar zhing 'dud par byed// mi rnams dag ni 'gro ba ma lus pa yi 'jug
btul nas// rna ba ya gcig la ni brang gis 'gro ba'i gdengs kar ldan// ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs byed brgyan cing rgya mtsho bskor ba'i sa gzhi gnon// steng gi phyogs nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma'i

'od zer stong gi 'od ldan khyod kyi lte ba'i phyogs su gzhag/ rgya mtsho'i klong na me 'bar chu rnams skems par byed pa'i bud med thams cad zhi mdzad ma// lha chen sku dang mtshams par bzhugs pa'i bka' zlog nag mo min nad
phyugs nad kun la 'jigs pa med// ma cig khyod nyid la ni bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod par bgyi// rgya mtsho gting nas me 'bar ma// mtsho rnams skems par nus pa ste// bud med thams

cad zhi mdzad ma// lha chen sku yi phyed du bzhugs// rdzong dang dka' bzlog nag mo che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pas// mi nad phyugs nad gang yin khyod kyis mkhyen// de la 'jigs pa med pa 'gyur// mi
nad thams cad zhi mdzad ma// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo khyod// rtag par bdag la skyong gyur cig/ dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la// 'dzam bu gling
gi mi'i yul du bram ze chog sred kyis bstod pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas rigs shes rnam par ldan pas/ bram ze ke'u 'di nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la rnam par bstod pa/ lha mo mthu chen
khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi btsun par khyod la bstod// 'jig rten 'di na rang dbang thob// sngon gyi bram zes bstod pa ltar// bkra shis mchog bsgrub sems bde gnas// yid myur gzugs chen kun

tu grags// ma mor byed cing 'jig rten skyong// dpa' brtan rtag spyod brtson 'grus che// 'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal// snying rje che zhes mngon par bstod pa ltar// gos su dar gos sngon po gon// sdug
dang mi sdug sna tshogs 'chang// spyan mig mthong na kun kyang dngangs// dpag med mchog bsgrub sems bder gnas// dad cing phyogs pa'i mi rnams sdud// bar bar ri brag zab mor gnas// bar bar tshal

dang shing la gnas// bar bar phug chu 'gram na gnas// bar bar rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas// bar bar ri rab rtse la gnas// lha mo'i gnas rten de ru bca'// gal te ri 'tshal mi rgod dag rtag tu lha mo khyod

la mchod// rma bya'i sgros ni rgyal mtshan byas// rtag tu 'jig brten bsrung bar nus// seng ge stag spyang rtag tu rtog/ gnag lug bya rnams srung bar byed// rdo rje dril chen dkrol nas ni// byin d+hi ril sgra kun tu
sgrogs// lan 'ga' lag tu tri shul thogs// lag gnyis lag na zla ba'i ru mtshon thogs// mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig la// de yi dus su mchod byas nas// lha mo mchod pas lhag pa med// 'dud tshul lha

chen srin mor ston// 'thab mo g.yul mthong stag snying rje// skye bo mang po'i nang rtags can// lha mo mchod pas lhag pa med// re 'ga' rtse dga'i bu mor ston// lha dag 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed// gtso bor byed

cing kha lo sgyur// bud med nang na mchog tsam spyod// tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon por grags// rgyal po'i khyab nas pad+ma 'dra// zhal bzangs zla ba nya ba 'dra// chu bo dag la gru zam 'dra// dgra bo chom rkun
'jigs pa'i tshe// dran pas nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing// de dag thams cad sel bar mdzad// de bas bdag gis btsun par bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lha mo mthu chen la bram ze ke'u
di nas bstod pa ste le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas/ gsang sngags rnam pa gsum gyi khyad par gsungs pa/ dang por sngags kyi mgo la oM// ru ru tsa ti a shug me// ba ti
ru tra kha sha la// rag mo hUM rnams bcu bdun sngags// bod pa srog gi snying po yin// ku ma ra ste 'dod la zhon// d+ha dun na ni dbyings na gnas// tsa sha ku ma rag zhon drag/ a tsud ta khug shi mug

shi/ re ma ti yi khug nyid yin// gsang sngags yi ge rtsa gsum ste// gnad la bor ba'i bod pa yin// tut+ta ke shug mud nyid nya ni// dgra la chu gces rbad pa dang// bod pa'i gsang sngags khyad par yin// de

bzhin rbad pa'i mgo la oM// she khe mud nyi zhes bos nas// dgra bo kha la yan zhes rbad// yi ge bcu pa rbad pa yi// srog gi snying por gyur pa yin// d+ha du dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// tsakra 'khor los gsad

pa ni// dgra bo kha la yan zhes bsgrubs// sngags dgu dbyangs su gsad phyir rbad// de ltar nye bar bskul ba'i phyir// ru ru a shug me ma 'khor// ka li ki ne sgra gzugs la// ru ru a shug me zhes bskul// s+ye

ka te tud ta zhes la// khyod kyi dgra bo gsad pa'i phyir// mA ra ya zhes gsad pa dang// swA hA sngags kyi sham bu tshang// yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga 'di// nye bar las la bskul ba yi// rbad pa nyid du byin gyis

brlabs// thams cad 'dus pa'i 'phreng ba 'di// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi rbad sngags yin// 'dir yang gsad phyir mgo la oM// ma zhes nga la bos nas ni// dgra yi snying sha gcod pa ni// reg mo sprul pa'i snying po

yin// ma sring snying pos gsad ba'i phyir// dbang po thum dang lus srog rbad// gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa 'di// gsad pa'i spyi khyab sngags kyi mgo// ma ma snying rtsa srog la chum// yi ge bdun pa'i nang gsad

yin// phyi rol rbad pa thum sha rbad// yi ge gsum pa'i de nyid yin// phyi nang gsad phyir ma mo brlang// sngags kyi brda ni gug tshar ling// sgra ltar bshad pa sha snying rbad// yi ge brgyad pa 'di yis ni// bsgrub

bya'i phyi nang gnyis ka gsod// dbang po rnams ni shi na thum// brda tshig sgra ltar byin gyis brlabs// dbang po kun la ri li li// lang rdo rbad ni gsad pa yin// yi ge bdun pa dbang po gsad// sgo lnga'i shes

pas snying po rbad// sgo lnga'i gsang sngags gsum pa yin// thams cad gsod phyir kun gyi sgra// ma ra ya zhes gsad pa yin// phaT kyis drag sngags thams cad rdzogs// de bzhin swA hA sngags kyi mtha'// yi
ge drug pa'i mthu stobs ni// lus dang dbang po shes pa dang// thams cad gsad pa'i gsang sngags yin// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa bzhis ni// drag po sngags kyi lus rnams rdzogs// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i
rgyud las// gsang sngags rnam pa gsum gyi khyad par bshad pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje nag mo chen mos// 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas nas dud 'gro'i 'jig rten du rnam par
song ngo// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams na dud 'gro'i rnam pa 'dab ma can gyi rigs dang/ sder mo can dang mche ba can gyi rigs dang/ rwa dang gzhug ma yod pa'i rigs dang/ drod las skyes pa

dang gsher las skyes pa dang/ mngal las skyes pa dang/ sgo nga las skyes pa dang/ rdzus te skyes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par bstod/ dud 'gro de dag kyang mthu dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ bsod
nams dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'phrul ba dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ston pa'i zhal mthong ba'i khyad par yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa yin te/ lam dang nye ba/ lam du 'jug pa/

las la gnas pa/ lam gyi 'phrul ba can 'ba' zhig ste/ de dag rnams kyis dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam par 'phrul ba yang shes nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas yongs su bstod pa/ 'jig rten gtso la rtag tu
gus phyag 'tshal// ma rnams nang na khyod ni mchog gyur te// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kun gyi mchog/ byad bzhin rab mdzes thams cad lta bar 'os// mig yangs pad+ma sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra// bsod
nams rin chen 'bar ba'i grags pas brgyan// dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bus mtshungs// ding bdag dam pa khyod la bsngags pas na// ji ltar seng ge gcan gzan mchog gyur pa// sngags sogs tsig
ni 'di las 'byung ba yin// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad grub par mdzod// de nas dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas 'khor rnams kyi gnyer gsungs pa/ 'jig rten 'di na bzang po'i dus// zla gcig drug ldan

nga yi dus// yar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig dang// de bzhin mar gyi bcu gcig dgu/ 'pho ba dang ni phyed dus drug/ nga ni 'jig rten nyul ba'i dus// lha min drang srong rnams kyis mchod// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin

drod nyung zhing// dge sdig las kyis bag chags lta// de yi dus su khyed rnams kyis// nga yi 'khor rnams bskyang ba dang// dam tshig ldan pa bsrung ba dang// lta ba can la gus pa dang// spyod pa can rnams bsrung
bar shis// dam nyams gsad par 'os pa ni// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang// slob dpon smod par byed pa dang// dam tshig mched las 'khus pa dang// sdig can yongs la gnod pa de// myur du

gsod pa'i pho nyar byos// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis shin tu bstod cing thams cad bka' nyan par gyur nas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo'i thad du 'dus nas// rdo rje theg pa chen po'i srungs
mar gyur te rgyud dag pa'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs so// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dud 'gro'i 'jig rten rnam par btul ba ste le'u bcu drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje lha mo nag mo chen
mos 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas te/ yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du rnam par rgyu zhing rnam par song ngo// yi dgas kyi zhing dang// khams dang/ mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste// yi dgas nam mkha' la

rgyu ba mthu bo che'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzugs mi 'dra ba kha dog tha dad pa dang/ las dang bsod nams las grub pa'i nga rgyal can rnams dang/ sa gzhi dang/ gling bar dang/ mun pa dang/ grib ma

dang/ tshal gyi nang na 'dug pa'i rigs ser sna'i rnam par smin pa la shas cher gyur pa/ lus nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin can so so'i sdug bsngal mi 'dra ba ste tsha na mang pos gdungs pa/ rang gi shes pa 'khrul

ba'i dra ba dang rgya mdud dang/ srid pa'i phur pa chen pos btab ste 'dug pa ltar ston pa/ de dag 'dul ba'i gnyen po cha 'dra ba'i sprul pa khyad par dang bcas par gyur to// de nas dpal lha mo chen mos yi

dwags kyi sgrib pa sbyang pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha

ba/ a nu ra g+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yad ts+tsha sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shri yang ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga ban sarba ta thA ga ta badzra m+me mu ny+tsa badzr-i b+hA ba ma hA sa ya sa twa a/ de ltar yi dwags

kyi tshogs thams cad kyang sgrib pa sbyangs te dag par byas nas/ rdo rje theg pa chen po'i srungs ma dang/ rnal 'byor gyi gral du bkod do// de nas yi dwags kyi tshogs kyis bstod pa/ sangs rgyas stong gi
bstan pa'i gdung 'dzin pa// gsang sngags 'khor skyong 'gro ba 'dul mdzad cing// chos dang rdzas rnams mi 'jig ster mdzad ma// sbyin pa'i bdag mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dam pa rnams dang 'thun
pa'i don mnga' ba// sems can don rnams mthun par 'dren mdzad cing// don dang 'thun pas don mthun smon lam can// don mthun cho 'phrul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thog ma bar dang tha ma dge sems

kyis// gang gzugs ji ltar 'os pa'i rna ba la// mthun pa'i tshig dang gsung gis 'dul mdzad ma// snyan par smra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las// yi dwags kyi 'jig
rten btul ba ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas te/ dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du rnam par song ngo// 'jig rten de ni 'di lta ste// mi dge ba'i

rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho chen po mtha' la thug pa med pa la gnas pa dang/ de lta bu'i sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan khyad par can rnams dang ldan par gyur to// de nas dpal ldan mkha' 'gro
mas/ sdig pa'i tshogs sbyangs ba'i gsang sngags kyi don bshad pa// mi dge ba'i rnam smin sbyang ba'i phyir// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yi ge ni// rgyal ba nga yis brtan par bya// oM ni rgyal ba

rnams kyi sku// badzra sa twa khyod brjod pas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// dam tshig gis mnyes sa ma ya// ma nu pa la ya brjod pas// dam tshig stobs kyi zil gyis gnon// badzra sad twa khyab pa'i

mtshan// twe no pa tiSh+Tha brjod pas// mnyes byed spyod pa rlabs po che// dr-i D+ho me b+ha zhes brjod pas ni// de 'dra'i thabs chen bdag la nus// su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba ni// rnam thar mchog gi bdag nyid yin// a nu rag+to

me b+ha ba// mi rtog gnas su bdag nyid 'gyur// su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba yang// gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid yin// sarba sid+d+hi me zhes pa// dngos grub thams cad bdag la 'dus// pra yad ts+tsha ni de tshad med// de yi

byin brlabs bstan pa yin// sarba karma zhes brjod pas// las kyi 'bras bu rnam dag pa'i// rjes su bdag nyid dag pa yin// sa tsa me byin tshad med gsal// de ltar byang byang chub sems tsit+taM// shri yang ku ru

hUM brjod pas// bdag gi lus las de ltar grub// ha ha ha ha gnyis med bzhad// ho ni gnyis med gnyis chen po// b+ha ga wan gyi mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan 'das dang tha dad min// sarba ta thA ga ta dang//

badzra m+me mu ny+tsa ni// thams cad de bzhin gshegs rdo rje// badzra swa b+ha ba ma hA dang// sa ma ya dang swA hA a// rdo rje mdzad du gsol ba yin// de nas rab tu gsungs pa ni// sngon 'das dus na gsad sogs
pas// de nyid dmyal bar 'dir skyes nas// khyod la gnod pa ma yin te// de yi rnam par smin pa ni// shes pa 'khrul bas yul 'di mthong// gnod pa'i dmyal dpon rje bo ni// de nyid sems can yin gyur
na// de yi sdig pa gang du 'gro// gang du de yi rnam smin ni// rgyal bas gang du ma gsungs so// gnod byed sems can yin na go/ thug pa med par cis mi 'gyur// rang sems nges par 'khrul yin pas// chos

nyid rab tu shes pas byos// khyed rnams ma 'ongs chos chen la// rab tu spyod par gyur pa ni// khyim gyi tha stag de la ni// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma rgya gram gtso bo dang// b+ha ga kha T+wAM ral gri dang// dbu
rgyan cod pan lha yi rigs// rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyur// nga yi 'khor rnams bskyang ba dang// rigs kyang 'dzin par shin tu byos// de nas dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis bstod pa/ byams

pa'i rang bzhin phan pa'i sems// gzhan gyi rgyud rnams cher skyob snying rje can// gzhan gyi don thob dga' ba can// zug rngu kun dang bral ba'i btang snyoms la// phyag 'tshal bstod de rab tu gus phyag
'tshal// de ltar dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar byas te/ rdo rje theg pa chen po'i srung ma dang/ rnal 'byor gyi gral du bkod do// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ dmyal

ba'i 'jig rten btul ba ste le'u bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje lha mo nag mo chen mos 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas te/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten du song ngo// de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal po
'khor dang bcas pas// lha ma yin gyi nga rgyal nyon mongs pa rnams las cher grub rnams kyis// mgrin gcig tu dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la 'di skad ces gsol to// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'
khyod kyis ni// bdag cag btul nas thar pa'i lam la bkod// sku gsung thugs kyi gzi brjid ma bzod pas// bka' nyon chos skyong theg chen zhing la mchis// srid pa 'di nas zhing khams mthar phyin
du// bdag cag bskyang phyir bskul zhing gsol ba ni// khyod kyi thad du smon lam btab pa ni// tshe rabs kun tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzod// yid bzhin nor bu bum pa dpag bsam sogs// sems ldan

med kyang gzhan gyi don 'byung na// snying rje brlan pa'i dpal ldan byang chub sems/ khyad par ci zhig smos te phyag 'tshal bstod// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba'i stobs kyis kyang// 'jig rten 'degs byed sems med

'di 'dra na// smon lam dbang gis 'gro ba'i rten 'gyur ba// khyod kyi rnam thar khyad par med kyang bstod// bdud dang srin po gshin rje gnod sbyin sogs// snying rje chung yang mos pas brten nas phan// dpal

ldan snying rje'i nga rgyal can khyod la// mos pas skyobs kyang cher skyob mdzad phyir bstod// 'jig rten 'di na srid pa'i 'khor lo rnams// byed pa med kyang las kyi dbang btsan pas// sngags dang phyag rgya ting
'dzin smon brlan na// 'khor ba'i pha rol son par mdzad phyir bstod// ltas ngan bdud dang mu stegs la brten nas// 'jig rten 'di yi dregs pa thang gcig bskyed// bdag cag dam pa khyod la skyabs gsol

bas// bdag don phun sum tshogs pa sgrub phyir bstod// 'jig rten dngos po stobs kyi khyad pa ni// rten cing 'brel ba'i nus pa dpag med nas// shes rab snying rje'i bdag nyid can khyod la// rten na mchog tu

grub phyir phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas lha ma yin thams cad yang dag pa'i lam la bzhag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bkod nas/ rdo rje theg pa chen po'i srung ma dang/ rnal 'byor gyi gral du bkod

do// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten btul ba ste le'u bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma chen mo la 'khor bye ba dung phyur dang bcas te/ slar dang po'i
gnas byang shar mtshams ri rab kyi steng yongs su shing gi gnas mchog tu song ngo// der 'khor dpag tu med pa mthu dang ldan pa'i drag po lha ma srin sde brgyad la sogs pas bskor te 'dug pa

dang/ lha'i dbang po la sogs pas dpal gyi lha mo la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa dang/ de nas dpal gyi lha mos 'khor rnams la gsungs pa/ mchod pa rnam lnga zhes bya ba/ sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa dpag

tu med pa'i sngon rol nas/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nga la bshad pa/ ngas khyod la bshad gyis nyon cig mchod pa rnam pa lnga 'di lta ste/ sngags dang/

phyag rgya dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdzas dang/ tshig bshad lnga'o// de ni lam lnga la sbyar ba ste/ de rnams lus ngag yid gsum gyi bsag pa ni/ sbyor ba dang theg pa chen po'i tshogs kyi lam du 'gyur ro// de rnams

la lus ngag yid gsum gyis sbyor ba ni/ theg pa chen po'i sbyor lam du shes par bya/ de rnams kyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi rig pa ni/ theg pa chen po'i tshogs kyi lam du 'gyur ro// de la rdzas ni sbyin pa'i rol
tu phyin pa yin pas/ sa dang po bsgom pa dang/ sngags ni tshul khrims yin pas/ sa gnyis pa sgom pa dang/ phyag rgya bzod pa yin pas/ sa gsum pa bsgom pa dang/ tshig bshad ni brtson 'grus yin pas/ sa

bzhi pa bsgom pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin ni bsam gtan yin pas/ sa lnga pa bsgom pa dang/ de rnams so sor ma 'dres pa ni shes rab yin pas/ sa drug pa bsgom pa dang/ de thams cad ni byang chub pa'i thabs su
gyur pas/ sa bdun pa bsgom pa dang/ de rnams lus ngag yid gsum gyi smon pa byang chub sems su gyur pas/ sa brgyad pa bsgom pa dang/ de las dad pa la sogs pa'i stobs skyes pas/ sa dgu pa bsgom pa

dang/ de rnams sbyar gzhag pa'i 'bras bu ye shes su gyur pas/ sa bcu pa sgom pa ni/ theg pa chen po'i bsgom lam du 'gyur ro// de'i mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gzugs rnam par snang

mdzad/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa'/ tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan/ 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas/ 'du byed don yod grub pa ni mthar phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyang 'di las gyur pa ste/ khyod kyis

kyang yang dag par sbyor cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bstan pa la gnod pa rnams la/ thod pa nag po'i nang drag pos bkang ste dkyil 'khor du bkod de/ byang ri gnyan po'i kha nas 'phang bar bya'o// de nas lha
rnams kyis bstod pa/ chos dbyings rnam dag thugs su chud pa'i yum// mngon spyod rgyal ba mang pos by-in brlabs pas// dus 'dir 'gro drug gyen du 'dren pa'i dpal// la lar drag po rnams kyi chung mar
ston// gdug pa'i ma dang 'jigs pa'i sring mo dang// la lar tshogs kyi rje mo mthun pa'i gzugs// yon tan cha las ci yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs// zug rngu zab mo ston la phyag 'tshal
bstod// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lha'i 'jig rten btul ba ste le'u nyi shu pa'o//// dpal thod pa nag po chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/

a mo g+ha sid+d+hi tiSh+Tha a ba lo tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ don yod pa dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud ces bya/ yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon 'das pa'i dus ma 'ongs pa'i sngon rol na/

srid pa thams cad yum gyi b+ha gar shar bar mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dpal he ru kas/ chos thams cad thig le chen po'i tshul du ye nas sangs rgyas shing/ rang rig pa'i ye

shes chen po rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul du mnyam zhing dbyer mi phyed de/ thams cad so so ma yin rang bzhin med pa yum gyi b+ha ga las phyin ci log tu rnam par zhen cing log par rtogs par/
brtags pa'i dbang gis srid pa thams cad yum gyi b+ha gar shar bar mkhyen nas/ gsang sngags log par spyad pa yis// srid pa gsum po thams cad la// dregs pas rim pa dbang sgyur ba// dge ba byed pa

bar chad bdud// nga rgyal khengs pa'i gshin rje dang// zhe sdang dregs pa'i ru tra dang// gti mug myos pa'i srin po rnams// sems can kun la dbang che ste// srid gsum lus rims kyi 'dus// nga rgyal dregs
pa'i gzugs 'chang ba// gzugs phung che la gdos pa rags// nga ro che zhing gtum bag can// srin po shin tu mi bsgrungs ldan// phyin ci log la yid ches pas// mtshan ma'i chos la blo rtas te// rang bzhin
med pa'i don dang bral// bdag rtog log par rtogs pa yis// srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phags// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong// bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khor// gal te de las thar nas

kyang// slar yang srid pa'i lus blangs nas// srin mo chen po de la spyod// srin mo de yi mtshan nyid kyang// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i dngos nyid mtshungs// zhen pa me yis rab tu tshig/ ma mo mkha' 'gro la sogs
te// cha lugs du mas bsgyur byas shing// srid gsum dug can dbang du sdud// shin tu rngams pa'i 'khor dang bcas// gsod pa'i las la dpa' zhing grims// sha dang khrag la sogs bcad de// de lta bu'i

sems dang ldan pa'i srin po dang srin mo chen mo gdul ba'i gnas su mkhyen nas/ yum gyi mkha' bde ba chen po'i klong nas thig le chen po'i tshul du bzhengs te/ che mchog he ru ka dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig pa phyag
bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par sprul te/ drag po nga ro hUM zhes brjod de/ sprul pas 'jig rten khams bkang nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa thul bar gyur kyang/ srin mo thul bar ma gyur te/ yab mngon

rdzogs rgyal pos hUM zhes brjod pas/ srid pa'i dman mo'i tshogs thams cad rang bzh-in ni mo rnams kyi steng du phrad pas brgyal bar gyur te/ 'khor thams cad brgyal bar mkhyen nas/ srin mo nyid dbang du

bsdu ba'i phyir/ hUM raM hUM la ni yo ga ni stam pa nan/ ces brjod pas/ rang bzhin grub pa mo'i tshogs dang/ ye shes brgyal te a ka sha stan nas bting ngo// de ltar bting yang ma thul bar mkhyen nas/ pany+tsa yo ga

ni sa ma ya phaT/ ces pas/ jo mo rnams kyang 'byung ba lnga'i rgyal mos mnan pa dang/ de yi rjes su srin po kro d+hi shwa ri de nyid spu langs te bred par gyur to// de ltar mkhyen nas de bzhin nyid du mu kha le b+ha ga

bde klong sa ma ya hUM zhes pas/ 'byung ba lnga yi bdag mo yang yum chen mo mu kha les brjis par gyur to// de nas srin mo kro d+hi shwa ris de mthong ba dang/ shin tu sdangs nas bros te 'dod pa'i khams la dbang

sgyur ba'i srin po dang/ srin pa gzhan dang gnod sbyin mo la thug pa'i bar du dbang bsdus te gnas so// de nas yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po mkhyen bzhin du/ de bzhin nyid mu kha les sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes pas/ yum

chen mo'i zhal lnga nas he ru ka lnga 'thon par gyur te/ b+ha ga lnga'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i byang chub sems kyi rgyud las/ sprul pa tha dad kyis 'khor tha dad dbang du bsdus pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dpal yak+Sha he ru ka
la sogs pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa sprul te btul bas/ 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'khor dang bcas pa brgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas gsang ba'i bdag po lag

na rdo rje sprul te/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma btul te 'khor de nyid na gnas so// de'i tshe lha gnod sbyin 'dul 'khor de na gnas pa stan las langs te/ mgrin pa bteg
gnas gdong drang por bltas te thal mo sbyar te/ yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po la 'di skad gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma sprul pa dang bcas pa/ gnas tha dad nas 'khor tha
dad pa dang bcas te 'dus par gyur pa 'di/ thugs rje bskyed du gsol zhes zhus pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yum gyi mkha' la yid byed pa po nyid snyoms par zhugs pa las/ byang chub sems kyi

'od zer rgyun ma chad par bkye ba las/ yum 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrib pa dag par gyur nas/ 'khor thams cad kyang dran pa rnyed de bde bas tshim par gyur to// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma
nyid sprul pa 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus te 'di skad ces gsol to// de ring phan chad khyed kyi 'bangs// sngags kyi bdag por bdag cag gnyis// mthu dbang
byin gyis brlab tu gsol// ji ltar 'di dang phyi ma gnyis// bka' rnams 'gro ba'i don bsgrub phyir// gsungs pa bzhin du bdag cag bgyid// gal te de ltar ma bgyis na// mgo lus snying yang 'gas gyur

cig/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma// phyi dus rnal 'byor phan gdags phyir// sngon byung sprul pa'i tshul dang ni// phyis 'byung sprul pa'i tshul smos la// khyed gnyis srog dang
mon mo rnams// ma lus par ni dus 'di smos// de skad bka' stsal thos pa dang// 'dod khams lcam dral 'khor bcas kyis// ston pa'i bka' ni gus par blangs// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs rje
yis// phyag rgya bzhi yis dbang du bsdus// thabs dang shes rab gcig pa las// byang chub sems kyi byin brlabs kyis// skad cig de la 'jig rten 'das// zhes gsungs so// dngos grub brtan par
gzigs pa'i rgyud las// dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po ji ltar btul ba dang/ bde ba thob pa dang/ dam bcas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dpal chen po he ru ka yis bka' stsal pa bzhin bya ba dang/

phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa bskyang ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i tshul bzung ste/ dpal zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// rang srog gi snying po dang dmod mo dus 'dir bzhes su gsol/ de nas dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag

po dang/ 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'khor dang bcas pas/ phyi nang gsang ba'i srog gi snying po dang dmod mo rnams smras pa/ oM badzra yak+Sha de ba ma hA kA la kro d+ha hUM dzA dza dza/ oM badzra yak+Sha de ba ma hA pe ta li

hUM dza dza/ oM ma hA kA la ku da ku ta hUM dza dza dza/ kang ka kha ra dza pe ta yak+Sha ni dza/ oM ma hA kA la gu na hri ta hUM dza hUM dza/ ma hA kA la argaM pra ti dza ye swA hA/ he be du 'bar ma bi du bi snu be du dza dza dza hUM/ in+d+ra ya ma dza la

yak+Sha bu ta bah+ni ba yu rak+Sha nA ga tsan+d+ra sU r+ya ma ta ma pa ta la ta le/ ar+tha sa ma ba dza dza hUM/ rbad brdeg las dang thun mong rnams// dpa' bo chen po bzhes su gsol// oM ma hA kA la ni thum lam thum ril rbad/ bu ni

dza snying la ya/ trag rag+sha snying kha rag dza/ ma hA kA la gshog gsha' ma hUM ram kI li kI li a nu shag tshal mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la hUM che ge mo zhig aM ku sha hUM/ gr-i h+na gr-i h+na shri kraM gr-i h+na gr-i h+na hUM phaT/ A na ya

a na ya hUM phaT/ shri kraM a na ya shri kraM a na ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la d+ha ra tsa hUM phaT/ ha na ha na ma hA kA la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ da ha da ha ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma hA kA la hUM

phaT/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ sh+ta pa ni mA ra ya/ oM ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la mo hA g+ha mo ha g+ha ya hUM phaT/ mahA kA la mo hA kA la ya/ ma hA kA la u tsa ta ya
hUM phaT/ ro langs chen po dur khrod bdag/ sems can rnams la nad 'bebs shing// srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol// mahA kA la 'bar ma be du ting krim sha ra

ma ti thuM thuM/ myog myog yed yed/ sha ra ma ti gug ling myos ling sha li ling tsa thun ta b+h+yo thuM thuM myogs myogs shig shig tsit+ta baM shi ra ti rgyob yer/ 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug mas yum dang 'khor gyi snying po ma

lus pa phul ba/ ma ma trag rag+sha snying kha rag tsit+ta srog tung dug dza dza hUM/ ma ma trag rag+sha kha mud tra snying kha rag mo dun b+h+yo dza dza/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ ru ru be ro he tiSh+ta ba to se rag+mo snying kha rag hUM b+h+yo dza dza/ oM tsa pa a

shu me swA hA/ oM tsa pa la a shu ma ar+g+haM pra ti ye swA hA/ trag rag+sha ma hi dun b+h+yo/ mahA yag+sha tig sna nag mo dun b+h+yo/ ma sprul lha dang klu dang rgyal po dang// srin po'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ste// ma mo gnod sbyin thun

mong du// bskor te bdag srog bskyang phyir du// de dus bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// bdag gi srog nas bskul ba 'di// dpa' bo chen pos bzhes su gsol// ma rag+mo thums lings snying rtsa 'dus srog srig srig

shaM shaM khyer khyer b+h+yo ya/ snying khrag la rtsa srog breng breng rbad rbad/ oM dza la dza la hUM phaT/ ma ma srog tug tug khrag la snying rtsa rbud/ ma srog thun snying la ma b+h+yo/ ma ra ya b+h+yo phaT/ khrag thun ni dza dza/ nir mi ci mi sha ku

ru ni shi skur skur/ dza dza nir mi tsi tsa sri ta ni dzam pa la/ ni nri aM ku sha dza swA hA/ ma ma snying khrag tshal ba dun ting ha la dun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phyi dus skur gnas 'dir brjod nas// bdag gi las bcol ma byas na// chad
pa mi zad bdag la 'byung// bdag cag dmod mo 'di lta bus// sems can rnams la nad 'bebs shing// srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol// ma mo rang gi

snying khrag gis thums rbad/ thang mu le thang mu le tsit+ta rbad rbad/ mug sni mug sni tsit+ta nan/ rag+mo ni rag+mo ni kha la long tsit+ta rbad rbad/ dug sni tsit+ta rbad rbad/ kyi kha long kyi kha long tsit+ta rbad

rbad/ rtsa sti rtsa sti tsit+ta rbad rbad/ nir sti nir sti tsit+ta mug mug thum thum sub sub tista rbad rbad/ kha 'dar yed yed/ thums thums rbad rbad/ se kha lo mun kha swA hA/ oM tad+ya thA/ ru ru be to ti sta ba to si ru ru bi to bad toSh+ta srang ba sti mA ra

ya phaT/ rag+mo rag+mo ma ma dun ting hed ma hed badzra ka ru sha rbad/ snying khrag tshal pa rbad gtubs tsit+ta rbad/ myogs mugs rbad/ snying khrag kha la rbad/ tshal pu se na si du rbad/ hur thums srog la ya rbad/ phyi dus
bdag gi lus gnad nas/ dbab cing gcad dbab byas na// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang/ skad cig yud la 'gum par 'gyur// 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo ni// 'khor dang bcas pas sngags

phul ba// oM ku ra d+ha ra nan/ tsa shi ku ma ra a shu d+ha khug mug shi re ma ti khug nyid/ ki li ki li tsa dud ke sa mud nya nga ba dad tra chum swA hA/ oM she kha ru ru tsi ti a shug me ba ti ru trang kha shal rag mo hUM/ oM sha kha

ma mud nyi kha la yan/ ru ru a shu mye s+ye kha te dud ta mA ra ya/ oM ru ru a shu me ni/ dza dza snying long srog rtsa rbad rbad rbad/ khrag rtsa rbad rbad/ dbugs kyib kyib rbod/ srog breng breng/ rmugs rmugs/ myogs myogs

sha rbad/ ma ra ya phaT/ ma ma de sho dus snying la yam/ shi ni ku ru thum rbad/ sa ma ya su staM/ khrag ni rbad/ ni ti staM sa ma ya rbad/ khrig ta ya man+ti sha thA rbad/ su rag sha rbad/ ba ru ni thibs snying dum bu/ srog rtsa

phrig phrig rbad rbad sod sod ni ra sti ni ra sti rbad rbad/ ma ma i sti srog la phyig yaM/ rag sha ma ma ru ru na rbad/ hUM mA ra ya rbad/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'khor dang
bcas pa 'jig rten pa'i tshul bzung nas sngags phul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po dang 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug mas/ mngon rdzogs yab la phyag 'tshal te// phyi
dus rnal 'byor don ched du// tshogs bdag 'khor dang bcas pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad du gsol// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dur khrod phug gam gang ri 'dab// ri gsum rtse 'am chu
'dus snar// sa bdag la sogs gtor ma sbyin// dpal gyi dkyil 'khor lta ba yin// mon mo ske rings mthong ba'i gnas// mi dang stag sha la sogs te// dug dang khrag gis chag chag gdab// dbus su gru

gsum sol bas byug/ zla kham dmar po khrag gi tshul// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan// sgo bzhi po la gru bzhi po// rta babs bzhi dang khyams ldan bri// rak+ta ra sa ya nar ldan// dbus su kham bu khrag gis

byug/ keng rus rul pas mtha' bskor te// zhing chen gur phub zhing phran yol// nal bu pho mo'i rgyal mtshan gzugs// mi snying rta sha la sogs te// sna tshogs sha dang 'chi ka'i mtshal// gal phyi rus dang mi dang

gtor ma rab tu bya// rtsa ba med pa'i thod pa ru// khrag mkhris dug dang shing tog dang// sna tshogs khrag ni 'byor tshad blugs// chu dang myos byed dug sna gsum// de yang gnod pa'i rdzas su sbyar// shing lo rlung

khyer sa ma ltung// mtshan byang tshil chen rwa rur gzhug/ byang shar mtshams kyi me nyid la// sreg cing nyungs kar yungs nag gi/ me lha gtor zhing rnam gsum bzlas// shun chen stan du gding bar bya// shun chen
blag pa de bzhin bgo/ gu gul dud pa rgyun mi gcad// zhag dgu bzlas pa tshang bar bya// yid la byang shar sprin nag 'khrug/ snying gtor bkang zhing dbang du bsdu// lnga na mon pa sog po

'thon// nang grol gtor ma de ru sbyin// bdun na dngos su 'byung bar bsam// 'od dang dri zhim gang byung rung// sha khrag lha mo'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsis dam bsre dam yang bskang// ting krim sha re'i drag
sngags brdeg/ nga yis bskul ba dbang med du// sngags bdag pho mo sha ru gnan// dbu dgu khrag 'dzag snying yang za// 'khor gyis 'gugs shing de la bstim// ling ga 'dar zhing 'gul ba dang// dpal gyi
sku bsgoms gsang sngags brdeg/ 'bum phrag gcig na gtor ma sbyin// des kyang sod par ma gyur na// pho mo sbrags te drag sngags brdeg/ des kyang me la bsreg cing bzlas// re re brgya brgya rdzogs dang

bsreg/ yang na bsreg thal phyogs bzhir gtor// des kyang nyams pa ma sgrol na// khrag gi maN+Dal gru gsum bya// tha ma rtsang mar phur bus bskor// ra thod phag thod khyi thod gsum// gnyan pa'i gnas su skyer

phur gzugs// dug sna lnga dang shing sna lnga// khrag sna lnga dang ming rus rnams// rtsa ba med pa'i nang du blugs// ma mo'i sngags ni dkar nas bzlas// bdag nyid gnyen po'i lha ru ste// bud med nag mo ral pa
can// re'u yi 'bo'u rkang la gon// sha tu'i tsit+ta g.yas g.yon thogs// dmar thab dmar la sgrub pa dang// dmar nyid ma mor 'gyur ba dang// de yi stobs kyis yul phrogs nas// sha tu sgrol byed za bar
bsgom// brgya stong tshad ni tshang bar bya// 'khor rnams gcig tu 'dus 'gyur te// lha gnod mdzes kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus la sbrul ltar 'khyud nas gdung ba byas
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thog mar rnam par dag pa la// brtags pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar 'gyur// de phyir lcam dral g.yog 'khor bcas// sku mdog phyag mtshan bsnyen
pa'i thabs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// lta ba drod kyi man ngag dang// spyod pa bsgrub pa'i man ngag dang// khyad pa
tshogs bdag man ngag gsum// sngags pa gdeng dang ldan pa yis// hUM las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// b+h+ruM las gzhal yas 'dab ma brgyad// de ru nyi zla baM chen thogs// hUM las dur khrod bdag po
ni// kha dog nag po cher 'bar ba// dar nag gu zu sku la gsol// brjid pa stag gi sham thabs can// smin ma khro gnyer 'bar ba la// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// thod rlon 'phreng bas do shal
byas// thod pa skam po'i dbu brgyan can// khrag dang zhag gi mchi ma can// dur khrod 'bar bas lus brgyan cing// g.yas na gri gug 'bar ba thogs// g.yon pa thod pa khrag gis

bkang// g.yon du 'dod khams gtso mo ni// rlung nag 'tshub ma'i nang shed du// nag mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku// glang chen gyi ni stod g.yogs la// re lde khra bo'i smad g.yogs can// zhing chen gyi ni ya bas

bskor// snyan g.yas seng ge 'chong ba la// snyan g.yon sprul nag 'khyud pa ste// spyi gtsug nas ni zla rgyas 'char// lte ba nas ni nyi ma 'char// thod pa tshar gsum sku la klubs// g.yas kyi dang po ral

gri thogs// 'og ma kha T+wAM rtse gsum pa// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag bsnams// 'og ma thod pa'i 'phreng ba bgrang// bong bu ga pa phyin phyogs zhon// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum sdes bskor// phyi rim pad+ma dag la

ni// shar phyogs brgya byin sku mdog dkar// phyag g.yas lcags kyu rdo rje gdengs ba g.yon// shar lho me lha dmar ser te// phyag g.yas g+hun te me dpung thogs// g.yon pa bgrang 'phreng rlung yab thogs// lho
phyogs gshin rje sku mdog nag/ dbu la mi thod rgyu mas brgyan// phyag g.yas ral gri g.yon dbyug tho// lho nub bden bral dmar nag la// ral gri thod pa g.yas g.yon thogs// nub tu chu lha sku mdog

dmar// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can// phyag g.yas bum pa sbrul zhags g.yon// nub byang rlung lha dud kha'i mdog/ g.yas pa ba dan sngon po rtse brgyad la// g.yon pa rlung gi sgro ba thogs// byang du

rnam thos sku mdog ljang// phyag g.yas rin chen dbyug tho ste// phyag g.yon nor gyi bum pa thogs// byang shar dbang ldan dmar skya ste// tri shul g.yas la rnge chung g.yon// steng gi phyogs skyong nyi ma ni// sku mdog
dmar ser phyag gnyis tog/ 'og gi sa bdag lku mdog sngo// g.yas pa phag rgod mche ba la// g.yon pa khrus kyi bum pa thogs// de ltar lha klu 'byung pos bskor// brgyad dam bco lnga'i nub mo bzhugs// de

ltar gdeng lnga ldan pa yis// spyi yi gtor ma shar du bzhag/ ma gtor lho ru thun gyis nub// skam phyed a mr-i tar sbyar ba'i// khrag gi zangs bu byang du bzhag/ tshogs bdag gtor ma dbus su bzhag/ gsur
chen me mar kha lnga gtang// shing lo gzugs ni gtor ma'i dbus// phung mo gzugs ling ga de// lcags sam nag po'i mtshon gyis gdab// lcam dral gnyis kyi lag tu gtad// yungs kar yungs nag thal chen

rdzas// lho nub mtsham su gzhag par bya// khrag 'thung gzugs ma mtshan ldan ma// gcig gam yang na gnyis kyang gzhag/ nam mkha'i lding dang tsa ra dang// shel dang gsum po nag pos bya// nyid kyang dpal
gyi cha lugs te// yum dang yab tu bsgom par bya// khrag 'thung yab yum gsal ba yis// lcam dral phyogs skyong bcas pa yang// rang gi snying gi nang nas drang// sngags nyid bar ma chad pa
dang// de dus rtags rnam 'byung ba ni// mon pa nag mo smra zhing 'ong// dkar gsum mngar gsum la sdus bkang// lcags kyi spyang mo ngu zhing zug/ drag sngags rnam gsum rims kyis brdeg/ sprin nag 'khyug
cing thog 'bab na// sbyin sreg cho ga rgya cher bya// zhib can dmag gi dpung 'gyed na// 'khor lo drug pa rims kyis bskor// nam mkha' smug nag 'thibs pa'i tshe// bdud mo shel gyi spyi dkar gyis

bkang// gnas khang 'khor ram thams cad du// chom sgra che dang chung ba ni// rgyal po 'am ma mo dbang du sdu// bskrad dang gtor ma byin te bcol// 'tsheg na 'gong po bskrad par bya// chas ngan sbrang mor byung ba

na// bskang gso cho ga rgya cher bya// rang nyid nyams ni mi gsal na// phur bu byang chub sems kyis bskang// rang nyid ngu snying 'dod pa'i tshe// rak+ta khrag gis bkang bar bya// seng seng 'gro snying 'dod gyur
na// dbang du bsdus te gsal bar bya// 'jigs shing snying na mi dga' na// bdud mo nag mo bya mchu yi// nyams sod yin pas bsgom par bya// 'od dkar byung na rgyal po bskrad// me thun byung na dam srid

nan// bud med bzang mo'i tshogs 'ong na// ma dang sring mor bstan par bya// gdung zhing 'khor la byams pa dang// bu tsha 'tsho bar rab tu bshad// slas dang bran mo grogs mo'i tshul// bu med rang gnod 'khor

la brkam// sgra snyan byung na tshe nyid sgrub// sgra chen byung na drag po bya// tshub ma dmar nag mthong sleb na// gtor ma byin la dgra la rbad// nam mkha' lding gis bskang bar bya// dri zhim byung na zas skom sgrub// tsa
ra rog pos bskang bar bya// lha mo dngos su mthong ba dang// ma dang bu ru dam bcas shing// rang byung bdud rtsi dam yang bsre// mna' bsgag las bsgo la sogs bya// bzang pa'i rtags rnams gang byung

yang// nye ba yin phyir mnyes pa dang// dbang du bsdus na las rnams 'grub// rkyen dang 'phrad dang ma phrad kyis// rings myur gang bde mo nyid gang bder bsgrub// mthong nas tha tshigs dam bcas pa// dam
nyams kyis ni 'jigs pa'i phyir// mgu dang mi mgu med par bsgrub// mang po'i mdun du the tshom med par bsgrub// ma mo dngos su mthong ba na// kha na ma thor 'gyur srid pas// slob dpon ma gtogs gzhan
mi smra// gcig pu grogs kyang med par bsgrub// dbang bsdus ting 'dzin gsal ba ni// ma mthong na yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgyun du bsrings na the tsom med par 'grub// dbyar ni gangs ri g.ya' 'dabs
su// dpyid ni chu mdo gangs su// ston ni spang dang 'obs 'dabs su// dgun ni dur khrod sa phug bsgrub// gtor ma nam gyi gung la gtang// dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud las/
tshogs bdag lcam dral gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos grub yongs su rdzogs pa'i thabs gsungs so// bai ye shes las

byung ba// gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi rgyun// ta na sgrol ba'i lung gis kyang// gnyis su med kho na'i don rtogs kyang// bai ye shes las byung ba// gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi rgyun// ga na sbyor ba'i lung gis

kyang// mi yi thugs dam bskang bar bya// bai ye shes las byung ba// rgu tshig rgang gi 'khor lo bstan// lta ba zab mo'i don rdzogs bya// 'phrin las dgongs spyod tshang bar bya// thun grub rtags kyi tshad phyin
pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// dmar la dkar ba chags pa ni// gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub thob// 'od dkar dri zhim don byung na// lha dang bcas pa grub pa yin// 'od dmar sbrul du chags pa

ni// klu dang bcas pa mngon du 'byung// 'od nag dri ma mi zhim na// gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bskor ba 'grub// 'od 'khrug snying ni 'phangs mtho na// gshin rje 'khor dang ldan pa yin// 'od ldan nus med spu zing

ni// bar chod byed pas bzlog par bya// thun khrag khol na sgrib yod bshags// 'gul zhing 'di ga na pho nya dgyed// khol zhing rlangs byung drag por 'gyur// nag po dug ni mthong ba na// chos kyi dbyings kyi

dngos grub thob// dkar na zhi ste ser na rgyas// dmar na dbang ste nag na drag/ gang grub kha dog 'byung ba bzhis// 'jam la ring na glu yi sgra// thung la rtsub na bdud kyi sgra// 'chad thung rtsub na gshin rje

yin// rtse rtsub thung na gnod sbyin nyid// thung cing rtsub na tshogs bdag nyid// 'jam ring mnyen na ma mo nyid// dri yi bye brag bshad pa ni// dri zhim 'phro ba lha dang ldan// dri zhim ngad ldan ma mo ste// dri mi

zhim zhing nyams dga' na// klu la sogs pa yin par bshad// bse dri'i dri la spu zing na// de ni bar chad yin par bshad// de nas 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ tshogs bdag lcam dral la bstod pa/ hUM/ skal

pa me ltar 'bar ba yi// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// stobs chen drang srong lha yi gtso// rngam byed bdud 'dul 'gying bag can// rngam sgras 'jig rten khams khyab pa// mi thung khro bo 'gying bag

can// 'dul byed mche bas bdud dpung 'joms// sma ra kham pas dug gsum bsreg/ smin ma glog stong bskal pa'i 'brug sgra sgrogs// dbu skra kham nag srid pa'i rtse la 'bar// thod rlon thod skam ra ri sku la
brgyan pa ni// sku gsung thugs dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rtags// bdud kyi ber nag sku la gsol ba ni// chos kyi sku la 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags// zhing lpags rlon pas stod g.yogs byas pa
ni// dur khrod gling nas ma mo 'du ba'i rtags// stag lpags brjid pa'i sham thabs gsol ba ni// gdug pa'i zhe sdang dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// sbrul nag rigs bzhis sku la brgyan pa ni// 'phrin las bzhi
la thogs pa med pa'i rtags// g.yas pa gri gug 'bar ba bsnams pa ni// ma rig sgrib pa gtan nas gcod pa'i rtags// g.yon pa thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba bsnams pa ni// srid gsum sha khrag zhal du
gsol ba'i rtags// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs pa ni// rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das pa'i rtags// mi ro baM chen steng na bgrad de bzhugs pa ni// lha mi g.yul las rgyal ba'i
rtags// spyan gsum thad kar gzigs pa ni// khams gsum dge sdig bya ra mdzad pa'i rtags// ba ti khra bo dbu la bcings pa ni// 'dod khams lha yi gtso mo 'gugs pa'i rtags// bdud dpung 'dul phyir
dar nag ru mtshon bsnams// srin po'i grong khyer 'joms phyir lcags kyi tshe 'brang gsol// lha min rdul du rlog phyir tsan dan beng chen bsnams// dgra rnams 'dul phyir mon pa nag por sprul// sri gcan

'dul phyir khyi nag dom bur sprul// ru tra 'dul phyir dur khrod klong na bzhugs// pho nya gtso mdzad dur bya kang ka lding// khrag mtsho'i glong nas srid pa'i ma mo sdud// sde dpon chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal
bstod// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// rlung nag 'tshum ma 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ma cig 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma// bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam cig ma// nag mo
rngam pa'i mche ba can// mthing nag gcer bu ral pa can// sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni// don dam dbyings la bskyod pa med pa'i rtags// ral pa g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni// yum gyi mkhal la
sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags// ral pa spyi gtsug gcig tu 'khyil ba ni// skye med don dam gcig tu 'khyil ba'i rtags// ral pa'i gseb nas me stag 'bar ba ni// thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i
rtags// thod rlon 'bar bas dbu la bcings pa ni// thugs rje sprul sku 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// g.yas na seng chen mtshungs med mchong ba ni// dman tho thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// g.yon

nas sbrul gyi gdengs ka 'phyo ba ni// zhe sdang ma g.yos dbyings su dag pa'i rtags// snyan cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig
bgrad pa ni// dgra bgegs thams cad rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// shangs nas khrag gi dri snom pa// dpag tshad brgyad khri gnas nas len pa'i rtags// zhal ni drag po'i hom khung gdengs pa
de// dam nyams dgra bo zhal du rngub pa'i rtags// rno dug mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni// dgra bgegs sha la chem chem gsol ba'i rtags// thugs rjes chags pa'i rtags su rat+ta'i thig les brgyan// don
dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zo ris can// 'dul byed 'phrin las rtags su thal chen mtshan ma btab// zhing lpags rlon pa sku la gsol ba ni// chos nyid yang dag don dang ldan pa'i rtags// glang chen ko

rlon stod g.yogs phyed dkris pa ni// theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags// re lde nag pos gnam phyed dkris pa ni// 'jig rten 'di na che btsan ldan pa'i rtags// lte ba'i dkyil nas nyi ma 'char ba
ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ma lus skems pa'i rtags// lcags sgrog 'bar bas zhabs la dkris pa ni// 'dod khams 'dul ba'i dbang dang ldan pa'i rtags// g.yas na shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni// sdug
bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// 'og na thod rlon 'phreng ba bsnams pa ni// thugs rjes 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'dren pa'i rtags// g.yon pa tri shul rtse gsum bsnams pa ni// dam nyams khams
gsum rdul du rlog pa'i rtags// 'og na thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba ni// srid gsum sha khrag zhal du rngub pa'i rtags// bong bu nag po phyin phyogs zhon pa ni// gti mug don dam shes rab ldan pa'i
rtags// srin po'i og mas sga ru byas pa ni// bdud dang srin po zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// sbrul nag chun pos gong rmed byas pa ni// zhe sdang dbang gis dgra dpung 'joms pa'i rtags// ru sbal nag po'i
pho bus brgyan pa ni// klu rigs thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// bdud kyi khram bam snga shar btags pa ni// dam nyams gang yin khram la 'debs pa'i rtags// nad kyi rkyal pa phyi shar bkal ba ni//
dkon mchog dbu 'phangs smod pa'i dgra bo la// nad ka chen po 'bebs pa'i rtags// ma mo 'bum phrag bran du 'khol ba ni// bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra la dmag dpung 'dren// ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar

da khye la// dbu 'phangs smod pa'i nyams pa khrid las shog/ ma cig me 'bar kha nas rgya mtsho skems// ma cig lag na rdo 'phen ri rab bsnyil// ma cig ral pa mun nag stong khams khebs// kha na mi sha rlon pa

za// khrag dang zhag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// dpal chen bu mo da tshur spyon// bdag gis btsun par khyod bstod kyis// ma cig lha mo da tshur spyon// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dngos grub brtan
par gzigs pa'i rgyud las/ sta na 'ga' na'i rtags brtan pa dang lcam dral la bstod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yum 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

la phyag 'tshal nas/ yak+Sha kro d+hi shwa ri ma'i cha lugs bzung nas g.yon phyogs su gnas te/ gar byed cing dam du 'khyud pa dang/ 'chor ba dang/ 'o byed pa dang/ ling ga la rol par byed cing ched du brjod
do// e ma ho thugs rje chen po'i bdag/ bdag kyang bsod nams skal bar ldan// snyoms 'jug dbang gis mya ngan 'das// phyi dus bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// 'das dang ma 'das tshul bzung nas// lha srin
sde brgyad dbang bsdus te// srid gsum nyam chung bde spyod cing// bstan pa bshig pa bsgral bar bgyi'o// zhes brjod do// bde ba dang ldan nas rang gis mthong ba'i don la mi g.yeng bar rtog go/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das he ru kas rdo rje gsang lam du hUM/ dges pa'i 'phro 'du b+ha gar thim// gsang ba rgyas pas 'jig rten khams// rak+ta chags pas g.yos par gyur// dbang gi rdo rje gyur pa rnams// rtsa ba bteg
ste yig gnas nas// kun nas rdo rje gnas su 'dus// 'jig rten mi la sman slad du// thams cad spyi dpal yab yum la// nag mo la sogs 'dod khams kyi// lha srin sde brgyad yak+Sha bdud// yum chen spyan
gzigs yab la bskul// yab kyis gnod 'dul stan las rab langs nas// bskor ba brgya phrag stong du byas// gus pa'i tshul du mdun du ni// pus btsugs thal mo rab sbyar nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad gsol// yab kyi dgongs pa ji lta bu// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// bsnyen pa'i cho ga sngon bzhin las// gzas zin nya 'am mar ngo la// 'khor lo drug pa'i cho ga dang// srin mo thun gyis gsad
pa brtsam// gtor ma byin la las rnams bcol// gdug pa'i bar chad spang ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bar der brtsam// bdag rtog log rtog can la ni// dgug pa las kyi cho ga ni// glang ngam mdzo mo'i

pags pa la// nag po'i zhal ni legs bris la// bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro rtsa yis// dbus su 'khor lo brgyad bris te// phya rim bcu drug rtsibs dang ldan// rnga mo'i steng na gnas pa ste// phyi rol thod pa lcags kyi

'phreng ba dag dang ldan// dug dang b+ha ga khrag thal gsum gyis ming rus bris// byang shar mtshams su kha bltas la// khri khrag gcig tu bar mi gcad// sha tu bkug nas 'ong bar bsam// oM ma hA kA la hUM

tri thun ma tri tri sha ku ru ni A kar+Sha ni hUM dza dza hri hUM phaT/ dbye ba las kyi cho ga ni// dur khrod ras dang gri khrag gis// nag po'i zhal ni bri bar bya// lug dang spyang khu steng na gnas// bya rog 'ug pa'i bar du
gzhug/ 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis la// bya rog khrag gis ming rus bri// lcags phye yungs kar shang tshes brab// phyi rol 'khor lo mtshon chas dgang// oM ru lu ru lu tsakra rbad// kha la kha la

ma tri du ma rbad/ che ge mo pra shag dun tring mA ra ya phaT/ lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// bya rog 'ug pa'i dang rus brdeg/ de yis dbye bya so sor 'gro// lung dang spyang ku gzugs mthong bas// de yis shin tu

sod par byed// khri khri bar ma chad par brdeg/ shin tu bskrad pa'i las bya// ma he 'am dur khrod ras ma la// b+ha ga khrag gi rab spangs la// rtsibs dgu'i 'khor lo bri// rta dang ma he'i steng na gnas// rta khrag

dug gis legs bris la// oM sha ni sha ni tsag tra rbad/ mug+ti thing rbad/ che ge mo u tsa ta ya dam phaT/ lho nub mtshams su kha bltas la// khri khri bar ma chad par bzlas// shin tu bsreg pa'i las bya na// ro ras

sam ni zhing lpags la// dri bo'i khrag gis legs mtshan te// nag po'i zhal ni bri bar bya// mkhas pas me yi steng na gnas// tsha ba gsum dang la phug shing// 'khor lo bcu drug bri bar bya// shin tu ming rus

dug gis bri// oM dz+wa la raM dz+wa la raM sha ni ha d+ha ru su ru ni pa tsa pa tsa ni// yak+Sha kA la dza la raM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ shar lho mtshams su kha bltas la// khri khri bar ma chad par brdeg/ la phug nim pa me la bdug/

shin tu gsad pa'i las bya na// dri bo dag gi pags pa la// nag po'i zhal ni bri bar bya// bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro rtsa 'am// de yi lag pa'i rus pa mchog/ rtsibs bcu pa yi 'khor lo bri// dug dang khu ba baM khrag

gis// shin tu ming rus bri bar bya// drag po e yi dbus su bzhugs// lcags sam nag po'i phur pas brdeg/ kyo 'dra mdung dang ral gris gtubs// oM ma hA kA la tsakra kA la ban+d+ha thum bu ra ti ku ru rbad rbad

phaT/ byang gi phyogs su kha bltas la// khri khri bar ma chad par bzlas// gnan pa las kyi cho ga ni// nal bu pho mo'i pags pa la// nag po'i zhal ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis la// shin tu

gzugs dang ming rus bri// phyi rol zlum po sbrul dang ni// rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// oM ma hA kA la ha na ha na nA sha ya nA sha ya che ge mo stam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha ni mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// khri khri bar
ma chad par bzlas// byang lta'i chu mig lkugs pa ru// sa bdag ma mo mdun sar gnan// spogs pa las kyi cho ga ni// nag po stong za dkyil 'khor du// thod pa gsum gsum dgu yis bskor// ral gri spu
gris tha mas bskor// dum bu drug pa'i thod pa ru// dug gi ma mo bskyed cing bsgrub// tsha ba'i rdzas dang til mar khrag/ rdo gsum phyed dang yungs kar la// spu gri drag sngags tshar bcad gsad//

oM shrI ma hA kA la gu na hri da hUM tsakra rbad yaM yaM snying yaM/ tri ma kha thun snying la tsitra ru ru ti sta rbad sod ril yam khram ba ti b+h+yo/ tsig tsig yam yaM dud tri rbad tri skor ba kham rbad/ nya nas nyi shu gnyis la

gnan// dang po phyogs su gtor byas na// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// tsit+ta dang ni rak+ta dang// btsan dug yungs kar nyungs nag la// byang shar mtshams kyi khung bu

ru// shin tu bkug ste de la bstim// ru ru shig+ta tri ma du sod/ srog thuM thuM sod/ ma rag du sod/ kha rug sha ma sod/ srog thuM ni sod/ nir ya ni ya tsa thuM ni sod/ sha rgyu snying phyung/ snying rgyu srog sod/ srog rgyud

dbugs long/ ma mo thuM thuM thod/ tsa thun mA ra ya sod/ shag thun mA ra ya thun sod/ ru ru rag+mo mA ra ya thun sod/ ma ma mug+ti g+hi na thun sod/ ma ma shag thun ting thun sod/ ma ma rbad mA ra ya sod/ shag shag

rag+mo thun sod/ nya dang tshes brgyad dus su gtor ma sbyin// bzlog gtor mi bsdu cho 'phrul 'byung dus gtang// dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud las/ dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po lcam dral 'khor lo
bskor ba dang drag sngags thun gyis gsad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas lha gnod 'dul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// yab kyi dgongs pa ji lta bu// dur khrod bdag po lcam dral
gyi// thog ser ltas ngan ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dben la dga' ba'i gnas nyid du// mtshams bcad mtho gzugs gtor ma

gtang// maN+Dal gru bzhi khrag gis byug/ gru gsum mthing nag zla kham gsum// gru bzhi gru chad ldan par bri// dri bo pho mo'i thod pa ru// rwa snying phag snying spyang snying dang// ra ro phag pa khra bo'i khrag/ bya mo nag

mo'i sgo nga dang// bdud rtsi lnga dang phur thal dang// chang dang sbyar la mo thod blugs// mi dbang rnam lnga 'bras ni so bar sbyar la ri lus bya/ nal bu'i rgyal mtshan dag la lcam dral sku 'ang bri// dri bo pho mo thod pa

kha sbyar la/ rdo sol gyis ya zi/ rang sngags kyis bskor/ nang du gtor ma dang/ ri lu dang/ yul de'i sngo sna ming dbyibs dang/ nya lcibs rdo dreg rnams blugs la rgyu mas bcings la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su

kun bzang che mchog he ru ka chos dbyings skye ba med pa'i ngang la snyoms par bzhugs so// de'i tshe yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma/ rol pa 'gag pa med pa'i ngang las bzhengs te/
yab la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye kye/ yab cig kun bzang he ru ka/ dpa' bo dpal chen che ba'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi bde bar gshegs// 'dul byed khrag 'thung gar gyi bdag/ rol pa chen

po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// sprul pa bye ba dpag med 'gyed// 'og min bye ba'i gnas mchog 'dir// nga yi b+ha ga yangs pa 'dir// bla med mchog gi bde ba skye// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'phrin las mchog/ sbyor

sgrol sprul pa'i dus la bab// sa ma ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ e ho ra ga ya mi/ zhes glu blangs te bskul bas/ chos nyid kyi sa ma ti las bzhengs te dgyes pa chen po bskyed nas/ sku gsung thugs las sprul pa bye ba phrag

mang po pho nya dang bcas pa bkye nas/ yum dang gnyis su med par rol ba mdzad do// de'i tshe sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de'i tshe sku gsung thugs las 'od zer mang po 'jig rten khams
steng 'og shar lho nub byang la sogs mtshams gang+gA klung gi bye ma thams cad bkang ste/ 'jig rten thams cad 'gul 'gul/ ldeg ldeg chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ shig shig yom yom/ shar nub lho byang mtha'

dbus mtho dman can du g.yos par gyur to// slar 'od zer tshur 'dus par gyur te spyi gtsug tu thim nas/ de nas yab yum sbyor mtshams nas 'chol ba'i khro bo chen po brgyad sprul te/ sku gsung thugs nas khro

bo 'chol ba gsum sprul to// gzhan yang spyi gtsug nas sku'i mgon po sprul/ mgrin pa nas gsung gi mgon po sprul/ snying kha nas thugs kyi mgon po sprul/ lte ba nas yon tan gyi mgon po sprul/ gsang ba nas

'phrin las kyi mgon po sprul te/ kun kyang sgyu ma rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ngang las spyod do// de'i tshe bskal pa dang po'i ru tra gdug pa can rnams sems can la 'tshe bar gyur to// de yang 'di lta ste/ a

kar sha ru tra dang/ ma traM ka ru tra dang/ klu kha trang ka ru tra gsum mo// gzhan yang bdud ru tra nag po/ srin po ru tra/ gnod sbyin ru tra/ gza' ru tra/ ka traM ka ru tra/ ma sangs ru tra/ btsan ru tra/ mo rgyud ru tra'o// de
rnams kun la gnod cing 'tshe bar gyur to// gzhan yang bdud kyi sde tshogs bye ba phrag mang po 'khod bar gyur to// de'i tshe yum khro mo gnam zhal mas stan las langs te 'di skad ces gsol
to// kye/ kye kye che mchog he ru ka/ thugs rje chen po 'gro ba'i mgon// sems can kun gyi mgon gcig po// 'dul dka' ma lus gdul ba po// dpa' bo bdud dgra 'dul ba po// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung
ba dang// dkon mchog dbu 'phangs bstod pa dang// sems can bde la 'god pa'i phyir// ru tra bdud kyi dpung tshogs sde// dpa' bo chen pos 'dul du gsol// ces zhus so// dpa' bo yab kyis bka'
stsal pa// nyon cig gnam zhal khro mo yum// de don khyod kyis zhus pa legs// sngon tshe 'das dus dang po la// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// chos nyid zhi bas mi

'dul ba'i// de tshe bdud dang srin po rnams// khro bo gar gyis 'dul bar bya// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can 'phros pas kyang// 'jig rten kun kyang sreg byed de// sangs rgyas thugs

rje 'phros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig las sdang rnams bsgral phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal// hUM hUM hUM/ oM badzra ma hA kro d+hA shrI he

ru ka phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ de'i tshe dpal chen sprul pa rnams dang/ ru tra'i bdud rnams stobs 'gran par gyur to// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dang/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa dang/ dbu dgu phyag bco

brgyad pa dang/ dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig phyag bzhi bcu zhe gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sprul pa 'gran par gyur to// de'i tshe dpal chen pos snying rjes bsgral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de'i tshe bdud

dang ru tra bred de bros so// rgyugs phyogs bcu kun tu bros kyang ma thar/ ma la ka'i yul ri gnam lcags ma la ya'i rtser 'dus so// der sde dang dpung dang bcas pa rnams da rung rtsod par 'dod do// de'i tshe

dpal chen pos thabs kyis ru tra'i sde dpon du sprul nas/ ru tra'i chung ma kro d+hi shwa ri ma la chags/ yid kyis bde bar rol to// de nas ru tra'i chung ma la bu chags te/ khro bo ljang nag zhal gsum pa cig byung ste/

ru tra'i bur brdzus nas phyag drug pa beng thogs pa/ gsang bdag dpal chen dngos kyi ru tra chen pos ma traM mgo la beng brgyab pas/ mgo tshal pa lngar song bar bsgral/ khog pa b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang du gyur/

ru tra'i sems nyid gdan du bting nas dam la btags/ ru tra'i 'khor de pho nya rang gi 'khor du bkod/ de'i tshe dpal chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ bdud rigs ru tra thams cad btul/ sku'i mgon pos ka traM ru
tra btul/ gsung gi mgon pos kha traM ru tra btul/ thugs kyi mgon pos ma traM ru tra btul/ yon tan gyi mgon pos pho rgyud ru tra btul/ 'phrin las kyi mgon pos mo rgyud ru tra btul/ de tshe dpal

chen he ru kas// lha srin sde brgyad 'dul ba'i phyir// 'chol ba'i khro rgyal stobs po che// mahA kA la drag pos te// ma ning mched gsum sku gsung thugs// dpal chen brgyad kyi sprul pas// lha srin sde brgyad la
sogs pa'i// bdud sde dpung tshogs 'dul ba'i phyir// yongs rdzogs dpal dgu'i dgongs pa skyed// bde gshegs zhi khro yongs rdzogs pa'i// srog snying mthar thug 'di brjod do// lha srin sde brgyad la

sogs pa'i// oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya man+ta ka ha na ma ta bany+dza hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra

kI li kI la ya/ sarba big nan baM hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ gu h+ya kro d+ha shwa ri s+t+waM/ oM ma hA gu ru sarba sid+d+hi hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba du Sh+taM hUM phaT/ oM badzra sarba duSh+ta na e dza b+h+yo hUM phaT/ ces bzlas
pas srid rtsa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i ru tra rnam gsum dang/ sde brgyad la sogs bdud dmag bye ba dung phyur thams cad btul lo// thul lo// tshar gcad do// chod do// la la bsgral te gdan du bting// la la
bsgral te rtsig par brtsigs// la la bsgral te thog phub byas// la la bsgral te ka bar btsugs// la la bsgral te ka zhur bkos// la la bsgral te ka gdan bting// la la bsgral te dam la btags// e

zhes brjod pas/ ru tra'i sems las nam mkha' chos 'byung srid// yaM zhes brjod pas/ ma traM sbugs las dam tshig sgron ma srid// ra zhes brjod pas/ ma traM khrag las ma ma ki ru srid// su ra ces brjod pas/

sha lpags las sangs rgyas spyan ma srid// ke zhes brjod pas/ keng rus ri rab gru bzhi srid// raM zhes brjod pas/ yum chen gos dkar srid// bruM zhes brjod pas/ khog pa dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang

nang gling dgur yod pa/ phyi rin po che'i rtsig pa 'ja' tshon ris su yod pa/ phyi dur khrod thod pa'i mkhar chen po rtse mo ltar mi mngon pa/ thod pa skam rlon gyi phag thabs su brtsigs pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs
kyis btab pa/ gnam lcags kyi gzer btab pa/ phyogs skyong bcus rtsig par brtsigs pa/ klu rigs bzhi pho mos ka gdan byas pa/ lha chen brgyad kyi ka ba btsugs pa/ gza' chen brgyad kyi ka gzhu byas pa/

rgyu skar rnams kyi dral lcam byas pa/ ru tra'i pags pas thog phub pa/ mi mgo'i tog gis brgyan pa/ thod tshal gyi dri bas sbras pa/ tsit+ta'i pho ltos brgyan pa/ sha chen khrag chen gyi zhal zhal byas pa/ phyi me rlung

'tshub ma'i klong/ nang dur khrod thod mkhar gyi dbus su/ ru tra kro d+hi sti ra baM/ zhes srid rtsa bdag 'dzin gyi ru tra chen po bsnol ba de'i steng du/ ma sUr+ya maN+Dal zhes pa nyi ma'i gdan/ a tsaN+d+ra maN+Dal

zhes pa zla ba'i gdan/ paM pad+ma maN+Dal zhes pa pad+ma'i gdan/ de'i steng du dpal chen yongs rdzogs che mchog he ru ka nyid/ sku phyag rgya chen po zil gnon chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum gyi ngang las rtsal chen

'phrin las mdzad pa'i phyir/ ye shes kyi mgon po ma ning nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas pa 'khor ba'i bdud dmag rum bzlog pa'i phyir mtshon mdung ring bsnams pa/ g.yon pa ru tra phyung nas zhal
du gsol ba/ chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum ldan phyir spyan gsum gyen thur thad kar gzigs pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo smin mas bsdus shing spyan zlog pa/ shangs gnyer ba/ zhal gdangs pa/ mche ba

gtsigs pa/ shin tu gtum zhing srog la rngam pa/ chos sku longs sku sprul sku mi 'gyur rdo rje'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga gnon pa'i brdar rin po che'i srog zhu lnga yod pa/ a kar ru tra'i thod skam lngas dbu la

brgyan pa/ klu kha traM kha ru tra btul nas sbrul nag po'i ral pas brgyan pa/ ma traM bsgral pa'i tsan dan gyi beng sked la btsugs pa/ beng gi nang lha dang lha min sde brgyad thams cad 'dul ba'i dmag tshogs byed ba
'gyed pa/ bdud thams cad bsgral ba'i mgo snying 'phreng bar brgyus te sku la brgyan pa/ klu thams cad bsgral te sbrul gyi chun por byas pa/ dar nag gi ber gsol ba/ gser ga rin chen sked la bcings pa/

mi lpags kyi g.yang gzhi stod du bcings pa cig tu sprul te/ de'i zhal nas/ hUM hUM hUM/ oM badzra mahA kro d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas ru tra thul te srog gi snying po/ dz+nyA nA ma hA kA la/ e g+h+ri ga g+ha na g+hu ya raM

sid+d+hi du beng ni ru pa sarba ho/ zhes mdongs gsol du phul te dam la btags/ bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs/ sa ma ya i tan te na ra kan zhes dam sgrags/ ye shes kyi mgon po las mgon mthu'i rtsal che
bas srog bdud du dbang bskur ro// dpal chen che mchog he ru ka dngos kyi sprul pa ma ning las rgyud nag po las/ gling gzhi'i le'u las ru tra sde gsum bdud dmag dang bcas pa btul ba'i le'u ste dang
po'o//// de'i tshe ri gnam lcags ma la ya'i rtser/ gnas dur khrod thod mkhar 'bar ba'i dbus na/ dpal chen dngos sprul ma hA ka la gsung ba'i khro rgyal stobs po che/ sme brtsegs ma ning 'chol ba'i bu

nag po chen po la/ 'khor du gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa byang sems rigs 'dzin gyi tshogs dang/ ma hA de ba la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang/ phywa dang dbang phyug chen po dang/ mu stegs ru tra btul ba'i lhag
ma dang/ gzhan yang bdud po khram thogs kyi 'khor dang/ shan pa gri thogs kyi 'khor dang/ nag po zor thogs kyi 'khor dang/ nag po mtshon thogs kyi 'khor dang/ sgrol byed dar thogs kyi

'khor dang/ yi dwags 'dre srin gyi 'khor la sogs pa mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe nag po chen po gzi brjid kyis nyi ma dang zla ba yang thod mkhar gyi logs la ta la la/ me rlung tshub ma

yang thod mkhar gyi rtse la 'u ru ru/ dug mtsho khol ma yang thod mkhar gyi rmang na chi li li/ de'i nang na sprul nag mang po 'khyug pa/ dom nag khyi nag mang po ngur ba/ lcags spyang ce spyang mang po 'dur ba/ bya nag

mang po 'thib pa/ g.yag rog mang po ngur ba/ rta nag mang po 'tsher ba/ mon pa pho mo gar byed pa/ ling pas mda' 'then pa/ bya rog sha 'thog pa/ 'ug pa rkan 'debs pa/ thun gyi ser ba 'bab pa/ rlung nag

tshub ma 'khyil ba/ mi lpags g.yab mo g.yob pa/ 'gong po mang po ngu ba/ 'dre ngan mang po skad 'don pa/ de lta bu'i dbus na srog bdud du sprul nas bzhugs so// de'i tshe brang gi spyan gsum gyi steng lha'i srid
pa/ 'og klu'i srid pa/ bar mi'i srid pa rnams gzigs pas/ lha dang lha yin rnams 'thab pa la/ thugs rje'i 'od zer dbang po brgya byin la 'phog pas/ brgya byin mngon par shes te/ dur khrod chen po thod

mkhar gyi dbus na ye shes kyi mgon po sprul pa srog bdud chen po de spyan drangs la/ dmag dpon bcol na rung snyam nas/ lha kar rti ka'i bu mo u ma de ba bya ba spyan 'dren du gtang bas/ thabs kyi spyan

'drongs so// de nas lha rnams kyis chos bzang lha'i mdun sar phyag byas/ rnam rgyal khang bzangs su mchod pa chen po byas so// shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi rtsar lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag mang pos mchod pa byas

so// rdo a mo li ka'i steng du lha'i bu mo bye pa phrag mang pos mchod pa byas so// lha'i sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis tshal chen po bzhir mchod pa byas so// mgon po bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bran byed par

khas blangs mchod pa chen po yang byas so// der lha rnams kyis dmag dpon du mnga' gsol lo// zas kyang lha'i bdud rtsi gsol lo// lha mo u ma de ba dang gnyis ma chags yid kyis rol te/ bu tsha ming sring

gnyis skyes te/ bu legs ldan nag po// bu mo dpal ldan lha mo re ma tir ming btags so// de'i tshe ma ning srog bdud nag po dmag chas su zhugs te/ phyag gi nywa lhu gnyis dang/ zhabs kyi byin lhu gnyis dang

bzhi dang/ spyan bzhi las dmag dpon chen po bzhi'o// pra ma rA dza/ ya ma rA dza/ nA ga rA dza/ ag se rgyal ba rnams sprul to// rta nag po rting dkar la zhon pa/ nyi zla'i zer dang dkar chen gyi 'od 'phrog pa/
stag ral gzig shugs g.yas g.yon la btags pa/ bdud mda' dgra snying gzer zhing gling bzhi yud la bskor ba/ spyan nas khrag 'dzag pa/ zhal nas me 'bar ba/ phyag g.yas gri gug/ g.yon

lcags par/ kha T+wAM mchan khung du bcug pa/ snang srid kyi pho rgyud thams cad pho nyar 'gyed pa/ rtag pa'i khung bu nas khro bo'i spyan gzigs pa/ ma tshogs thams cad dmag la 'gyed pa/ nyi ma byang shar mtshams

kyi gnod sbyin chen po brgyad ni/ lcags kyi bya khra brgyad du sprul nas dgra'i sha khrag la rngam pa/ sngon la 'gro zhing dam tshig nyams pa thams cad kyi g.yen pa mdzad cing g.yas kyi phyogs nas lding ba/ lho phyogs kyi

gshin rje chen po brgyad ni/ stag gzig dom spyang khyir sprul nas phyir 'brang zhing phyi'i dgra bgegs 'dul ba/ lha ma srin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma srin rdul du rlog pa/ gdug pa'i klu chen po brgyad bka' sdod

kyi pho nya byed cing kha rlangs nag po sprin 'phung du gtibs nas/ g.yu sprul sngon po brgyad du sprul nas g.yon phyogs nas 'khyug pa/ drag po'i phyogs skyong bcu ni bka' nyan gyi blon po byas te khyi nag dom nag rol

du khrid pa/ lha chen po brgyan ni thugs kyi pho nyar mnga' gsol te/ khye'u chung gdug pa'i mtshon thogs pa brgyad du sprul nas dbu'i 'od las 'phro zhing drag po'i las mdzad pa/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ni go mtshon thogs

nas ci nyan gyi 'phrin las byed pa/ bdud 'dul gyi dmag tshogs nyi khri chig stong dang chas nas bar snang khams su sprul nas 'thab ste lha ma yin gyi g.yul thams cad bzlog ste phung bar byas so// de nas lha ma

yin 'pham ste rgya mtsho'i gting du bros nas/ klu \u0f84la skyabs su gsol lo// de nas lha rnams g.yul las rgyal bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shin tu mnyes nas bstod pa/ chos sku skye med kun tu bzang// longs

sku che mchog he ru ka/ sprul sku ma ning khro bo'i rgyal// gsang bdag chen po stobs po che// 'chol ba'i khro rgyal srog bdud che// lha rnams bsod nams rgyas mdzad pa'i// lha chen dpal 'bar khyod la phyag 'tshal

lo// dmag dpon chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sde dpon chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod cing gtang rag gi mchod pa chen po byas so// dpal che mchog he ru ka dngos kyi sprul pa dpal mgon ma
ning nag po'i las rgyud las/ gleng slang zhing lha yul du sprul nas lha ma yin btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal che mchog he ru ka'i thugs kyi sprul pa gsang bdag lag na rdo rjes rigs

'dzin rdo rje chos su sku sprul te/ gnas 'og min lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog tu/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka la dus ru tra dang lha min thul ba'i tshe/ yo byad 'jig rten pa'i yo byad dang/ lha'i yo

byad dang/ klu'i yo byad dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i yo byad dang/ gnod sbyin gyi yo byad dang/ dur khrod kyi sha khrag sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po mdzad nas gsol pa/

kye kye kye/ bcom ldan gsang bdag he ru ka/ dpal chen yongs rdzogs 'gro ba'i mgon// ru tra tshar gcad bdud 'dul rgyal// gsang ba'i khro rgyal stobs po che// nyid sprul ma ning 'khor bcas kyi// dang po ngo
bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba dgos ched phan yon gang// lta ba sgom pa spyod pa gang// dbang dang 'phrin las bskyed rdzogs 'bras bu gang// zhes gsol pas/ dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig
rigs 'dzin gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po// de don khyod kyis zhus pa legs// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs yongs rdzogs pa'i// dpal chen dngos sprul
nag po che// ma ning las rgyud nag po las// phun tshogs lnga 'am bdun bzhi gzung// thog mar ston 'khor gnas su yo byad 'dzom// ngo bo kun khyab byang chub sems// de nyid rtogs pa kun bzang he ru

ka/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dgongs pa des// ma rtogs ma rig bdag 'dzin ru tra'i rgyud// nges tshig ru tra rnam pa gnyis// rtag pa rang rgyud ru tra dang// chad pa stong tsam ru tra'o// rtag pa'i ru tra pho mor

shar// lta log stong nyid chad pa'o// stong rtsal 'gag rtsal stobs po che// ru tra ma ning 'chol pa'o// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// rtag pa rgyun gyi ru tra dang// 'khrul pa rang rgyud ru tra dang// thugs rje sprul

pa'i ru tra'o/// gzhan yang ru tra rnam pa bdun// lha chen klu chen srin po dang// log sred can dang mi ma yin// 'byung po yi dgas la sogs yin// dgos byed rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad// de bzhin rigs dang

rtag dang ched// sangs rgyas thugs rjes byin rlabs dang// ru tra rjes gzung phan yon bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bya ba byas// rang mthar thug rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma ning las rgyud nag po
las/ snang ba'i skabs phye nas dngos po lnga ru bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol ba/ kye kye kye/ ston pa kun bzang he ru ka/ ting 'dzin du mas dbang sgyur
ba'i// rgyud don nyams len don ched du// gzhi lam 'bras bu gang ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ che mchog he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig khro rgyal gsang ba'i bdag/ ma ning las rgyud nag po

las// nyams su len cing sgrub 'dod na// thog mar dbang dang ldan pa gces// dbang rnams thob par ma byas shing// bla ma mnyes par ma byas na// nyan pa la sogs rtsol pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing rlag [538]
par 'gyur// des na dbang thob rab ru gces// 'di la rkyen sten bcud ldan gces// rkyen ni mtshan nyid drug ldan bla ma gces// rten ni snod ldan slob mas te// snying rje byams ldan shes rab

ldan// gtong phod gus ldan bka' mi cog/ khog yang gzhung bzang gsang thub cing// blo che yid gzhung rkyen thub pa// sha tsha snying nye dam ldan gyis// bla ma mtshan ldan dam pa btsal// bu dang chung ma nor gyi
dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad 'bul// ngang bsrings yun du bla ma bsten// thog mar tshogs bsags sbyang la 'bad// dus dang tshes grangs bzang po la// bla ma slob bu yo byad tshogs la sogs// kun

kyang sta gon sngon du 'gro// gsang ba yongs rdzogs dbang snyan sgrub// mtshams gshegs gang bsgo brda phyag dang// dam bca' byin dbab byin rlabs bdun// bskyed rdzogs gzhung srang tshogs 'khor bya// rtsa ba

gsum dang nag po che// thams cad chos kyis mnyes par bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang rim rnams// bum pa lha sku yig 'bru dang// phyag mtshan dbu rgyan rten dbang bskur// dug gsum dug lnga sbyor sgrol

mthu// khyad par ma ning dregs pa'i srog dbang bskur// bla ma yon gyis mnyes byas zhing// mgon po skongs kyi mnyes par bya// de ltar dbang thob yon tan bsam mi khyab// lo ga 'dir na che btsan ldan// zhi

rgyas dbang drag bsam pa 'grub// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thob// bkra shis nor 'phel mthu rtsal che// kun gyi yid 'ong gtsug tu khur// dbang srog dam tshig gis gzung ba// bla ma yi dam chos skyong
mkha' 'gro ma'i// sku gsung thugs rtsa ba'i yan lag dam tshig srung// bla ma'i dam tshig sku mi smad// gsung mi cag cing thugs mi dkrug/ yi dam dam tshig bskyed rdzogs dang// gsung gi bzlas pa mi cag
cing// dus mchod mi cag rten mi spang// chos skyong dam tshig lta ba yis// rgyas gdab gsol mchod rem pa gces// sgom bzlas rem cing phud mi 'bag/ dam rdzas mi sten mi spel cing// rten mchod mi btsing

mtshams gcod rem// nyams pa mi ston bskang mdos bya// DA ki'i dam tshig tshogs 'khor bya// rtsa ba gsum po spyi yi dam tshig ni// skra sen mi breg gdan mi sprug/ ral pa'i rtse mo mi bcad cing// bla ma min

par phyag mi btsal// de ltar dam tshig gtsang 'gyur na// tshe 'dir bde skyid phun sum tshogs// phyi ma rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i snga ltas ni// sngon la bu dang chung ma 'chi// yid du mi 'ong sna
tshogs 'byung// phyi ma rdo rje dmyal gting nas// bskal pa 'bum du thar du med// de bas dam tshig mchog tu gces// ma ning nag po'i lta ba ni// rang sems stong gsal 'gag med la// bdag 'dzin ye med

chad pa'o// kun khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// sgom pa kun khyab he ru ka/ phyag rgya chen po zil gnon sku// rtag pa chen po mi 'gyur ba'i// tshe yi g.yung drung can yin no// spyod pa thabs shes zung

'jug ste// de yang khro gtum sbyor sgrol brtson// sha khrag dmar la spyod pa'o// thabs ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ste// ai/ skye med stong pa'i nam mkha' ni// ma nor ma bcos chos kyi sku// rang bzhin lhun grub ngang gi

gsal// oM ma hA shU dz+nyA ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba Ad ma konya haM/ oM/ 'gag med snying rje'i sprin tshogs ni// stong gsal kun snang longs spyod rdzogs// snying rjes sems can kun la khyab// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba shud+d+he oM/

hUM/ rgyu las kun bskyed yi ge hUM// thams cad 'byung ba'i ngang du shar// gnyis med sprul pa'i skur gsal sgom// hUM e yaM ra suM keng bruM bi sha bi shud+d+he ban+d+ha dz+nyA na ma tsakra maN+Dal e bruM:ru tra kro ti ti ra ba/ ma sU r+ya

maN+Dal/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal/ paM pad+ma maN+Dal hUM/ hUM/ dur khrod thod mkhar me rlung tshub ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// rab 'jigs keng rus phyogs skyong brtsigs pa'i dbus// rin chen sna lngas 'ja' 'od zang thal 'od du

shar// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhi mu khyud bcas// lte dbus zla gam mthing nag e dbus su// ma traM ru tra chen po bsnol ba'i khri stengs na// hUM las me 'od rdo rje tsha tsha skar ltar 'phro// 'phros pas stong gsum

rab 'byams phyogs dus sangs rgyas mchod// bsdus pas sgrib sbyangs phyag mtshan thugs rdo rje// de las tsan dan beng chen po// oM badzra shrI he ru ka ma hA kA la g+ha na e/ ai/ rab 'jigs dur khrod 'bar ba'i

gzhal yas su// mi 'gyur mthing nag gru gsum e dkyil nas// ma traM ru tra chen po'i khri stengs nas// nyi zla pad+ma rin chen brtsegs pa'i gdan// he ru ka dpal 'jigs pa'i sku// ma ning nag po khro rgyal
che// gsang ba'i khro rgyal stobs po che// ma hA kA la dpal 'bar sku// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa la// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ g.yas na ru mtshon g.yon na snying zhags bsnams// spyan gsum

gyen 'thur thad kar gzigs// 'jigs byed khro gnyer gsum ldan gtum zhing rngam// sbrul chen 'bar ba'i ral pas sa gzhi khyab// rin chen bar khab lnga yis dbu la brgyan// thod pa skam po lnga yi dbu rgyan
can// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la rgyan// sku la dar nag ber chen gsol// gser ga rin chen sked la bcings// mi lpags g.yang gzhis stod du g.yogs// de dang gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum chen ni// lha
mo u ma de ba zhes// dngos su lha mo dpal 'bar ma// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar// g.yas na shel gri dkar po bsnams// g.yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// gtso bo yab kyi zhal du
stobs// de gnyis thugs las sprul pa'i sras// 'chol pa'i khro rgyal srog bdud nag po'i sku// srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan gsum brang la shar// spyan bzhis lhu tshigs brgyan pa'o// zhal nas
khrag 'dzag spyan mig phung por 'bar// rta nag rting dkar chibs su chibs// stag ral gzig shugs glo la btags// g.yas na gri gug g.yon pa lcags par thogs// lag na lcags gzhu bdud mda'
bsnams// skad cig yud la gling bzhir rgyug/ zlog pas mi zlog sngags zlog mkhan gshed byed// tri yaM ru tra hUM b+h+yo/ hUM/ sku las sprul pa'i mgon po stag zhon ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mtha' ber

gsol// mi mgo 'phreng ba'i do shal can// phyag g.yas beng chen g.yon pa bdud zhags pa// chibs su stag chen rngam pa chibs// oM shrI ma hA kA la ru pa tri yaM hUM dza/ hUM/ gsung las sprul pa'i mgon po beng chen
ni// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// dar nag sngo khra'i 'jol ber sku la gsol// gser ga'i skye rags sked la bcings// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// smin mtshams khro gnyer rab tu
brjid// spyan gsum sdang mig zhal bgrad pa// mche gtsigs sma ra mun ltar 'thibs// g.yas pa tsan dan beng chen phyag g.yon na// lcags par bdud rtsis bkang ba zhal du gsol// oM shrI ma hA kA la rag sha
du beM ni dza/ thugs kyi mgon po gri gug ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ g.yas g.yon gri gug thod khrag bsnams// thod pa'i 'phreng bas do shal byas// dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes// yan

lag thung zhing gyel chags pa// lhu gzugs sbrul gyis rab tu brgyan// zhal nas khrag dang zhag tu 'dzag/ oM badzra shrI ma hA kA la k+She ta ha na hUM hUM/ hUM/ yon tan mgon po seng zhon ni// sku mdog mthing nag

'jigs pa la// phyag na rin chen thod khrag bsnams// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum dor thabs bgrad// mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal can// mi lpags g.yang gzhi sku la gsol// me yi tshub mas brgyan pa po// oM shrI

ma hA kA la sing nge raM hUM/ hUM/ 'phrin las mgon po trag shad ni// sku mdog mun pa'i g.yung drung 'dra// sku la dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// phyag g.yas be con 'bar ba bsnams// g.yon pa mi snying zhal du
gsol// bskal pa me dpung klong na bzhugs// oM shrI ma hA kA la trag shad dza hUM/ gzhan yang sprul 'khor bye ba sa ya 'bum dang bcas pa bskyed par bya/ de ltar dam tshig bskyed nas ni// ye shes sems

dpa' spyan drangs pa// hUM/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur spyon lha chen po// ma hA kA la mthu bo che// gsang ba'i khro rgyal stobs po che// ma ning nag po kun gyi rje// 'og min gnas mchog dam
pa nas// gsang chen lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag tu// dur khrod rab 'jigs gzhal yas su// mchod phyir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// lha chen dpal 'bar gshegs su gsol// srog
bdud chen po gshegs su gsol// legs ldan nag po gshegs su gsol// b+ha ga nag po gshegs su gsol// tshogs bdag chen po gshegs su gsol// 'dzam lha nag po gshegs su gsol// nag po tshe
bdud gshegs su gsol// bya rgod thang nag gshegs su gsol// nag po thod 'phreng gshegs su gsol// mkha' lding nag po gshegs su gsol// rta ki nag po gshegs su gsol// bdag gi grogs po
