gshegs su gsol// bgegs kyi gnyen po gshegs su gsol// 'gro ba kun bzang gshegs su gsol// sring cig chen mo gshegs su gsol// mkha' 'gro gtso mo gshegs su gsol// re ti chen mo

gshegs su gsol// e h+ya hi b+ha ga wAn ma hA kA la shrI g+ha na g+hu ya dza dza/ zhes rgyal spos la sogs sbyar bas bsreg go/ bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ hUM/ dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal yas dam pa 'dir// ru tra pho

mo bsgyel ba'i khri stengs su// khro rgyal ma ning 'khor bcas gdan la bzhugs su gsol// oM shrI mahA kA la g+ha na gu ya sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM/ chos dbyings skye ba med pa'i pho brang nas// skye ba'i cho 'phrul khro rgyal

ma ning sku// mnyam nyid mthu lnga gtum chen me rlung 'bar// ru tra 'joms mdzad bdud dpung thal bar rlog/ thar byed gzhan du 'jigs pa'i gad rgyangs can// ma hA kA la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes
mkha' 'dra sngon po'i mdog tu 'gyur// sku mdog sngo nag dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// dug gsum mun khams ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i// ma hA kA la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dug gsum rtsad gcod sku gsum
lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung// phyi nang bar gsum dgra bgegs thal bar rlog/ ma ning mched gsum sku la phyag 'tshal lo// tshogs bdag chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// srog

bdud chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po tshe bdud sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po thod 'phreng sku la phyag 'tshal lo// b+ha ga nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// chos skyong chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// ta ki

nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// klu bdud nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// gza' bdud nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// shar gyi nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra gshed chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal

lo// dzam lha nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bgegs kyi gnyen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi grogs po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dam can chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// gtsug lag khang skyong khyod la
phyag 'tshal lo// ser chags dgra lha khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor dpal mgon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dug gsum sman pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs 'dzin srog shing khyod la phyag

'tshal lo// bstan pa'i mnga' bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po sde lnga'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// lha srin sde brgyad che la phyag 'tshal lo// sring cig chen

mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// re ti chen mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud 'dul nyi khri chig stong sku la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ khyed la mchod pa dbul ba ni// khyed kyi mthun pa'i dam rdzas ni// rnal 'byor 'byor

pas bsags pa'i thugs dam can// thod can ban d+ha rlon pa'i snod nang du// rgya shugs dza ti a ka ru// gla rtsi shing kun la sogs pa// dri zhim spos lnga tu lu lu// ga bur la sogs sman lnga chi li li// 'bru

bcud dza gad gser skyems brengs se brengs// rak+ta dmar chen arga khyi li li/ ban d+ha rus pa'i tshogs ni khro lo lo// sha chen gsur dud ngad pa chi li li// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa brengs se brengs// b+ha ling

gtor ma'i mchod pa rol se rol// mahA maM sa la sogs sha sna stong// ma hA tsit+ta la sogs snying sna stong// ma hA rak+ta la sogs khrag sna stong// go ro tsa na la sogs klad chen stong// ba su ta dang nang khrol rnam pa

lnga// shing thog me tog 'bru sna sman sna dang// zan dang khur ba thug pa'i bye brag dang// khrag rul nya sha la sogs mthun pa'i kha zas dang// la phug la du yid bzhin 'bras bu'i zas// mar thud khrom dang zho dang

'o mar bcas// rtsi dang rtsabs ru go snyod sgog pa dang// gzugs dang sgra dri reg bya chos la sogs// 'dod yon lnga ldan mchod pa dam pa 'di// che mchog he ru ka yi thugs dam skongs// dpal mgon ma ning

nag po'i thugs dam skongs// sprul 'khor nyi khri chig stong thugs dam skongs// zhes mchod pa'i rim pa rgyas par bya// gzhan yang sman raka gtor ma dang// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang// phyag rgya'i mchod
pas bstod pa bya// hUM/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// che mchog he ru ka dpal sku gsum rdzogs// srid rtsa bdag 'dzin ru tra sde gsum btul// rtsal chen 'phrin las bdag la phyag 'tshal

lo// hUM/ dpal chen dngos sprul nag po chen po'i sku// 'chol ba'i khro rgyal ma ning dgra bgegs gshed// lha chen dpal 'bar chos skyong yongs kyi rje// dmag dpon chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM/
dur khrod thod mkhar me rlung tshub dkyil nas// rnal 'byor dpal mgon khyod kyi cha lugs ni// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// sku gsum ldan phyir spyan gsum gyen 'thur gzigs// rab
'jigs khro gnyer gsum ldan gtam la rngam// rin chen thod skam lnga yis dbu la brgyan// sprul nag ral pa nag pos sa gzhi khyab// g.yas pa ru mtshon g.yon pa snying zhags bsnams// tsan dan
beng chen sked btsugs dmag tshogs 'gyed// thod pa skam rlon snying 'phreng sbrul chun spras// dar nag ber chen gser ga mi lpags bcings// las la chas tshe srog bdud cha lugs 'dzin// srid gsum gzigs
phyir spyan gsum brang la shar// dmag dpon bzhi 'gyed spyan bzhis lhu tshigs brgyan// stag ral gzig shugs btags nas rta nag zhon// bdud mda' dgra snying gzer 'debs gling bzhir rgyug/ spyan nas

khrag 'dzag me yi kha rlangs 'bar// kha T+wAM gri gug lcags ral thogs nas su// snang srid pho rgyud thams cad pho nyar 'gyed// ci bcol las rnams skad cig yud la sgrubs// rtag tu grogs mdzad mgon po nag
po ni// ma bskul bar yang gnag pa'i dgra bgegs sgrol// rta gnas spyan bzhi dmag tshogs dmag dpung sdud// gar bskul sa ru mi ro tsher mar 'tsher// zlog pas mi zlog sngags zlog mkhan gyi gshed// sde
brgyad bran 'khol stag sham mig brgyan can// gtsug lag khang srung dkor kun rtsad nas chod// dregs pa kun 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzhan yang 'dzab bzlas dngos grub blang zhing 'phrin las

bskul// gsol ka tshogs mchod rgyun ting 'dzin rim sgom// 'dzab ni spyi 'dzab dgos 'dzab rang rang gzhung// spyi 'dzab che mchog he ru ka'i// snying po ma nor 'di ltar bzlas// oM shri ma hA kro d+ha he ru ka hUM
phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ dgos 'dzab ma ning snying po ni// chu bo'i gzhung bzhin bzlas gyur na// lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'khor// yon tan srid gsum dbang du sdud// khams gsum zil gyis

gnon// bkra shis nor 'phel dkor srungs mchog/ oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na gu ya raM sid d+hi hUM/ bye ba them nas las kun 'grub// gang bsams pa la thogs pa med// dngos grub ban d+har chang dang bdud rtsir
sbyar// sha dmar zas dang dngos grub rdzas rnams bsags// hUM/ rang byung gdod nas rnam dag rdzas// 'chi med rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i mchog/ gsang ba yongs rdzogs dngos grub zhu// khams gsum dbang sdud

'gran zla med// dpal mgon ma ning chen po'i dngos grub stsol// gzhan gyis mi thub mthu che rtsal drag pa'i// ma ning srog bdud chen po'i dngos grub stsol// gsang sngags rgyud 'dzin gzhan don lhun grub

pa'i// tshe bdud chen po'i dngos grub stsol// 'chi med tshe yi dngos grub stsol// 'dzad med nor gyi dngos grub stsol// 'bru bcud zas kyi dngos grub stsol// 'bral med grogs kyi dngos grub stsol// rdzu 'phrul

mthu yi dngos grub stsol// oM AHhUM/ oM ma hA kA la g+ha na gu ya raM kA ya sid+d+hi bAk+ka sid+d+hi tsit+ta sid+d+hi sarba sid+d+hi hUM dza/ 'phrin las gsum ste bcas gzhi dmigs pa sngags// nad gdon zhi byed bum pa
mtshan ldan bshams// tshad med bzhi ldan skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya// bden pa'i stobs brjod spyan ras gzigs su gsol// 'od zer dkar po 'phros te gang dmigs de la phog/ rtsa sngags sham du shan+ting
ku ru gdags// nad gdon rnam rtog zhi bar nges// tshe nor rgyas byed bang mdzod tshad ldan bshams// nang du ma ning tshogs bdag 'dzam lha'i sku// rin chen sna lnga las bzhengs pa// mnga' gsol rab gnas

bya// rang nyid tshe dpag med du bsam// khang pa lcang lo can du bsgom// 'od zer ser pos stong gsum bkang// tshe dpal longs spyod 'dus par bsam// rtsa sngags sham bur nan kha te ma ma kha shi mi snying
'gul// mi 'gram chog a yu pu ni sarba ru pa puSh+tiM ku ru ya swA hA/ tshe nor longs spyod rgyas par 'gyur// khams gsum dbang bsdus rgyal mtshan phyogs bzhir gzugs// zangs ma'i ga'u rtag tu lus la
srel// rgyal mtshan ga'u'i nang du dpal 'khor gzhug/ ma ning sku mdog dmar por gsal// 'od zer dmar po spro bsdu yis// gang dmigs tsit+ta'i zhal drangs la// rtsa sngags sham bur ba shang ku ru
gdags// des ni khams gsum srid gsum dus gcig sdud// drag po 'brub khung tshad ldan bshams// nang du zag rdzas nya bo gzhug/ steng nas 'khor los bkab nas ni// lte bar bug pa thun lam bya// ro

g.yam rgya gram bris pas kha bcad// chu shing phur la sngags 'di gdab// rtsa sngags sham bur mA ra ya ku ru ye swA hA/ ma ning stobs ldan chen por bsam// 'od zer nag po 'phro 'du yis// dgra bgegs thal
bar rlag par 'gyur// gtor ma bdud shos nag po la// sha dmar sgog btsong la phug dang// sman rag chang phud sha chen gsur// a ka ru dang rgya spos tam// dpal chen gsal bas byin gyis brlabs// srog
snying kha yi rtags te dbul// rnga brdung dar nag 'phyar la 'di skad bskul// hUM b+h+yo/ lha chen dpal 'bar gshegs su gsol// legs ldan nag po gshegs su gsol// b+ha ga nag po gshegs su
gsol// tshogs bdag chen po gshegs su gsol// dzam lha nag po gshegs su gsol// nag po thod 'phreng gshegs su gsol// chos skyong nag po gshegs su gsol// dgra bo'i gshed ma gshegs su
gsol// bgegs kyi gnyen po gshegs su gsol// bdag gi grogs po gshegs su gsol// dam can chen mo gshegs su gsol// nag po gzim dngas ya la la// sring mo zor thogs thibs
se thibs// bdud po khram thogs ye re re// shan pa gri thogs zangs se zangs// nag po zor thogs chems se chems// dar nag ru mtshon rongs se rongs// g.yab dar nag po lhabs se

lhabs// nyi ma zla ba ta la la// me stag tshub ma 'u ru ru// dug mtsho khol ma chi li li// sbrul nag mang po khyug se khyugs// dom nag khyi nag nga ra ra// lcags spyang ce spyang 'du ru ru// bya nag mang po thibs

se thibs// g.yag rog mang po 'du ru ru// rta nag mang po tse re re// mon pa gar byed khyugs se khyugs// ling ba mda' 'phen sbrings se sbrings// bya rog sha 'thog lings se lings// 'ug pa'i rkan sgra chems se
chems// thun gyi ser ra sha ra ra// gnam lcags thog 'bebs longs se longs// rlung nag tshub mar khyi li li// ma mo'i spyugs pa kyu ru ru// mi lpags g.yab dor lings se lings// 'gong po ngus skad lhangs

se lhangs// 'dre ngan skad ngan tse re re// rgyal sen smyo sgra teg ge teg/ chos skyong 'khor bcas thibs se thibs// tshur spyon tshur spyon dam la 'du// rgyan gyi bshos gtor 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i 'phrin las

grub par mdzod// hUM b+h+yo/ do nub nam gyi gung thun la// bla rkun jag pa las la khye// dam nyams dgra bo gnyid song gi/ dgra bo bla 'khyams khrid las shog/ bsad rtags don snying khyer las shog/ dkor rkun

snying rtsa khyer la shog/ b+h+yo/ ma ning nag po'i dus la bab// b+ha ga nag po'i dus la bab// dgra gshed chen po'i dus la bab// mgon po nag po'i dus la bab// yab rje nag po'i dus la bab// 'dzam lha nag
po'i dus la bab// rta ki nag po'i dus la bab// mon pa nag po'i dus la bab// shar ging nag po'i dus la bab// gza' bdud nag po'i dus la bab// tshogs bdag nag po'i dus la bab// nag po tshe bdud
dus la bab// sring cig chen mo'i dus la bab// 'gro ba kun bzang dus la bab// mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo'i dus la bab// las kyi dbang chen dus la bab// re ma ti yi dus la bab// mon mo nag mo'i dus la

bab// ci bcol las rnams thams cad sgrubs// zas su dgra bo'i sha la zo// skom du dgra bo'i khrag la 'thung// las su gnod byed dgra bgegs sgrol// e yaM raM sid di tri yaM ru tra hUM b+h+yo/ zhes pas drag tu
bskul/ gtor zor 'phang/ gsol ka bsham dang byin brlab cing// spyan 'dren mchod dbul bstod bskul bya// phud mchod rgyas dang sngags mchod 'bul// bsham pa ma 'bags phye phud la// rin chen brdar
cing mgo bo'i bshos// zur gsum nag po nang can 'bru// rtse la smyug rgod rten mda' dar nag gzugs// de'i mthar bshos bu zur gsum brgyad// mtheb kyus bskor/ sman rag tshogs 'khor spos dud
bsham// skyabs 'gro sems bskyed tshogs bsag cing// phyi ltar sngags drug phyag rgya drug/ nang ltara'abru gsum sbyangs spel sgyur// gsang bar rang nyid che mchog sgom// thugs srog hUM las 'bru

lngar 'phros// e yaM raM keM/ e las nam mkha' stong pa'i ngang// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sgom// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor skyed// ko las ban d+ha'i sgyed bu gsum// de steng ban d+ha stong gsum tsam// a

las sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga ru bskyed// de dbus rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// me rlung 'bar bas rlangs 'phungs te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing du 'phros// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul// byang sems bdud rtsi'i

rgyun drangs nas// rdo rje la thim rdo rje lan gsum dkrugs pas bdud rtsir 'khyil// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang sems dang// zhi khro yongs rdzogs lha tshogs dang// ma ning mgo dgu rnam gsum dang// snang
srid lha srin sde brgyad sogs// ma lus mnyes mchod mgron bzhi mchod// rgyas par yongs su rdzogs par bya// blo 'bring bstod bskul tshig bshad mchod// dbang mthas byin rlabs sngags kyis gsol// sman
raka gtor ma sbreng bya zhing// hUM b+h+yo/ lha chen dpal 'bar 'dir gshegs gsol// ma ning nag po gshegs su gsol// legs ldan nag po gshegs su gsol// b+ha ga nag po gshegs su gsol// tshogs
bdag chen po gshegs su gsol// dzam lha nag po gshegs su gsol// nag po thod 'phreng gshegs su gsol// chos skyong chen po gshegs su gsol// gza' bdud chen po gshegs su gsol// srog bdud
nag po gshegs su gsol// ta ki nag po gshegs su gsol// nag po tshe bdud gshegs su gsol// bya rgod thang nag gshegs su gsol// mkha' lding nag po gshegs su gsol// klu bdud nag po
gshegs su gsol// thar pa nag po gshegs su gsol// dgra bo'i gshed ma gshegs su gsol// bgegs kyi gnyen po gshegs su gsol// bdag gi grogs po gshegs su gsol// dam can chen po
gshegs su gsol// sprul 'khor dpa' bo gshegs su gsol// yab rje nag po gshegs su gsol// shar ging nag po gshegs su gsol// dung gi sna can gshegs su gsol// mon pa nag po gshegs su
gsol// sring cig chen mo gshegs su gsol// 'gro ba kun bzang gshegs su gsol// mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo gshegs su gsol// las kyi dbang chen gshegs su gsol// re ti chen mo gshegs su
gsol// mon mo nag mo gshegs su gsol// 'dir gshegs gdan la bzhugs su gsol// 'dod yon lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// b+ha ling rgyan gyi mchod pa 'bul// sman raka bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul// go
ro tsa na'i mchod pa 'bul// ba su ta yi mchod pa 'bul// ma hA maM sa'i mchod pa 'bul// ma hA tsit+ta'i mchod pa 'bul// ma hA rak+ta'i mchod pa 'bul// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa

'bul// dza gad chang gi mchod pa 'bul// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bdag cag rnal 'byor 'khor bcas la// nad gdon rnam rtog zhi ba dang// tshe dang bsod nams rgyas pa dang// khams gsum srid
gsum dbang sdud pa// dregs pas dgra bgegs tshar gcod pa// mi mthun phyogs rnams zhi ba dang// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang// dkon mchog dbu 'phangs bstod pa dang// rnal 'byor

sku dgra 'dul ba dang// gtsug lag khang bsrung chos 'khor skyong// bcol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod// ces bskul lo// gzhan yang sngags gsol kha ni// oM shrI badzra ma hA kro d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ mahA kro

d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta sarba pU tsa la khA hi khA hi/ oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na gu na raM sid+d+hi ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta khA hi khA hi/ oM ma hA kA la ru pa tri yaM dza ma hA pany+tsa/ oM ma hA kA la rag+sha du beM ni ma hA pany+tsa/

oM badzra shrI mahA kA la kha k+She ta ha na ma hA pany+tsa/ oM ma hA kA la sing nga raM hUM ma hA pany+tsa/ oM shrI ma hA kA la krag shad ma hA pany+tsa/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo ma hA pan tri yaM ru tra hUM b+h+yo ma hA pany+tsa/ mun shi b+h+yo ma hA pany+tsa/ mun nag

shi b+h+yo ma hA pany+tsa/ ru tra nag po dgra bo'i snying la su tri tsit+ta rbad ma hA pany+tsa/ su tri mA ra ya rbad ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta ma hA rak+ta g+han khA hi khA hi/ hUM b+h+yo lha chen dpal 'bar zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsakra kha

raM khA hi/ ma hA kA la'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ ma ning nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta ma hA rak+ta g+ha na kha raM khA hi/ srog bdud chen po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rag+ta g+ha na

kha raM khA hi/ gza' bdud ma ning zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na kha raM khA hi/ klu bdud ma ning zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta ma hA rag+ta g+ha na kha raM khA hi/ ba ga nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rag+ta g+ha na kha

raM khA hi/ legs ldan nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na kha raM khA hi/ yab rje nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na kha raM khA hi/ chos skyong chen po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra

kha raM khA hi/ tshogs bdag chen po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ dzam lha nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ ta ki nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa g+ha ling ta

rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ mon pa nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ shar ging nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ dam can chen po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa

b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ nag po thod 'phreng zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra khA raM khA hi/ bya rgod thang nag zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ mkha' lding

nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ tshe bdud nag po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ dgra bo'i gshed ma'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA

hi/ bgegs kyi gnyen po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ bdag gi grogs po'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsakra kha raM khA hi/ sring cig chen mo'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta

rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ 'gro ba kun bzang zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ las kyi dbang chen zhal du ma

hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta g+ha na tsak+k+ra kha raM khA hi/ re ma ti'i zhal du ma hA pany+tsa b+ha ling ta rak+ta sarba pU dza khA hi/ nag po gzi mdangs ya la la// sring mo ma tshogs thibs se thibs// bdud pho khram thogs nye re
re// shan pa gri thogs zings se zings// nag po zor thogs chems se chems// dar nag ru mtshon rongs se rongs// g.yab dar nag po lhabs se lhabs// nyi ma zla ba ta la la// me stag tshub ma 'u ru ru// dug

mtsho khol ma chi li li// sbrul nag mang po khyugs se khyugs// dom nag khyi nag nga ra ra// lcags spyang ce spyang 'du ru ru// bya nag mang po thibs se thibs// g.yag rog mang po ngu ru ru// rta nag mang po tse re
re// mon pa gar byed khyugs se khyugs// ling pa mda' 'phen sbrangs se sbrangs// bya rog sha 'thog lings se lings// 'ug pa rkan sgra chems se chems// thun gyi ser ba sha ra ra// gnam lcags thog 'bab

longs se longs// rlung nag tshub ma kyi li li// ma mo'i spyugs pa kyu ru ru// mi lpags g.yab 'dor lings se lings// 'gong po ngu skad lhangs se lhangs// 'dre ngan skad ngan tse re re// rgyal bsen smyo sgra teg ge

teg/ chos skyong 'khor bcas thibs se thibs// tshur sbyon tshur sbyon dam la 'du// rgyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod// do nub nam gyi gung thun la// bla rkun jag pa las

la khye// dam nyams dgra bo gnyid song gis// dgra bo bla 'khyam khrid las shog/ bsad rtags don snying khyer las shog/ dkor rkun snying rtsa chod las shog/ b+h+yo/ ma ning nag po'i dus la bab// b+ha ga nag po'i
dus la bab// dgra gshed nag po'i dus la bab// mgon po nag po'i dus la bab// yab rje nag po'i dus la bab// dzam lha nag po'i dus la bab// ta ki nag po'i dus la bab// mon pa nag po'i dus la
bab// shar ging nag po'i dus la bab// gza' bdud nag po'i dus la bab// tshogs bdag nag po'i dus la bab// nag po tshe bdud dus la bab// sring cig chen mo'i dus la bab// 'gro ba
kun bzang dus la bab// mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo'i dus la bab// las kyi dbang chen dus la bab// re ma ti yi dus la bab// mon mo nag mo'i dus la bab// ci bcol las rnams thams cad sgrubs// zas su

dgra bo'i sha la zo// skom du dgra bo'i khrag la 'thung// las su gnod byed dgra bgegs sgrol// e yaM raM sid+d+hi tri yaM ru tra hUM b+h+yo/ zhes gsol/ drag tu bskul// thal mo gdab// 'dor na 'di nyid gsol bas

grub// ma ning yin phyir zlog tu med// gzhan yang tshogs kyi mchod pa ni// bsham zhing bsang sbyang byin brlab cing// spyan drangs phud 'bul bar ma bshags// zhal du btab cing rol bar bya// bsham pa gal

za zla rgyas zla phrom dang// dza gad dza ti dza des kun tu rgyu// maM sa rak+ta tsit+ta ba su ta// go ro tsa na la sogs yo byad bsags gsang ba// oM A tsus ma pe ta li kro ta ni sarba phraM sbyaM saM sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ sbyang ba raM yaM khaM

sbyang spel// bdud rtsir bsgyur byin rlabs// oM AHhUM hri/ g+ha na ka sarba tsa ho 'dod yon lnga ldan byin brlabs nas// spyan 'dren ma ning gtso 'khor bcas// phud bshags btab cing lhag ma rol// rgyun du dpal

chen krong bskyed bya// sprul 'khor gzhal yas rang lus bsdu// rang lus snang la rang bzhin med// 'gag med snying kha'i hUM la 'dus// de gnyis mtha' nas bsdus pa la// stong gsal cig bzhag/ 'bras bu lha

bskyed stong mtha' 'gag/ sprul pa'i sku ru mngon sangs rgyas// rdzogs rim snang la rang bzhin med// longs spyod rdzogs skur mngon sangs rgyas// bskyed rdzogs gang du 'dzin med pas// chos kyi sku ru mngon
sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon ma hA kA la'i las rgyud chen po las/ bskyed rdzogs las byang du bsdebs nas ldang tshad brgyad du bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gsang ba'i

bdag pos yang zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan he ru ka/ sprul pa sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// nyid sprul
dpal mgon ma hA kA la 'di'i// sprul pa'i don byed gang yin dang// sprul pa'i bye brag ji ltar byed// rigs dang sde tshan du ru 'dus// gnyen po'i lha ni gang gang lags// gnas khang sgrub khang ci 'dra

dgos// bsnyen sgrub las sbyor ji ltar bgyi// spyi yi dam rdzas gang la byed// sgo sgo'i dam rdzas gang ltar yin// bsten cing sgrub pa'i yon tan gang// las kyi kha tshar ji tsam yod// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol
cig/ ces zhus pas/ che mchog he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rigs 'dzin gsang ba'i bdag/ de don khyod kyis zhus pa legs// ma nor bdag gis legs par bstan// lha mgon ma

hA kA la 'di'i// sprul pa'i don byed 'gro ba 'dul// sprul pa'i bye brag bzhi lnga brgyad// rigs ni nyi shu rtsa lngar 'byed// sde tshan nyi khri chig stong yod// shis pa'i lha ni che mchog bdag nyid dang// gshin rje rta

mgrin gsang bdag khyod yin no// gnas khang dben zhing nyams dga' ba// gtsug lag khang ngam mtshan ldan gces// grogs ni dad ldan shes rab can// snying rje can dang sdug sran can// phyag rgya gsang thub
mtshan ldan gces// bsnyen pa rab 'bring rtags la sbyor// sgrub pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum// las sbyor srog ser cho 'phrul gtad// bran dang pho nyar sde brgyad bkol// yang 'khol brgyad po rno myur

mgyogs// sgrub mchog mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi// beng bcas bla rdo kun dbang bsgyur// spyi yi dam rdzas bsnyen bsgrub cing// las sbyor bsad las cho 'phrul rdzas// sgo sgo'i dam rdzas rang rig gtso// bsnyen sgrub
yon tan brjod las 'das// las kyi kha tshar bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// ma ning las rgyud nag po las/ mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye che

mchog he ru ka/ gong zhus don rnams mdor bstan kyang// de don zhib rgyas ma gsungs na// ma rigs 'khrul bas blo mi khrol// bye brag shin tu rgyas par zhu// zhes zhus pas/ che mchog he ru kas bka' stsal pa/
de don zhus pa shin tu legs// dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa rnams// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// mi shes g.yul ngo sel ba

po// rgyas par bshad kyis gus pas nyon// lha mgon ma hA kA la 'di// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa yin// ci'i phyir ru tra btul ba'i phyir// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// gza' bdud ma ning nag po
dang// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i ru tra dar// de tshe gzhan gyis mi thul bas// bdag 'dzin sngon bcom ma ning 'dis// de tshe bdag 'dzin ru tra btul// bye brag phye na rnam pa bzhi// mgon po ma ning nag po

dang// gza' bdud ma ning nag po dang// srog bdud ma ning nag po dang// klu bdud ma ning nag po dang bzhi yin te// sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las mgon po lnga ru phye// de yang lha srin sde brgyad don
gyi ngo bo gcig pa yin// rigs ni gcig tu ma nges te// ston pa sa gsung rgyud gzhung re// rigs 'dzin mang po dam la btags// ye shes mgon po las mgon dang// dam tshig mgon po sprul mgon dang// ru
tra rang rgyud gnas bsgyur ba'i// sha za'i mgon po la sogs pa// dam tshig ar+g+ha~M dmar la dam bcas pa'i// mgon po nyi shu rtsa lnga yod// dkyil 'khor mu ran skyong ba yi// dpal mgon bdun cu

rtsa bzhi dang// bdud 'dul nyi khri chig stong yod// lha ni lta ba gyabs kyi lha// gsal stong 'dzin med ru tra'i gnyen po yin// sgom pa stobs su gyur pa'i lha// bdag nyid chen po he ru ka/ nga ni dus gsum sngon

yang byung// nga ni dus gsum phyis kyang 'byung// nga ni da lta kun gyi rje// nga ni khro bo kun gyi rgyal// nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// nga ni ma mo kun gyi yab// nga ni ru tra kun gyi gshed// nga yi sku yi brjid mthong
na// dus gsum sangs rgyas ba spu gzing// nga yi gsung gi sgra sgrags na// khams gsum srid gsum brgyal skrag dngangs// nga yi sems kyi don rig na// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam por sbyor// ma rig mun
pa'i 'khor sgo sangs// gzhan yang sku gsung thugs kyi lha// yon tan 'phrin las rbod gtong drag sngags dang// mchod bstod la sogs bka' brgyad gtso bo dgu/ gnyen po yin zhes nga yis bshad// mdor na
lha tshogs mang po kun// thams cad sems kyi sprul pa yin// sems nyid gsang bdag khyod du 'dus// khyod kyi kun gyi gnyen por che// ci phyir rgyal ba'i thugs gsang 'dus// khyod ni mthu stobs bdag po

ru// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur bas// de phyir khyod nyid gnyen po'i lha// zhes gsungs so// ma ning las rgyud nag po las/ che mchog gi sprul don ched du 'byung khung dang bye brag rigs dang sde tshan gnyen

po'i lha rnams rgyas par spyad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// kye kye che mchog he ru ka/ bsnyen cing sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang du bgyi// gnas kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// zhes
gsol pas/ dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig ma yengs gsang ba'i bdag/ gnas la rnam pa lnga ru spyad// dam gnas bsnyen gnas sgrub pa'i gnas// rten gzugs gnas dang las la sbyar ba'i
gnas// dbang gnas bkra shis grub thob gnas// yang na bla ma'i gdan sar bya// bsnyen pa'i gnas rnyed nyams dga' ba// shar ri dma' la nub ri mtho// lho gzhol byang skyobs rtse la rgod po lding// mdun

na me tog sna dgu yod// phu na gangs dang ri rtse mtho// mda' na mtsho dang gtsang po 'bab// rtsi shing nags tshal 'bras bu smin// bya skad ri dwags gcan gzan 'khrol// de ru ma yengs gus pas bsnyen// sgrub
gnas dur khrod chen por shis// yang na gtsug lag khang chen por// sgrub cing rten gzugs mchod pa bya// rten gnas rang gi khang par bya// las sbyor ri gsum 'dus pa'i rtse// lung gsum mdo 'am chu gsum
mdo// gnam sa gru gsum yod pa ru// phung shul bkra mi shis dang lha 'dre 'tshogs pa'i sa// srin po ral pa g.yeng ba 'dra ba dang// sog po khros pa 'dra ba'i sa ru sbyar// ma ning las rgyud nag po
las/ gnas kyi mtshan nyid lnga ru bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan che mchog dpal// grogs dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gang// zhes zhus
pas/ dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po yang nyon cig/ grogs ni 'khor bas sun pa yi// dad ldan shes rab snying rje can// khong yangs gsang thub rigs bzang btsal// phyag rgya dung
can glang sna la// pad can lcug phran ri mo can// yid 'ong gsang thub rtsa bzang ba// bongs mtshams sha rgyas smin dkyus ring// mdangs mtshams ngang ring sos dal ba// mdor na rnal 'byor spyod dang
mthun// phyag rgya'i mchog ni yin par nges// ma ning las rgyud nag po las/ grogs dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang gsol pa// kye kye bcom

ldan che mchog he ru ka/ bsnyen pa rab 'bring ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig khro rgyal gsang bdag che// dben pa'i gnas su rang 'dug ste// gtsang zhing yid 'ong
rgyan bkram ste// dkon mchog rten gsum ras bris mchod pa bsham// dpal gtor rtags gtor 'dzin gtor bsham// 'tsho zas rkyen zlog bdud 'dul go mtshon bsags// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams
gcad la// yongs rdzogs las gzhung srang// yang na yi dam gang byed dam// gsang bdag chen po'i las gzhung srang// bsod nams tshogs la dbang ba dang// skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon du btang// de'i

rjes bdag nyid che mchog gam// gsang bdag khyod kyi bsnyen pa la// rab tu lo sgrub rtags la sbyar// 'bring du zla sgrub drangs la sbyar// tha ma zhag bsnyen dus sgrub bo// las gzhung gzhan rgyas ma grub
kyang// gsang bdag bsnyen sgrub shin tu gces// gsang bdag bsnyen rdzogs mchog tu gces// bde gshegs gcig grub rgyal ba kun gyi ngang// de ltar gnyen po'i bsnyen rdzogs nas// gong bstan gnas su

rang 'dug ste// tshad med bzhi po sngon song bas// ma ning nag po'i bsnyen pa bskyal// rang nyid che mchog skur sgom la// mdun du ma ning sku gzugs sgom// spos sbyar bsregs la gtor ma gtang// de nas smra

bcad sngags 'di bzlas// oM shrI ma hA kA lA g+ha na g+hu h+ya raM sid+d+hi hUM/ grangs bsnyen bye ba 'them par bskyal// dus bsnyen zhag grangs nyi shu gcig/ bsnyen rtags las 'phro che chung shes// las 'phro rab la gong
gis grub// 'bring la nyis 'dab tha ma gsum 'dab grub// las 'phro gcig kyang med gyur kyang// bye ba bdun 'bum bsnyen byas na// sku dngos ston cing gsung thos dang// thugs sems dbyer
med gcig tu 'dres// phan gnod gang yang bsams pas 'grub// rtags ni ma nor 'di ltar ston// slob dpon zhang blon pha gu spun// a tsar mon nag khol po sogs// glu bro gar dang las rogs yong// bya
dom kyi g.yag nag po'i tshogs// 'khor bcas bsnyen po'i rtags yin no// zhes gsungs so// mgon po ma ning gsang ba'i las rgyud nag po las/ bsnyen pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu
pa'o//// gsang bdag chen pos yang zhus pa// kye kye/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru ka/ lha mgon ma ning nag po 'di'i// sgrub thabs phyi nang gsang ba gsum// ma nor bdag la bka' stsol
cig/ ces zhus pas// dpal chen he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ gsang bdag chen po yang nyon cig/ mgon po ma ning nag po yi// sgrub thabs phyi nang gsang ba gsum// legs par bshad kyi yid la zung// phyi

sgrub hoM dang ri rab maN+Dal gsum// hom ni rang lus sum 'gyur tshad// se skyer bla ba tsher nag bzhi// bam du sbams la thogs gsum ching ma gsum// yang na ching ma lnga ru bya// bye tshang dang po gsang ba

sbed// bar ma tha ma ma yi tshang// sa la rtags blang rin gzhal sbyang// 'og tu 'brub khung mda' gang tshad// de ru dgra yi ming rus gzugs// gzhan yang ling ga mang du bris// phyi ru gdags shing gseb tu

rdzang// de ni mgon po dngos su bskyed// phyi gshegs phyi skongs bka' sgrags tsha tsha gdab// mgon po mchod pa'i rdzas rnams la// mi sha rta nag khyi nag sha// spos reng ma ning gtso la dbul// oM shrI ma hA kA la

ga na g+hu ya raM sid+d+hi du pe de a hUM/ ra dug kyi lce me tog spang rgyan gsum// mgon po me tog mchod par 'bul// oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na g+hu ya raM sid+d+hi puSh+pe te A hUM/ ra rog phag tshil me zhus mar me sbyar// nag po

chen po nyid la dbul// oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na g+hu ya raM sid+d+hi a lo ke a hUM/ g.yag rog glang rog lug nag khrag/ dri chab mgon po nyid la dbul// oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na g+hu ya raM sid+d+hi sa ma ya badzra g+han d+he a hUM/

nas nag bra bo sran nag gsum// lha bshol mgon po nyid la dbul// oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na g+hu ya raM sid+d+hi sa ma ya ne be te A hUM/ dam tshogs mchod pa shin tu gnyan// 'di ni kun la gsang bar bya// spyi yi rnam

lnga dngos su mchod// nyams chag skong na gong bzhin bya// bag phye ka ra sbrang rtsi bu ram thud// de rnams sbyar la 'o mar btso// de nas ri lu sran tshad mar du btso// stag zhon 'phrin las gzhung srangs la// ma ning
sngags sgrub sham bu ru// gang 'dod las kyi kha sgyur cig/ thabs ldan me 'bar hoM sreg cing// gong gi mchod dbul ri lug sreg/ rnga rdung dung bus cha lang gdab// g+han d+he brdung zhing rkang dung
'bud// dar 'phyar b+h+yos gdab gser skyems gtor// des ni dam can sprin bzhin 'du// mthu rtsal nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// gzhan yang ri rab la rten nas// dam can rten pa'i phyi sgrub ni// sa

bzang spyin la rin chen brdar// tsan dan chus sbrus ri rab ni// lcog ldan bang rim bzhi pa bya// ma ning dmar nag 'jigs pa la// phyi ni dur khrod thod mkhar bri// gseb na me rlung tshub mar 'khyil// rtse la dar
'phyar smyu rgod gzugs// bse byang stag gzigs ras ma gdags// shes dang zhing ras bris sku btags// nya stong brgyad gsum gtor ma gtang// gser skyems btang la gsol kha bya// des ni dam can grib

so bzhin du 'du// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// maN+Dal nag po mda' gang la// dbus ni zla gam gnam sgo can// pad+ma 'dab brgyad nag por bya// mu khyud thod pa'i ra bas bskor// sgo bzhi phyogs mthun sgo

rgyan gzhan dang mthun// phyi rim rdo rje me ris bskor// seng ldeng phur pa mgon por skyed// byin rlabs dbang bskur rab gnas bya// dus bzhi dus drug las gzhung srang// ra ba bzhi la dus mchod bya// bsnyen

sngags sgrub sngags las sbyor gsum// nyin mtshan spel mar drang bar bya// de byas ma ning nag po yang// nang ma bzhin du bdag la 'khor// mthu rtsal nam mkha'i thog ltar 'byung// de nas yang dag bshad bya

ba// ma ning nag po'i nang sgrub ni// beng dang gtor ma dkyil 'khor gsum// tsan dan shing la beng bcas te// zhi rgyas dbang drag 'phrin las sgo// rtse la rin chen 'bar ba bya// logs la srog sngags bsnyen
sgrub bri// nang du dam rdzas 'khor lo gzhug/ rab gnas dgug gzhug lha bskyed bya// gang 'dod beng gi kha lo sgyur// beng ni lha yi nor bu yin// gtor ma chang bcud kyis sbrus la// rin chen 'bar ba'i

gzugs su bya// ri bdun mtsho bdun gling bzhi gling phran brgyad// nyi ma shar nub tha ma lcags ris bskor// gtor rgyan sha khrag dkar dang spos sna tshogs// 'bras chang 'o thug la phug sgog btsong bran// dngos

grub rdzas dang sman rag tshogs// las mgon gtor ma la sogs bsham// byin rlabs sngags drug phyag rgya drug/ raM yaM khaM sbyang gsol ka'i skabs bzhin bya/// rang nyid che mchog gsal ba yi// thugs ka'i hUM
las mgon po grangs med spros// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams gcad cing// 'di yi las gzhung rgyas par srang// beng ma'i gzhung yang skabs su srang// tshogs 'khor 'byor pa mnga' thang bskyed// bod rbad
bsad gsum dril la bzlas// ma ning la sogs mgon po rnams// sha rul sbrag ma bzhin du 'khor// de ltar zla gcig bar du byas pa yis// ma ning nag po dngos su 'khol// stong gsum kha lo

sgyur bar nus// dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra ba la// pad 'dab rin chen zur brgyad sgyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang ba maN+Dal gtor ma dang// 'brub khung gri snying la sten nas// ma ning nag po

dngos su sgrub// maN+Dal nag po gru bzhi bsham// pad+ma'i dod la 'khor lo bri// de dbus khru gang gru gsum bya// ling ga 'brub la rtsang gis bskor// steng du khri stengs rtag gtor bsham// rgyun gtor dus bzhir

nam phyed gtang// brten mda' rgod sgro gzhob ma phob pa// gri snying rtags la rten du gzung// tshes gcig nas ni nyer gcig bar// rang lan nag po mdun du bsam// oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na gu h+ya raM sid+d+hi hUM

phaT/ bsnyen rtags byung nas rbad bsad gdags// tri yaM ru tra hUM b+h+yo/ mun shi b+h+yo/ mun nag shi b+h+yo/ ru tra nag po dgra bo'i snying la pu tri tsit+ta rbad/ bu nri mA ra ya rbad/ gsol ka bskul bya drag tu rbad/ dpal
gtor 'og gi ling ga de// gris gtub thun brab dgug 'dab sreg/ thal ba mchod rten lam 'og mnan// mdor na 'di nyid gsol kas 'grub// gsang sgrub 'di bzhin sus sgrub pa// ma n-ing lus dang grib ma
bzhin du 'khor// ces gsungs so// dpal ma ning gsang ba'i las rgyud nag po las/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum du sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa/ kye kye/ che mchog
dpal chen he ru ka/ las sbyor srog ser cho 'phrul gtad// lag len rim pas bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ che mchog he rus bka' stsal pa// gsang bdag chen po yang nyon cig/ lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma

la// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i sku dgra ldang// de tshe log lta tshar bcad pa'i// gsad pa srog gi las sbyor ni// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi'i dbus// khru gang gru gsum 'brub khung nang// dgra du yod pa'i

ling ga dag/ nal bu rkyal pa'i nang du grub// lte bar 'bri ru g.yas pa gzugs// lpags phur brgyad kyis tha ma bskor// skye tshe shang tshe thun gyis brab// 'bri ru'i nang blug sngags kyi sbal// nal bu'i lte bar mi
rkang gzud// nang nas sngags thun bcas pas brab// zhag grangs bdun gsum nyer gcig tu// spu gri ngar ma'i sngags rgod 'di// ma yengs sel med thog ltar 'phags// mA ra ya thun b+h+yo/ ab pra sib pre/ e
sna phu ni/ i sa tra bo ro// khin na khin na/ a bo ro// sad ta sad ta// khrid ta khrid ta/ drag sngags bdun re bzlas pas// dgra bo dngos nyams khrid nas gsod// gsod mkhan nga yi gdan 'og gi/ mu stegs
rab 'jigs kho na ste// srog gi mthar thug de kho na'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ser ba 'bebs na 'di ltar bya// zangs gzhog nang du rdzas bsags pa// ra khrag khyi khrag rta khrag

dang// mngal khrag dug sna tshogs tshad bsags// mdzo 'am khyi 'am phag pa 'am// de rnams med na gang rnyed pa'i// 'o ma dgra yul sngo sna bsags// yungs kar rnams la bzlas te sgrub// tsan dan phur ba sor

bzhi la// sngags bris dgra bo'i 'ongs dkyil gzugs// yang na chu shing nag po yi// phur pa gza' bdud ma ning sgom// sngags bzlas chu mig zhing dkyil sba// zangs gzhong rdzas la thab byas la// dgra bo yul

du khyab par gtor// oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha na g+hu ya raM sid+d+hi hUM/ mi sha ku ru/ bya sha ku ru/ byi sha ku ru/ sad ku ru/ ku ru raM/ sad ku ru/ ku mi ni ra skye/ prad nya sa la nir hUM hUM phaT phaT/ shi ra yag shaM phob/ hUM hUM

phob/ ar+ya rag sha hril hril/ du ru du ru phob/ ha na ha na dril dril/ du na du na rol/ pa tsa pa tsa phob/ badzra badzra ha la ha la/ phu ha phu ha/ hab hob ya/ rtsa dmar rtsa dmar/ ser ba phob ya/ ad god taM/ a badzra

badzra/ ser ba phob yA/ rtsa dmar rtsa dmar/ hU ru hU ru hril hril/ a bya ha bya/ ba hu ba hu/ sdang ba'i dgra bo 'khor bcas kyi// mkhar khyim zhing la thog ser phob// 'phran tshegs tsam la byas gyur na// mu ge'i

chad pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// cho 'phrul 'bebs na 'di ltar bya// gla ba dang ni ba glang dang// wa dang srin bya pho rog sogs// klad snying spu rkang sha khrag sogs// gtor mar blug la

sngags 'di bzlas// gtor zor dgra yi khyim la brdeg/ 'od dang sems can de dag ni// gzugs ni snang la rang bzhin med// dgra yi dbang po 'khrul nas 'ong// oM hi la ka she'u re'u hUM/ oM tro te a she'u re'u

hUM/ oM go re she'u re'u hUM/ oM tsit+ta she'u re'u hUM/ oM kas to re she'u re'u hUM/ oM kas to re she'u re'u hUM/ zhes zhag bdun bzlas pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nag po klu la gtad

pa'i thabs// klu rigs rnam pa grangs mang yang// klu gnyan sa bdag mtsho sman bzhi// gtod pa bzhir 'dus skam gtad de dang mtshungs// gang la gtod kyang 'di ltar bya// bum pa ling ga rdzas kun la// rang

dri kha rlangs mi gtang zhing// bum rdzas dkar gsum mngar gsum dang// rin chen dar sna klu sman sogs// rnal 'byor rdzas la bsnyen pa bya// gnyen pa'i bdag po de la gtad// drag gtad gang byed rdzas lnga
la// bum skyed rdzas lnga re bar blug/ bum pa re bas dril la gtad// klu rtags med na yi ge bdun// zhabs la dza bzlas pas rtags 'byung// dgra'i ming gzhug/ tis ta rbad ni las sngags so// bzlog pa'i
rtags mtshon ma byung na// dza dang che ge mo gzhug/ sngags rnams bzlas/ des ni rang srangs nan tan skyed// gsang sngags 'bru drug po 'di bzlas// ni ma ta sa na ga ti ta rbad/ dza che ge mo rngogs
nas 'dom gang khru gang gyen la can// rang 'byung phur pas rkos la gtad// mang por 'dras na gtad la thug/ gtad ni kun gyi las mtha' yin// gtad ni 'phyor med thebs ga sdeng ngo// kha ru mi brjod gsang
la gtad// dpal nag po chen po 'phrin las kyi rgyud las/ las sbyor srog ser cho 'phrul gtad kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// gsang bdag chen pos yang gsol pa/ kye kye/ bcom ldan dpal chen he
ru ka/ bran por sde brgyad ji ltar bkol// yang 'khol brgyad po ji ltar 'gyed// sgrub mchog mtshon cha gang la bgyi// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ che mchog he ru kas bka' stsal pa// gsang bdag

chen po yang nyon cig/ dmag 'gyed bran po rten pa ni// dregs pa lha srin sde brgyad yin// smyo 'bog gtong ba rgyal po'i sde// mdze shu gtong ba klu yi sde// thog ser gtong ba gza' yi sde// rims nad gtong ba

ma mo'i sde// gzer thabs gtong ba btsan gyi sde// thibs nad gtong ba dmu yi sde// khram nad 'debs pa bdud kyi sde// pho log gtong ba srin po'i sde// dred sdigs gzer ba gnad kyis bcun// smyo 'bog rgyal

po 'khol 'dod na// mgon khang rnying par sog nas kyang// maN+Dal ra khrag chag chag gdab// le phyi gtsang ma gru bzhi gding// gyi ling gser mdog thod pa la// rgyal mkhar gling bzhi bri bar bya// dar zab kyis
brgyan smyug tshigs dgu// nam mkha' dkar po dgu 'phar gzugs// dkar po gsum gyi snying srog bcas// dar dang zab kyis brgyan pa gzugs// stag dang bya rgod rgyal mtshan btsugs// dar dkar tshal gyi
tri gnas pas// 'od dkar sprul nag 'khril ba'i tri// srog bdag bla srog der gnas pas// bus pa gcer bu spu med cig/ snying dkar bla srog dmigs pa'i rten// ting nge 'dzin gyis mi gtang zhing// dmigs

pa gyad du 'gyur ba dang// srog gi snying po 'di bzlas pas// sha rul dong du bcug pa la// sha sbrang nam mkha' 'khor ba ltar// las kyi skal ba'i mi ma yin// cir yang sprul cing nyams bag len// brten par

byas te nges par brtag/ ci byung dngos grub yin shes na// gcer bu spu med mchan du 'ong// ci bya zer nas bka' stsal don// dgos pa'i tha tshigs bka' bsgos te// sha khrag rog po lta bu la// snying khrag bran

po lta bur bstan// mngal khrag nu zho sbyar la gtor// bud med bla khab thod du bcings// gong gi rtan la g.yab cing 'dul// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas sngags 'di bzlas// tri badzra tri badzra tri badzra yA ta sta sta/ badzra aM
gu sha dza/ 'bar ba las kyi shan pa'i srog/ rgyal po'i sde dpon bran du 'khol// rnal 'byor pa yi las kun 'grub// a+thi+-i/ mdze shu'i mnga' bdag klu yi sde// khol po dgra la dmag 'dren no// gro ga

shing shun ming rus bri// bar dkar dmar mar gyis bri// tshon skud bcings la rbad nang gzhug/ ri lu glang ru nang du gzhug/ gza' dang gtun cing rtags la sbyar// nA ga gu ra ling snying la 'dus 'dus// snying

khrag ba mo rul snying la 'dus// nA ga ken rtsi snying la 'dus// nA ga du nA nri snying la 'dus 'dus/ dgra bo ni song ni chod/ snying la 'dus 'dus// sa ma ya daM daM dza/ de byas dgra bo gri ru 'chi// lhag ma bdun
brgyud mdze nad 'byung// thog ser bdag po gza' yi sde// gza' rgod bdud po 'khol 'dod na// sbrul sngon dag gi shun pa la// lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu'i gzugs// tshon rtsis legs bris dmigs rten

bya// rtags byung dngos grub blang par bya// sa sha mi ge ga ra thang nu a hri/ grub nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ gza' yi 'phrin las sna tshogs kun// thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// rims nad gtong

ba ma mo'i sde// 'khol 'dod dri yi thod pa ru// snying bcug de'i nang ling ga bcug/ dar gyis kha bcad rgod sgro btsugs// thod pa byad gzhug gru gsum gzhug/ ra lug bya nag thun rdzas mchod// thu brab brda

ka'i dmod sngags bzla// ma mA snying kha ma ma rag sha/ trag rag sha snying kha khrag/ ma hU ba dza dza/ che ge la rbad ya/ ma ning snying tsit+ta la thin/ traka mo rag sha thun/ mugs myogs rbad dza dza/ ma thun snying khrag thun sha

ti ta ma rag mo// ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma mo'i srog sde'i rbad gsad dril// rtags 'byung ling ga gdab srog mnan// dgra la rims nad rgyu gzer 'byung// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// drag po btsan rnams 'khol
'dod na// nub ltas brag dmar zangs 'dra'i gnas// maN+Dal ra khrag chag chag gdab// gser skyems dpang btsugs bden pa bdar// dkyil 'khor zhi rgyas dbang drag rtsig/ ra sha ra khrag gtor mar

gtang// yi dam lha sgom sngags rgod bzlas// oM a bi shu sa ma yA trig shaM rbad b+h+yo/ lag len sdebs la khong bkrul na// btsan rgod dngos su khol por 'khol// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dmu yi bran po
khol 'dod na// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal bsham// mon nag dig pa'i thod pa ru// dgra yi ling ga bris la gzhug/ sngo dmar byad gzhug phur la brtod// rang nyid yi dam lhar sgom la// ga las dmu yi rgyal
po skyed// aM mun mun pa ni ga dza zhes bzlas so// dmu rje btsan po khol du 'khol// dgra la dmu rje thibs nad 'byung// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// khram 'debs bdud sde 'khol 'dod na// nub phyogs
brag nag rtsar song la// maN+Dal nag po zur gsum bsham// nag po gsum gyi snying sna sogs// mthun pa'i dam rdzas gtor ma gtang// bdud kyi drag sngags bdun pa bzlas// srog bdud nag

po thod 'phreng can// sngun du 'ong nas ci bya zer// dam bsre las gzhol bla rdo bcangs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// srin po bran du 'khol 'dod na// skyes pa dar ma'i snying srog rtsar// bdun po'i bla byang

bris la gzhug/ tshon skud kyis dkris rta thod rtsal// ag rtse ba nas thun sngags brdeg/ yungs kar yungs nag skye tshes brab// rag sha srin po sa mu dza// rag sha ru tra hUM b+h+yo/ ru gnyen nag po cho cho sa// che ge ba
du se shig sod/ gtor ha ba le hob la thun b+h+yo/ zhe bzlas srin po bran du khol// dred sdigs gzir ba las la bcun// 'di dag logs na med// dpal chen rig rtsal cir yang sgyur// nag po sprul 'gyed
'khol ba gces// ma ning las rgyud nag po las/ bran pho sde brgyad 'khol ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ kye kye/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru

ka/ rgyud 'di'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs gang// ji ltar bzung zhing bcang bar bgyi// su la gsang zhing su la gtad// ces gsol pas/ che mchog he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ gsang bdag chen po khyod nyon cig/ nga

yi rgyud chen kun 'dus pa'i// bde gshegs yongs kyi srog 'dus pas// gsang ba srog rgyud ces kyang grags// dregs pa spyi yi rgyud 'dus pas// dregs pa spyi rgyud ces kyang bya// lha 'dre yongs kyi gtso yin
pas// gtso mchog chen po'i rgyud ces bya// sems can kun gyi mgon mdzad pas// mgon po'i rgyud chen zhes kyang bya// pho mo klu gsum 'dir dril bas// dril rgyud chen po zhes kyang bya// dgra bgegs thams

cad 'dir sgrol bas// drag po sgrol rgyud ces kyang bya// pho mo gang du ma nges shing// sangs rgyas 'phrin las bdag mdzad pas// ma ning las rgyud nag por grags// zhi rgyas dbang drag thun mong mchog/ 'das

dang ma 'das kun dbang sgyur// 'di ni nor bu rin po che// ma rig mun sel sgron ma'o// rgyud 'di rin chen gser gyis bris// rtag tu mi 'bral lus la bcang// phyi nang gsang ba'i rten rdzas bcang// rgyun du

bsnyen sgrub nar mar byed// dus kyi mchod pa mi bcag cing// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang// chos skyong ma ning gtso 'khor la// brtse gdung gus pa rgyun mi bcad// dpal mgon ma ning las rgyud 'di// bla ma

mi 'khur rang cher 'dzin// dbul ba mi nus stong zhus byed// dad gus med cing g.yo khram byed// rab 'bring tha ma'i zhabs tog med// pha ma dkon mchog mi 'khur zhing// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i spyi tshogs
med// gtsug lag khang 'joms sde 'khrugs skyong// kha gsag stong zhus nyams len mi skyong dang// gnag pa snying rus med cing blo mi brtan// de lta bu la bka' 'di gsang// dad med g.yem la
phyar la bka' 'di gsang// dam tshig sdom pa nyams la bka' 'di gsang// snod med rang dgar mod la bka' 'di gsang// skal med rang don can la bka' 'di gsang// de lta bu la 'di shor na// rgyal

khams mes sregs bskal pa chus 'khru bas// de bas rab tu nan tan gces// mgo la me 'bar khong du sbrul zhugs kyang// chu srin gre bar rin chen tshud pa bzhin// bskal pa 'khrug kyang khar mi dbyung// gong

bstan snod med rnams la 'di spel na// ma ning nag po nyid kyis srog rtsa chad// srog thig nag pos tshe yi 'du byed bskul// lha srin sde brgyad rnams kyis bka' 'di srungs// nam zhig las can rdo rje thod 'phreng
rtsal// spyan ras gzigs sprul 'di la bka' 'di gtod// des kyang gter nas gter du sbos// DA ki las kyi dbang mo che// mkha' 'gro gtso mo khyod kyis bka' 'di srungs// ched du gnyer ro shor ra

re// nam zhig dus kyi tha ma la// sems can rnams ni nyon mongs rang dgar spyod// chos pa rnams ni chos gzhung spangs nas chos brgyad skyong// sgom chen sgom sgrub mi byed bsod nams skyong// gsang sngags
bskyed rdzogs chos rnams skyangs la// dge bshes thos bsam spangs nas bzang rdzus byed// mtshan nyid sde gsum chos la yang// dge bcu pha rol phyin drug dang// lam lnga sa bcu spyod mkhan med// dkon
mchog gsum gyi dbu 'phang dma'// dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa nyams// gtsug lag khang la bdag 'dzin phyugs ra byed// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kun// bdag 'dzin ru tra khengs pa'i tshe// de

dus skal ldan byang sems can// sngon dus sa lam rab sbyangs ba// de dus kun la snying rje che// rgyu 'bras chos kun ma lus mkhyen// rig pa'i gnas kun blo kha bye// rigs rtsal phyogs med kun sgrol bdag/ blo

brtan blo zab blo che ba// gsang sngags spyi gnad kun la goms// bla ma la gus gtong phod che// dbang rigs yongs rdzogs mched la dung// gtsug lag khang skyong stan tshis che// rang don ma yin gzhan don

brtson// lus srog bab kyang chos mi 'dor// bla ma'i bka' tsam mi cog cing// yi dam bsnyen sgrub mi cog pa// chos skyong dus mchod mi cog pa// gtsang rme chung zhing dpa' brtul che// de lta bu yi skal ldan
la// bka' 'di ston cig sa ma ya// des kyang rang don ma yin gzhan don du// bdag 'dzin ru tra thams cad bsgral// ces gsungs so// dpal mgon ma ning gsang ba 'phrin las nag po'i rgyud chen po las/
mtshan gyis rnam grangs bstan pa dang/ snod med la gsang zhing snod ldan la gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yum khro mo gnam zhal ma dang/ rigs 'dzin chen po rdo rje chos

dang/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mgrin gcig tu bstod pa/ e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// chos sku skye med ngang nas ni// longs sku 'gag med dpal chen sku// sku sprul 'gro 'dul stobs po che// ru tra
bdud sde dpung bcas ma lus thul// rtsal chen thogs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal chen sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i sku// ma rungs 'dul dka' bdud sde ji snyed btul// lha yul sum cu rtsa gsum
gnas su lha yi dmag dpon mdzad// phrag dog lha ma yin rnams brlag par mdzad// lha rnams g.yul rgyal bstan par dar rgyas mdzad// lha chen dpal 'bar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dbang brgya byin dang

lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag mang pos bstod pa/ ma la ya yi rtse mo ru// dur khrod thod mkhar me rlung tshub dkyil du// ru tra sde gsum sde brgyad ma lus btul// gsang sngags bskyed rdzogs bstan pa dar rgyas

mdzad// dpal mgon ma ning sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi thod pa can gyis bstod pa/ bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du// lta log sum brgya drug cu bcom// grub mtha' ngan pa kun tshar bcad// mu stegs bstan

pa gtan nas brlag/ zhing skyong ma mo mkha' 'gros bskor// nag po chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid rtsa bdag 'dzin 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// pha rol phyin drug spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyod pa
rlabs chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid rtsa bdag 'dzin gzi mdangs can la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtsal chen gzi mdangs can la phyag 'tshal bstod// nag po thod 'phreng khyod la phyag 'tshal

bstod// rigs 'dzin srog shing khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sa chu mnga' bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud 'dul dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshogs kyi bdag po khyod la phyag 'tshal
bstod// gtsug lag khang skyong khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces don dang mthun pas bstod do// de nas yum khro mo gnam zhal ma dang/ sprul pa'i mgon po rnams dang/ ma ning mched bzhi la sogs pa rnams

'od du gyur nas/ yab kyi thugs kar thim/ dpa' bo yab chen che mchog he ru ka snang la rang bzhin med pa/ nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon ltar dbyings su thim mo// slar yang sprul pa du ma 'gyed do// de nas rigs

'dzin gsang ba'i bdag po dang/ lha ma srin sde brgyad dang/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro las kyi dbang mo che dang/ 'khor mkha' 'gro bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang/ sha za 'bum gyi tshogs dang/ ma mo bye ba'i tshogs
dang/ khro bo 'bum gyi tshogs dang/ lang+ka dur khrod bdag po dang/ bdud 'dul nyi khri chig stong gi tshogs dang/ thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
do// dpal chen po sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa ye shes kyi mgon po ma ning nag pos dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa'i ma ning las rgyud nag po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// sha mi la zhus/
'bring gis bris/ sa ma yA/ kha thaM/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ man tra/ gu yA/ a+thi+-i//// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la pa tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po skyes pa'i rgyud/ nag
po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ yul rgya gar gyi lho phyogs na/ me ltar 'bar ba'i dur khrod chen po'i dbus u tsa la bya ba'i gling/ thod

pa skam rlon mang po brtsigs pa'i gzhal yas khang/ bdud pho dang bdud mo grong khyer bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbus/ thod mkhar gsum brtsegs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang bya ba/ rmang srin po'i ro las byas

pa/ rtsig pa'i mi'i thod pa las byas pa/ ro'i rgyal mtshan phyogs bzhir 'phyar ba/ ngos la khrag gi zar bu 'bab pa/ kha bad mchong las byas pa/ nad kyi na bun rgyun mi 'chad pa/ de yi gnas kyi pha rol na/ ma mo
dang mkha' 'gro ma sogs pa/ ka li ma dal ti ma dal ti ma dang/ ro langs ma dang/ kang ka ma dang/ srin mo mi ro'i bdag mo la sogs pa da ltar gnas so// brgya byin dang/ rag shi ta dang/ kA la nag mo

dang/ bgris gnas sa ya do dang/ ma hA krig ti kA la sogs pa gnas so// dur khrod de'i phyi na/ lce spyang dang/ ro spyang dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ bya'i rnam pa kang ka dang/ khwa ta dang/ de ltar gnas so// de

la dur khrod brgyad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas so// nag po chen po skye rgyud las/ gleng bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas zhus pa/ srid pa las kyi skyes pa'i phyir// pha dang ma yi mtshan
nyid dang// spun gyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// zhus pas/ nyon cig las kyis 'brel ba'i bu// sku mkhar thod pa'i gzhal yas nas// pha dregs pa bdud kyi rgyal po dang// ma smu za ral gcig bshos pa

las// bu spun rnam pa bzhi ru byung// shar gyi skos rje brang dkar dang// lho yi ral pa spyi bcings dang// nub kyi nag po bkrag med dang// byang gi legs ldan nag po dang// de ltar mched bzhi bltams pa

las// las su srog dbugs la dbang byed// shar gyi skos rje brang dkar de// rus pa'i mtsho yi klad pa za// lho yi ral pa spyi bcings de// dbugs kyi mtsho yi glo ba za// nub kyi nag po bkrag med de// khrag gi
mtsho yi mchin pa za// byang gi legs ldan nag po de// sha yi mtsho yi mkhal ma za// las mkhan zhes byar btags pa las/ rje nyid kyis snang ngo// skye rgyud las pha ma dang spun gyi le'u ste gnyis

pa'o//// de nas yang zhus pa/ kye/ nag po chen po srog la dges// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ de nas sku mkhar de'i rtse la byon te/ mo'i kha rlangs bzhin spar nas bod pa/ rbad

pa/ gsad pa gsum 'brug gi sgra ltar bsgrags nas/ 'di skad gsungs so// oM ma hA kA la g+hu hri d+ha hUM/ zhes yi dam du gsungs so// de nas bdud kyi sngags 'di gsungs so// oM ma hA kA la trag shad/ sid+d+hi yaM
du dza dza hUM/ de skad bsgrags pas/ la la ni brgyal/ la la ni rengs/ la la ni 'bog nas/ bdud kyi grong khyer dang/ bdud thams cad gus pa phul te/ khrag gi me tog gtor nas/ bdud kyi gtso bor dbang
bskur te/ dar gyi ru mtshon phyar/ bdud rta chibs/ dbang rtags su snying dang zhags pa bskur/ dpa' rtags kyi stag ral gzugs shugs btags nas/ bdud dmag dpung dang bcas te gshegs so// ri rab

rtse la bzhugs te/ skye 'gro srang la bcal/ dam nyams pa'i gshed byas so// ri rab rtse na ngan sngags srog la 'bebs pa 'di bka' stsal to// oM ma hA kA las snying 'byin to// snying la su tri tsit+ta rbad/ oM ma hA kA

la nr-i thuM lam thuM ril rbad/ su tri ma ra ya dza/ che ge mo'i snying la ya/ ma hA kA la gtubs/ rbad thum ril rbad/ thum ril brang rgyab nas gshogs/ tsit+ta breng yed yed mA ra dza/ de skad gsungs so// skye rgyud las
drag po sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang zhus pa/ bsgrub pa'i las byed ji ltar byed// dkyil 'khor gtor ma ji ltar byed// las kyi mjug sdud ji ltar sdud// nag po chen pos bka'

stsal pa// bod rbad bsad dang gsum la bya// 'brub khung gtor ma gzhung bzhin btang// srog mnan 'phang ba'i cho ga bya// bod pa'i dam rdzas rten la bya// rbad pa'i dam rdzas snying la bya// bsad pa'i dam rdzas

srog la bya// bod pa rbad pa bsad pa gsum// dkyil 'khor rdzas dang bsgrub rdzas gsum// ming po sring mo g.yog po gsum// mnan dang lding dang spar dang gsum// skye rgyud bsgrub thabs shi sa dang// mdor
bsdus nas ni bstan pa'o// nag po chen po'i skye rgyud las/ mdor bsdus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// rdzogs so//////

@##// rgya gar skad du/ shri ma hA kA li de bi b+h+yo tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo srog rtsa dmar po gzer ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag

gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje hU~M mdzad chen po/ dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ de nyid du dpal lha mo nag mo 'khor bdud mo bye ba 'bum dang bcas pa

'dus nas/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la/ lha mo nag mos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'gro mgon rdo rje 'dzin// bdag cag bdud mo 'khor tshogs kyi// zas dang skom ni gang la bya// las dang skal ni gang

gang bya// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ji ltar bgyi// thun dang zor dang sbyin sreg dang// mnan pa'i las ni ji ltar bgyi// srog gi snying po ji ltar drang// rdo rje 'dzin la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka'

stsal pa// nyon dang bdud mo 'khor tshogs rnams/ khyed kyi zas dang skom du ni// mi dbang gri rgod sha snying khrag/ khyed kyi zas dang skom du byos// khyed kyi las dang skal du ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung pa
dang// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo la// bsad cing bsgral ba nyid du byos// dpal ldan lha mo srog rtsa dmar po gzer ba'i rgyud las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// hU~M mdzad chen pos bka'

stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo nag mo khyed/ khyed kyi bsnyen par bsgrub pa ni// bshad kyi legs par yid la zung// bdag nyid hU~M mdzad chen po yi// ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgoms nas su// mdun du b+h+ruM las thod
pa yi// gzhal yas khang bsam dbus su ni// g+ha ta pa hU~M zhes brjod pas// gdan mchog bong bu bsam par bya// de stengs lha mo nag mo ni// nag mo rngam pa'i ral pa can// ral gri thod khrag phyag

na thogs// dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa yi// sa bon b+h+yo las b+h+yo 'phros pas// bdud mo 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor// me rlung 'tshub ma'i pho brang du// bsgoms te thod rlon phyag rgya yis// gtor ma byin nas gang

bsgo byed// dpal lha mo nag mo srog rtsa dmar mo gzer ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// yang ni bshad kyis lha mo nyon// sngags zhes bya ba srog yin te// ma mo rang dbang med

par 'gug/ oM mahA ka li re ma ti/ ma ma ru lu rag sha re ma ti/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo dza dza/ oM ru ru tsar tur a shug me/ pra ti ru tra kha shag rag mo hU~M/ rag sha tsit+ta sa ma ya ku ru kha tsit+ta nan/ oM ru ru be ro ru hU~M/ ti sta

ba to si rag mo snying la kha rag mo thun b+h+yo dza dza/ ru lu re ma ti sa ma ya pra ma ha sti pra rag mo ru lu b+h+yo dza dza/ kha rag ti kim ma dza dza/ kha le thun b+h+yo/ thun ma ma b+h+yo/ hU~M rag mo ni rag sha ku ru thun rbad rag mo ar+Ya
dza dza/ ti kim kha le b+h+yo b+h+yo/ sa ma ya che ge mo ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ bod rbad bsad pa thun dang bzhi// gcig tu dril nas bstan pa'o// dpal lha mo srog rtsa dmar po gzer ba'i rgyud las/ sngags
bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas lha mo nag mo yis// thun gyi man ngag gsang ba bstan// gru gsum bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rtsang dang phur bu srin mo 'gros// nal phrug sha yi bstan gtor

dang// chur shi srin lag g.yab mo bya// g.yag ru lkugs par ling ga gzhug/ rang nyid bdud mo nag mor bsgom// bsgrub bya srog rtsa drangs la gzung// bsgrub bya gsal bar dmigs nas su// rlung spros lha mo

nag mo ste// g.yas kyi gri gug srog rtsa sgral nas gcod// g.yon gyi thod khrag sems kyi mar mo bsad// bdud rtsi hU~M gi ngo bo 'phrog par byed// 'bud pa'i rlung gis mar mo skad kyis bsad// grang ba'i rlung
gis thig le rtsa nas 'dren// drug cu rtsa gcig thun gyis dmigs bya bsad// gtor ma che na dngos grub chung// de bas nal sha la sogs pa'i// gtor ma dag la nan tan bskyed// gzhan yang dam tshig bshad

par bya// yugs sa dag la mi 'bag cing// mgar ba dag dang tshang mi bsre// nal bu nal ma'i mtshang mi 'bru// me mi gsang la rlung mi smad// bong bu mi brdeg lha mo yi// dam tshig 'di la nan tan bskyed// de

ltar byas na rtags 'byung ste// rtags kyi man ngag bshad par bya// rab ni sku ston dngos grub sna tshogs ster// 'bring ni 'od dang sgra dang tshub ma 'ong// tha ma rmi lam dag tu ni// bud med brgyan dang ldan pa

yi// bdag la bkur sti byed pa'o// ling ga 'tsheg na bsgrub bya khugs// bsgrub bya sha bshus bshas byed dang// sha dang rgyu ma za ba dang// skyug bro la sogs byung gyur na// bsgrub bya gsod par the tshom

med// gal te de ltar ma byung na// ma mo dbang du ma 'dus pas// shi sa bstan pa'i las bshad do// ma mo'i spyi bo'i steng du ni// phyag na rdo rje bsam pa yis// spyi bor mnan nas gzir bsams la// sngags

'di bdun nam nyi shu gcig/ oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na// ma hA ka li re ma ti nan// ces brjod pas/ lha mo bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// bran bzhin ci sgo las rnams byed// dpal lha mo srog rtsa dmar po gzer
ba'i rgyud las/ bsad pa thun gyi las dang/ rtags dang/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang ni bshad par bya// bdud mo srog gi gzer chung gi/ bsgrub bya bsad pa zor gyi rim pa

bshad par bya// thun khung byang shar zur la ni// ltas ngan sre mo'i sgo nga'i nang du// rims khrag dug rnams blug par bya// shar lho zur la gri thod du// gri khrag dug sna tshogs tshad blug/ nub byang zur la phag thod
du// mdze khrag ram bu dug rnams blug/ rang nyid ma mor gnas pa yis// spos dkar la sogs thun rdzas la// bod rbad bsad pa'i thun sngags kyis// rim pa bzhin du brab par bya// zor la me
'bar thon pa dang// bdud chos zhugs la ma mor bsgom// byang ri mthon po'i khar song la// ma mo bsgoms la zor du 'phang// bsgrub bya rlag par the tshom med// dpal lha mo nag mo srog rtsa dmar po gzer

ba'i rgyud las/ bsad pa zor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las rnams me yis 'grub pa ste// sbyin sreg cho ga 'di ltar bya// thab tu gdug pa'i shing rdzas la// rigs ngan khyim du

me sbar la// dbus su lha mo dpon g.yog bsam// nal sha ling ga bcas pas bsreg/ ag ne ye kro d+ha dz+wa la raM raM che ge mo ma ra ya phaT/ de yis brgya byin 'chi bar bstan// mjug sdud mnan pa'i las bshad

de// ling ga g.yag ru rtse rgyal bcug/ rgya gram gnyan sa gang rung du// legs par mnan pa'i las byas nas// bskal par thar dus med do// dpal lha mo srog rtsa dmar po gzer ba'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg dang
mnan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nga yi gsang ba'i rgyud chen 'di// bdud mo 'khor tshogs khyed la gtad// bstan pa bsrung ba'i mtshon cha yin// gzhan du bstan par ma
gsungs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pas// dpal lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa dga' zhing mgu nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dpal lha mo sro rtsa dmar po gzer
ba'i rgyud las/ gtad cing rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/// dpal lha mo srog gzer ma'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ e truM ka la rag sh+mo kro d+ha tan+t+ra/

bod skad du/ srog tig nag mo srin mo khros pa'i rgyud/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// dur khrod chen po khrag gi rba klong 'khyil ba'i rag ta rgya mtsho

gting 'khol zhes bya ba 'jig rten srin mo 'dul zhing 'khrugs pa'i dbus na/ dpal khro mchog ya man ta ka snang srid ma mo dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rngam par bzhugs te/ e ya ma sa ma ya ma ma rag

mo srog la dun dun dza dza dza/ badzra kar ma rag sha du tri hri tri/ zhes rngam par bsgrags pas/ 'jig rten ma mo thams cad kyang rab tu snying zags te/ bya skyung kha lhags pa ltar gyur to// dbyings dang ye shes las

gyur pa dang/ srid pa sman mo la sogs pa thams cad dpal ya man ta ka'i 'khor na nye bar 'dun to// de'i tshe srid pa'i ma mo stong rtsa brgyad kyi nang na mthu byin che ba/ 'phrin las thams cad kyi bdag po
sprul pas 'jig rten rlag par byed pa/ srin mo re ma ti dang/ srin mo nag mo tshe 'phrog ma dang/ srin mo nag mo bla 'gugs ma dang/ srin mo nag mo srog len ma dang/ srin mo nag mo snying 'phrog

ma dang/ bdud gsod byed nag po dang/ rgyal po g.yu 'phreng smyo byed dang/ ging gsang ba pho log gi bdag po dang/ srog bdag gshan pa dmar po dang/ srid gsum srin mo 'khrugs pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje ging
ka ra'i tshogs dang/ thams cad nyid gtso bo la mngon par 'dud do// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor de dag gi nang nas dpal lha mo re ma ti langs te/ dpal chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye/ rab tu mi
bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gzi brjid 'bar ba dbang bsdus la// srin mo 'dus pa'i dmod gzir rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ de yang dpal chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'phrin las
bdag mo re ma ti// rnal 'byor can gyi don du zhus pa legs// srin mo khros pa'i dmod pa gsang ba'i gzer// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// ma grub spogs pa shi sa dang// lo thog gzhom pa la sogs
pa'i// las kyi rim pa ngas bshad kyis// bde byed lha mo yid la zung// zhes gsungs so// srog tig nag mo srin mo khros pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dpal gshin rje gshed

pos srog tig nag mo bsgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// dur khrod chen po gsar rnying gling// brag nag spungs pa'i sa phyogs su// phung sa dag la sogs pa yi// maN+Dal mda' gang khrag gis byugs// dbus kyi pho

brang zlum po la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rab tu mdzes// thod 'phreng skam rlon tshogs kyis bskor// sgo bzhi lcags ri me 'od 'bar// srin mo nyid dang las byed bzhi// sgrol ging bzhi yi rten rdzas dgram// rang

sngags sham bu a mu ka/ rtsa rgyud chod cig brjod cing dgod// rgyal mtshan bzhi dang keng rus dgram// dpal dang ma mo'i b+ha liM dang// mthun rdzas dag kyang tshang bar dgram// de nas bdag nyid lus srang

la// skye med rnam dag byang chub sems// stong pa chen po'i rol ba cir yang snang// snang tsam nyid nas snang ba'i dngos dang bral// mtha' dbus med cing phyogs cha kun bral bsgom// rdzogs pa chen po'i ngang
las ma g.yos kyang// log rtog ma rtogs sems can thams cad kun// bde chen klong du bsgral ba'i thig ler bsgom// ma rtogs sems can nyon mongs 'khrul pa kun// bde chen 'od kyi pho brang 'od kyi ga

bur bsgral// 'od 'dus yi ge hU~M du bsgom par bya// hU~M las 'bru lnga yum lnga'i klong du dag/ dur khrod gzhal yas lhun gyis grub pa'i dbus// lha chen dregs pa'i gdan la nga nyid rdzogs// dbu gsum phyag drug
zhabs drug bgrad// mdun du ma las ra zhes brjod pa las// dug mtsho nang du mi ro rta ro bkram// dre mo kham nag zhon nas tshub ma'i dbus// gtso la 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis rab tu blta// srin

mo bzhi dang sgrol ging chen po bzhi// 'bum sde bsdus pa'i tshogs rnams gnas su 'khod// ye shes las kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// oM ya man ta ka sa ya dza hU~M a/ badzra karma rag sha du tri hri hri dza dza/ a

ti pu ho/ pra ti dzA ho/ shi ya man ta pu tsa kha hi/ i dan d+hu pa/ puSh+pas/ di pa/ g+han d+ha/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ rag sha ru ti tsit+ta khA hi/ i ran b+ha liM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ de nas bdag nyid gsal ba dang/ lha

mo'i thugs kar sur+ya'i dkyil 'khor ma dang bcas pa'i srog snying bsam/ badzra karma rag sha du tri hri hri hri dza dza/ mu tig ltar la rgyus bzhin bzlas// zhag gsum dag nas bdun dgu yis// mtshan rtags ston
par 'gyur ba yin// rtags de byung nas dngos grub blang// dam rdzas tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang// zhes gsungs so// srog tig nag mo khros pa'i rgyud las bsgrub thabs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod cing thugs dam bskul ba 'di gsungs so// skyes pa dar ma'i thod pa ru// spa ra ma ti rag ta snying// ling ling su tra sa ma snying// ku ku rag ta ya pa na dag/ mchod cing thugs
dam gnad nas bskul// hU~M/ sngo nag ma mo mi srun ma// bdud 'dul nag mo ral pa can// ral pa khrag dang phur bus brgyan// sku la stag dang re lde gsol// chibs su dre'u kham nag chibs// nag mo dus

mtha' rtul byed ma// spa ra ma ti rag ta snying// ku ku rag ta su pa na dag/ nag mo mi bsrun mchod pa bzhes/ rag ta ru tri tsit+ta kha hi/ rag+ta sbreng ste mchod pa dbul// las la drag tu rbad pa'i tshe/ hU~M/ bdud

dpung nag po'i dkyil 'khor nas// ya mtshan ma mo sku mdog nag/ bong dre kha nag chibs su chibs// sku la mi lpags rlon pa gsol// stag dang re lde'i sham thabs byas// dbu rgyan lcang lo phru lu lu// ral pa

mun nag thibs se thibs// ya so ma so'i bar bar na// rag ta'i chu rgyun zhams se zhams// zhing chen gyi dpal dar sha ra ra// sbrul nag chun po nyil li li// thod pa'i 'phreng ba khra la la// keng rus mche ba

gtsigs se gtsigs/ khrag dang chu ser zu lu lu// dre mo'i chibs ni stong khams rgyug khyod kyi 'khor ni nag mo mi bsgrangs ma// nag mo 'bum sde bcas pa sprul bar 'gyed/ kha nas me 'bar shin tu nag/ mig

nas khrag 'dzag rab tu khros// nag mo me thogs sha ra ra// mi rkang gling bu skyu ru ru// ban d+ha ltag sprod de ri ri// bdag gis bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// srin mo chen mo bzhi dag dang// sgrol ging
chen po bzhi yang bskul// srog tig nag mo srin mo khros pa'i rgyud las/ thugs dam bskul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ru tra sgrol byed srin mo'i dmod pa 'di

gsungs so// dur khrod sa la byas pa yi// dbus su gru gsum sbags ma brtsigs// gru chad sgo dang ldan par bya/ kha khyer rtsang gis bskor bar bya// nang du rgya sol dug khrag byug/ gru gsum nang du ma ra
gnan// b+ha hu yungs kar thod rtsal khrag/ lum zhing thal ba yungs nag lho// dug dang smre khrag lan tshar sbyar// cha cha nas ni gung la brdeg/ ha la nag mo mi bsrun mi// mig gsum gdong la khrag gis

bskus// tri shul ban dmar phyag na bsnams// mche ba gtsigs shing srog snying 'byin// rdzas la bsngags shing ngar blud la// srin mo bzhi dag sgrol ging bzhi// dmigs pa'i rtsa dang srog gcad nas// sha khrag
srog la gtong bar bsam// drag sngags nyi shu ming dang bcas// 'bru bzhis gcod cing sgrol bar byed// ming bcas 'bru brgyad zor du 'phang// 'bru bzhi mnan cing las mtha' brtul// drag po phyi yi las su
bshad// bsnol dri'i thod par 'khor lo bri// gsang thun brgyad po rim pas dgod// 'brub khung nang du ling ga gzhug/ rabs chad mgo'am glang ru ru// thun rdzas btsal te brab par brtsam// nyi shu ming
btags nyin par brab// thun sngags dgu pas mtshan mo brab// zor 'phang gnas pas las mtha' brtul// drag po nang gi lugs su bshad// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// snying gzer dgu pa'i 'khor lo
bri// rog po lte kar dmigs pa la/ khram byang bcu gsum gdags par bya// snying gzer dgu pa'i 'khor lo bskor// thun sngags dgu pa yis zor thun dbab// nyi shu ming btags phur pas gdab// ra bsgral

tsit+ta ling ga gzhug/ 'khor lo gtums te gdan khram bya// drag po gsang ba'i las su bshad// 'khor lo drag po'i snying gzer dgu// ra rog khram byang dang bcas la// ming po'i sngags dang snying gzer dgu// lto
sngags spu gri nag po ni// yang gsang thugs kyi las su bshad// rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo lte 'og bcas// drag po'i gzer sngags phyi nang dgod// srin mo nag mo'i lto bar dkrug/ drag po spogs ba'i las su
bshad// ces gsungs so// srog tig nag mo khros pa'i rgyud las/ drag po 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo khros pa'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// rtsa ba las dang

bcas pa yi// yid bzhin 'phreng ba 'di lta bu// thugs kyi klong nas bka' stsal pa// badzra kar ma rag sha du ti hri hri dza dza/ dgra bo'i srog la thum ri li li b+h+yo/ hal hal yaM yaM/ khaM rbad subs mugs snying paM rbad/

khraM ha ri baM hur tri trag thums/ ra tri khaM dgra bo'i srog ma ra ya rbad/ badzra ka ru na rbad/ snying khrag tshal pa rbad/ srog la hur thums rbad/ myogs mugs tsit+ta rbad/ stubs tsit+ta la rbad/ tshal bu si na

si du rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thum rbad/ rtsa la thang thang ro// myags rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la ma ra ya rbad/ de dag gnang gi sngags te/ thod pa 'khor lo de la brdeg/ trag shig ha la yaM dgra bo tsit+ta

gzer thums rbad/ rag mo kha lo paM ril dgra bo'i tsit+ta gzer thums rbad/ rag mo tsit+ta breng shag dgra bo'i tsit+ta gzer thums rbad/ rag mo dun ti dgra bo'i tsit+ta gzer thums rbad/ rag mo rtsa tha srog la breng

shag dgra bo'i tsit+ta gzer thums rbad/ thibs khaM shag dun dgra bo'i tsit+t-i gzer thums rbad/ hri pa tsa shu la yaM dgra bo'i tsit+ti gzir thums rbad/ tri ling baM rim dgra bo'i tsit+ti gzer thums rbad/ ra tri khaM tsit+ta shag

dgra bo'i tsit+ta gzer thums rbad/ dgra bo'i srog thun myogs b+h+yo/ srog stam b+ha ya nan/ badzra kar ma rag sha du tri hri hri ma srog la breng breng hur thum dza dza/ ya ma sa ma ya ma ma rag mo srog la dun dun dza dza dza/ ya

ma kro d+ha rag mo ma ma trig nan/ gsang ba snying gzer gnad kyi sngags// 'di dag 'khor lo dkrug pa'o// ra tri khraM dgra bo'i srog la rbad// trag thums dgra bo'i srog la rbad// hur tri dgra bo'i srog la rbad/ khaM ha

ri baM dgra bo'i srog la rbad// snying baM dgra bo'i srog la rbad// rmugs dgra bo'i srog la rbad// subs dgra bo'i srog la rbad/ khaM dgra bo'i srog la rbad// yaM yaM hal hal dgra bo'i srog la ma ra ya rbad// srog

tig nag mo gsang ba'i sngags// dug gi spu gri gdug pa'i mda'// srin mo khros pa'i yang snying ste// lha srin yongs kyi grong khyer yin// ces gsungs so// srog tig nag mo khros pa'i rgyud las/ drag po sngags kyi
le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa'i las 'di gsungs so// rabs chad thod par rdzas sgrubs la// dkyil 'khor gru gsum dag tu dgod// drag po dkrugs pa'i

sngags kyang bri/ b+ha hu dug ltuM bu dang/ ra khyi ma'i rag ta dang/ 'bru sna lnga sngo sna thar bar sbyar/ bsnyen bsgrub rdzogs par thun dgongs la// rta gzhug zor gyis dbab par bya// hal hal yaM yaM khaM rbad/ subs

mugs snying baM rbad/ khaM ha ri baM rbad/ baM ha ri trag thums rbad// ra tri khaM ma ra ya kar phrom du hril/ sa dung du phob/ dmar phroM du hril/ lo dur du phob/ seng dur du phob/ rkyang dur du phob tro la tro ma yaM la/ thun

b+h+yo thun b+h+yo/ nag mo nag mo// thog mda' can b+h+yo/ badzra a si byi ru b+h+yo dza/ pa na b+h+yo b+h+yo mi myur su myur/ cem cem sa ma ya b+h+yo/ nag mon nag mo thog mda' can/ b+h+yo/ srog tig nag mo srin mo khros pa'i rgyud las/
chu 'khyag dbab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub pa rtags kyi le'u 'di gsungs so// gang zag dam tshig rab 'bring gis// mtshan ma rnam pa gsum du

'byung// nag mo khro gnyer ral pa can// bzhin mi sdug la so tham byed// dkyil 'khor dbus su me 'bar dang// rlung ser tshub ma thog ser 'byung// de byung dngos grub blang par bya// mi 'dod byung nas las la
sbyar// grub rtags zhan na las rnams spogs// tshe ldog byed na mnan la dbab// las mjug sngags rnams mas bzlog bzlas// de yis las rnams grub par 'gyur// ra g.yas gsad dang ri dgas shor// bla
shing gcad dang mkhar bshig na// dgra bo'i kha thum 'gum par 'gyur// dam rdzas tshogs kyis gtang rag gtang// srog tig nag mo'i srin mo khros pa'i rgyud las/ grub rtags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ming po srin po nag po'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// maN+Dal 'brub khung gru gsum du// rgyu rten drug gi ling ga gzhug/ rtsibs bdun bdud kyi lto bar bri// ro ras shing shun dag
la'o// nag po ka li ba la b+ha shos// gri mda' mdung la sogs pa ni// ling ga dag la gdab par bya// ra rog dag la khram byang gdags// nag po bdud kyi drag sngags dang// snying gzer dgu pa nyid mtshan

bsnol// ga ro ni sha na shag rbad// tsa ra pa sha na shag rbad// mug ga du na shag rbad// dza la pa tra na shag rbad/ 'du na bu ti na shag rbad/ ram di pu ga na shag rbad/ wa ga sha ling na shag rbad/ hril du rbad/ sa du

ra rbad/ ra shi shi rbad/ ki ki rbad/ tri ling rbad/ tsa shu rbad/ srog gsol srog long/ ga ta a mo ga rbad/ drag sngags brabs shing rab sgral la// ra snying dag la gnan pa bya/ khra ni dgra la zor du 'phang// las
kyi thus ka gsang bar bshad// srog tig nag mo srin mo khros pa'i rgyud las/ ming po bdud dang sbrel ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyi rabs rnal

'byor chen po dag/ nga yis ngan sngags 'di spyod na// rgyud lung spyi yi dbang rnams blangs/ khyad par ma mo'i dbang yang blang// bla ma bka' brgyud ma chad pa'i/ khyad par byin rlabs yod pa las// mnyes pa'i
yon phul dbang yang nod// rag ta'i bum pas dbang yang bskur// ma mo bsgrubs shig lung yang byin// bkra shis dbang du tshe dbang bskur// bsgrub rdzas 'tshogs par dbang bskur na// ci 'dod rdzas la rol
par 'gyur// 'phrin las drag po'i dbang bskur na// thogs med las la 'byams par 'gyur// slob dpon ma mo sbyar byas te// byang sems dbang bskur ci smras nyan// ma mo bu la gtad pa na// ma mo nyid dang
dbyer med 'gyur// dbang thob bu des sdom pa srun// bla ma pha ma rtag tu bkur// rdo rje spun rnams byams pas gdung// lus kyi chas dgu ral nag gyon// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mig

gcad// rnam par mi rtog chod nyid la// rtag tu ma yengs yid la bya// yi dam ma mi gtan mo gsang/ rtsa ba yan lag nyi shu lnga// gsang sngags spyi las grags pas bsrung// srog tig nag mo srin mo khros pa'i
rgyud las/ dam tshig dbang gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpal lha mo re ma ti la 'di skad gsungs so// nyon cig lha mo re ma ti// ma mo rang bzhin shes par gyis// ma ni skye ba
med pa'i dbyings// thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod chen mo// thams cad 'byung bas mkha' klong yang// ma bcos lhun gyis rdzogs pa nas// ma skyes mkha' rtsol sems dang bral// ma ni dag pa chen po'i

gnas// mo ni 'gag med ye shes te// 'phrin las ma btsam chos nyid rol pa'i brgyan/ ji ltar sprul kyang ma las g.yos pa med// ji ltar sna tshogs stong pa nyid la rol// skye 'gag med pa'i klong du mya ngan

'das// ma ni sna tshogs snang ba'i rol par snang// snang tsam nyid na snang ba'i dngos po med// ma ni stong pa chen po'i ngo bor gnas// stong pa nyid na stong stong blo las grol// ma ni rang bzhin bdal ba chen por
gnas// rig pa nyid na rig pa'i ngo bo med// rtag chad mtha' las grol te ye shes la// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun las bgres par gnas// des na thams cad ma mo nyid las 'byung// nyon cig srin mo

'phrul gyi bka' rgyud 'di// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dang ni// dam tshig 'phrin las sna tshogs 'brel ba'i rgyud// drag sngags dug dang mtshon tsha dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnas phyir khyed la
gtad// ces gsungs so// srog tig nag mo srin mo khros pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor la rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas lha mo re ma ti dang/ 'khor srin mo dang/ ging dang/ bdud dang/ srog

bdag dang/ lha dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ste bstod pa/ e ma thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can/ zung ngu'i rtsa ba mi mnga' yon tan ldan// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo thags la

gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gtsug rdo rje 'chang/ khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// srog tig nag mo srin mo khros pa'i rgyud las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// dpal lha mo ma
mo'i srog tig nag mo khros pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so/ a+thi+-i/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya////
rgya gar skad du/ ba tharba nas zhag sam/ bod skad du/ shis bstan pa dpal srog gi 'khor lo'i sdom pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ lha mchog mdzes pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos

pa'i dus gcig na// lha mchog ya man ta ka la/ 'khor gyi ma mo rigs bzhis bskor ba ni/ gtso bo nyid de gnod sbyin tshul// gar byas sgeg pas rab tu brjid// dur khrod chas ni rab tu ldan// sku gsung thugs
sdan thams cad 'dus pa ma mo'i srog/ rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bsdus te thams cad gsang ba'i gnas su bsgral// dug gsum ma spangs rang bzhin gnas su dag/ rnam shes 'chi med keng rus gzhal yas khang// sha

khrag ri ltar spungs nas gdan du bting// hU~M gi glu dbyangs phyogs bcur phaT kyis spros// hU~M dang dza yis thugs khar slar yang bsdus// byang chub sems kyi thig le 'od du gsal// g.yas su kun tu bzang mo
gsal// tshul dang cha byad bstan pa ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi'o// g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis na ban d+ha dril bu 'bar// phyag bzhi shan pa bzhi rnams 'dzin// 'od 'bar gsal 'phro'i sbyor ba
las// ra ma trag dang rtsa bzhi spros// ra las sprul pa'i ma mo 'dus// thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo las// gnod sbyin chen po sku las ni// g.yon nas mgo dgu ral gcig 'khril// ma las dbyings kyi ma mo
'dus// thams cad 'dus pa'i rtse mo ste// mdun na e ka dza ti 'khyil// tsa las las byed ma mo thams cad 'dus// thams cad 'dus pa'i gtso mo ni// gdug byed nag mo gnam lugs zor ba gdong// de
bzhin du rgyab nas 'khyil te rab tu 'khod do// sku'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i skabs te le'u dang po'o//// de nas ma mo rigs bzhi dam du bsdus te thugs dam la gnas par bya ba'i phyir// rdzas bza' zhing
shi sa bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// gnod sbyin stobs ldan nag po'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs kyang gnyis// zhabs gnyis zhing chen bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// zhal gyi 'bri gu gyen

du mdzes// mche ba bzhi ni bsnol mar gtsigs// sku la mthib ber nag po gsol// ral pa kham nag gyen du brdzes// sku stod zhing gi g.yang gzhis brgyan// sku smad chu srin g.yang gzhis klubs// lha srin sde

brgyad dbang du sdud pa'i phyir/ khraM gyi ri mo bdun pa rnams// de dag thams cad dga' ba ston pa'i phyir// g.yon na ga'u'i phor pa bsnams// de yang thams cad mthun pa'i rdzas dang ldan par bsam// sbrul gyi

chun pos phyag zhabs gdug gur brgyan// thod pa skam rlon tshar gsum dbu yi rgyan// de yi sku la ma mo rnams// gsal bar bskyed te rdzas rnams btung// dang po gnod sbyin snying po 'di// dran pa tsam gyi ma
